40001001	This is the family history of Jesus the Messiah . He came from the family of David , who was from the family of Abraham .
40001017	So there were fourteen generations from Abraham to David . There were also fourteen generations from David until the people were taken away to Babylon . And there were fourteen more from the time the people were taken to Babylon until the Messiah was born .
40001018	This is how the birth of Jesus the Messiah happened . His mother Mary was engaged to marry Joseph . But before they married , he learned that she was expecting a baby . ( She was pregnant by the power of the Holy Spirit . )
40001019	Mary’s husband , Joseph , was a good man . He did not want to cause her public disgrace , so he planned to divorce her secretly .
40001020	But after Joseph thought about this , an angel from the Lord came to him in a dream . The angel said , “ Joseph , son of David , don’t be afraid to accept Mary to be your wife . The baby inside her is from the Holy Spirit .
40001021	She will give birth to a son . You will name him Jesus . Give him that name because he will save his people from their sins . ”
40001022	All this happened to make clear the full meaning of what the Lord said through the prophet :
40001023	“ The virgin will be pregnant and will give birth to a son . They will name him Immanuel . ” ( Immanuel means “ God with us . ” )
40001024	When Joseph woke up , he did what the Lord’s angel told him to do . He married Mary .
40001025	But Joseph did not have sexual relations with her until her son was born . And he named him Jesus .
40002001	Jesus was born in the town of Bethlehem in Judea during the time when Herod was king . After Jesus was born , some wise men from the east came to Jerusalem .
40002002	They asked people , “ Where is the child who has been born to be the king of the Jews ? We saw the star that shows he was born . We saw it rise in the sky in the east and have come to worship him . ”
40002003	When King Herod heard about this , it upset him as well as everyone else in Jerusalem .
40002004	Herod called a meeting of all the leading Jewish priests and teachers of the law . He asked them where the Messiah would be born .
40002005	They answered , “ In the town of Bethlehem in Judea , just as the prophet wrote :
40002006	‘ Bethlehem , in the land of Judah , you are important among the rulers of Judah . Yes , a ruler will come from you , and that ruler will lead Israel , my people . ’ ”
40002007	Then Herod had a private meeting with the wise men from the east . He learned from them the exact time they first saw the star .
40002008	Then he sent them to Bethlehem . He said , “ Go and look carefully for the child . When you find him , come tell me . Then I can go worship him too . ”
40002009	After the wise men heard the king , they left . They saw the same star they had seen in the east , and they followed it . The star went before them until it stopped above the place where the child was .
40002010	They were very happy and excited to see the star .
40002011	The wise men came to the house where the child was with his mother Mary . They bowed down and worshiped him . Then they opened the boxes of gifts they had brought for him . They gave him treasures of gold , frankincense , and myrrh .
40002012	But God warned the wise men in a dream not to go back to Herod . So they went home to their own country a different way .
40002013	After the wise men left , an angel from the Lord came to Joseph in a dream . The angel said , “ Get up ! Take the child with his mother and escape to Egypt . Herod wants to kill the child and will soon start looking for him . Stay in Egypt until I tell you to come back . ”
40002014	So Joseph got ready and left for Egypt with the child and the mother . They left during the night .
40002015	Joseph stayed in Egypt until Herod died . This gave full meaning to what the Lord said through the prophet : “ I called my son to come out of Egypt . ”
40002016	Herod saw that the wise men had fooled him , and he was very angry . So he gave an order to kill all the baby boys in Bethlehem and the whole area around Bethlehem . Herod had learned from the wise men the time the baby was born . It was now two years from that time . So he said to kill all the boys who were two years old and younger .
40002017	This gave full meaning to what God said through the prophet Jeremiah :
40002018	“ A sound was heard in Ramah — bitter crying and great sadness . Rachel cries for her children , and she cannot be comforted , because her children are gone . ”
40002019	While Joseph was in Egypt , Herod died . An angel from the Lord came to Joseph in a dream
40002020	and said , “ Get up ! Take the child with his mother and go to Israel . Those who were trying to kill the child are now dead . ”
40002021	So Joseph took the child and the mother and went to Israel .
40002022	But he heard that Archelaus was now king in Judea . Archelaus became king when his father Herod died . So Joseph was afraid to go there . Then , after being warned in a dream , he went away to the area of Galilee .
40002023	He went to a town called Nazareth and lived there . This gave full meaning to what God said through the prophets . God said the Messiah would be called a Nazarene .
40003001	When it was the right time , John the Baptizer began telling people a message from God . This was out in the desert area of Judea .
40003002	John said , “ Change your hearts and lives , because God’s kingdom is now very near . ”
40003003	John is the one Isaiah the prophet was talking about when he said , “ There is someone shouting in the desert : ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord . Make the road straight for him . ’ ”
40003004	John’s clothes were made from camel’s hair , and he had a leather belt around his waist . For food , he ate locusts and wild honey .
40003005	People came to John from Jerusalem and the rest of Judea and from all the areas along the Jordan River .
40003006	They confessed the bad things they had done , and John baptized them in the Jordan .
40003007	Many Pharisees and Sadducees came to where John was baptizing people . When John saw them , he said , “ You are all snakes ! Who warned you to run from God’s judgment that is coming ?
40003008	Change your hearts ! And show by the way you live that you have changed .
40003009	I know what you are thinking . You want to say , ‘ but Abraham is our father ! ’ That means nothing . I tell you , God could make children for Abraham from these rocks .
40003010	The ax is now ready to cut down the trees . Every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire .
40003011	“ I baptize you with water to show that you have changed your hearts and lives . But there is someone coming later who is able to do more than I can . I am not good enough to be the slave who takes off his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire .
40003012	He will come ready to clean the grain . He will separate the good grain from the straw , and he will put the good part into his barn . Then he will burn the useless part with a fire that cannot be stopped . ”
40003013	Then Jesus came from Galilee to the Jordan River . He came to John , wanting John to baptize him .
40003014	But John tried to stop him . John said , “ Why do you come to me to be baptized ? I should be baptized by you ! ”
40003015	Jesus answered , “ Let it be this way for now . We should do whatever God says is right . ” Then John agreed .
40003016	So Jesus was baptized . As soon as he came up out of the water , the sky opened , and he saw God’s Spirit coming down on him like a dove .
40003017	A voice from heaven said , “ This is my Son , the one I love . I am very pleased with him . ”
40004001	Then the Spirit led Jesus into the desert . He was taken there to be tempted by the devil .
40004002	Jesus ate nothing for 40 days and nights . After this , he was very hungry .
40004003	The devil came to tempt him and said , “ If you are the Son of God , tell these rocks to become bread . ”
40004004	Jesus answered him , “ The Scriptures say , ‘ It is not just bread that keeps people alive . Their lives depend on what God says . ’ ”
40004005	Then the devil led Jesus to the holy city of Jerusalem and put him on a high place at the edge of the Temple area .
40004006	He said to Jesus , “ If you are the Son of God , jump off , because the Scriptures say , ‘ God will command his angels to help you , and their hands will catch you , so that you will not hit your foot on a rock . ’ ”
40004007	Jesus answered , “ The Scriptures also say , ‘ You must not test the Lord your God . ’ ”
40004008	Then the devil led Jesus to the top of a very high mountain and showed him all the kingdoms of the world and all the wonderful things in them .
40004009	The devil said , “ If you will bow down and worship me , I will give you all these things . ”
40004010	Jesus said to him , “ Get away from me , Satan ! The Scriptures say , ‘ You must worship the Lord your God . Serve only him ! ’ ”
40004011	So the devil left him . Then some angels came to Jesus and helped him .
40004012	Jesus heard that John was put in prison , so he went back to Galilee .
40004013	But he did not stay in Nazareth . He went to live in Capernaum , a town near Lake Galilee in the area near Zebulun and Naphtali .
40004014	He did this to give full meaning to what the prophet Isaiah said :
40004015	“ Listen , land of Zebulun and land of Naphtali , lands by the road that goes to the sea , the area past the Jordan River — Galilee , where those from other nations live .
40004016	The people who live in spiritual darkness have seen a great light . The light has shined for those who live in the land that is as dark as a grave . ”
40004017	From that time Jesus began to tell people his message : “ Change your hearts and lives , because God’s kingdom is now very near . ”
40004018	As Jesus was walking by Lake Galilee , he saw two brothers , Simon ( called Peter ) and Simon’s brother Andrew . These brothers were fishermen , and they were fishing in the lake with a net .
40004019	Jesus said to them , “ Come , follow me , and I will make you a different kind of fishermen . You will bring in people , not fish . ”
40004020	Simon and Andrew immediately left their nets and followed him .
40004021	Jesus continued walking by Lake Galilee . He saw two other brothers , James and John , the sons of Zebedee . They were in a boat with their father Zebedee . They were preparing their nets to catch fish . Jesus told the brothers to come with him .
40004022	So they immediately left the boat and their father , and they followed Jesus .
40004023	Jesus went everywhere in the country of Galilee . He taught in the synagogues and told the Good News about God’s kingdom . And he healed all the people’s diseases and sicknesses .
40004024	The news about Jesus spread all over Syria , and people brought to him all those who were sick . They were suffering from different kinds of diseases and pain . Some had demons inside them , some suffered from seizures , and some were paralyzed . Jesus healed them all .
40004025	Large crowds followed him — people from Galilee , the Ten Towns , Jerusalem , Judea , and the area across the Jordan River .
40005001	When Jesus saw the crowds of people there , he went up on a hill and sat down . His followers came and sat next to him .
40005002	Then Jesus began teaching the people . He said ,
40005003	“ Great blessings belong to those who know they are spiritually in need . God’s kingdom belongs to them .
40005004	Great blessings belong to those who are sad now . God will comfort them .
40005005	Great blessings belong to those who are humble . They will be given the land God promised .
40005006	Great blessings belong to those who want to do right more than anything else . God will fully satisfy them .
40005007	Great blessings belong to those who show mercy to others . Mercy will be given to them .
40005008	Great blessings belong to those whose thoughts are pure . They will be with God .
40005009	Great blessings belong to those who work to bring peace . God will call them his sons and daughters .
40005010	Great blessings belong to those who suffer persecution for doing what is right . God’s kingdom belongs to them .
40005011	“ People will insult you and hurt you . They will lie and say all kinds of evil things about you because you follow me . But when they do that , know that great blessings belong to you .
40005012	Be happy about it . Be very glad because you have a great reward waiting for you in heaven . People did these same bad things to the prophets who lived before you .
40005013	“ You are the salt of the earth . But if the salt loses its taste , it cannot be made salty again . Salt is useless if it loses its salty taste . It will be thrown out where people will just walk on it .
40005014	“ You are the light that shines for the world to see . You are like a city built on a hill that cannot be hidden .
40005015	People don’t hide a lamp under a bowl . They put it on a lampstand . Then the light shines for everyone in the house .
40005016	In the same way , you should be a light for other people . Live so that they will see the good things you do and praise your Father in heaven .
40005017	“ Don’t think that I have come to destroy the Law of Moses or the teaching of the prophets . I have come not to destroy their teachings but to give full meaning to them .
40005018	I assure you that nothing will disappear from the law until heaven and earth are gone . The law will not lose even the smallest letter or the smallest part of a letter until it has all been done .
40005019	“ A person should obey every command in the law , even one that does not seem important . Whoever refuses to obey any command and teaches others not to obey it will be the least important in God’s kingdom . But whoever obeys the law and teaches others to obey it will be great in God’s kingdom .
40005020	I tell you that you must do better than the teachers of the law and the Pharisees . If you are not more pleasing to God than they are , you will never enter God’s kingdom .
40005021	“ You have heard that it was said to our people long ago , ‘ You must not murder anyone . Any person who commits murder will be judged . ’
40005022	But I tell you , don’t be angry with anyone . If you are angry with others , you will be judged . And if you insult someone , you will be judged by the high court . And if you call someone a fool , you will be in danger of the fire of hell .
40005023	“ So , what if you are offering your gift at the altar and remember that someone has something against you ?
40005024	Leave your gift there and go make peace with that person . Then come and offer your gift .
40005025	“ If anyone wants to take you to court , make friends with them quickly . Try to do that before you get to the court . If you don’t , they might hand you over to the judge . And the judge will hand you over to a guard , who will throw you into jail .
40005026	I assure you that you will not leave there until you have paid everything you owe .
40005027	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ You must not commit adultery . ’
40005028	But I tell you that if a man looks at a woman and wants to sin sexually with her , he has already committed that sin with her in his mind .
40005029	If your right eye makes you sin , take it out and throw it away . It is better to lose one part of your body than to have your whole body thrown into hell .
40005030	If your right hand makes you sin , cut it off and throw it away . It is better to lose one part of your body than for your whole body to go into hell .
40005031	“ It was also said , ‘ Any man who divorces his wife must give her a written notice of divorce . ’
40005032	But I tell you that any man who divorces his wife , except for the problem of sexual sin , is causing his wife to be guilty of adultery . And whoever marries a divorced woman is guilty of adultery .
40005033	“ You have heard that it was said to our people long ago , ‘ When you make a vow , you must not break your promise . Keep the vows that you make to the Lord . ’
40005034	But I tell you , when you make a promise , don’t try to make it stronger with a vow . Don’t make a vow using the name of heaven , because heaven is God’s throne .
40005035	Don’t make a vow using the name of the earth , because the earth belongs to him . Don’t make a vow using the name of Jerusalem , because it also belongs to him , the great King .
40005036	And don’t even say that your own head is proof that you will keep your promise . You cannot make one hair on your head white or black .
40005037	Say only ‘ yes’ if you mean ‘ yes , ’ and say only ‘ no ’ if you mean ‘ no . ’ If you say more than that , it is from the Evil One .
40005038	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth . ’
40005039	But I tell you , don’t fight back against someone who wants to do harm to you . If they hit you on the right cheek , let them hit the other cheek too .
40005040	If anyone wants to sue you in court and take your shirt , let them have your coat too .
40005041	If a soldier forces you to walk with him one mile , go with him two .
40005042	Give to anyone who asks you for something . Don’t refuse to give to anyone who wants to borrow from you .
40005043	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ Love your neighbor and hate your enemy . ’
40005044	But I tell you , love your enemies . Pray for those who treat you badly .
40005045	If you do this , you will be children who are truly like your Father in heaven . He lets the sun rise for all people , whether they are good or bad . He sends rain to those who do right and to those who do wrong .
40005046	If you love only those who love you , why should you get a reward for that ? Even the tax collectors do that .
40005047	And if you are nice only to your friends , you are no better than anyone else . Even the people who don’t know God are nice to their friends .
40005048	What I am saying is that you must be perfect , just as your Father in heaven is perfect .
40006001	“ Be careful ! When you do something good , don’t do it in front of others so that they will see you . If you do that , you will have no reward from your Father in heaven .
40006002	“ When you give to those who are poor , don’t announce that you are giving . Don’t be like the hypocrites . When they are in the synagogues and on the streets , they blow trumpets before they give so that people will see them . They want everyone to praise them . The truth is , that’s all the reward they will get .
40006003	So when you give to the poor , don’t let anyone know what you are doing .
40006004	Your giving should be done in private . Your Father can see what is done in private , and he will reward you .
40006005	“ When you pray , don’t be like the hypocrites . They love to stand in the synagogues and on the street corners and pray loudly . They want people to see them . The truth is , that’s all the reward they will get .
40006006	But when you pray , you should go into your room and close the door . Then pray to your Father . He is there in that private place . He can see what is done in private , and he will reward you .
40006007	“ And when you pray , don’t be like the people who don’t know God . They say the same things again and again . They think that if they say it enough , their god will hear them .
40006008	Don’t be like them . Your Father knows what you need before you ask him .
40006009	So this is how you should pray : ‘ Our Father in heaven , we pray that your name will always be kept holy .
40006010	We pray that your kingdom will come — that what you want will be done here on earth , the same as in heaven .
40006011	Give us the food we need for today .
40006012	Forgive our sins , just as we have forgiven those who did wrong to us .
40006013	Don’t let us be tempted , but save us from the Evil One . ’
40006016	“ When you fast , don’t make yourselves look sad like the hypocrites . They put a look of suffering on their faces so that people will see they are fasting . The truth is , that’s all the reward they will get .
40006017	So when you fast , wash your face and make yourself look nice .
40006018	Then no one will know you are fasting , except your Father , who is with you even in private . He can see what is done in private , and he will reward you .
40006019	“ Don’t save treasures for yourselves here on earth . Moths and rust will destroy them . And thieves can break into your house and steal them .
40006020	Instead , save your treasures in heaven , where they cannot be destroyed by moths or rust and where thieves cannot break in and steal them .
40006021	Your heart will be where your treasure is .
40006022	“ The only source of light for the body is the eye . If you look at people and want to help them , you will be full of light .
40006023	But if you look at people in a selfish way , you will be full of darkness . And if the only light you have is really darkness , you have the worst kind of darkness .
40006024	“ You cannot serve two masters at the same time . You will hate one and love the other , or you will be loyal to one and not care about the other . You cannot serve God and Money at the same time .
40006025	“ So I tell you , don’t worry about the things you need to live — what you will eat , drink , or wear . Life is more important than food , and the body is more important than what you put on it .
40006026	Look at the birds . They don’t plant , harvest , or save food in barns , but your heavenly Father feeds them . Don’t you know you are worth much more than they are ?
40006027	You cannot add any time to your life by worrying about it .
40006028	“ And why do you worry about clothes ? Look at the wildflowers in the field . See how they grow . They don’t work or make clothes for themselves .
40006029	But I tell you that even Solomon , the great and rich king , was not dressed as beautifully as one of these flowers .
40006030	If God makes what grows in the field so beautiful , what do you think he will do for you ? It’s just grass — one day it’s alive , and the next day someone throws it into a fire . But God cares enough to make it beautiful . Surely he will do much more for you . Your faith is so small !
40006031	“ Don’t worry and say , ‘ What will we eat ? ’ or ‘ What will we drink ? ’ or ‘ What will we wear ? ’
40006032	That’s what those people who don’t know God are always thinking about . Don’t worry , because your Father in heaven knows that you need all these things .
40006033	What you should want most is God’s kingdom and doing what he wants you to do . Then he will give you all these other things you need .
40006034	So don’t worry about tomorrow . Each day has enough trouble of its own . Tomorrow will have its own worries .
40007001	“ Don’t judge others , and God will not judge you .
40007002	If you judge others , you will be judged the same way you judge them . God will treat you the same way you treat others .
40007003	“ Why do you notice the small piece of dust that is in your friend’s eye , but you don’t notice the big piece of wood that is in your own ?
40007004	Why do you say to your friend , ‘ Let me take that piece of dust out of your eye ’ ? Look at yourself first ! You still have that big piece of wood in your own eye .
40007005	You are a hypocrite ! First , take the wood out of your own eye . Then you will see clearly to get the dust out of your friend’s eye .
40007006	“ Don’t give something that is holy to dogs . They will only turn and hurt you . And don’t throw your pearls to pigs . They will only step on them .
40007007	“ Continue to ask , and God will give to you . Continue to search , and you will find . Continue to knock , and the door will open for you .
40007008	Yes , whoever continues to ask will receive . Whoever continues to look will find . And whoever continues to knock will have the door opened for them .
40007009	“ Do any of you have a son ? If he asked for bread , would you give him a rock ?
40007010	Or if he asked for a fish , would you give him a snake ? Of course not !
40007011	You people are so bad , but you still know how to give good things to your children . So surely your heavenly Father will give good things to those who ask him .
40007012	“ Do for others what you would want them to do for you . This is the meaning of the Law of Moses and the teaching of the prophets .
40007013	“ You can enter true life only through the narrow gate . The gate to hell is very wide , and there is plenty of room on the road that leads there . Many people go that way .
40007014	But the gate that opens the way to true life is narrow . And the road that leads there is hard to follow . Only a few people find it .
40007015	“ Be careful of false prophets . They come to you and look gentle like sheep . But they are really dangerous like wolves .
40007016	You will know these people because of what they do . Good things don’t come from people who are bad , just as grapes don’t come from thornbushes , and figs don’t come from thorny weeds .
40007017	In the same way , every good tree produces good fruit , and bad trees produce bad fruit .
40007018	A good tree cannot produce bad fruit , and a bad tree cannot produce good fruit .
40007019	Every tree that does not produce good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire .
40007020	You will know these false people by what they do .
40007021	“ Not everyone who calls me Lord will enter God’s kingdom . The only people who will enter are those who do what my Father in heaven wants .
40007022	On that last Day many will call me Lord . They will say , ‘ Lord , Lord , by the power of your name we spoke for God . And by your name we forced out demons and did many miracles . ’
40007023	Then I will tell those people clearly , ‘ Get away from me , you people who do wrong . I never knew you . ’
40007024	“ Whoever hears these teachings of mine and obeys them is like a wise man who built his house on rock .
40007025	It rained hard , the floods came , and the winds blew and beat against that house . But it did not fall because it was built on rock .
40007026	“ Whoever hears these teachings of mine and does not obey them is like a foolish man who built his house on sand .
40007027	It rained hard , the floods came , and the winds blew and beat against that house . And it fell with a loud crash . ”
40007028	When Jesus finished speaking , the people were amazed at his teaching .
40007029	He did not teach like their teachers of the law . He taught like someone who has authority .
40008001	Jesus came down from the hill , and a large crowd followed him .
40008002	Then a man sick with leprosy came to him . The man bowed down before Jesus and said , “ Lord , you have the power to heal me if you want . ”
40008003	Jesus touched the man . He said , “ I want to heal you . Be healed ! ” Immediately the man was healed from his leprosy .
40008004	Then Jesus said to him , “ Don’t tell anyone about what happened . But go and let the priest look at you . And offer the gift that Moses commanded for people who are made well . This will show everyone that you are healed . ”
40008005	Jesus went to the city of Capernaum . When he entered the city , an army officer came to him and begged for help .
40008006	The officer said , “ Lord , my servant is very sick at home in bed . He can’t move his body and has much pain . ”
40008007	Jesus said to the officer , “ I will go and heal him . ”
40008008	The officer answered , “ Lord , I am not good enough for you to come into my house . You need only to give the order , and my servant will be healed .
40008009	I know this , because I understand authority . There are people who have authority over me , and I have soldiers under my authority . I tell one soldier , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes . I tell another soldier , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes . I say to my servant , ‘ Do this , ’ and my servant obeys me . ”
40008010	When Jesus heard this , he was amazed . He said to those who were with him , “ The truth is , this man has more faith than anyone I have found , even in Israel .
40008011	Many people will come from the east and from the west . These people will sit and eat with Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob in God’s kingdom .
40008012	And those who should have the kingdom will be thrown out . They will be thrown outside into the darkness , where people will cry and grind their teeth with pain . ”
40008013	Then Jesus said to the officer , “ Go home . Your servant will be healed the way you believed he would . ” Right then his servant was healed .
40008014	Jesus went to Peter’s house . He saw that Peter’s mother-in-law was in bed with a high fever .
40008015	He touched her hand , and the fever left her . Then she stood up and began to serve him .
40008016	That evening people brought to Jesus many people who had demons inside them . He spoke and the demons left the people . He healed all those who were sick .
40008017	So Jesus made clear the full meaning of what Isaiah the prophet said : “ He took away our diseases and carried away our sicknesses . ”
40008018	When Jesus saw the crowd around him , he told his followers to go to the other side of the lake .
40008019	Then a teacher of the law came to him and said , “ Teacher , I will follow you any place you go . ”
40008020	Jesus said to him , “ The foxes have holes to live in . The birds have nests . But the Son of Man has no place to rest . ”
40008021	Another of Jesus’ followers said to him , “ Lord , I will follow you too , but let me go and bury my father first . ”
40008022	But Jesus said to him , “ Follow me , and let those who are dead bury their own dead . ”
40008023	Jesus got into a boat , and his followers went with him .
40008024	After the boat left the shore , a very bad storm began on the lake . The waves covered the boat . But Jesus was sleeping .
40008025	The followers went to him and woke him . They said , “ Lord , save us ! We will drown ! ”
40008026	Jesus answered , “ Why are you afraid ? You don’t have enough faith . ” Then he stood up and gave a command to the wind and the water . The wind stopped , and the lake became very calm .
40008027	The men were amazed . They said , “ What kind of man is this ? Even the wind and the water obey him ! ”
40008028	Jesus arrived at the other side of the lake in the country of the Gadarene people . There , two men who had demons inside them came to him . They lived in the burial caves and were so dangerous that no one could use the road by those caves .
40008029	They came to Jesus and shouted , “ What do you want with us , Son of God ? Did you come here to punish us before the right time ? ”
40008030	Near that place there was a large herd of pigs feeding .
40008031	The demons begged Jesus , “ If you make us leave these men , please send us into that herd of pigs . ”
40008032	Jesus said to them , “ Go ! ” So the demons left the men and went into the pigs . Then the whole herd of pigs ran down the hill into the lake , and all were drowned .
40008033	The men who had the work of caring for the pigs ran away . They went into town and told the people everything that happened , especially about the men who had the demons .
40008034	Then the whole town went out to see Jesus . When the people saw him , they begged him to leave their area .
40009001	Jesus got into a boat and went back across the lake to his own town .
40009002	Some people brought to him a man who was paralyzed and was lying on a mat . Jesus saw that these people had much faith . So he said to the paralyzed man , “ Young man , you will be glad to hear this . Your sins are forgiven . ”
40009003	Some of the teachers of the law heard what Jesus said . They said to themselves , “ What an insult to God for this man to say that ! ”
40009004	Jesus knew what they were thinking . So he said , “ Why are you thinking such evil thoughts ?
40009007	The man stood up and went home .
40009008	The people saw this and they were amazed . They praised God for letting someone have such power .
40009009	When Jesus was leaving , he saw a man named Matthew sitting at the place for collecting taxes . Jesus said to him , “ Follow me . ” So he got up and followed Jesus .
40009010	Jesus ate dinner at Matthew’s house . Many tax collectors and others with bad reputations came and ate with him and his followers .
40009011	The Pharisees saw that Jesus was eating with these people . They asked his followers , “ Why does your teacher eat with tax collectors and other sinners ? ”
40009012	Jesus heard them say this . So he said to them , “ It is the sick people who need a doctor , not those who are healthy .
40009013	You need to go and learn what this Scripture means : ‘ I don’t want animal sacrifices ; I want you to show kindness to people . ’ I did not come to invite good people . I came to invite sinners . ”
40009014	Then the followers of John came to Jesus and said , “ We and the Pharisees fast often , but your followers don’t ever fast . Why ? ”
40009015	Jesus answered , “ At a wedding the friends of the bridegroom are not sad while he is with them . They cannot fast then . But the time will come when the bridegroom will be taken from them . Then they will fast .
40009016	“ When someone sews a patch over a hole in an old coat , they never use a piece of cloth that has not already been shrunk . If they do , the patch will shrink and pull away from the coat . Then the hole will be worse .
40009017	Also , people never pour new wine into old wineskins . They would break , the wine would spill out , and the wineskins would be ruined . People always put new wine into new wineskins , which won’t break , and the wine stays good . ”
40009018	While Jesus was still talking , a leader of the synagogue came to him . The leader bowed down before him and said , “ My daughter has just died . But if you will come and touch her with your hand , she will live again . ”
40009019	So Jesus and his followers went with the man .
40009020	On the way , there was a woman who had been bleeding for twelve years . She came close behind Jesus and touched the bottom of his coat .
40009021	She was thinking , “ If I can touch his coat , I will be healed . ”
40009022	Jesus turned and saw the woman . He said , “ Be happy , dear woman . You are made well because you believed . ” Then the woman was healed .
40009023	Jesus continued going with the Jewish leader and went into the leader’s house . He saw people there who make music for funerals . And he saw a crowd of people crying loudly .
40009024	Jesus said , “ Go away . The girl is not dead . She is only sleeping . ” But the people laughed at him .
40009025	After the people were put out of the house , Jesus went into the girl’s room . He held the girl’s hand , and the girl stood up .
40009026	The news about this spread all around the area .
40009027	As Jesus was going away from there , two blind men followed him . They said loudly , “ Show kindness to us , Son of David . ”
40009028	Jesus went inside , and the blind men went with him . He asked them , “ Do you believe that I am able to make you see again ? ” They answered , “ Yes , Lord , we believe . ”
40009029	Then Jesus touched their eyes and said , “ You believe that I can make you see again , so it will happen . ”
40009030	Then the men were able to see . Jesus gave them a strong warning . He said , “ Don’t tell anyone about this . ”
40009031	But they left and spread the news about Jesus all around that area .
40009032	As these two men were leaving , some people brought another man to Jesus . This man could not talk because he had a demon inside him .
40009033	Jesus forced the demon out , and the man was able to talk . The people were amazed and said , “ We have never seen anything like this in Israel . ”
40009034	But the Pharisees said , “ The ruler of demons is the one that gives him power to force demons out . ”
40009035	Jesus traveled through all the towns and villages . He taught in their synagogues and told people the Good News about God’s kingdom . He healed all kinds of diseases and sicknesses .
40009036	Jesus saw the many people and felt sorry for them because they were worried and helpless — like sheep without a shepherd to lead them .
40009037	Jesus said to his followers , “ There is such a big harvest of people to bring in . But there are only a few workers to help harvest them .
40009038	God owns the harvest . Ask him to send more workers to help gather his harvest . ”
40010001	Jesus called his twelve followers together . He gave them power over evil spirits and power to heal every kind of disease and sickness .
40010002	These are the names of the twelve apostles :
40010005	Jesus sent the twelve men out with these instructions : “ Don’t go to the non-Jewish people . And don’t go into any town where the Samaritans live .
40010006	But go to the people of Israel . They are like sheep that are lost .
40010007	When you go , tell them this : ‘ God’s kingdom is now very near . ’
40010008	Heal the sick . Bring the dead back to life . Heal the people who have leprosy . And force demons out of people . I give you these powers freely , so help others freely .
40010009	Don’t carry any money with you — gold or silver or copper .
40010010	Don’t carry a bag . Take only the clothes and sandals you are wearing . And don’t take a walking stick . A worker should be given what he needs .
40010011	“ When you enter a city or town , find some worthy person there and stay in his home until you leave .
40010012	When you enter that home , say , ‘ Peace be with you . ’
40010013	If the people in that home welcome you , they are worthy of your peace . May they have the peace you wished for them . But if they don’t welcome you , they are not worthy of your peace . Take back the peace you wished for them .
40010014	And if the people in a home or a town refuse to welcome you or listen to you , then leave that place and shake the dust off your feet .
40010015	I can assure you that on the judgment day it will be worse for that town than for the people of Sodom and Gomorrah .
40010016	“ Listen ! I am sending you , and you will be like sheep among wolves . So be smart like snakes . But also be like doves and don’t hurt anyone .
40010017	Be careful ! There are people who will arrest you and take you to be judged . They will whip you in their synagogues .
40010018	You will be taken to stand before governors and kings . People will do this to you because you follow me . You will tell about me to those kings and governors and to the non-Jewish people .
40010019	When you are arrested , don’t worry about what to say or how you should say it . At that time you will be given the words to say .
40010020	It will not really be you speaking ; the Spirit of your Father will be speaking through you .
40010021	“ Brothers will turn against their own brothers and hand them over to be killed . Fathers will hand over their own children to be killed . Children will fight against their own parents and will have them killed .
40010022	Everyone will hate you because you follow me . But the one who remains faithful to the end will be saved .
40010023	When you are treated badly in one city , go to another city . I promise you that you will not finish going to all the cities of Israel before the Son of Man comes again .
40010024	“ Students are not better than their teacher . Servants are not better than their master .
40010025	Students should be happy to be treated the same as their teacher . And servants should be happy to be treated the same as their master . If those people call me ‘ the ruler of demons , ’ and I am the head of the family , then it is even more certain that they will insult you , the members of the family !
40010026	“ So don’t be afraid of those people . Everything that is hidden will be shown . Everything that is secret will be made known .
40010027	I tell you all this secretly , but I want you to tell it publicly . Whatever I tell you privately , you should shout for everyone to hear .
40010028	“ Don’t be afraid of people . They can kill the body , but they cannot kill the soul . The only one you should fear is God , the one who can send the body and the soul to be destroyed in hell .
40010029	When birds are sold , two small birds cost only a penny . But not even one of those little birds can die without your Father knowing it .
40010030	God even knows how many hairs are on your head .
40010031	So don’t be afraid . You are worth more than a whole flock of birds .
40010032	“ If you stand before others and are willing to say you believe in me , then I will tell my Father in heaven that you belong to me .
40010033	But if you stand before others and say you do not believe in me , then I will tell my Father in heaven that you do not belong to me .
40010034	“ Do not think that I have come to bring peace to the earth . I did not come to bring peace . I came to bring trouble .
40010035	I have come to make this happen : ‘ A son will turn against his father . A daughter will turn against her mother . A daughter-in-law will turn against her mother-in-law .
40010036	Even members of your own family will be your enemies . ’
40010037	“ Those who love their father or mother more than they love me are not worthy of me . And those who love their son or daughter more than they love me are not worthy of me .
40010038	Those who will not accept the cross that is given to them when they follow me are not worthy of me .
40010039	Those who try to keep the life they have will lose it . But those who give up their life for me will find true life .
40010040	“ Whoever accepts you also accepts me . And whoever accepts me accepts the one who sent me .
40010041	Whoever accepts a prophet because he is a prophet will get the same reward a prophet gets . And whoever accepts a godly person just because that person is godly will get the same reward a godly person gets .
40010042	Whoever helps any of these little ones because they are my followers will definitely get a reward , even if they only give them a cup of cold water . ”
40011001	When Jesus finished these instructions for his twelve followers , he left there . He went to the towns in Galilee to teach the people and tell them God’s message .
40011002	When John was in prison , he heard about the things that were happening — things the Messiah would do . So he sent some of his followers to Jesus .
40011003	They asked him , “ Are you the one we have been expecting , or should we wait for someone else ? ”
40011004	Jesus answered , “ Go tell John what you have heard and seen :
40011005	The blind can see . The crippled can walk . People with leprosy are healed . The deaf can hear . The dead are brought back to life . And the Good News is being told to the poor .
40011006	Great blessings belong to those who don’t have a problem accepting me . ”
40011007	When John’s followers left , Jesus began talking to the people about John . He said , “ What did you people go out to the desert to see ? Someone who is weak , like a stem of grass blowing in the wind ?
40011008	Really , what did you expect to see ? Someone dressed in fine clothes ? Of course not . People who wear fine clothes are all in kings’ palaces .
40011009	So what did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes , John is a prophet . But I tell you , he is more than that .
40011010	This Scripture was written about him : ‘ Listen ! I will send my messenger ahead of you . He will prepare the way for you . ’
40011011	“ The truth is that John the Baptizer is greater than anyone who has ever come into this world . But even the least important person in God’s kingdom is greater than John .
40011012	Since the time John the Baptizer came until now , God’s kingdom has been going forward strongly . And people have been trying to take control of it by force .
40011013	Before John came , the Law of Moses and all the prophets told about the things that would happen .
40011014	And if you believe what they said , then John is Elijah . He is the one they said would come .
40011015	You people who hear me , listen !
40011016	“ What can I say about the people who live today ? What are they like ? The people today are like children sitting in the marketplace . One group of children calls to the other group ,
40011017	‘ We played flute music for you , but you did not dance ; we sang a funeral song , but you were not sad . ’
40011020	Then Jesus criticized the cities where he did most of his miracles . He criticized these cities because the people there did not change their lives and stop sinning .
40011021	Jesus said , “ It will be bad for you Chorazin ! It will be bad for you Bethsaida ! I did many miracles in you . If these same miracles had happened in Tyre and Sidon , the people there would have changed their lives a long time ago . They would have worn sackcloth and put ashes on themselves to show that they were sorry for their sins .
40011022	But I tell you , on the day of judgment it will be worse for you than for Tyre and Sidon .
40011023	“ And you , Capernaum , will you be lifted up to heaven ? No ! You will be thrown down to the place of death . I did many miracles in you . If these same miracles had happened in Sodom , the people there would have stopped sinning , and it would still be a city today .
40011024	But I tell you , it will be worse for you in the day of judgment than for Sodom . ”
40011025	Then Jesus said , “ I praise you , Father , Lord of heaven and earth . I am thankful that you have hidden these things from those who are so wise and so smart . But you have shown them to people who are like little children .
40011026	Yes , Father , you did this because it’s what you really wanted to do .
40011027	“ My Father has given me everything . No one knows the Son — only the Father knows the Son . And no one knows the Father — only the Son knows the Father . And the only people who will know about the Father are those the Son chooses to tell .
40011028	“ Come to me all of you who are tired from the heavy burden you have been forced to carry . I will give you rest .
40011029	Accept my teaching . Learn from me . I am gentle and humble in spirit . And you will be able to get some rest .
40011030	Yes , the teaching that I ask you to accept is easy . The load I give you to carry is light . ”
40012001	About that same time , Jesus was walking through the fields of grain on a Sabbath day . His followers were with him , and they were hungry . So they began to pick the grain and eat it .
40012002	The Pharisees saw this . They said to Jesus , “ Look ! Your followers are doing something that is against the law to do on the Sabbath day . ”
40012003	Jesus said to them , “ You have read what David did when he and those with him were hungry .
40012004	David went into God’s house . He and those with him ate the bread that was offered to God . It was against the law for David or those with him to eat that bread . Only the priests were allowed to eat it .
40012005	And you have read in the Law of Moses that on every Sabbath day the priests at the Temple break the law about the Sabbath day . But they are not wrong for doing that .
40012006	I tell you that there is something here that is greater than the Temple .
40012007	The Scriptures say , ‘ I don’t want animal sacrifices ; I want you to show kindness to people . ’ You don’t really know what that means . If you understood it , you would not judge those who have done nothing wrong .
40012008	“ The Son of Man is Lord over the Sabbath day . ”
40012009	Jesus went from there to their synagogue .
40012010	In the synagogue there was a man with a crippled hand . Some Jews there were looking for a reason to accuse Jesus of doing wrong . So they asked him , “ Is it right to heal on the Sabbath day ? ”
40012011	Jesus answered , “ If any of you has a sheep and it falls into a ditch on the Sabbath day , you will take the sheep and help it out of the ditch .
40012012	Surely a man is more important than a sheep . So it is right to do good on the Sabbath day . ”
40012013	Then Jesus said to the man with the crippled hand , “ Hold out your hand . ” The man held out his hand , and it became well again , the same as the other hand .
40012014	But the Pharisees left and made plans to kill Jesus .
40012015	Jesus knew what the Pharisees were planning . So he left that place , and many people followed him . He healed all who were sick ,
40012016	but he warned them not to tell others who he was .
40012017	This was to give full meaning to what Isaiah the prophet said when he spoke for God :
40012018	“ Here is my servant , the one I have chosen . He is the one I love , and I am very pleased with him . I will fill him with my Spirit , and he will bring justice to the nations .
40012019	He will not argue or shout ; no one will hear his voice in the streets .
40012020	He will not break off even a bent stem of grass . He will not put out even the weakest flame . He will not give up until he has made justice victorious .
40012021	All people will hope in him . ”
40012022	Then some people brought a man to Jesus . This man was blind and could not talk , because he had a demon inside him . Jesus healed the man , and he could talk and see .
40012023	All the people were amazed at what Jesus did . They said , “ Maybe he is the promised Son of David ! ”
40012024	When the Pharisees heard this , they said , “ This man uses the power of Satan to force demons out of people . Satan is the ruler of demons . ”
40012025	Jesus knew what the Pharisees were thinking . So he said to them , “ Every kingdom that fights against itself will be destroyed . And every city or family that is divided against itself will not survive .
40012026	So if Satan forces out his own demons , then he is fighting against himself , and his kingdom will not survive .
40012027	You say that I use the power of Satan to force out demons . If that is true , then what power do your people use when they force out demons ? So your own people will prove that you are wrong .
40012028	But I use the power of God’s Spirit to force out demons , and this shows that God’s kingdom has come to you .
40012029	Whoever wants to enter a strong man’s house and steal his things must first tie him up . Then they can steal the things from his house .
40012030	Whoever is not with me is against me . And anyone who does not work with me is working against me .
40012031	“ So I tell you , people can be forgiven for every sinful thing they do and for every bad thing they say against God . But anyone who speaks against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven .
40012032	You can even speak against the Son of Man and be forgiven . But anyone who speaks against the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven — not now or in the future .
40012033	“ If you want good fruit , you must make the tree good . If your tree is not good , it will have bad fruit . A tree is known by the kind of fruit it produces .
40012034	You snakes ! You are so evil . How can you say anything good ? What people say with their mouths comes from what fills their hearts .
40012035	Those who are good have good things saved in their hearts . That’s why they say good things . But those who are evil have hearts full of evil , and that’s why they say things that are evil .
40012036	I tell you that everyone will have to answer for all the careless things they have said . This will happen on the day of judgment .
40012037	Your words will be used to judge you . What you have said will show whether you are right or whether you are guilty . ”
40012038	Then some of the Pharisees and teachers of the law answered Jesus . They said , “ Teacher , we want to see you do a miracle as a sign from God . ”
40012039	Jesus answered , “ Evil and sinful people are the ones who want to see a miracle as a sign . But no miracle will be done to prove anything to them . The only sign will be the miracle that happened to the prophet Jonah .
40012040	Jonah was in the stomach of the big fish for three days and three nights . In the same way , the Son of Man will be in the grave three days and three nights .
40012041	On the judgment day , you people who live now will be compared with the people from Nineveh , and they will be witnesses who show how guilty you are . Why do I say this ? Because when Jonah preached to those people , they changed their lives . And you are listening to someone greater than Jonah , but you refuse to change !
40012042	“ On the judgment day , you people who live now will also be compared with the queen of the South , and she will be a witness who shows how guilty you are . I say this because she traveled from far , far away to listen to Solomon’s wise teaching . And I tell you that someone greater than Solomon is right here , but you won’t listen !
40012043	“ When an evil spirit comes out of a person , it travels through dry places looking for a place to rest , but it finds none .
40012044	So it says , ‘ I will go back to the home I left . ’ When it comes back , it finds that home still empty . It is all neat and clean .
40012045	Then the evil spirit goes out and brings seven other spirits more evil than itself . They all go and live there , and that person has even more trouble than before . It is the same way with the evil people who live today . ”
40012046	While Jesus was talking to the people , his mother and brothers stood outside . They wanted to talk to him .
40012047	Someone told him , “ Your mother and brothers are waiting for you outside . They want to talk to you . ”
40012048	Jesus answered , “ Who is my mother ? Who are my brothers ? ”
40012049	Then he pointed to his followers and said , “ See ! These people are my mother and my brothers .
40012050	Yes , anyone who does what my Father in heaven wants is my true brother and sister and mother . ”
40013001	That same day Jesus went out of the house and sat by the lake .
40013002	A large crowd gathered around him . So he got into a boat and sat down . All the people stayed on the shore .
40013003	Then Jesus used stories to teach them many things . He told them this story : “ A farmer went out to sow seed .
40013004	While he was scattering the seed , some of it fell by the road . The birds came and ate all that seed .
40013005	Other seed fell on rocky ground , where there was not enough dirt . It grew very fast there , because the soil was not deep .
40013006	But when the sun rose , it burned the plants . The plants died because they did not have deep roots .
40013007	Some other seed fell among thorny weeds . The weeds grew and stopped the good plants from growing .
40013008	But some of the seed fell on good ground . There it grew and made grain . Some plants made 100 times more grain , some 60 times more , and some 30 times more .
40013009	You people who hear me , listen ! ”
40013010	The followers came to Jesus and asked , “ Why do you use these stories to teach the people ? ”
40013011	Jesus answered , “ Only you can know the secret truths about God’s kingdom . Those other people cannot know these secret truths .
40013012	The people who have some understanding will be given more . And they will have even more than they need . But those who do not have much understanding will lose even the little understanding that they have .
40013013	This is why I use these stories to teach the people : They see , but they don’t really see . They hear , but they don’t really hear or understand .
40013014	So they show that what Isaiah said about them is true : ‘ You people will listen and listen , but you will not understand . You will look and look , but you will not really see .
40013015	Yes , the minds of these people are now closed . They have ears , but they don’t listen . They have eyes , but they refuse to see . If their minds were not closed , they might see with their eyes ; they might hear with their ears ; they might understand with their minds . Then they might turn back to me and be healed . ’
40013018	“ So listen to the meaning of that story about the farmer :
40013019	“ What about the seed that fell by the path ? That is like the people who hear the teaching about God’s kingdom but do not understand it . The Evil One comes and takes away what was planted in their hearts .
40013020	“ And what about the seed that fell on rocky ground ? That is like the people who hear the teaching and quickly and gladly accept it .
40013021	But they do not let the teaching go deep into their lives . They keep it only a short time . As soon as trouble or persecution comes because of the teaching they accepted , they give up .
40013022	“ And what about the seed that fell among the thorny weeds ? That is like the people who hear the teaching but let worries about this life and love for money stop it from growing . So it does not produce a crop in their lives .
40013023	“ But what about the seed that fell on the good ground ? That is like the people who hear the teaching and understand it . They grow and produce a good crop , sometimes 100 times more , sometimes 60 times more , and sometimes 30 times more . ”
40013024	Then Jesus used another story to teach them . Jesus said , “ God’s kingdom is like a man who planted good seed in his field .
40013025	That night , while everyone was asleep , the man’s enemy came and planted weeds among the wheat and then left .
40013026	Later , the wheat grew , and heads of grain grew on the plants . But at the same time the weeds also grew .
40013027	Then the man’s servants came to him and said , ‘ You planted good seed in your field . Where did the weeds come from ? ’
40013028	“ The man answered , ‘ An enemy planted weeds . ’ “ The servants asked , ‘ Do you want us to go and pull up the weeds ? ’
40013029	“ He answered , ‘ No , because when you pull up the weeds , you might also pull up the wheat .
40013030	Let the weeds and the wheat grow together until the harvest time . At the harvest time I will tell the workers this : First , gather the weeds and tie them together to be burned . Then gather the wheat and bring it to my barn . ’ ”
40013031	Then Jesus told the people another story : “ God’s kingdom is like a mustard seed that a man plants in his field .
40013032	It is the smallest of all seeds . But when it grows , it is the largest of all garden plants . It becomes a tree big enough for the birds to come and make nests in its branches . ”
40013033	Then Jesus told them another story : “ God’s kingdom is like yeast that a woman mixes into a big bowl of flour to make bread . The yeast makes all the dough rise . ”
40013034	Jesus used stories to tell all these things to the people . He always used stories to teach them .
40013035	This was to make clear the full meaning of what the prophet said : “ I will speak using stories ; I will tell things that have been secrets since the world was made . ”
40013036	Then Jesus left the people and went into the house . His followers came to him and said , “ Explain to us the meaning of the story about the weeds in the field . ”
40013037	He answered , “ The man who planted the good seed in the field is the Son of Man .
40013038	The field is the world . The good seed are the people in God’s kingdom . The weeds are the people who belong to the Evil One .
40013039	And the enemy who planted the bad seed is the devil . The harvest is the end of time . And the workers who gather are God’s angels .
40013040	“ The weeds are pulled up and burned in the fire . It will be the same at the end of time .
40013041	The Son of Man will send his angels , and they will find the people who cause sin and all those who do evil . The angels will take those people out of his kingdom .
40013042	They will throw them into the place of fire . There the people will be crying and grinding their teeth with pain .
40013043	Then the godly people will shine like the sun . They will be in the kingdom of their Father . You people who hear me , listen !
40013044	“ God’s kingdom is like a treasure hidden in a field . One day a man found the treasure . He hid it again and was so happy that he went and sold everything he owned and bought the field .
40013045	“ Also , God’s kingdom is like a merchant looking for fine pearls .
40013046	One day he found a very fine pearl . He went and sold everything he had to buy it .
40013047	“ Also , God’s kingdom is like a net that was put into the lake . The net caught many different kinds of fish .
40013048	It was full , so the fishermen pulled it to the shore . They sat down and put all the good fish in baskets . Then they threw away the bad fish .
40013049	It will be the same at the end of time . The angels will come and separate the evil people from the godly people .
40013050	They will throw the evil people into the place of fire . There the people will cry and grind their teeth with pain . ”
40013051	Then Jesus asked his followers , “ Do you understand all these things ? ” They said , “ Yes , we understand . ”
40013052	Then Jesus said to the followers , “ So every teacher of the law who has learned about God’s kingdom has some new things to teach . He is like the owner of a house . He has new things and old things saved in that house . And he brings out the new with the old . ”
40013053	When Jesus finished teaching with these stories , he left there .
40013054	He went to the town where he grew up . He taught the people in the synagogue , and they were amazed . They said , “ Where did this man get such wisdom and this power to do miracles ?
40013055	Isn’t he just the son of the carpenter we know ? Isn’t his mother’s name Mary , and aren’t his brothers James , Joseph , Simon , and Judas ?
40013056	And don’t all his sisters still live here in town ? How is he able to do these things ? ”
40013057	So they had a problem accepting him . But Jesus said to them , “ People everywhere give honor to a prophet , but in his own town or in his own home a prophet does not get any honor . ”
40013058	Jesus did not do many miracles there , because the people did not believe in him .
40014001	About that time , Herod , the ruler of Galilee , heard what the people were saying about Jesus .
40014002	So he said to his servants , “ This man is really John the Baptizer . He must have risen from death , and that is why he can do these miracles . ”
40014003	Before this time , Herod had arrested John . He had him chained and put in prison . He arrested John because of Herodias , the wife of Philip , Herod’s brother .
40014004	John had told him , “ It is not right for you to be married to Herodias . ”
40014005	Herod wanted to kill him , but he was afraid of the people . They believed that John was a prophet .
40014006	On Herod’s birthday , the daughter of Herodias danced for him and his group . Herod was very pleased with her .
40014007	So he promised that he would give her anything she wanted .
40014008	Herodias told her daughter what to ask for . So she said to Herod , “ Give me the head of John the Baptizer here on this plate . ”
40014009	King Herod was very sad . But he had promised to give the daughter anything she wanted . And the people eating with Herod had heard his promise . So he ordered what she asked to be done .
40014010	He sent men to the prison , where they cut off John’s head .
40014011	And the men brought John’s head on a plate and gave it to the girl . Then she took the head to her mother , Herodias .
40014012	John’s followers came and got his body and buried it . Then they went and told Jesus what happened .
40014013	When Jesus heard what happened to John , he left in a boat . He went alone to a place where no one lived . But the people heard that Jesus had left . So they left their towns and followed him . They went by land to the same place he went .
40014014	When Jesus got out of the boat , he saw a large crowd of people . He felt sorry for them , and he healed the ones who were sick .
40014015	Late that afternoon , the followers came to Jesus and said , “ No one lives in this place . And it is already late . Send the people away so they can go to the towns and buy food for themselves . ”
40014016	Jesus said , “ The people don’t need to go away . You give them some food to eat . ”
40014017	The followers answered , “ But we have only five loaves of bread and two fish . ”
40014018	Jesus said , “ Bring the bread and the fish to me . ”
40014019	Then he told the people to sit down on the grass . He took the five loaves of bread and the two fish . He looked into the sky and thanked God for the food . Then he broke the bread into pieces , which he gave to the followers , and they gave the food to the people .
40014020	Everyone ate until they were full . When they finished eating , the followers filled twelve baskets with the pieces of food that were not eaten .
40014021	There were about 5000 men there who ate . There were also women and children who ate .
40014022	Then Jesus made the followers get into the boat . He told them to go to the other side of the lake . He said he would come later . He stayed there to tell everyone they could go home .
40014023	After Jesus said goodbye to the people , he went up into the hills by himself to pray . It was late , and he was there alone .
40014024	By this time the boat was already a long way from shore . Since the wind was blowing against it , the boat was having trouble because of the waves .
40014025	Between three and six o’clock in the morning , Jesus’ followers were still in the boat . Jesus came to them . He was walking on the water .
40014026	When they saw him walking on the water , it scared them . “ It’s a ghost ! ” they said , screaming in fear .
40014027	But Jesus quickly spoke to them . He said , “ Don’t worry ! It’s me ! Don’t be afraid . ”
40014028	Peter said , “ Lord , if that is really you , tell me to come to you on the water . ”
40014029	Jesus said , “ Come , Peter . ” Then Peter left the boat and walked on the water to Jesus .
40014030	But while Peter was walking on the water , he saw the wind and the waves . He was afraid and began sinking into the water . He shouted , “ Lord , save me ! ”
40014031	Then Jesus caught Peter with his hand . He said , “ Your faith is small . Why did you doubt ? ”
40014032	After Peter and Jesus were in the boat , the wind stopped .
40014033	Then the followers in the boat worshiped Jesus and said , “ You really are the Son of God . ”
40014034	After they crossed the lake , they came to the shore at Gennesaret .
40014035	Some men there saw Jesus and knew who he was . So they sent word to the other people throughout that area that Jesus had come . The people brought all their sick people to him .
40014036	They begged Jesus to let them only touch the edge of his coat to be healed . And all the sick people who touched his coat were healed .
40015001	Then some Pharisees and teachers of the law came to Jesus . They came from Jerusalem and asked him ,
40015002	“ Why do your followers not obey the traditions we have from our great leaders who lived long ago ? Your followers don’t wash their hands before they eat ! ”
40015003	Jesus answered , “ And why do you refuse to obey God’s command so that you can follow those traditions you have ?
40015004	God said , ‘ You must respect your father and mother . ’ And God also said , ‘ Whoever says anything bad to their father or mother must be killed . ’
40015005	But you teach that a person can say to their father or mother , ‘ I have something I could use to help you . But I will not use it for you . I will give it to God . ’
40015006	You are teaching them not to respect their father . So you are teaching that it is not important to do what God said . You think it is more important to follow those traditions you have .
40015007	You are hypocrites ! Isaiah was right when he spoke for God about you :
40015008	‘ These people honor me with their words , but I am not really important to them .
40015009	Their worship of me is worthless . The things they teach are only human rules . ’ ”
40015010	Jesus called the people to him . He said , “ Listen and understand what I am saying .
40015011	It is not what people put in their mouth that makes them wrong . It is what comes out of their mouth that makes them wrong . ”
40015012	Then the followers came to Jesus and asked , “ Do you know that the Pharisees are upset about what you said ? ”
40015013	Jesus answered , “ Every plant that my Father in heaven has not planted will be pulled up by the roots .
40015014	Stay away from the Pharisees . They lead the people , but they are like blind men leading other blind men . And if a blind man leads another blind man , both of them will fall into a ditch . ”
40015015	Peter said , “ Explain to us what you said earlier to the people . ”
40015016	Jesus said , “ Do you still have trouble understanding ?
40015017	Surely you know that all the food that enters the mouth goes into the stomach . Then it goes out of the body .
40015018	But the bad things people say with their mouth come from the way they think . And that’s what can make people wrong .
40015019	All these bad things begin in the mind : evil thoughts , murder , adultery , sexual sins , stealing , lying , and insulting people .
40015020	These are the things that make people wrong . Eating without washing their hands will never make people unacceptable to God . ”
40015021	Jesus went from there to the area of Tyre and Sidon .
40015022	A Canaanite woman from that area came out and began shouting , “ Lord , Son of David , please help me ! My daughter has a demon inside her , and she is suffering very much . ”
40015023	But Jesus did not answer her . So the followers came to him and said , “ Tell her to go away . She keeps crying out and will not leave us alone . ”
40015024	Jesus answered , “ God sent me only to the lost people of Israel . ”
40015025	Then the woman came over to Jesus and bowed before him . She said , “ Lord , help me ! ”
40015026	He answered her with this saying : “ It is not right to take the children’s bread and give it to the dogs . ”
40015027	The woman said , “ Yes , Lord , but even the dogs eat the pieces of food that fall from their master’s table . ”
40015028	Then Jesus answered , “ Woman , you have great faith ! You will get what you asked for . ” And right then the woman’s daughter was healed .
40015029	Then Jesus went from there to the shore of Lake Galilee . He went up on a hill and sat down .
40015030	A large crowd of people came to him . They brought many other sick people and put them before him . There were people who could not walk , people who were blind , crippled , or deaf , and many others . Jesus healed them all .
40015031	People were amazed when they saw that those who could not speak were now able to speak . Crippled people were made strong . Those who could not walk were now able to walk . The blind were able to see . Everyone thanked the God of Israel for this .
40015032	Jesus called his followers to him and said , “ I feel sorry for these people . They have been with me three days , and now they have nothing to eat . I don’t want to send them away hungry . They might faint while going home . ”
40015033	The followers asked Jesus , “ Where can we get enough bread to feed all these people ? We are a long way from any town . ”
40015034	Jesus asked , “ How many loaves of bread do you have ? ” They answered , “ We have seven loaves of bread and a few small fish . ”
40015035	Jesus told the people to sit on the ground .
40015036	He took the seven loaves of bread and the fish . Then he gave thanks to God for the food . He broke the bread into pieces , which he gave to the followers , and they gave the food to the people .
40015037	All the people ate until they were full . After this , the followers filled seven baskets with the pieces of food that were not eaten .
40015038	There were about 4000 men there who ate . There were also some women and children .
40015039	After they all ate , Jesus told the people they could go home . He got into the boat and went to the area of Magadan .
40016001	The Pharisees and Sadducees came to Jesus . They wanted to test him . So they asked him to show them a miracle as a sign from God .
40016002	Jesus answered , “ When you people see the sunset , you know what the weather will be . If the sky is red , you say we will have good weather .
40016003	And in the morning , if the sky is dark and red , you say that it will be a rainy day . These are signs of the weather . You see these signs in the sky and know what they mean . In the same way , you see the things that are happening now . These are also signs , but you don’t know their meaning .
40016004	It is the evil and sinful people who want to see a miracle as a sign from God . But no miracle will be done to prove anything to them . The only sign will be the miracle that happened to Jonah . ” Then Jesus went away from there .
40016005	Jesus and his followers went across the lake . But the followers forgot to bring bread .
40016006	Jesus said to the followers , “ Be careful ! Guard against the yeast of the Pharisees and the Sadducees . ”
40016007	The followers discussed the meaning of this . They said , “ Did Jesus say this because we forgot to bring bread ? ”
40016008	Jesus knew that they were talking about this . So he asked them , “ Why are you talking about not having bread ? Your faith is small .
40016009	Do you still not understand ? Remember the five loaves of bread that fed the 5000 people and the many baskets you filled with the bread that was left ?
40016010	And remember the seven loaves of bread that fed the 4000 people and the many baskets you filled that time ?
40016011	So how could you think that I am concerned about bread ? I am telling you to be careful and guard against the yeast of the Pharisees and the Sadducees . ”
40016012	Then the followers understood what Jesus meant . He was not telling them to guard against the yeast used in bread . He was telling them to guard against the teaching of the Pharisees and the Sadducees .
40016013	Jesus went to the area of Caesarea Philippi . He said to his followers , “ Who do people say I am ? ”

40016017	Jesus answered , “ You are blessed , Simon son of Jonah . No one taught you that . My Father in heaven showed you who I am .
40016018	So I tell you , you are Peter . And I will build my church on this rock . The power of death will not be able to defeat my church .
40016019	I will give you the keys to God’s kingdom . When you speak judgment here on earth , that judgment will be God’s judgment . When you promise forgiveness here on earth , that forgiveness will be God’s forgiveness . ”
40016020	Then Jesus warned his followers not to tell anyone he was the Messiah .
40016021	From that time Jesus began telling his followers that he must go to Jerusalem . 40016022	Peter took Jesus away from the other followers to talk to him alone . He began to criticize him . He said , “ God save you from those sufferings , Lord ! That will never happen to you ! ”
40016023	Then Jesus said to Peter , “ Get away from me , Satan ! You are not helping me ! You don’t care about the same things God does . You care only about things that people think are important . ”

40017001	Six days later , Jesus took Peter , James , and John the brother of James and went up on a high mountain . They were all alone there .
40017002	While these followers watched him , Jesus was changed . His face became bright like the sun , and his clothes became white as light .
40017003	Then two men were there , talking with him . They were Moses and Elijah .

40017005	While Peter was talking , a bright cloud came over them . A voice came from the cloud and said , “ This is my Son , the one I love . I am very pleased with him . Obey him ! ”
40017006	The followers with Jesus heard this voice . They were very afraid , so they fell to the ground .
40017007	But Jesus came to them and touched them . He said , “ Stand up . Don’t be afraid . ”
40017008	The followers looked up , and they saw that Jesus was now alone .
40017009	As Jesus and the followers were coming down the mountain , he gave them this command : “ Don’t tell anyone about what you saw on the mountain . Wait until the Son of Man has been raised from death . Then you can tell people about what you saw . ”
40017010	The followers asked Jesus , “ Why do the teachers of the law say that Elijah must come before the Messiah comes ? ”
