40017012	But I tell you , Elijah has already come . People did not know who he was , and they treated him badly , doing whatever they wanted to do . It is the same with the Son of Man . Those same people will make the Son of Man suffer . ”
40017013	Then the followers understood that when Jesus said Elijah , he was really talking about John the Baptizer .
40017014	Jesus and the followers went back to the people . A man came to Jesus and bowed before him .
40017015	The man said , “ Lord , be kind to my son . He suffers so much from the seizures he has . He often falls into the fire or into the water .
40017016	I brought him to your followers , but they could not heal him . ”
40017017	Jesus answered , “ You people today have no faith . Your lives are so wrong ! How long must I stay with you ? How long must I continue to be patient with you ? Bring the boy here . ”
40017018	Jesus gave a strong command to the demon inside the boy . The demon came out of the boy , and the boy was healed .
40017019	Then the followers came to Jesus alone . They said , “ We tried to force the demon out of the boy , but we could not . Why were we not able to make the demon go out ? ”
40017020	Jesus answered , “ You were not able to make the demon go out , because your faith is too small . Believe me when I tell you , if your faith is only as big as a mustard seed you can say to this mountain , ‘ Move from here to there , ’ and it will move . You will be able to do anything . ”
40017022	Later , the followers met together in Galilee . Jesus said to them , “ The Son of Man will be handed over to the control of other men ,
40017023	who will kill him . But on the third day he will be raised from death . ” The followers were very sad to hear that Jesus would be killed .
40017024	Jesus and his followers went to Capernaum . There the men who collect the two-drachma Temple tax came to Peter and asked , “ Does your teacher pay the Temple tax ? ”
40017025	Peter answered , “ Yes , he does . ” Peter went into the house where Jesus was . Before Peter could speak , Jesus said to him , “ The kings on the earth get different kinds of taxes from people . But who are those who pay the taxes ? Are they the king’s children ? Or do other people pay the taxes ? What do you think ? ”
40017026	Peter answered , “ The other people pay the taxes . ” Jesus said , “ Then the children of the king don’t have to pay taxes .
40017027	But we don’t want to upset these tax collectors . So do this : Go to the lake and fish . After you catch the first fish , open its mouth . Inside its mouth you will find a four-drachma coin . Take that coin and give it to the tax collectors . That will pay the tax for you and me . ”
40018001	About that time the followers came to Jesus and asked , “ Who is the greatest in God’s kingdom ? ”
40018002	Jesus called a little child to come to him . He stood the child in front of the followers .
40018003	Then he said , “ The truth is , you must change your thinking and become like little children . If you don’t do this , you will never enter God’s kingdom .
40018004	The greatest person in God’s kingdom is the one who makes himself humble like this child .
40018005	“ Whoever accepts a little child like this in my name is accepting me .
40018006	“ If one of these little children believes in me , and someone causes that child to sin , it will be very bad for that person . It would be better for them to have a millstone tied around their neck and be drowned in the deep sea .
40018007	I feel sorry for the people in the world because of the things that make people sin . These things must happen , but it will be very bad for anyone who causes them to happen .
40018008	“ If your hand or your foot makes you sin , cut it off and throw it away . It is better for you to lose part of your body and have eternal life than to have two hands and two feet and be thrown into the fire that burns forever .
40018009	If your eye makes you sin , take it out and throw it away . It is better for you to have only one eye and have eternal life than to have two eyes and be thrown into the fire of hell .
40018010	“ Be careful . Don’t think these little children are not important . I tell you that these children have angels in heaven . And those angels are always with my Father in heaven .
40018012	“ If a man has 100 sheep , but one of the sheep is lost , what will he do ? He will leave the other 99 sheep on the hill and go look for the lost sheep . Right ?
40018013	And if he finds the lost sheep , he is happier about that one sheep than about the 99 sheep that were never lost . I can assure you ,
40018014	in the same way your Father in heaven does not want any of these little children to be lost .
40018015	“ If your brother or sister in God’s family does something wrong , go and tell them what they did wrong . Do this when you are alone with them . If they listen to you , then you have helped them to be your brother or sister again .
40018016	But if they refuse to listen , go to them again and take one or two people with you . Then there will be two or three people who will be able to tell all that happened .
40018017	If they refuse to listen to them , tell the church . And if they refuse to listen to the church , treat them as you would treat someone who does not know God or who is a tax collector .
40018018	“ I can assure you that when you speak judgment here on earth , it will be God’s judgment . And when you promise forgiveness here on earth , it will be God’s forgiveness .
40018019	To say it another way , if two of you on earth agree on anything you pray for , my Father in heaven will do what you ask .
40018020	Yes , if two or three people are together believing in me , I am there with them . ”
40018021	Then Peter came to Jesus and asked , “ Lord , when someone won’t stop doing wrong to me , how many times must I forgive them ? Seven times ? ”
40018022	Jesus answered , “ I tell you , you must forgive them more than seven times . You must continue to forgive them even if they do wrong to you seventy-seven times .
40018023	“ So God’s kingdom is like a king who decided to collect the money his servants owed him .
40018024	The king began to collect his money . One servant owed him several thousand pounds of silver .
40018025	He was not able to pay the money to his master , the king . So the master ordered that he and everything he owned be sold , even his wife and children . The money would be used to pay the king what the servant owed .
40018026	“ But the servant fell on his knees and begged , ‘ Be patient with me . I will pay you everything I owe . ’
40018027	The master felt sorry for him . So he told the servant he did not have to pay . He let him go free .
40018028	“ Later , that same servant found another servant who owed him a hundred silver coins . He grabbed him around the neck and said , ‘ Pay me the money you owe me ! ’
40018029	“ The other servant fell on his knees and begged him , ‘ Be patient with me . I will pay you everything I owe . ’
40018030	“ But the first servant refused to be patient . He told the judge that the other servant owed him money , and that servant was put in jail until he could pay everything he owed .
40018031	All the other servants saw what happened . They felt very sorry for the man . So they went and told their master everything that happened .
40018032	“ Then the master called his servant in and said , ‘ You evil servant . You begged me to forgive your debt , and I said you did not have to pay anything !
40018033	So you should have given that other man who serves with you the same mercy I gave you . ’
40018034	The master was very angry , so he put the servant in jail to be punished . And he had to stay in jail until he could pay everything he owed .
40018035	“ This king did the same as my heavenly Father will do to you . You must forgive your brother or sister with all your heart , or my heavenly Father will not forgive you . ”
40019001	After Jesus said all these things , he left Galilee . He went into the area of Judea on the other side of the Jordan River .
40019002	Many people followed him . Jesus healed the sick people there .
40019003	Some Pharisees came to Jesus . They tried to make him say something wrong . They asked him , “ Is it right for a man to divorce his wife for any reason he chooses ? ”
40019004	Jesus answered , “ Surely you have read this in the Scriptures : When God made the world , ‘ he made people male and female . ’
40019005	And God said , ‘ That is why a man will leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife . And the two people will become one . ’
40019006	So they are no longer two , but one . God has joined them together , so no one should separate them . ”
40019007	The Pharisees asked , “ Then why did Moses give a command allowing a man to divorce his wife by writing a certificate of divorce ? ”
40019008	Jesus answered , “ Moses allowed you to divorce your wives because you refused to accept God’s teaching . But divorce was not allowed in the beginning .
40019009	I tell you that whoever divorces his wife , except for the problem of sexual sin , and marries another woman is guilty of adultery . ”
40019010	The followers said to Jesus , “ If that is the only reason a man can divorce his wife , it is better not to marry . ”
40019011	He answered , “ This statement is true for some , but not for everyone — only for those who have been given this gift .
40019012	There are different reasons why some men don’t marry . Some were born without the ability to produce children . Others were made that way later in life . And others have given up marriage because of God’s kingdom . This is for anyone who is able to accept it . ”
40019013	Then the people brought their little children to Jesus so that he could lay his hands on them to bless them and pray for them . When the followers saw this , they told the people to stop bringing their children to him .
40019014	But Jesus said , “ Let the little children come to me . Don’t stop them , because God’s kingdom belongs to people who are like these children . ”
40019015	After Jesus blessed the children , he left there .
40019016	A man came to Jesus and asked , “ Teacher , what good thing must I do to have eternal life ? ”
40019017	Jesus answered , “ Why do you ask me about what is good ? Only God is good . But if you want to have eternal life , obey the law’s commands . ”
40019018	The man asked , “ Which ones ? ” Jesus answered , “ ‘ You must not murder anyone , you must not commit adultery , you must not steal , you must not tell lies about others ,
40019019	you must respect your father and mother , ’ and ‘ love your neighbor the same as you love yourself . ’ ”
40019020	The young man said , “ I have obeyed all these commands . What else do I need ? ”
40019021	Jesus answered , “ If you want to be perfect , then go and sell all that you own . Give the money to the poor , and you will have riches in heaven . Then come and follow me ! ”
40019022	But when the young man heard Jesus tell him to give away his money , he was sad . He didn’t want to do this , because he was very rich . So he left .
40019023	Then Jesus said to his followers , “ The truth is , it will be very hard for a rich person to enter God’s kingdom .
40019024	Yes , I tell you , it is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich person to enter God’s kingdom . ”
40019025	The followers were amazed to hear this . They asked , “ Then who can be saved ? ”
40019026	Jesus looked at them and said , “ This is something that people cannot do . But God can do anything . ”
40019027	Peter said to him , “ We left everything we had and followed you . So what will we have ? ”
40019028	Jesus said to them , “ When the time of the new world comes , the Son of Man will sit on his great and glorious throne . And I can promise that you who followed me will sit on twelve thrones , and you will judge the twelve tribes of Israel .
40019029	Everyone who has left houses , brothers , sisters , father , mother , children , or farms to follow me will get much more than they left . And they will have eternal life .
40019030	Many people who are first now will be last in the future . And many who are last now will be first in the future .
40020001	“ God’s kingdom is like a man who owned some land . One morning , the man went out very early to hire some people to work in his vineyard .
40020002	He agreed to pay the workers one silver coin for working that day . Then he sent them into the vineyard to work .
40020003	“ About nine o’clock the man went to the marketplace and saw some other people standing there . They were doing nothing .
40020004	So he said to them , ‘ If you go and work in my field , I will pay you what your work is worth . ’
40020005	So they went to work in the vineyard . “ The man went out again about twelve o’clock and again at three o’clock . Both times he hired some others to work in his vineyard .
40020006	About five o’clock the man went to the marketplace again . He saw some other people standing there . He asked them , ‘ Why did you stand here all day doing nothing ? ’
40020007	“ They said , ‘ No one gave us a job . ’ “ The man said to them , ‘ Then you can go and work in my vineyard . ’
40020008	“ At the end of the day , the owner of the field said to the boss of all the workers , ‘ Call the workers and pay them all . Start by paying the last people I hired . Then pay all of them , ending with the ones I hired first . ’
40020009	“ The workers who were hired at five o’clock came to get their pay . Each worker got one silver coin .
40020010	Then the workers who were hired first came to get their pay . They thought they would be paid more than the others . But each one of them also received one silver coin .
40020011	When they got their silver coin , they complained to the man who owned the land .
40020012	They said , ‘ Those people were hired last and worked only one hour . But you paid them the same as us . And we worked hard all day in the hot sun . ’
40020013	“ But the man who owned the field said to one of them , ‘ Friend , I am being fair with you . You agreed to work for one silver coin . Right ?
40020014	So take your pay and go . I want to give the man who was hired last the same pay I gave you .
40020015	I can do what I want with my own money . Why would you be jealous because I am generous ? ’
40020016	“ So those who are last now will be first in the future . And those who are first now will be last in the future . ”
40020017	Jesus was going to Jerusalem . His twelve followers were with him . While they were walking , he gathered the followers together and spoke to them privately . He said to them ,
40020018	“ We are going to Jerusalem . The Son of Man will be handed over to the leading priests and the teachers of the law , and they will say he must die .
40020019	They will hand him over to the foreigners , who will laugh at him and beat him with whips , and then they will kill him on a cross . But on the third day after his death , he will be raised to life again . ”
40020020	Then Zebedee’s wife came to Jesus and brought her sons . She bowed before Jesus and asked him to do something for her .
40020021	Jesus said , “ What do you want ? ” She said , “ Promise that one of my sons will sit at your right side in your kingdom and the other at your left . ”
40020022	So Jesus said to the sons , “ You don’t understand what you are asking . Can you drink from the cup that I must drink from ? ” The sons answered , “ Yes , we can ! ”
40020023	Jesus said to them , “ It is true that you will drink from the cup that I drink from . But it is not for me to say who will sit at my right or my left . My Father has decided who will do that . He has prepared those places for them . ”
40020024	The other ten followers heard this and were angry with the two brothers .
40020025	So Jesus called the followers together . He said , “ You know that the rulers of the non-Jewish people love to show their power over the people . And their important leaders love to use all their authority over the people .
40020026	But it should not be that way with you . Whoever wants to be your leader must be your servant .
40020027	Whoever wants to be first must serve the rest of you like a slave .
40020028	Do as I did : The Son of Man did not come for people to serve him . He came to serve others and to give his life to save many people . ”
40020029	When Jesus and his followers were leaving Jericho , a large crowd followed him .
40020030	There were two blind men sitting by the road . They heard that Jesus was coming by . So they shouted , “ Lord , Son of David , please help us ! ”
40020031	The people there criticized the blind men and told them to be quiet . But they shouted more and more , “ Lord , Son of David , please help us ! ”
40020032	Jesus stopped and said to them , “ What do you want me to do for you ? ”
40020033	They answered , “ Lord , we want to be able to see . ”
40020034	Jesus felt sorry for the blind men . He touched their eyes , and immediately they were able to see . Then they became followers of Jesus .
40021001	Jesus and his followers were coming closer to Jerusalem . But first they stopped at Bethphage at the hill called the Mount of Olives . From there Jesus sent two of his followers into town .
40021002	He said to them , “ Go to the town you can see there . When you enter it , you will find a donkey with her colt . Untie them both , and bring them to me .
40021003	If anyone asks you why you are taking the donkeys , tell them , ‘ The Master needs them . He will send them back soon . ’ ”
40021004	This showed the full meaning of what the prophet said :
40021005	“ Tell the people of Zion , ‘ Now your king is coming to you . He is humble and riding on a donkey . He is riding on a young donkey , born from a work animal . ’ ”
40021006	The followers went and did what Jesus told them to do .
40021007	They brought the mother donkey and the young donkey to him . They covered the donkeys with their coats , and Jesus sat on them .
40021008	On the way to Jerusalem , many people spread their coats on the road for Jesus . Others cut branches from the trees and spread them on the road .
40021009	Some of the people were walking ahead of Jesus . Others were walking behind him . They all shouted , “ Praise to the Son of David ! ‘ Welcome ! God bless the one who comes in the name of the Lord ! ’ Praise to God in heaven ! ”
40021010	Then Jesus went into Jerusalem . All the people in the city were confused . They asked , “ Who is this man ? ”
40021011	The crowds following Jesus answered , “ This is Jesus . He is the prophet from the town of Nazareth in Galilee . ”
40021012	Jesus went into the Temple area . He threw out all those who were selling and buying things there . He turned over the tables that belonged to those who were exchanging different kinds of money . And he turned over the benches of those who were selling doves .
40021013	Jesus said to them , “ The Scriptures say , ‘ My Temple will be called a house of prayer . ’ But you are changing it into a ‘ hiding place for thieves . ’ ”
40021014	Some blind people and some who were crippled came to Jesus in the Temple area . Jesus healed them .
40021015	The leading priests and the teachers of the law saw the wonderful things he was doing . And they saw the children praising him in the Temple area . The children were shouting , “ Praise to the Son of David . ” All this made the priests and the teachers of the law angry .
40021016	They asked Jesus , “ Do you hear what these children are saying ? ” He answered , “ Yes . The Scriptures say , ‘ You have taught children and babies to give praise . ’ Have you not read that Scripture ? ”
40021017	Then Jesus left them and went out of the city to Bethany , where he spent the night .
40021018	Early the next morning , Jesus was going back to the city . He was very hungry .
40021019	He saw a fig tree beside the road and went to get a fig from it . But there were no figs on the tree . There were only leaves . So Jesus said to the tree , “ You will never again produce fruit ! ” The tree immediately dried up and died .
40021020	When the followers saw this , they were very surprised . They asked , “ How did the fig tree dry up and die so quickly ? ”
40021021	Jesus answered , “ The truth is , if you have faith and no doubts , you will be able to do the same as I did to this tree . And you will be able to do more . You will be able to say to this mountain , ‘ Go , mountain , fall into the sea . ’ And if you have faith , it will happen .
40021022	If you believe , you will get anything you ask for in prayer . ”
40021023	Jesus went into the Temple area . While Jesus was teaching there , the leading priests and the older leaders of the people came to him . They said , “ Tell us ! What authority do you have to do these things you are doing ? Who gave you this authority ? ”
40021024	Jesus answered , “ I will ask you a question too . If you answer me , then I will tell you what authority I have to do these things .
40021025	Tell me : When John baptized people , did his authority come from God , or was it only from other people ? ” The priests and the Jewish leaders talked about Jesus’ question . They said to each other , “ If we answer , ‘ John’s baptism was from God , ’ then he will say , ‘ Then why didn’t you believe John ? ’
40021026	But we can’t say John’s baptism was from someone else . We are afraid of the people , because they all believe John was a prophet . ”
40021027	So they told Jesus , “ We don’t know the answer . ” Jesus said , “ Then I will not tell you who gave me the authority to do these things .
40021028	“ Tell me what you think about this : There was a man who had two sons . He went to the first son and said , ‘ Son , go and work today in the vineyard . ’
40021029	“ The son answered , ‘ I will not go . ’ But later he decided he should go , and he went .
40021030	“ Then the father went to the other son and said , ‘ Son , go and work today in the vineyard . ’ He answered , ‘ Yes , sir , I will go and work . ’ But he did not go .
40021031	“ Which of the two sons obeyed his father ? ” The Jewish leaders answered , “ The first son . ” Jesus said to them , “ The truth is , you are worse than the tax collectors and the prostitutes . In fact , they will enter God’s kingdom before you enter .
40021032	John came showing you the right way to live , and you did not believe him . But the tax collectors and prostitutes believed John . You saw that happening , but you would not change . You still refused to believe him .
40021033	“ Listen to this story : There was a man who owned a vineyard . He put a wall around the field and dug a hole for a winepress . Then he built a tower . He leased the land to some farmers and then left on a trip .
40021034	Later , it was time for the grapes to be picked . So the man sent his servants to the farmers to get his share of the grapes .
40021035	“ But the farmers grabbed the servants and beat one . They killed another one and then stoned to death a third servant .
40021036	So the man sent some other servants to the farmers . He sent more servants than he sent the first time . But the farmers did the same thing to them that they did the first time .
40021037	So the man decided to send his son to the farmers . He said , ‘ The farmers will respect my son . ’
40021038	“ But when the farmers saw the son , they said to each other , ‘ This is the owner’s son . This vineyard will be his . If we kill him , it will be ours . ’
40021039	So the farmers took the son , threw him out of the vineyard , and killed him .
40021040	“ So what will the owner of the vineyard do to these farmers when he comes ? ”
40021041	The Jewish priests and leaders said , “ He will surely kill those evil men . Then he will lease the land to other farmers , who will give him his share of the crop at harvest time . ”
40021042	Jesus said to them , “ Surely you have read this in the Scriptures : ‘ The stone that the builders refused to accept became the cornerstone . The Lord did this , and it is wonderful to us . ’
40021043	“ So I tell you that God’s kingdom will be taken away from you . It will be given to people who do what God wants in his kingdom .
40021044	Whoever falls on this stone will be broken . And it will crush anyone it falls on . ”
40021045	When the leading priests and the Pharisees heard these stories , they knew that Jesus was talking about them .
40021046	They wanted to find a way to arrest Jesus . But they were afraid to do anything , because the people believed that Jesus was a prophet .
40022001	Jesus used some more stories to teach the people . He said ,
40022002	“ God’s kingdom is like a king who prepared a wedding feast for his son .
40022003	He invited some people to the feast . When it was ready , the king sent his servants to tell the people to come . But they refused to come to the king’s feast .
40022004	“ Then the king sent some more servants . He said to them , ‘ I have already invited the people . So tell them that my feast is ready . I have killed my best bulls and calves to be eaten . Everything is ready . Come to the wedding feast . ’
40022005	“ But when the servants told the people to come , they refused to listen . They all went to do other things . One went to work in his field , and another went to his business .
40022006	Some of the other people grabbed the servants , beat them , and killed them .
40022007	The king was very angry . He sent his army to kill those who murdered his servants . And the army burned their city .
40022008	“ After that the king said to his servants , ‘ The wedding feast is ready . I invited those people , but they were not good enough to come to my feast .
40022009	So go to the street corners and invite everyone you see . Tell them to come to my feast . ’
40022010	So the servants went into the streets . They gathered all the people they could find , good and bad alike , and brought them to where the wedding feast was ready . And the place was filled with guests .
40022011	“ When the king came in to meet the guests , he saw a man there who was not dressed in the right clothes for a wedding .
40022012	The king said , ‘ Friend , how were you allowed to come in here ? You are not wearing the right clothes . ’ But the man said nothing .
40022013	So the king told some servants , ‘ Tie this man’s hands and feet . Throw him out into the darkness , where people are crying and grinding their teeth with pain . ’
40022014	“ Yes , many people are invited . But only a few are chosen . ”
40022015	Then the Pharisees left the place where Jesus was teaching . They made plans to catch him saying something wrong .
40022016	They sent some men to Jesus . They were some of their own followers and some from the group called Herodians . They said , “ Teacher , we know you are an honest man . We know you teach the truth about God’s way . You are not afraid of what others think about you . All people are the same to you .
40022017	So tell us what you think . Is it right to pay taxes to Caesar or not ? ”
40022018	But Jesus knew that these men were trying to trick him . So he said , “ You hypocrites ! Why are you trying to catch me saying something wrong ?
40022019	Show me a coin used for paying the tax . ” They showed Jesus a silver coin .
40022020	Then he asked , “ Whose picture is on the coin ? And whose name is written on the coin ? ”
40022021	They answered , “ It is Caesar’s picture and Caesar’s name . ” Then Jesus said to them , “ Give to Caesar what belongs to Caesar , and give to God what belongs to God . ”
40022022	When they heard what Jesus said , they were amazed . They left him and went away .
40022023	That same day some Sadducees came to Jesus . ( Sadducees believe that no one will rise from death . ) The Sadducees asked Jesus a question .
40022024	They said , “ Teacher , Moses told us that if a married man dies and had no children , his brother must marry the woman . Then they will have children for the dead brother .
40022025	There were seven brothers among us . The first brother married but died . He had no children . So his brother married the woman .
40022026	Then the second brother also died . The same thing happened to the third brother and all the other brothers .
40022027	The woman was the last to die .
40022028	But all seven men had married her . So when people rise from death , whose wife will she be ? ”
40022029	Jesus answered , “ You are so wrong ! You don’t know what the Scriptures say . And you don’t know anything about God’s power .
40022030	At the time when people rise from death , there will be no marriage . People will not be married to each other . Everyone will be like the angels in heaven .
40022031	Surely you have read what God said to you about people rising from death .
40022032	God said , ‘ I am the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’ So they were not still dead , because he is the God only of living people . ”
40022033	When the people heard this , they were amazed at Jesus’ teaching .
40022034	The Pharisees learned that Jesus had made the Sadducees look so foolish that they stopped trying to argue with him . So the Pharisees had a meeting .
40022035	Then one of them , an expert in the Law of Moses , asked Jesus a question to test him .
40022036	He said , “ Teacher , which command in the law is the most important ? ”
40022037	Jesus answered , “ ‘ Love the Lord your God with all your heart , all your soul , and all your mind . ’
40022038	This is the first and most important command .
40022039	And the second command is like the first : ‘ Love your neighbor the same as you love yourself . ’
40022040	All of the law and the writings of the prophets take their meaning from these two commands . ”
40022041	So while the Pharisees were together , Jesus asked them a question .
40022042	He said , “ What do you think about the Messiah ? Whose son is he ? ” The Pharisees answered , “ The Messiah is the Son of David . ”
40022043	Jesus said to them , “ Then why did David call him ‘ Lord ’ ? David was speaking by the power of the Spirit . He said ,
40022044	‘ The Lord God said to my Lord : Sit by me at my right side , and I will put your enemies under your control . ’
40022046	None of the Pharisees could answer Jesus’ question . And after that day , no one was brave enough to ask him any more questions .
40023001	Then Jesus spoke to the people and to his followers . He said ,
40023002	“ The teachers of the law and the Pharisees have the authority to tell you what the Law of Moses says .
40023003	So you should obey them . Do everything they tell you to do . But their lives are not good examples for you to follow . They tell you to do things , but they don’t do those things themselves .
40023004	They make strict rules that are hard for people to obey . They try to force others to obey all their rules . But they themselves will not try to follow any of those rules .
40023005	“ The only reason they do what they do is for other people to see them . They make the little Scripture boxes they wear bigger and bigger . And they make the tassels on their prayer clothes long enough for people to notice them .
40023006	These men love to have the places of honor at banquets and the most important seats in the synagogues .
40023007	They love for people to show respect to them in the marketplaces and to call them ‘ Teacher . ’
40023008	“ But you must not be called ‘ Teacher . ’ You are all equal as brothers and sisters . You have only one Teacher .
40023009	And don’t call anyone on earth ‘ Father . ’ You have one Father . He is in heaven .
40023010	And you should not be called ‘ Master . ’ You have only one Master , the Messiah .
40023011	Whoever serves you like a servant is the greatest among you .
40023012	People who think they are better than others will be made humble . But people who humble themselves will be made great .
40023013	“ It will be bad for you teachers of the law and you Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You close the way for people to enter God’s kingdom . You yourselves don’t enter , and you stop those who are trying to enter .
40023015	“ It will be bad for you teachers of the law and you Pharisees ! You are hypocrites . You travel across the seas and across different countries to find one person who will follow your ways . When you find that person , you make him worse than you are . And you are so bad that you belong in hell !
40023016	“ It will be bad for you teachers of the law and you Pharisees ! You guide the people , but you are blind . You say , ‘ If anyone uses the name of the Temple to make a promise , that means nothing . But anyone who uses the gold that is in the Temple to make a promise must keep that promise . ’
40023017	You are blind fools ! Can’t you see that the Temple is greater than the gold on it ? It’s the Temple that makes the gold holy !
40023018	“ And you say , ‘ If anyone uses the altar to make a promise , that means nothing . But anyone who uses the gift on the altar to make a promise must keep that promise . ’
40023019	You are blind ! Can’t you see that the altar is greater than any gift on it ? It’s the altar that makes the gift holy !
40023020	Whoever uses the altar to make a promise is really using the altar and everything on the altar .
40023021	And anyone who uses the Temple to make a promise is really using the Temple and God , who lives in it .
40023022	Whoever uses heaven to make a promise is using God’s throne and the one who is seated on it .
40023023	“ It will be bad for you teachers of the law and you Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You give God a tenth of the food you get , even your mint , dill , and cumin . But you don’t obey the really important teachings of the law — being fair , showing mercy , and being faithful . These are the things you should do . And you should also continue to do those other things .
40023024	You guide the people , but you are blind ! Think about a man picking a little fly out of his drink and then swallowing a camel ! You are like that .
40023025	“ It will be bad for you teachers of the law and you Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You wash clean the outside of your cups and dishes . But inside they are full of what you got by cheating others and pleasing yourselves .
40023026	Pharisees , you are blind ! First make the inside of the cup clean and good . Then the outside of the cup will also be clean .
40023027	“ It will be bad for you teachers of the law and you Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You are like tombs that are painted white . Outside they look fine , but inside they are full of dead people’s bones and all kinds of filth .
40023028	It is the same with you . People look at you and think you are godly . But on the inside you are full of hypocrisy and evil .
40023029	“ It will be bad for you teachers of the law and you Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You build tombs for the prophets . And you show honor to the graves of the godly people who were killed .
40023030	And you say , ‘ If we had lived during the time of our ancestors , we would not have helped them kill these prophets . ’
40023031	So you give proof that you are descendants of those who killed the prophets .
40023032	And you will finish the sin that your ancestors started !
40023033	“ You are snakes ! You are from a family of poisonous snakes ! You will not escape God . You will all be judged guilty and go to hell !
40023034	So I tell you this : I send to you prophets and teachers who are wise and know the Scriptures . You will kill some of them . You will hang some of them on crosses . You will beat some of them in your synagogues . You will chase them from town to town .
40023035	“ So you will be guilty for the death of all the good people who have been killed on earth . You will be guilty for the killing of that godly man Abel . And you will be guilty for the killing of Zechariah son of Berachiah . He was killed between the Temple and the altar . You will be guilty for the killing of all the good people who lived between the time of Abel and the time of Zechariah .
40023036	Believe me when I say that all these things will happen to you people who are living now .
40023037	“ O Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! You kill the prophets . You stone to death those that God has sent to you . Many , many times I wanted to help your people . I wanted to gather them together as a hen gathers her chicks under her wings . But you did not let me .
40023038	Now your house will be left completely empty .
40023039	I tell you , you will not see me again until that time when you will say , ‘ Welcome ! God bless the one who comes in the name of the Lord . ’ ”
40024001	Jesus left the Temple area and was walking away . But his followers came to him to show him the Temple’s buildings .
40024002	He asked them , “ Are you looking at these buildings ? The fact is , they will be destroyed . Every stone will be thrown down to the ground . Not one stone will be left on another . ”
40024003	Later , Jesus was sitting at a place on the Mount of Olives . The followers came to be alone with him . They said , “ Tell us when these things will happen . And what will happen to prepare us for your coming and the end of time ? ”
40024004	Jesus answered , “ Be careful ! Don’t let anyone fool you .
40024005	Many people will come and use my name . They will say , ‘ I am the Messiah . ’ And they will fool many people .
40024006	You will hear about wars that are being fought . And you will hear stories about other wars beginning . But don’t be afraid . These things must happen before the end comes .
40024007	Nations will fight against other nations . Kingdoms will fight against other kingdoms . There will be times when there is no food for people to eat . And there will be earthquakes in different places .
40024008	These things are only the beginning of troubles , like the first pains of a woman giving birth .
40024009	“ Then you will be arrested and handed over to be punished and killed . People all over the world will hate you because you believe in me .
40024010	During that time many believers will lose their faith . They will turn against each other and hate each other .
40024011	Many false prophets will come and cause many people to believe things that are wrong .
40024012	There will be so much more evil in the world that the love of most believers will grow cold .
40024013	But the one who remains faithful to the end will be saved .
40024014	And the Good News I have shared about God’s kingdom will be told throughout the world . It will be spread to every nation . Then the end will come .
40024015	“ Daniel the prophet spoke about ‘ the terrible thing that causes destruction . ’ You will see this terrible thing standing in the holy place . ” ( You who read this should understand what it means . )
40024016	“ The people in Judea at that time should run away to the mountains .
40024017	They should run away without wasting time to stop for anything . If they are on the roof of their house , they must not go down to get anything out of the house .
40024018	If they are in the field , they must not go back to get a coat .
40024019	“ During that time it will be hard for women who are pregnant or have small babies !
40024020	Pray that it will not be winter or a Sabbath day when these things happen and you have to run away ,
40024021	because it will be a time of great trouble . There will be more trouble than has ever happened since the beginning of the world . And nothing as bad as that will ever happen again .
40024022	“ But God has decided to make that terrible time short . If it were not made short , no one would continue living . But God will make that time short to help the people he has chosen .
40024023	“ Someone might say to you at that time , ‘ Look , there is the Messiah ! ’ Or someone else might say , ‘ There he is ! ’ But don’t believe them .

40024025	Now I have warned you about this before it happens .
40024026	“ Someone might tell you , ‘ The Messiah is there in the desert ! ’ But don’t go into the desert to look for him . Someone else might say , ‘ There is the Messiah in that room ! ’ But don’t believe it .
40024027	When the Son of Man comes , everyone will see him . It will be like lightning flashing in the sky that can be seen everywhere .
40024028	It’s like looking for a dead body : You will find it where the vultures are gathering above .

40024033	In the same way , when you see all these things happening , you will know that the time is very near , already present .

40024035	The whole world , earth and sky , will be destroyed , but my words will last forever .
40024036	“ No one knows when that day or time will be . The Son and the angels in heaven don’t know when it will be . Only the Father knows .

40024039	They knew nothing about what was happening until the flood came and destroyed them all . “ It will be the same when the Son of Man comes .
40024040	Two men will be working together in the field . One will be taken and the other will be left .

40024042	“ So always be ready . You don’t know the day your Lord will come .
40024043	What would a homeowner do if he knew when a thief was coming ? You know he would be ready and not let the thief break in .
40024044	So you also must be ready . The Son of Man will come at a time when you don’t expect him .
40024045	“ Who is the wise and trusted servant ? The master trusts one servant to give the other servants their food at the right time . Who is the one the master trusts to do that work ?
40024046	When the master comes and finds that servant doing the work he gave him , it will be a day of blessing for that servant .
40024047	I can tell you without a doubt , the master will choose that servant to take care of everything he owns .
40024048	“ But what will happen if that servant is evil and thinks his master will not come back soon ?
40024049	He will begin to beat the other servants . He will eat and drink with others who are drunk .
40024050	Then the master will come when the servant is not ready , at a time when the servant is not expecting him .

40025001	“ At that time God’s kingdom will be like ten girls who went to wait for the bridegroom . They took their lamps with them .
40025002	Five of the girls were foolish , and five were wise .
40025003	The foolish girls took their lamps with them , but they did not take extra oil for the lamps .
40025004	The wise girls took their lamps and more oil in jars .
40025005	When the bridegroom was very late , the girls could not keep their eyes open , and they all fell asleep .
40025006	“ At midnight someone announced , ‘ The bridegroom is coming ! Come and meet him ! ’
40025007	“ Then all the girls woke up . They made their lamps ready .
40025008	But the foolish girls said to the wise girls , ‘ Give us some of your oil . The oil in our lamps is all gone . ’
40025009	“ The wise girls answered , ‘ No ! The oil we have might not be enough for all of us . But go to those who sell oil and buy some for yourselves . ’
40025010	“ So the foolish girls went to buy oil . While they were gone , the bridegroom came . The girls who were ready went in with the bridegroom to the wedding feast . Then the door was closed and locked .
40025011	“ Later , the other girls came . They said , ‘ Sir , sir ! Open the door to let us in . ’
40025012	“ But the bridegroom answered , ‘ Certainly not ! I don’t even know you . ’
40025013	“ So always be ready . You don’t know the day or the time when the Son of Man will come .
40025014	“ At that time God’s kingdom will also be like a man leaving home to travel to another place for a visit . Before he left , he talked with his servants . He told his servants to take care of his things while he was gone .
40025015	He decided how much each servant would be able to care for . The man gave one servant five bags of money . He gave another servant two bags . And he gave a third servant one bag . Then he left .
40025016	The servant who got five bags went quickly to invest the money . Those five bags of money earned five more .
40025017	It was the same with the servant who had two bags . That servant invested the money and earned two more .
40025018	But the servant who got one bag of money went away and dug a hole in the ground . Then he hid his master’s money in the hole .
40025019	“ After a long time the master came home . He asked the servants what they did with his money .
40025020	The servant who got five bags brought that amount and five more bags of money to the master . The servant said , ‘ Master , you trusted me to care for five bags of money . So I used them to earn five more . ’
40025021	“ The master answered , ‘ You did right . You are a good servant who can be trusted . You did well with that small amount of money . So I will let you care for much greater things . Come and share my happiness with me . ’
40025022	“ Then the servant who got two bags of money came to the master . The servant said , ‘ Master , you gave me two bags of money to care for . So I used your two bags to earn two more . ’
40025023	“ The master answered , ‘ You did right . You are a good servant who can be trusted . You did well with a small amount of money . So I will let you care for much greater things . Come and share my happiness with me . ’
40025024	“ Then the servant who got one bag of money came to the master . The servant said , ‘ Master , I knew you were a very hard man . You harvest what you did not plant . You gather crops where you did not put any seed .
40025025	So I was afraid . I went and hid your money in the ground . Here is the one bag of money you gave me . ’
40025026	“ The master answered , ‘ You are a bad and lazy servant ! You say you knew that I harvest what I did not plant and that I gather crops where I did not put any seed .
40025027	So you should have put my money in the bank . Then , when I came home , I would get my money back . And I would also get the interest that my money earned . ’
40025028	“ So the master told his other servants , ‘ Take the one bag of money from that servant and give it to the servant who has ten bags .
40025029	Everyone who uses what they have will get more . They will have much more than they need . But people who do not use what they have will have everything taken away from them . ’

40026001	After Jesus finished saying all these things , he said to his followers ,

40026006	Jesus was in Bethany at the house of Simon the leper .

40027006	The leading priests picked up the silver coins in the Temple . They said , “ Our law does not allow us to keep this money with the Temple money , because this money has paid for a man’s death . ”

40027008	That is why that field is still called the Field of Blood .

41001001	The Good News about Jesus the Messiah , the Son of God , begins

41001045	The man left there and told everyone he saw that Jesus had healed him . So the news about Jesus spread . And that is why he could not enter a town if people saw him . He stayed in places where people did not live . But people came from all the towns to the places where he was .
41002001	A few days later , Jesus came back to Capernaum . The news spread that he was back home .

41002003	some people brought a paralyzed man to see him . He was being carried by four of them .
41002004	But they could not get the man inside to Jesus because the house was so full of people . So they went to the roof above Jesus and made a hole in it . Then they lowered the mat with the paralyzed man on it .
41002005	When Jesus saw how much faith they had , he said to the paralyzed man , “ Young man , your sins are forgiven . ”
41002006	Some of the teachers of the law were sitting there . They saw what Jesus did , and they said to themselves ,
41002007	“ Why does this man say things like that ? What an insult to God ! No one but God can forgive sins . ”
41002008	Jesus knew immediately what these teachers of the law were thinking . So he said to them , “ Why do you have these questions in your minds ?
41002011	“ I tell you , stand up . Take your mat and go home . ”
41002012	Immediately the paralyzed man stood up . He picked up his mat and walked out of the room . Everyone could see him . They were amazed and praised God . They said , “ This is the most amazing thing we have ever seen ! ”
41002013	Jesus went to the lake again , and many people followed him there . So Jesus taught them .
41002014	He was walking beside the lake , and he saw a man named Levi , son of Alphaeus . Levi was sitting at his place for collecting taxes . Jesus said to him , “ Follow me . ” Then Levi stood up and followed Jesus .
41002015	Later that day , Jesus and his followers ate at Levi’s house . There were also many tax collectors and others with bad reputations eating with them . ( There were many of these people who followed Jesus . )
41002016	When some teachers of the law who were Pharisees saw Jesus eating with such bad people , they asked his followers , “ Why does he eat with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
41002017	When Jesus heard this , he said to them , “ It is the sick people who need a doctor , not those who are healthy . I did not come to invite good people . I came to invite sinners . ”
41002018	The followers of John and the Pharisees were fasting . Some people came to Jesus and said , “ John’s followers fast , and the followers of the Pharisees fast . But your followers don’t fast . Why ? ”
41002019	Jesus answered , “ At a wedding the friends of the bridegroom are not sad while he is with them . They cannot fast while the bridegroom is still there .
41002020	But the time will come when the bridegroom will be taken from them . Then they will fast .
41002021	“ When someone sews a patch over a hole in an old coat , they never use a piece of cloth that is not yet shrunk . If they do , the patch will shrink and pull away from the coat . Then the hole will be worse .
41002022	Also , no one ever pours new wine into old wineskins . The wine would break them , and the wine would be ruined along with the wineskins . You always put new wine into new wineskins . ”
41002023	On the Sabbath day , Jesus and his followers were walking through some grain fields . The followers picked some grain to eat .
41002024	Some Pharisees said to Jesus , “ Why are your followers doing this ? It is against the law to pick grain on the Sabbath . ”
41002025	Jesus answered , “ You have read what David did when he and the people with him were hungry and needed food .
41002026	It was during the time of Abiathar the high priest . David went into God’s house and ate the bread that was offered to God . And the Law of Moses says that only priests can eat that bread . David also gave some of the bread to the people with him . ”
41002027	Then Jesus said to the Pharisees , “ The Sabbath day was made to help people . People were not made to be ruled by the Sabbath .
41002028	So the Son of Man is Lord of every day , even the Sabbath . ”
41003001	Another time Jesus went into the synagogue . In the synagogue there was a man with a crippled hand .
41003002	Some Jews there were watching Jesus closely . They were waiting to see if he would heal the man on a Sabbath day . They wanted to see Jesus do something wrong so that they could accuse him .
41003003	Jesus said to the man with the crippled hand , “ Stand up here so that everyone can see you . ”
41003004	Then Jesus asked the people , “ Which is the right thing to do on the Sabbath day : to do good or to do evil ? Is it right to save a life or to destroy one ? ” The people said nothing to answer him .
41003005	Jesus looked at the people . He was angry , but he felt very sad because they were so stubborn . He said to the man , “ Hold out your hand . ” The man held out his hand , and it was healed .
41003006	Then the Pharisees left and made plans with the Herodians about a way to kill Jesus .
41003007	Jesus went away with his followers to the lake . A large crowd of people from Galilee followed them .
41003008	Many also came from Judea , from Jerusalem , from Idumea , from the area across the Jordan River , and from the area around Tyre and Sidon . These people came because they heard about all that Jesus was doing .
41003009	Jesus saw how many people there were , so he told his followers to get a small boat and make it ready for him . He wanted the boat so that the crowds of people could not push against him .
41003010	He had healed many of them , so all the sick people were pushing toward him to touch him .
41003011	Some people had evil spirits inside them . When the evil spirits saw Jesus , they bowed before him and shouted , “ You are the Son of God ! ”
41003012	But Jesus gave the spirits a strong warning not to tell anyone who he was .
41003013	Then Jesus went up on a hill and invited those he wanted to go with him . So they joined him there .
41003014	And he chose twelve men and called them apostles . He wanted these twelve men to be with him , and he wanted to send them to other places to tell people God’s message .
41003015	He also wanted them to have the power to force demons out of people .
41003016	These are the names of the twelve men Jesus chose :
41003020	Then Jesus went home , but again a large crowd gathered there . There were so many people that he and his followers could not eat .
41003021	His family heard about all these things . They went to get him because people said he was crazy .
41003022	And the teachers of the law from Jerusalem said , “ Satan is living inside him ! He uses power from the ruler of demons to force demons out of people . ”
41003023	So Jesus called them together and talked to them using some stories . He said , “ Satan will not force his own demons out of people .
41003024	A kingdom that fights against itself will not survive .
41003025	And a family that is divided will not survive .
41003026	If Satan is against himself and is fighting against his own people , he will not survive . That would be the end of Satan .
41003027	“ Whoever wants to enter a strong man’s house and steal his things must first tie him up . Then they can steal the things from his house .
41003028	“ I want you to know that people can be forgiven for all the sinful things they do . They can even be forgiven for the bad things they say against God .
41003029	But anyone who speaks against the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven . They will always be guilty of that sin . ”
41003030	Jesus said this because the teachers of the law had accused him of having an evil spirit inside him .
41003031	Then Jesus’ mother and brothers came . They stood outside and sent someone in to tell him to come out .
41003032	Many people were sitting around Jesus . They said to him , “ Your mother , your brothers , and your sisters are waiting for you outside . ”
41003033	Jesus asked , “ Who is my mother ? Who are my brothers ? ”
41003034	Then he looked at the people sitting around him and said , “ These people are my mother and my brothers !
41003035	My true brother and sister and mother are those who do what God wants . ”
41004001	Another time Jesus began teaching by the lake , and a large crowd gathered around him . He got into a boat so that he could sit and teach from the lake . All the people stayed on the shore near the water .
41004002	Jesus used stories to teach them many things . One of his lessons included this story :
41004003	“ Listen ! A farmer went out to sow seed .
41004004	While he was scattering the seed , some of it fell by the road . The birds came and ate all that seed .
41004005	Other seed fell on rocky ground , where there was not enough dirt . It grew quickly there because the soil was not deep .
41004006	But then the sun rose and the plants were burned . They died because they did not have deep roots .
41004007	Some other seed fell among thorny weeds . The weeds grew and stopped the good plants from growing . So they did not make grain .
41004008	But some of the seed fell on good ground . There it began to grow , and it made grain . Some plants made 30 times more grain , some 60 times more , and some 100 times more . ”
41004009	Then Jesus said , “ You people who hear me , listen ! ”
41004010	Later , Jesus was away from the people . The twelve apostles and his other followers asked him about the stories .
41004011	Jesus said , “ Only you can know the secret truth about God’s kingdom . But to those other people I tell everything by using stories .
41004012	I do this so that ‘ They will look and look but never really see ; they will listen and listen but never understand . If they saw and understood , they might change and be forgiven . ’ ”
41004013	Then Jesus said to the followers , “ Do you understand this story ? If you don’t , how will you understand any story ?
41004014	The farmer is like someone who plants God’s teaching in people .
41004015	Sometimes the teaching falls on the path . That is like some people who hear the teaching of God . As soon as they hear it , Satan comes and takes away the teaching that was planted in them .
41004016	“ Other people are like the seed planted on rocky ground . They hear the teaching , and they quickly and gladly accept it .
41004017	But they don’t allow it to go deep into their lives . They keep it only a short time . As soon as trouble or persecution comes because of the teaching they accepted , they give up .
41004018	“ Others are like the seed planted among the thorny weeds . They hear the teaching ,
41004019	but their lives become full of other things : the worries of this life , the love of money , and everything else they want . This keeps the teaching from growing , and it does not produce a crop in their lives .
41004020	“ And others are like the seed planted on the good ground . They hear the teaching and accept it . Then they grow and produce a good crop — sometimes 30 times more , sometimes 60 times more , and sometimes 100 times more . ”
41004021	Then Jesus said to them , “ You don’t take a lamp and hide it under a bowl or a bed , do you ? Of course not . You put it on a lampstand .
41004022	Everything that is hidden will be made clear . Every secret thing will be made known .
41004023	You people who hear me , listen !
41004024	Think carefully about what you are hearing . God will know how much to give you by how much you understand now . But he will give you more than you deserve .
41004025	The people who have some understanding will receive more . But those who do not have much will lose even the small amount they have . ”
41004026	Then Jesus said , “ God’s kingdom is like a man who plants seed in the ground .
41004027	The seed begins to grow . It grows night and day . It doesn’t matter whether the man is sleeping or awake , the seed still grows . He doesn’t know how it happens .
41004028	Without any help the ground produces grain . First the plant grows , then the head , and then all the grain in the head .
41004029	When the grain is ready , the man cuts it . This is the harvest time . ”
41004030	Then Jesus said , “ What can I use to show you what God’s kingdom is like ? What story can I use to explain it ?
41004031	God’s kingdom is like a mustard seed , which is smaller than any other seed on earth that you can plant .
41004032	But when you plant it , it grows and becomes the largest of all the plants in your garden . It has branches that are very big . The wild birds can come and make nests there and be protected from the sun . ”
41004033	Jesus used many stories like these to teach the people . He taught them all they could understand .
41004034	He always used stories to teach them . But when he was alone with his followers , Jesus explained everything to them .
41004035	That day , at evening , Jesus said to his followers , “ Come with me across the lake . ”
41004036	So they left the crowd behind and went with Jesus in the boat he was already in . There were also other boats that went with them .
41004037	A very bad wind came up on the lake . The waves were coming over the sides and into the boat , and it was almost full of water .
41004038	Jesus was inside the boat , sleeping with his head on a pillow . The followers went and woke him . They said , “ Teacher , don’t you care about us ? We are going to drown ! ”
41004039	Jesus stood up and gave a command to the wind and the water . He said , “ Quiet ! Be still ! ” Then the wind stopped , and the lake became calm .
41004040	He said to his followers , “ Why are you afraid ? Do you still have no faith ? ”
41004041	They were very afraid and asked each other , “ What kind of man is this ? Even the wind and the water obey him ! ”
41005001	Jesus and his followers went across the lake to the area where the Gerasene people lived .
41005002	When Jesus got out of the boat , a man came to him from the caves where the dead are buried . This man had an evil spirit living inside him .
41005003	He lived in the burial caves . No one could keep him tied up , even with chains .
41005004	Many times people had put chains on his hands and feet , but he broke the chains . No one was strong enough to control him .
41005005	Day and night he stayed around the burial caves and on the hills . He would scream and cut himself with rocks .
41005006	While Jesus was still far away , the man saw him . He ran to Jesus and bowed down before him .
41005009	Then Jesus asked the man , “ What is your name ? ” The man answered , “ My name is Legion , because there are many spirits inside me . ”
41005010	The spirits inside the man begged Jesus again and again not to send them out of that area .
41005011	A large herd of pigs was eating on a hill near there .
41005012	The evil spirits begged Jesus , “ Send us to the pigs . Let us go into them . ”
41005013	So Jesus allowed them to do this . The evil spirits left the man and went into the pigs . Then the herd of pigs ran down the hill and into the lake . They were all drowned . There were about 2000 pigs in that herd .
41005014	The men who had the work of caring for the pigs ran away . They ran to the town and to the farms and told everyone what happened . The people went out to see .
41005015	They came to Jesus , and they saw the man who had the many evil spirits . He was sitting down and was wearing clothes . He was in his right mind again . When they saw this , they were afraid .
41005016	Those who had seen what Jesus did told the others what happened to the man who had the demons living in him . And they also told about the pigs .
41005017	Then the people began to beg Jesus to leave their area .
41005018	Jesus was preparing to leave in the boat . The man who was now free from the demons begged to go with him .
41005019	But Jesus did not allow the man to go . He said , “ Go home to your family and friends . Tell them about all that the Lord did for you . Tell them how the Lord was good to you . ”
41005020	So the man left and told the people in the Ten Towns about the great things Jesus did for him . Everyone was amazed .
41005021	Jesus went back to the other side of the lake in the boat . There , a large crowd of people gathered around him on the shore .
41005022	A leader of the synagogue came . His name was Jairus . He saw Jesus and bowed down before him .
41005023	He begged Jesus again and again , saying , “ My little daughter is dying . Please come and lay your hands on her . Then she will be healed and will live . ”
41005024	So Jesus went with Jairus . Many people followed Jesus . They were pushing very close around him .
41005025	There among the people was a woman who had been bleeding for the past twelve years .
41005026	She had suffered very much . Many doctors had tried to help her , and all the money she had was spent , but she was not improving . In fact , her sickness was getting worse .
41005027	The woman heard about Jesus , so she followed him with the other people and touched his coat .
41005028	She thought , “ If I can just touch his clothes , that will be enough to heal me . ”
41005029	As soon as she touched his coat , her bleeding stopped . She felt that her body was healed from all the suffering .
41005030	Jesus immediately felt power go out from him , so he stopped and turned around . “ Who touched my clothes ? ” he asked .
41005031	The followers said to Jesus , “ There are so many people pushing against you . But you ask , ‘ Who touched me ? ’ ”
41005032	But Jesus continued looking for the one who touched him .
41005033	The woman knew that she was healed , so she came and bowed at Jesus’ feet . She was shaking with fear . She told Jesus the whole story .
41005034	He said to her , “ Dear woman , you are made well because you believed . Go in peace . You will not suffer anymore . ”
41005035	While Jesus was still there speaking , some men came from the house of Jairus , the synagogue leader . They said , “ Your daughter is dead . There is no need to bother the Teacher . ”
41005036	But Jesus did not care what the men said . He said to the synagogue leader , “ Don’t be afraid ; just believe . ”
41005037	Jesus let only Peter , James , and John the brother of James go with him .
41005038	They went to the synagogue leader’s house , where Jesus saw many people crying loudly . There was a lot of confusion .
41005039	He entered the house and said , “ Why are you people crying and making so much noise ? This child is not dead . She is only sleeping . ”
41005040	But everyone laughed at him . Jesus told the people to leave the house . Then he went into the room where the child was . He brought the child’s father and mother and his three followers into the room with him .
41005041	Then Jesus held the girl’s hand and said to her , “ Talitha , koum ! ” ( This means “ Little girl , I tell you to stand up ! ” )
41005042	The girl immediately stood up and began walking . ( She was twelve years old . ) The father and mother and the followers were amazed .
41005043	Jesus gave the father and mother very strict orders not to tell people about this . Then he told them to give the girl some food to eat .
41006001	Jesus left and went back to his hometown . His followers went with him .
41006002	On the Sabbath day Jesus taught in the synagogue , and many people heard him . They were amazed and said , “ Where did this man get this teaching ? How did he get such wisdom ? Who gave it to him ? And where did he get the power to do miracles ?
41006003	Isn’t he just the carpenter we know — Mary’s son , the brother of James , Joses , Judas , and Simon ? And don’t his sisters still live here in town ? ” So they had a problem accepting him .
41006004	Then Jesus said to them , “ People everywhere give honor to a prophet , except in his own town , with his own people , or in his home . ”
41006005	Jesus was not able to do any miracles there except the healing of some sick people by laying his hands on them .
41006006	He was surprised that the people there had no faith . Then he went to other villages in that area and taught .
41006007	Jesus called his twelve apostles together . He sent them out in groups of two and gave them power over evil spirits .
41006008	This is what he told them : “ Take nothing for your trip except a stick for walking . Take no bread , no bag , and no money .
41006009	You can wear sandals , but don’t take extra clothes .
41006010	When you enter a house , stay there until you leave that town .
41006011	If any town refuses to accept you or refuses to listen to you , then leave that town and shake the dust off your feet as a warning to them . ”
41006012	The apostles left and went to other places . They talked to the people and told them to change their hearts and lives .
41006013	They forced many demons out of people and put olive oil on many who were sick and healed them .
41006014	King Herod heard about Jesus , because Jesus was now famous . Some people said , “ He is John the Baptizer . He must have risen from death , and that is why he can do these miracles . ”
41006015	Other people said , “ He is Elijah . ” And others said , “ He is a prophet . He is like the prophets who lived long ago . ”
41006016	Herod heard these things about Jesus . He said , “ I killed John by cutting off his head . Now he has been raised from death ! ”
41006017	Herod himself had ordered his soldiers to arrest John and put him in prison . Herod did this to please his wife Herodias . She had been married to Herod’s brother Philip , but then Herod married her .
41006018	John told Herod , “ It is not right for you to be married to your brother’s wife . ”
41006019	So Herodias hated John . She wanted him dead , but she was not able to persuade Herod to kill him .
41006020	Herod was afraid to kill John , because he knew that he was a good and holy man . So he protected him . He liked listening to John , although what John said left him with so many questions .
41006021	Then the right time came for Herodias to cause John’s death . It happened on Herod’s birthday . Herod gave a dinner party for the most important government leaders , the commanders of his army , and the most important people in Galilee .
41006022	The daughter of Herodias came to the party and danced . When she danced , Herod and the people eating with him were very pleased . So King Herod said to the girl , “ I will give you anything you want . ”
41006023	He promised her , “ Anything you ask for I will give to you — even half of my kingdom . ”
41006024	The girl went to her mother and asked , “ What should I ask King Herod to give me ? ” Her mother answered , “ Ask for the head of John the Baptizer . ”
41006025	So right then the girl went back in to the king . She said to him , “ Please give me the head of John the Baptizer . Bring it to me now on a plate . ”
41006026	King Herod was very sad , but he didn’t want to break the promise he had made to her in front of his guests .
41006027	So he sent a soldier to cut off John’s head and bring it to him . The soldier went and cut off John’s head in the prison .
41006028	He brought the head back on a plate and gave it to the girl , and the girl gave it to her mother .
41006029	John’s followers heard about what happened , so they came and got John’s body and put it in a tomb .
41006030	The apostles Jesus had sent out came back to him . They gathered around him and told him about all they had done and taught .
41006031	Jesus and his followers were in a very busy place . There were so many people that he and his followers did not even have time to eat . He said to them , “ Come with me . We will go to a quiet place to be alone . There we will get some rest . ”
41006032	So Jesus and his followers went away alone . They went in a boat to a place where no one lived .
41006033	But many people saw them leave and knew who they were . So people from every town ran to the place where they were going and got there before Jesus .
41006034	As Jesus stepped out of the boat , he saw a large crowd waiting . He felt sorry for them , because they were like sheep without a shepherd to care for them . So he taught the people many things .
41006035	It was now very late in the day . Jesus’ followers came to him and said , “ No one lives around here , and it is already very late .
41006036	So send the people away . They need to go to the farms and towns around here to buy some food to eat . ”
41006037	But Jesus answered , “ You give them some food to eat . ” They said to Jesus , “ We can’t buy enough bread to feed all these people . We would all have to work a month to earn enough to buy that much bread ! ”
41006038	Jesus asked them , “ How many loaves of bread do you have now ? Go and see . ” They counted their loaves of bread . They came to Jesus and said , “ We have five loaves of bread and two fish . ”
41006039	Then Jesus said to them , “ Tell everyone to sit in groups on the green grass . ”
41006040	So all the people sat in groups . There were about 50 or 100 people in each group .
41006041	Jesus took the five loaves and two fish . He looked up to the sky and thanked God for the food . Then he broke the bread into pieces , which he gave to his followers to distribute to the people . Then he divided the two fish among everyone there .
41006042	They all ate until they were full .
41006043	After they finished eating , the followers filled twelve baskets with the pieces of bread and fish that were left .
41006044	There were about 5000 men there who ate .
41006045	Then Jesus told the followers to get into the boat . He told them to go to the other side of the lake to Bethsaida . He said he would come later . He stayed there to tell everyone they could go home .
41006046	After he said goodbye to them , he went up into the hills to pray .
41006047	That night , the boat was still in the middle of the lake . Jesus was alone on the land .
41006048	He saw the boat far away on the lake . And he saw the followers working hard to row the boat . The wind was blowing against them . Sometime between three and six o’clock in the morning , Jesus went out to the boat , walking on the water . He continued walking until he was almost past the boat .
41006049	But the followers saw Jesus walking on the water . They thought he was a ghost , and they started screaming .
41006050	It scared them all to see him . But he spoke to them and said , “ Don’t worry ! It’s me ! Don’t be afraid . ”
41006051	When he got into the boat with the followers , the wind stopped . The followers were completely amazed .
41006052	They could not believe what happened . It was like the miracle he did with the bread . They still didn’t understand what that meant .
41006053	Jesus and his followers went across the lake and came to shore at Gennesaret . They tied the boat there .
41006054	When they were out of the boat , the people there saw Jesus . They knew who he was ,
41006055	so they ran to tell others throughout that area . They brought sick people on mats to every place Jesus went .
41006056	Jesus went into towns , cities , and farms around that area . And every place he went , the people brought sick people to the marketplaces . They begged him to let them touch any part of his coat . And all those who touched him were healed .
41007001	Some Pharisees and some teachers of the law came from Jerusalem and gathered around Jesus .
41007002	They saw that some of his followers ate food with hands that were not clean , meaning that they did not wash their hands in a special way .
41007003	The Pharisees and all the other Jews never eat before washing their hands in this special way . They do this to follow the traditions they have from their great leaders who lived long ago .
41007004	And when these Jews buy something in the market , they never eat it until they wash it in a special way . They also follow other rules from their people who lived before them . They follow rules like the washing of cups , pitchers , and pots .
41007005	The Pharisees and teachers of the law said to Jesus , “ Your followers don’t follow the traditions we have from our great leaders who lived long ago . They eat their food with hands that are not clean . Why do they do this ? ”
41007006	Jesus answered , “ You are all hypocrites . Isaiah was right when he wrote these words from God about you : ‘ These people honor me with their words , but I am not really important to them .
41007007	Their worship of me is worthless . The things they teach are only human rules . ’
41007009	Then he said , “ You show great skill in avoiding the commands of God so that you can follow your own teachings !
41007010	Moses said , ‘ You must respect your father and mother . ’ He also said , ‘ Whoever says anything bad to their father or mother must be killed . ’
41007011	But you teach that people can say to their father or mother , ‘ I have something I could use to help you , but I will not use it for you . I will give it to God . ’
41007012	You are telling people that they do not have to do anything for their father or mother .
41007013	So you are teaching that it is not important to do what God said . You think it is more important to follow those traditions you have , which you pass on to others . And you do many things like that . ”
41007014	Jesus called the people to him again . He said , “ Everyone should listen to me and understand what I am saying .
41007015	There is nothing people can put in their mouth that will make them wrong . People are made wrong by what comes from inside them . ”
41007017	Then Jesus left the people and went into the house . The followers asked Jesus about what he had told the people .
41007018	He said , “ Do you still have trouble understanding ? Surely you know that nothing that enters the mouth from the outside can make people unacceptable to God .
41007019	Food does not go into a person’s mind . It goes into the stomach . Then it goes out of the body . ” ( When Jesus said this , he meant there is no food that is wrong for people to eat . )
41007020	And Jesus said , “ The things that make people wrong are the things that come from the inside .
41007021	All these bad things begin inside a person , in the mind : bad thoughts , sexual sins , stealing , murder ,
41007022	adultery , greed , doing bad things to people , lying , doing things that are morally wrong , jealousy , insulting people , proud talking , and foolish living .
41007023	These evil things come from inside a person . And these are the things that make people unacceptable to God . ”
41007024	Jesus went from there to the area around Tyre . He did not want the people in that area to know he was there , so he went into a house . But he could not stay hidden .
41007025	A woman heard that he was there . Her little daughter had an evil spirit inside her . So the woman came to Jesus and bowed down near his feet .
41007026	She was not a Jew . She was born in Phoenicia , an area in Syria . She begged Jesus to force the demon out of her daughter .
41007027	Jesus told the woman , “ It is not right to take the children’s bread and give it to the dogs . First let the children eat all they want . ”
41007028	She answered , “ That is true , Lord . But the dogs under the table can eat the pieces of food that the children don’t eat . ”
41007029	Then he told her , “ That is a very good answer . You may go . The demon has left your daughter . ”
41007030	The woman went home and found her daughter lying on the bed . The demon was gone .
41007031	Then Jesus left the area around Tyre and went through Sidon . On his way to Lake Galilee he went through the area of the Ten Towns .
41007032	While he was there , some people brought a man to him who was deaf and could not talk clearly . The people begged Jesus to put his hand on the man to heal him .
41007033	Jesus led the man away from the people to be alone with him . He put his fingers in the man’s ears . Then he spit on a finger and put it on the man’s tongue .
41007034	Jesus looked up to the sky and with a loud sigh he said , “ Ephphatha ! ” ( This means “ Open ! ” )
41007035	As soon as Jesus did this , the man was able to hear . He was able to use his tongue , and he began to speak clearly .
41007036	Jesus told the people not to tell anyone about this . But the more he told them not to say anything , the more people they told .
41007037	They were all completely amazed . They said , “ Look at what he has done . It’s all good . He makes deaf people able to hear and gives a new voice to people who could not talk . ”
41008001	Another time there were many people with Jesus . The people had nothing to eat . So he called his followers to him and said ,
41008002	“ I feel sorry for these people . They have been with me for three days , and now they have nothing to eat .
41008003	I should not send them home hungry . If they leave without eating , they will faint on the way home . Some of them live a long way from here . ”
41008004	Jesus’ followers answered , “ But we are far away from any towns . Where can we get enough bread to feed all these people ? ”
