41008005	Then Jesus asked them , “ How many loaves of bread do you have ? ” They answered , “ We have seven loaves of bread . ”
41008006	Jesus told the people to sit on the ground . Then he took the seven loaves and gave thanks to God . He broke the bread into pieces and gave them to his followers . He told them to give the bread to the people , and they did as he said .
41008007	The followers also had a few small fish . Jesus gave thanks for the fish and told them to give the fish to the people .
41008008	They all ate until they were full . Then the followers filled seven baskets with the pieces of food that were left .
41008009	There were about 4000 men who ate . After they ate , Jesus told them to go home .
41008010	Then he went in a boat with his followers to the area of Dalmanutha .
41008011	The Pharisees came to Jesus and asked him questions . They wanted to test him . So they asked him to do a miracle as a sign from God .
41008012	Jesus sighed deeply and said , “ Why do you people ask to see a miracle as a sign ? I want you to know that no miracle will be done to prove anything to you . ”
41008013	Then Jesus left them and went in the boat to the other side of the lake .
41008014	The followers had only one loaf of bread with them in the boat . They forgot to bring more bread .
41008015	Jesus warned them , “ Be careful ! Guard against the yeast of the Pharisees and the yeast of Herod . ”
41008016	The followers discussed the meaning of this . They said , “ He said this because we have no bread . ”
41008017	Jesus knew that the followers were talking about this . So he asked them , “ Why are you talking about having no bread ? Do you still not see or understand ? Are you not able to understand ?
41008018	Do you have eyes that can’t see ? Do you have ears that can’t hear ? Remember what I did before , when we did not have enough bread ?
41008019	I divided five loaves of bread for 5000 people . Remember how many baskets you filled with pieces of food that were not eaten ? ” The followers answered , “ We filled twelve baskets . ”
41008020	“ And when I divided seven loaves of bread for 4000 people , how many baskets did you fill with the leftover pieces ? ” They answered , “ We filled seven baskets . ”
41008021	Then he said to them , “ You remember these things I did , but you still don’t understand ? ”
41008022	Jesus and his followers came to Bethsaida . Some people brought a blind man to him and begged him to touch the man .
41008023	So Jesus held the blind man’s hand and led him out of the village . Then he spit on the man’s eyes . He laid his hands on him and asked , “ Can you see now ? ”
41008024	The man looked up and said , “ Yes , I see people . They look like trees walking around . ”
41008025	Again Jesus laid his hands on the man’s eyes , and the man opened them wide . His eyes were healed , and he was able to see everything clearly .
41008026	Jesus told him to go home . He said , “ Don’t go into the town . ”
41008027	Jesus and his followers went to the towns in the area of Caesarea Philippi . While they were traveling , Jesus asked the followers , “ Who do people say I am ? ”
41008028	They answered , “ Some people say you are John the Baptizer . Others say you are Elijah . And others say you are one of the prophets . ”
41008029	Then Jesus asked , “ Who do you say I am ? ” Peter answered , “ You are the Messiah . ”
41008030	Jesus told the followers , “ Don’t tell anyone who I am . ”
41008031	Then Jesus began to teach his followers that the Son of Man must suffer many things . He taught that the Son of Man would not be accepted by the older Jewish leaders , the leading priests , and the teachers of the law . He said that the Son of Man must be killed and then rise from death after three days .
41008032	Jesus told them everything that would happen . He did not keep anything secret . Peter took Jesus away from the other followers to talk to him alone . Peter criticized him for saying these things .
41008033	But Jesus turned and looked at his followers . Then he criticized Peter . He said to Peter , “ Get away from me , Satan ! You don’t care about the same things God does . You care only about things that people think are important . ”
41008034	Then Jesus called the crowd and his followers to him . He said , “ Any of you who want to be my follower must stop thinking about yourself and what you want . You must be willing to carry the cross that is given to you for following me .
41008035	Any of you who try to save the life you have will lose it . But you who give up your life for me and for the Good News will save it .
41008036	It is worth nothing for you to have the whole world if you yourself are lost .
41008037	You could never pay enough to buy back your life .
41008038	People today are so sinful . They have not been faithful to God . As you live among them , don’t be ashamed of me and my teaching . If that happens , I will be ashamed of you when I come with the glory of my Father and the holy angels . ”
41009001	Then Jesus said , “ Believe me when I say that some of you people standing here will see God’s kingdom come with power before you die . ”
41009002	Six days later , Jesus took Peter , James , and John and went up on a high mountain . They were all alone there . While these followers watched him , Jesus was changed .
41009003	His clothes became shining white — whiter than anyone on earth could make them .
41009004	Then two men were there talking with Jesus . They were Elijah and Moses .
41009005	Peter said to Jesus , “ Teacher , it is good that we are here . We will put three tents here — one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
41009006	Peter did not know what to say , because he and the other two followers were so afraid .
41009007	Then a cloud came and covered them . A voice came from the cloud and said , “ This is my Son , the one I love . Obey him ! ”
41009008	The followers looked , but they saw only Jesus there alone with them .
41009009	As Jesus and the followers were walking back down the mountain , he gave them these instructions : “ Don’t tell anyone about what you saw on the mountain . Wait until after the Son of Man rises from death . Then you can tell people what you saw . ”
41009010	So the followers waited to say anything about what they saw . But they discussed among themselves what Jesus meant about rising from death .
41009011	They asked him , “ Why do the teachers of the law say that Elijah must come first ? ”
41009012	Jesus answered , “ They are right to say that Elijah must come first . Elijah makes all things the way they should be . But why do the Scriptures say that the Son of Man will suffer much and that people will think he is worth nothing ?
41009013	I tell you that Elijah has already come . And people did to him all the bad things they wanted to do . The Scriptures said this would happen to him . ”
41009014	Then Jesus , Peter , James , and John went to the other followers . They saw many people around them . The teachers of the law were arguing with the followers .
41009015	When the people saw Jesus , they were very surprised and ran to welcome him .
41009016	Jesus asked , “ What are you arguing about with the teachers of the law ? ”
41009017	A man answered , “ Teacher , I brought my son to you . He is controlled by an evil spirit that keeps him from talking .
41009018	The spirit attacks him and throws him on the ground . He foams at the mouth , grinds his teeth , and becomes very stiff . I asked your followers to force the evil spirit out , but they could not . ”
41009019	Jesus answered , “ You people today don’t believe ! How long must I stay with you ? How long must I be patient with you ? Bring the boy to me ! ”
41009020	So the followers brought the boy to Jesus . When the evil spirit saw Jesus , it attacked the boy . The boy fell down and rolled on the ground . He was foaming at the mouth .
41009021	Jesus asked the boy’s father , “ How long has this been happening to him ? ” The father answered , “ Since he was very young .
41009022	The spirit often throws him into a fire or into water to kill him . If you can do anything , please have pity on us and help us . ”
41009023	Jesus said to the father , “ Why did you say ‘ if you can ’ ? All things are possible for the one who believes . ”
41009024	Immediately the father shouted , “ I do believe . Help me to believe more ! ”
41009025	Jesus saw that all the people were running there to see what was happening . So he spoke to the evil spirit . He said , “ You evil spirit that makes this boy deaf and stops him from talking — I command you to come out of him and never enter him again ! ”
41009026	The evil spirit screamed . It caused the boy to fall on the ground again , and then it came out . The boy looked as if he was dead . Many people said , “ He is dead ! ”
41009027	But Jesus took hold of his hand and helped him stand up .
41009028	Then Jesus went into the house . His followers were alone with him there . They said , “ Why weren’t we able to force that evil spirit out ? ”
41009029	Jesus answered , “ That kind of spirit can be forced out only with prayer . ”
41009030	Then Jesus and his followers left there and went through Galilee . Jesus did not want the people to know where they were .
41009031	He wanted to teach his followers alone . He said to them , “ The Son of Man will be handed over to the control of other men , who will kill him . After three days , he will rise from death . ”
41009032	But the followers did not understand what he meant , and they were afraid to ask him .
41009033	Jesus and his followers went to Capernaum . They went into a house , and Jesus said to them , “ I heard you arguing on the way here today . What were you arguing about ? ”
41009034	But the followers did not answer , because their argument on the road was about which one of them was the greatest .
41009035	Jesus sat down and called the twelve apostles to him . He said , “ Whoever wants to be the most important must make others more important than themselves . They must serve everyone else . ”
41009036	Then Jesus took a small child and stood the child in front of the followers . He held the child in his arms and said ,
41009037	“ Whoever accepts children like these in my name is accepting me . And anyone who accepts me is also accepting the one who sent me . ”
41009038	Then John said , “ Teacher , we saw a man using your name to force demons out of someone . He is not one of us . So we told him to stop , because he does not belong to our group . ”
41009039	Jesus said , “ Don’t stop him . Whoever uses my name to do powerful things will not soon say bad things about me .
41009040	Whoever is not against us is with us .
41009041	I can assure you that anyone who helps you by giving you a drink of water because you belong to the Messiah will definitely get a reward .
41009042	“ If one of these little children believes in me , and someone causes that child to sin , it will be very bad for that person . It would be better for them to have a millstone tied around their neck and be drowned in the sea .
41009043	If your hand makes you sin , cut it off . It is better for you to lose part of your body and have eternal life than to have two hands and go to hell . There the fire never stops .
41009045	If your foot makes you sin , cut it off . It is better for you to lose part of your body and have eternal life than to have two feet and be thrown into hell .
41009047	If your eye makes you sin , take it out . It is better for you to have only one eye and enter God’s kingdom than to have two eyes and be thrown into hell .
41009048	The worms that eat the people in hell never die . The fire there is never stopped .
41009049	“ Everyone will be salted with fire .
41009050	“ Salt is good . But if it loses its salty taste , you can’t make it good again . So , don’t lose that good quality of salt you have . And live in peace with each other . ”
41010001	Then Jesus left there and went into the area of Judea and across the Jordan River . Again , many people came to him , and Jesus taught them as he always did .
41010002	Some Pharisees came to Jesus and tried to make him say something wrong . They asked him , “ Is it right for a man to divorce his wife ? ”
41010003	Jesus answered , “ What did Moses command you to do ? ”
41010004	The Pharisees said , “ Moses allowed a man to divorce his wife by writing a certificate of divorce . ”
41010005	Jesus said , “ Moses wrote that command for you because you refused to accept God’s teaching .
41010006	But when God made the world , ‘ he made people male and female . ’
41010007	‘ That is why a man will leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife .
41010008	And the two people will become one . ’ So they are no longer two , but one .
41010009	God has joined them together , so no one should separate them . ”
41010010	Later , when the followers and Jesus were in the house , they asked him again about the question of divorce .
41010011	He said , “ Whoever divorces his wife and marries another woman has sinned against his wife . He is guilty of adultery .
41010012	And the woman who divorces her husband and marries another man is also guilty of adultery . ”
41010013	People brought their small children to Jesus so that he could lay his hands on them to bless them . But the followers told the people to stop bringing their children to him .
41010014	Jesus saw what happened . He did not like his followers telling the children not to come . So he said to them , “ Let the little children come to me . Don’t stop them , because God’s kingdom belongs to people who are like these little children .
41010015	The truth is , you must accept God’s kingdom like a little child accepts things , or you will never enter it . ”
41010016	Then Jesus held the children in his arms . He laid his hands on them and blessed them .
41010017	Jesus started to leave , but a man ran to him and bowed down on his knees before him . The man asked , “ Good Teacher , what must I do to get the life that never ends ? ”
41010018	Jesus answered , “ Why do you call me good ? Only God is good .
41010019	And you know his commands : ‘ You must not murder anyone , you must not commit adultery , you must not steal , you must not lie , you must not cheat , you must respect your father and mother … . ’ ”
41010020	The man said , “ Teacher , I have obeyed all these commands since I was a boy . ”
41010021	Jesus looked at the man in a way that showed how much he cared for him . He said , “ There is still one thing you need to do . Go and sell everything you have . Give the money to those who are poor , and you will have riches in heaven . Then come and follow me . ”
41010022	The man was upset when Jesus told him to give away his money . He didn’t want to do this , because he was very rich . So he went away sad .
41010023	Then Jesus looked at his followers and said to them , “ It will be very hard for a rich person to enter God’s kingdom ! ”
41010024	The followers were amazed at what Jesus said . But he said again , “ My children , it is very hard to enter God’s kingdom !
41010025	It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich person to enter God’s kingdom ! ”
41010026	The followers were even more amazed and said to each other , “ Then who can be saved ? ”
41010027	Jesus looked at them and said , “ That is something people cannot do , but God can . He can do anything . ”
41010028	Peter said to Jesus , “ We left everything to follow you ! ”
41010029	Jesus said , “ I can promise that everyone who has left their home , brothers , sisters , mother , father , children , or farm for me and for the Good News about me
41010030	will get a hundred times more than they left . Here in this world they will get more homes , brothers , sisters , mothers , children , and farms . And with these things they will have persecutions . But in the world that is coming they will also get the reward of eternal life .
41010031	Many people who have the highest place now will have the lowest place in the future . And the people who have the lowest place now will have the highest place then . ”
41010032	Jesus and those with him were on their way to Jerusalem . He was at the front of the group . His followers were wondering what was happening , and the people who followed behind them were feeling afraid . Jesus gathered the twelve apostles again and talked with them alone . He told them what would happen in Jerusalem .
41010033	He said , “ We are going to Jerusalem . The Son of Man will be handed over to the leading priests and teachers of the law . They will say that he must die and will hand him over to the foreigners ,
41010034	who will laugh at him and spit on him . They will beat him with whips and kill him . But on the third day after his death , he will rise to life again . ”
41010035	Then James and John , sons of Zebedee , came to Jesus and said , “ Teacher , we want to ask you to do something for us . ”
41010036	Jesus asked , “ What do you want me to do for you ? ”
41010037	The sons answered , “ Let us share the great honor you will have as king . Let one of us sit at your right side and the other at your left . ”
41010038	Jesus said , “ You don’t understand what you are asking . Can you drink from the cup that I must drink from ? Can you be baptized with the same baptism that I must go through ? ”
41010039	The sons answered , “ Yes , we can ! ” Jesus said to the sons , “ It is true that you will drink from the cup that I drink from . And you will be baptized with the same baptism that I must go through .
41010040	But it is not for me to say who will sit at my right or my left . God has prepared those places for the ones he chooses . ”
41010041	When the other ten followers heard this , they were angry with James and John .
41010042	Jesus called all the followers together . He said , “ The non-Jewish people have men they call rulers . You know that those rulers love to show their power over the people . And their important leaders love to use all their authority over the people .
41010043	But it should not be that way with you . Whoever wants to be your leader must be your servant .
41010044	Whoever wants to be first must serve the rest of you like a slave .
41010045	Follow my example : Even the Son of Man did not come for people to serve him . He came to serve others and to give his life to save many people . ”
41010046	Then they came to the town of Jericho . When Jesus left there with his followers , a large crowd was with them . A blind man named Bartimaeus ( meaning “ son of Timaeus ” ) was sitting by the road . He was always begging for money .
41010047	He heard that Jesus from Nazareth was walking by . So he began shouting , “ Jesus , Son of David , please help me ! ”
41010048	Many people criticized the blind man and told him to be quiet . But he shouted more and more , “ Son of David , please help me ! ”
41010049	Jesus stopped and said , “ Tell him to come here . ” So they called the blind man and said , “ You can be happy now . Stand up ! Jesus is calling you . ”
41010050	The blind man stood up quickly . He left his coat there and went to Jesus .
41010051	Jesus asked the man , “ What do you want me to do for you ? ” He answered , “ Teacher , I want to see again . ”
41010052	Jesus said , “ Go . You are healed because you believed . ” Immediately the man was able to see again . He followed Jesus down the road .
41011001	Jesus and his followers were coming closer to Jerusalem . They came to the towns of Bethphage and Bethany at the Mount of Olives . There Jesus sent two of his followers to do something .
41011002	He said to them , “ Go to the town you can see there . When you enter it , you will find a young donkey that no one has ever ridden . Untie it and bring it here to me .
41011003	If anyone asks you why you are taking the donkey , tell them , ‘ The Master needs it . He will send it back soon . ’ ”
41011004	The followers went into the town . They found a young donkey tied in the street near the door of a house , and they untied it .
41011005	Some people were standing there and saw this . They asked , “ What are you doing ? Why are you untying that donkey ? ”
41011006	The followers answered the way Jesus told them , and the people let them take the donkey .
41011007	The followers brought the donkey to Jesus . They put their coats on it , and Jesus sat on it .
41011008	Many people spread their coats on the road for Jesus . Others cut branches in the fields and spread the branches on the road .
41011009	Some of them were walking ahead of Jesus . Others were walking behind him . Everyone shouted , “ ‘ Praise Him ! ’ ‘ Welcome ! God bless the one who comes in the name of the Lord ! ’
41011010	“ God bless the kingdom of our father David . That kingdom is coming ! Praise to God in heaven ! ”
41011011	Jesus entered Jerusalem and went to the Temple . He looked at everything in the Temple area , but it was already late . So he went to Bethany with the twelve apostles .
41011012	The next day , Jesus was leaving Bethany . He was hungry .
41011013	He saw a fig tree with leaves . So he went to the tree to see if it had any figs growing on it . But he found no figs on the tree . There were only leaves , because it was not the right time for figs to grow .
41011014	So Jesus said to the tree , “ People will never eat fruit from you again . ” His followers heard him say this .
41011015	When Jesus and his followers came to Jerusalem , they entered the Temple area . Jesus began driving out the people who were buying and selling things there . He turned over the tables that belonged to those who were exchanging different kinds of money . And he turned over the benches of those who were selling doves .
41011016	He refused to allow anyone to carry things through the Temple area .
41011017	Then Jesus began teaching the people and said , “ It is written in the Scriptures , ‘ My Temple will be called a house of prayer for all nations . ’ But you have changed it into a ‘ hiding place for thieves . ’ ”
41011018	When the leading priests and the teachers of the law heard what Jesus said , they began trying to find a way to kill him . They were afraid of him because all the people were amazed at his teaching .
41011019	That night Jesus and his followers left the city .
41011020	The next morning Jesus was walking with his followers . They saw the fig tree that he spoke to the day before . The tree was dry and dead , even the roots .
41011021	Peter remembered the tree and said to Jesus , “ Teacher , look ! Yesterday , you told that fig tree to die . Now it is dry and dead ! ”
41011022	Jesus answered , “ Have faith in God .
41011023	The truth is , you can say to this mountain , ‘ Go , mountain , fall into the sea . ’ And if you have no doubts in your mind and believe that what you say will happen , then God will do it for you .
41011024	So I tell you to ask for what you want in prayer . And if you believe that you have received those things , then they will be yours .
41011025	When you are praying and you remember that you are angry with another person about something , forgive that person . Forgive them so that your Father in heaven will also forgive your sins . ”
41011027	Jesus and his followers went again to Jerusalem . Jesus was walking in the Temple area . The leading priests , the teachers of the law , and the older Jewish leaders came to him .
41011028	They said , “ Tell us ! What authority do you have to do these things ? Who gave you this authority ? ”
41011029	Jesus answered , “ I will ask you a question . You answer my question . Then I will tell you whose authority I use to do these things .
41011030	Tell me : When John baptized people , did his authority come from God or was it only from other people ? Answer me . ”
41011031	These Jewish leaders talked about Jesus’ question . They said to each other , “ If we answer , ‘ John’s baptism was from God , ’ then he will say , ‘ Then why didn’t you believe John ? ’
41011032	But we can’t say that John’s baptism was from someone else . ” ( These leaders were afraid of the people , because the people believed that John was a prophet . )
41011033	So the leaders answered Jesus , “ We don’t know the answer . ” Jesus said , “ Then I will not tell you who gave me the authority to do these things . ”
41012001	Jesus used stories to teach the people . He said , “ A man planted a vineyard . He put a wall around the field and dug a hole for a winepress . Then he built a tower . He leased the land to some farmers and left for a trip .
41012002	“ Later , it was time for the grapes to be picked . So the man sent a servant to the farmers to get his share of the grapes .
41012003	But the farmers grabbed the servant and beat him . They sent him away with nothing .
41012004	Then the man sent another servant to the farmers . They hit this servant on the head , showing no respect for him .
41012005	So the man sent another servant . The farmers killed this servant . The man sent many other servants to the farmers . The farmers beat some of them and killed the others .
41012006	“ The man had only one person left to send to the farmers . It was his son . He loved his son , but he decided to send him . He said , ‘ The farmers will respect my son . ’
41012007	“ But the farmers said to each other , ‘ This is the owner’s son , and this vineyard will be his . If we kill him , it will be ours . ’
41012008	So they took the son , threw him out of the vineyard , and killed him .
41012009	“ So what will the man who owns the vineyard do ? He will go and kill those farmers . Then he will lease the land to others .
41012010	Surely you have read this in the Scriptures : ‘ The stone that the builders refused to accept became the cornerstone .
41012011	The Lord did this , and it is wonderful to us . ’ ”
41012012	When these Jewish leaders heard this story , they knew it was about them . They wanted to find a way to arrest Jesus , but they were afraid of what the crowd would do . So they left him and went away .
41012013	Later , the Jewish leaders sent some Pharisees and some men from the group called Herodians to Jesus . They wanted to catch him saying something wrong .
41012014	They went to Jesus and said , “ Teacher , we know that you are an honest man . You are not afraid of what others think about you . All people are the same to you . And you teach the truth about God’s way . Tell us , is it right to pay taxes to Caesar ? Should we pay them or not ? ”
41012015	But Jesus knew that these men were really trying to trick him . He said , “ Why are you trying to catch me saying something wrong ? Bring me a silver coin . Let me see it . ”
41012016	They gave Jesus a coin and he asked , “ Whose picture is on the coin ? And whose name is written on it ? ” They answered , “ It is Caesar’s picture and Caesar’s name . ”
41012017	Then Jesus said to them , “ Give to Caesar what belongs to Caesar , and give to God what belongs to God . ” The men were amazed at what Jesus said .
41012018	Then some Sadducees came to Jesus . ( Sadducees believe that no one will rise from death . ) They asked him a question :
41012019	“ Teacher , Moses wrote that if a married man dies and had no children , his brother must marry the woman . Then they will have children for the dead brother .
41012020	There were seven brothers . The first brother married but died . He had no children .
41012021	So the second brother married the woman . But he also died and had no children . The same thing happened with the third brother .
41012022	All seven brothers married the woman and died . None of the brothers had any children with her . And she was the last to die .
41012023	But all seven brothers had married her . So at the time when people rise from death , whose wife will she be ? ”
41012024	Jesus answered , “ How could you be so wrong ? It’s because you don’t know what the Scriptures say . And you don’t know anything about God’s power .
41012025	When people rise from death , there will be no marriage . People will not be married to each other . All people will be like angels in heaven .
41012026	Surely you have read what God said about people rising from death . In the book where Moses wrote about the burning bush , it says that God told Moses this : ‘ I am the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’
41012027	So they were not still dead , because he is the God only of living people . You Sadducees are so wrong ! ”
41012028	One of the teachers of the law came to Jesus . He heard Jesus arguing with the Sadducees and the Pharisees . He saw that Jesus gave good answers to their questions . So he asked him , “ Which of the commands is the most important ? ”
41012029	Jesus answered , “ The most important command is this : ‘ People of Israel , listen ! The Lord our God is the only Lord .
41012030	Love the Lord your God with all your heart , all your soul , all your mind , and all your strength . ’
41012031	The second most important command is this : ‘ Love your neighbor the same as you love yourself . ’ These two commands are the most important . ”
41012032	The man answered , “ That was a good answer , Teacher . You are right in saying that God is the only Lord and that there is no other God .
41012033	And you must love God with all your heart , all your mind , and all your strength . And you must love others the same as you love yourself . These commands are more important than all the animals and sacrifices we offer to God . ”
41012034	Jesus saw that the man answered him wisely . So he said to him , “ You are close to God’s kingdom . ” And after that time , no one was brave enough to ask Jesus any more questions .
41012035	Jesus was teaching in the Temple area . He asked , “ Why do the teachers of the law say that the Messiah is the son of David ?
41012036	With the help of the Holy Spirit , David himself says , ‘ The Lord God said to my Lord : Sit by me at my right side , and I will put your enemies under your control . ’
41012038	Jesus continued teaching . He said , “ Be careful of the teachers of the law . They like to walk around wearing clothes that look important . And they love for people to show respect to them in the marketplaces .
41012039	They love to have the most important seats in the synagogues and the places of honor at banquets .
41012040	But they cheat widows and take their homes . Then they try to make themselves look good by saying long prayers . God will punish them very much . ”
41012041	Jesus sat near the Temple collection box and watched as people put money into it . Many rich people put in a lot of money .
41012042	Then a poor widow came and put in two very small copper coins , worth less than a penny .
41012043	Jesus called his followers to him and said , “ This poor widow put in only two small coins . But the truth is , she gave more than all those rich people .
41012044	They have plenty , and they gave only what they did not need . This woman is very poor , but she gave all she had . It was money she needed to live on . ”
41013001	Jesus was leaving the Temple area . One of his followers said to him , “ Teacher , look how big those stones are ! What beautiful buildings ! ”
41013002	Jesus said , “ Do you see these great buildings ? They will all be destroyed . Every stone will be thrown down to the ground . Not one stone will be left on another . ”
41013003	Later , Jesus was sitting at a place on the Mount of Olives . He was alone with Peter , James , John , and Andrew . They could all see the Temple , and they said to Jesus ,
41013004	“ Tell us when these things will happen . And what will show us it is time for them to happen ? ”
41013005	Jesus said to them , “ Be careful ! Don’t let anyone fool you .
41013006	Many people will come and use my name . They will say , ‘ I am the Messiah , ’ and they will fool many people .
41013007	You will hear about wars that are being fought . And you will hear stories about other wars beginning . But don’t be afraid . These things must happen before the end comes .
41013008	Nations will fight against other nations . Kingdoms will fight against other kingdoms . There will be times when there is no food for people to eat . And there will be earthquakes in different places . These things are only the beginning of troubles , like the first pains of a woman giving birth .
41013009	“ You must be careful ! There are people who will arrest you and take you to be judged for being my followers . They will beat you in their synagogues . You will be forced to stand before kings and governors . You will tell them about me .
41013010	Before the end comes , the Good News must be told to all nations .
41013011	Even when you are arrested and put on trial , don’t worry about what you will say . Say whatever God tells you at the time . It will not really be you speaking . It will be the Holy Spirit .
41013012	“ Brothers will turn against their own brothers and hand them over to be killed . Fathers will hand over their own children to be killed . Children will fight against their own parents and have them killed .
41013013	All people will hate you because you follow me . But those who remain faithful to the end will be saved .
41013014	“ You will see ‘ the terrible thing that causes destruction . ’ You will see this thing standing in the place where it should not be . ” ( Reader , I trust you understand what this means . ) “ Everyone in Judea at that time should run away to the mountains .
41013015	They should run away without wasting time to stop for anything . If someone is on the roof of their house , they must not go down to take things out of the house .
41013016	If someone is in the field , they must not go back to get a coat .
41013017	“ During that time it will be hard for women who are pregnant or have small babies .
41013018	Pray that these things will not happen in winter ,
41013019	because those days will be full of trouble . There will be more trouble than has ever happened since the beginning , when God made the world . And nothing that bad will ever happen again .
41013020	But the Lord has decided to make that terrible time short . If it were not made short , no one could survive . But the Lord will make that time short to help the special people he has chosen .
41013021	“ Someone might say to you at that time , ‘ Look , there is the Messiah ! ’ Or another person might say , ‘ There he is ! ’ But don’t believe them .
41013022	False messiahs and false prophets will come and do miracles and wonders , trying to fool the people God has chosen , if that is possible .
41013023	So be careful . Now I have warned you about all this before it happens .
41013024	“ During the days following that time of trouble , ‘ The sun will become dark , and the moon will not give light .
41013025	The stars will fall from the sky , and everything in the sky will be changed . ’
41013026	“ Then people will see the Son of Man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
41013027	He will send his angels all around the earth . They will gather his chosen people from every part of the earth .
41013028	“ The fig tree teaches us a lesson : When its branches become green and soft , and new leaves begin to grow , then you know that summer is very near .
41013029	In the same way , when you see all these things happening , you will know that the time is very near , already present .
41013030	I assure you that all these things will happen while some of the people of this time are still living .
41013031	The whole world , earth and sky , will be destroyed , but my words will last forever .
41013032	“ No one knows when that day or time will be . The Son and the angels in heaven don’t know when that day or time will be . Only the Father knows .
41013033	Be careful ! Always be ready . You don’t know when that time will be .
41013034	“ It’s like a man who goes on a trip and leaves his house in the care of his servants . He gives each one a special job to do . He tells the servant guarding the door to always be ready . And this is what I am telling you now .
41013035	You must always be ready . You don’t know when the owner of the house will come back . He might come in the afternoon , or at midnight , or in the early morning , or when the sun rises .
41013036	If you are always ready , he will not find you sleeping , even if he comes back earlier than expected .
41013037	I tell you this , and I say it to everyone : ‘ Be ready ! ’ ”
41014001	It was now only two days before the Passover and the Festival of Unleavened Bread . The leading priests and teachers of the law were trying to find a way to arrest Jesus without the people seeing it . Then they could kill him .
41014002	They said , “ But we cannot arrest Jesus during the festival . We don’t want the people to be angry and cause a riot . ”
41014003	Jesus was in Bethany at the house of Simon the leper . While he was eating there , a woman came to him . She had an alabaster jar filled with expensive perfume made of pure nard . She opened the jar and poured the perfume on Jesus’ head .
41014004	Some of the followers there saw this . They were upset and complained to each other . They said , “ Why waste that perfume ?
41014005	It was worth a full year’s pay . It could have been sold and the money given to those who are poor . ” And they told the woman what a bad thing she had done .
41014006	Jesus said , “ Leave her alone . Why are you giving her such trouble ? She did a very good thing for me .
41014007	You will always have the poor with you , and you can help them any time you want . But you will not always have me .
41014008	This woman did the only thing she could do for me . She poured perfume on my body before I die to prepare it for burial .
41014009	The Good News will be told to people all over the world . And I can assure you that everywhere the Good News is told , the story of what this woman did will also be told , and people will remember her . ”
41014010	Then Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve apostles , went to talk to the leading priests about handing Jesus over to them .
41014011	They were very happy about this , and they promised to pay him . So he waited for the best time to hand Jesus over to them .
41014012	It was now the first day of the Festival of Unleavened Bread — the day the lambs were killed for the Passover . Jesus’ followers came to him and said , “ We will go and prepare everything for you to eat the Passover meal . Where do you want us to have the meal ? ”
41014013	Jesus sent two of his followers into the city . He said to them , “ Go into the city . You will see a man carrying a jar of water . He will come to you . Follow him .
41014014	He will go into a house . Tell the owner of the house , ‘ The Teacher asks that you show us the room where he and his followers can eat the Passover meal . ’
41014015	The owner will show you a large room upstairs that is ready for us . Prepare the meal for us there . ”
41014016	So the followers left and went into the city . Everything happened the way Jesus said . So the followers prepared the Passover meal .
41014017	In the evening Jesus went to that house with the twelve apostles .
41014018	While they were all at the table eating , he said , “ Believe me when I say that one of you will hand me over to my enemies — one of you eating with me now . ”
41014019	The followers were very sad to hear this . Each one said to Jesus , “ Surely I am not the one ! ”
41014020	Jesus answered , “ It is one of you twelve — the one who is dipping his bread in the same bowl with me .
41014021	The Son of Man will suffer what the Scriptures say will happen to him . But it will be very bad for the one who hands over the Son of Man to be killed . It would be better for him if he had never been born . ”
41014022	While they were eating , Jesus took some bread and thanked God for it . He broke off some pieces , gave them to his followers and said , “ Take and eat this bread . It is my body . ”
41014023	Then he took a cup of wine , thanked God for it , and gave it to them . They all drank from the cup .
41014024	Then he said , “ This wine is my blood , which will be poured out for many to begin the new agreement from God to his people .
41014025	I want you to know , I will not drink this wine again until that day when I drink it in God’s kingdom and the wine is new . ”
41014026	They all sang a song and then went out to the Mount of Olives .
41014027	Then Jesus told the followers , “ You will all lose your faith . The Scriptures say , ‘ I will kill the shepherd , and the sheep will run away . ’
41014029	Peter said , “ All the other followers may lose their faith . But my faith will never be shaken . ”
41014030	Jesus answered , “ The truth is , tonight you will say you don’t know me . You will say it three times before the rooster crows twice . ”
41014031	But Peter strongly protested , “ I will never say I don’t know you ! I will even die with you ! ” And all the other followers said the same thing .
41014032	Jesus and his followers went to a place named Gethsemane . He said to them , “ Sit here while I pray . ”
41014033	But he told Peter , James , and John to come with him . He began to be very distressed and troubled ,
41014034	and he said to them , “ My heart is so heavy with grief , I feel as if I am dying . Wait here and stay awake . ”
41014035	Jesus went on a little farther away from them , fell to the ground , and prayed . He asked that , if possible , he would not have this time of suffering .
41014036	He said , “ Abba , Father ! You can do all things . Don’t make me drink from this cup . But do what you want , not what I want . ”
41014037	Then he went back to his followers and found them sleeping . He said to Peter , “ Simon , why are you sleeping ? Could you not stay awake with me for one hour ?
41014038	Stay awake and pray for strength against temptation . Your spirit wants to do what is right , but your body is weak . ”
41014039	Again Jesus went away and prayed the same thing .
41014040	Then he went back to the followers and again found them sleeping . They could not stay awake . They did not know what they should say to him .
41014041	After Jesus prayed a third time , he went back to his followers . He said to them , “ Are you still sleeping and resting ? That’s enough ! The time has come for the Son of Man to be handed over to the control of sinful men .
41014042	Stand up ! We must go . Here comes the man who is handing me over to them . ”
41014043	While Jesus was still speaking , Judas , one of the twelve apostles , came there . He had a big crowd of people with him , all carrying swords and clubs . They had been sent from the leading priests , the teachers of the law , and the older Jewish leaders .
41014044	Judas planned to do something to show them which one was Jesus . He said , “ The one I kiss will be Jesus . Arrest him and guard him while you lead him away . ”
41014045	So Judas went over to Jesus and said , “ Teacher ! ” Then he kissed him .
41014046	The men grabbed Jesus and arrested him .
41014047	One of the followers standing near Jesus grabbed his sword and pulled it out . He swung it at the servant of the high priest and cut off his ear .
41014048	Then Jesus said , “ Why do you come to get me with swords and clubs as if I were a criminal ?
41014049	Every day I was with you teaching in the Temple area . You did not arrest me there . But all these things have happened to show the full meaning of what the Scriptures said . ”
41014050	Then all of Jesus’ followers left him and ran away .
41014051	One of those following Jesus was a young man wearing only a linen cloth . When the people tried to grab him ,
41014052	he left the cloth in their hands and ran away naked .
41014053	Those who arrested Jesus led him to the house of the high priest . All the leading priests , the older Jewish leaders , and the teachers of the law were gathered there .
41014054	Peter followed Jesus but stayed back at a distance . He followed him to the yard of the high priest’s house . He went into the yard and sat there with the guards , warming himself by their fire .
41014055	The leading priests and the whole high council tried to find something that Jesus had done wrong so they could kill him . But the council could find no proof that would allow them to kill Jesus .
41014056	Many people came and told lies against Jesus , but they all said different things . None of them agreed .
41014057	Then some others stood up and told more lies against Jesus . They said ,
41014058	“ We heard this man say , ‘ I will destroy this Temple built by human hands . And three days later , I will build another Temple not made by human hands . ’ ”
41014059	But also what these people said did not agree .
41014060	Then the high priest stood up before everyone and said to Jesus , “ These people said things against you . Do you have something to say about their charges ? Are they telling the truth ? ”
41014061	But Jesus said nothing to answer him . The high priest asked Jesus another question : “ Are you the Messiah , the Son of the blessed God ? ”
41014062	Jesus answered , “ Yes , I am the Son of God . And in the future you will see the Son of Man sitting at the right side of God All-Powerful . And you will see the Son of Man coming on the clouds of heaven . ”
41014063	When the high priest heard this , he tore his clothes in anger . He said , “ We don’t need any more witnesses !
41014064	You all heard these insults to God . What do you think ? ” Everyone agreed that Jesus was guilty and must be killed .
41014065	Some of the people there spit at him . They covered his eyes and hit him with their fists . They said , “ Be a prophet and tell us who hit you ! ” Then the guards led Jesus away and beat him .
41014066	While Peter was still in the yard , a servant girl of the high priest came there .
41014067	She saw him warming himself by the fire . She looked closely at him and said , “ You were with Jesus , that man from Nazareth . ”
41014068	But Peter said this was not true . “ That makes no sense , ” he said . “ I don’t know what you are talking about ! ” Then he left and went to the entrance of the yard , and a rooster crowed .
41014069	When the servant girl saw him there , she began saying again to the people standing around , “ This man is one of them . ”
41014070	Again Peter said it was not true . A short time later , the people standing there said , “ We know you are one of them , because you are from Galilee . ”
41014071	Then Peter began to curse . He said , “ I swear to God , I don’t know this man you are talking about ! ”
41014072	As soon as Peter said this , the rooster crowed the second time . Then he remembered what Jesus had told him : “ Before the rooster crows twice , you will say three times that you don’t know me . ” Then Peter began to cry .
41015001	Very early in the morning , the leading priests , the older Jewish leaders , the teachers of the law , and the whole high council decided what to do with Jesus . They tied him , led him away , and handed him over to Governor Pilate .
41015002	Pilate asked Jesus , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” Jesus answered , “ Yes , that is right . ”
41015003	The leading priests accused Jesus of many things .
41015004	So Pilate asked Jesus another question . He said , “ You can see that these people are accusing you of many things . Why don’t you answer ? ”
41015005	But Jesus still did not answer , and this really surprised Pilate .
41015006	Every year at the Passover time the governor would free one prisoner — whichever one the people wanted .
41015007	There was a man in prison at that time named Barabbas . He and the rebels with him had been put in prison for committing murder during a riot .
41015008	The people came to Pilate and asked him to free a prisoner as he always did .
41015009	Pilate asked them , “ Do you want me to free the king of the Jews ? ”
41015010	Pilate knew that the leading priests had handed Jesus over to him because they were jealous of him .
41015011	But the leading priests persuaded the people to ask Pilate to free Barabbas , not Jesus .
41015012	Pilate asked the people again , “ So what should I do with this man you call the king of the Jews ? ”
41015013	The people shouted , “ Kill him on a cross ! ”
41015014	Pilate asked , “ Why ? What wrong has he done ? ” But the people shouted louder and louder , “ Kill him on a cross ! ”
41015015	Pilate wanted to please the people , so he set Barabbas free for them . And he told the soldiers to beat Jesus with whips . Then he handed him over to the soldiers to be killed on a cross .
41015016	Pilate’s soldiers took Jesus into the governor’s palace ( called the Praetorium ) . They called all the other soldiers together .
41015017	They put a purple robe on Jesus , made a crown from thorny branches , and put it on his head .
41015018	Then they began shouting , “ Welcome , king of the Jews ! ”
41015019	They kept on beating his head with a stick and spitting on him . Then they bowed down on their knees and pretended to honor him as a king .
41015020	After they finished making fun of him , they took off the purple robe and put his own clothes on him again . Then they led him out of the palace to be killed on a cross .
41015021	There was a man from Cyrene named Simon walking into the city from the fields . He was the father of Alexander and Rufus . The soldiers forced him to carry Jesus’ cross .
41015022	They led Jesus to the place called Golgotha . ( Golgotha means “ The Place of the Skull . ” )
41015023	There they gave him some wine mixed with myrrh , but he refused to drink it .
41015024	The soldiers nailed Jesus to a cross . Then they divided his clothes among themselves , throwing dice to see who would get what .
41015025	It was nine o’clock in the morning when they nailed Jesus to the cross .
41015026	There was a sign with the charge against him written on it . It said , “ the king of the jews . ”
41015027	They also nailed two criminals to crosses beside Jesus — one on the right and the other on the left .
41015029	People walked by and said bad things to Jesus . They shook their heads and said , “ You said you could destroy the Temple and build it again in three days .
41015030	So save yourself ! Come down from that cross ! ”
41015031	The leading priests and the teachers of the law were also there . They made fun of Jesus the same as the other people did . They said to each other , “ He saved others , but he can’t save himself !
41015032	If he is really the Messiah , the king of Israel , he should come down from the cross now . When we see this , then we will believe in him . ” The criminals on the crosses beside Jesus also said bad things to him .
41015033	At noon the whole country became dark . This darkness continued until three o’clock .
41015034	At three o’clock Jesus cried out loudly , “ Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani . ” This means “ My God , my God , why have you left me alone ? ”
41015035	Some of the people standing there heard this . They said , “ Listen ! He is calling Elijah . ”
41015036	One man there ran and got a sponge . He filled the sponge with sour wine and tied it to a stick . Then he used the stick to give the sponge to Jesus to get a drink from it . The man said , “ We should wait now and see if Elijah will come to take him down from the cross . ”
41015037	Then Jesus cried out loudly and died .
41015038	When Jesus died , the curtain in the Temple was torn into two pieces . The tear started at the top and tore all the way to the bottom .
41015039	The army officer who was standing there in front of the cross saw what happened when Jesus died . The officer said , “ This man really was the Son of God ! ”
41015040	Some women were standing away from the cross , watching . Among these women were Mary Magdalene , Salome , and Mary the mother of James and Joses . ( James was her youngest son . )
41015041	These were the women who had followed Jesus in Galilee and cared for him . Many other women who had come with Jesus to Jerusalem were also there .
41015042	This day was called Preparation day . ( That means the day before the Sabbath day . ) It was becoming dark .
41015043	A man named Joseph from Arimathea was brave enough to go to Pilate and ask for Jesus’ body . Joseph was an important member of the high council . He was one of the people who wanted God’s kingdom to come .
41015044	Pilate was surprised to hear that Jesus was already dead . So he called for the army officer in charge and asked him if Jesus was already dead .
41015045	When Pilate heard it from the officer , he told Joseph he could have the body .
41015046	Joseph bought some linen cloth . He took the body from the cross , wrapped it in the linen , and put the body in a tomb that was dug in a wall of rock . Then he closed the tomb by rolling a large stone to cover the entrance .
41015047	Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses saw the place where Jesus was put .
41016001	The next day after the Sabbath day , Mary Magdalene , Salome , and Mary the mother of James bought some sweet-smelling spices to put on Jesus’ body .
41016002	Very early on that day , the first day of the week , the women were going to the tomb . It was very early after sunrise .
41016003	The women said to each other , “ There is a large stone covering the entrance of the tomb . Who will move the stone for us ? ”
41016004	Then the women looked and saw that the stone was moved . The stone was very large , but it was moved away from the entrance .
41016005	The women walked into the tomb and saw a young man there wearing a white robe . He was sitting on the right side of the tomb . The women were afraid .
41016006	But the man said , “ Don’t be afraid . You are looking for Jesus from Nazareth , the one who was killed on a cross . He has risen from death ! He is not here . Look , here is the place they put him when he was dead .
41016007	Now go and tell his followers . And be sure to tell Peter . Tell them , ‘ Jesus is going into Galilee and will be there before you come . You will see him there , as he told you before . ’ ”
41016008	The women were very afraid and confused . They left the tomb and ran away . They did not tell about what happened , because they were afraid .
41016009	Jesus rose from death early on the first day of the week . He appeared first to Mary Magdalene . One time in the past Jesus had forced seven demons out of Mary .
41016010	After Mary saw Jesus , she went and told his followers . They were very sad and were crying .
41016011	But Mary told them that Jesus was alive . She said that she had seen Jesus , but they did not believe her .
41016012	Later , Jesus appeared to two followers while they were walking in the country . But Jesus did not look the same as before he was killed .
41016013	These followers went back to the other followers and told them what happened . Again , the followers did not believe them .
41016014	Later , Jesus appeared to the eleven followers while they were eating . He criticized them because they had so little faith . They were stubborn and refused to believe the people who said Jesus had risen from death .
41016015	He said to them , “ Go everywhere in the world . Tell the Good News to everyone .
41016016	Whoever believes and is baptized will be saved . But those who do not believe will be judged guilty .
41016017	And the people who believe will be able to do these things as proof : They will use my name to force demons out of people . They will speak in languages they never learned .
41016018	If they pick up snakes or drink any poison , they will not be hurt . They will lay their hands on sick people , and they will get well . ”
41016019	After the Lord Jesus said these things to his followers , he was carried up into heaven . There , Jesus sat at the right side of God .
41016020	The followers went everywhere in the world telling people the Good News , and the Lord helped them . By giving them power to do miracles the Lord proved that their message was true .
42001001	Most Honorable Theophilus : Many others have tried to give a report of the things that happened among us to complete God’s plan .
42001002	What they have written agrees with what we learned from the people who saw those events from the beginning . They also served God by telling people his message .
42001003	I studied it all carefully from the beginning . Then I decided to write it down for you in an organized way .
42001004	I did this so that you can be sure that what you have been taught is true .
42001005	During the time when Herod ruled Judea , there was a priest named Zechariah . He belonged to Abijah’s group . His wife came from the family of Aaron . Her name was Elizabeth .
42001006	Zechariah and Elizabeth were both good people who pleased God . They did everything the Lord commanded , always following his instructions completely .
42001007	But they had no children . Elizabeth could not have a baby , and both of them were very old .
42001008	Zechariah was serving as a priest before God for his group . It was his group’s time to serve .
42001009	The priests always chose one priest to offer the incense , and Zechariah was the one chosen this time . So he went into the Temple of the Lord to offer the incense .
42001010	There was a large crowd outside praying at the time the incense was offered .
42001011	Then , on the right side of the incense table , an angel of the Lord came and stood before Zechariah .
42001012	When he saw the angel , Zechariah was upset and very afraid .
42001013	But the angel said to him , “ Zechariah , don’t be afraid . Your prayer has been heard by God . Your wife Elizabeth will give birth to a baby boy , and you will name him John .
42001014	You will be very happy , and many others will share your joy over his birth .
42001015	He will be a great man for the Lord . He will never drink wine or beer . Even before he is born , he will be filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001016	“ John will help many people of Israel return to the Lord their God .
42001017	John himself will go ahead of the Lord and make people ready for his coming . He will be powerful like Elijah and will have the same spirit . He will make peace between fathers and their children . He will cause people who are not obeying God to change and start thinking the way they should . ”
42001018	Zechariah said to the angel , “ How can I know that what you say is true ? I am an old man , and my wife is also old . ”
42001019	The angel answered him , “ I am Gabriel , the one who always stands ready before God . He sent me to talk to you and to tell you this good news .
42001020	Now , listen ! You will not be able to talk until the day when these things happen . You will lose your speech because you did not believe what I told you . But everything I said will really happen . ”
42001021	Outside , the people were still waiting for Zechariah . They were surprised that he was staying so long in the Temple .
42001022	Then Zechariah came outside , but he could not speak to them . So the people knew that he had seen a vision inside the Temple . He was not able to speak , so he could only make signs to the people .
42001023	When his time of service was finished , he went home .
42001024	Later , Zechariah’s wife Elizabeth became pregnant . So she did not go out of her house for five months . She said ,
42001025	“ Look what the Lord has done for me ! He decided to help me . Now people will stop thinking there is something wrong with me . ”
42001028	The angel came to her and said , “ Greetings ! The Lord is with you ; you are very special to him . ”
42001029	But Mary was very confused about what the angel said . She wondered , “ What does this mean ? ”
42001030	The angel said to her , “ Don’t be afraid , Mary , because God is very pleased with you .
42001031	Listen ! You will become pregnant and have a baby boy . You will name him Jesus .
42001032	He will be great . People will call him the Son of the Most High God , and the Lord God will make him king like his ancestor David .
42001033	He will rule over the people of Jacob forever ; his kingdom will never end . ”
42001034	Mary said to the angel , “ How will this happen ? I am still a virgin . ”
42001035	The angel said to Mary , “ The Holy Spirit will come to you , and the power of the Most High God will cover you . The baby will be holy and will be called the Son of God .
42001036	And here’s something else : Your relative Elizabeth is pregnant . She is very old , but she is going to have a son . Everyone thought she could not have a baby , but she has been pregnant now for six months .
42001037	God can do anything ! ”
42001038	Mary said , “ I am the Lord’s servant . Let this thing you have said happen to me ! ” Then the angel went away .
42001039	Mary got up and went quickly to a town in the hill country of Judea .
42001040	She went into Zechariah’s house and greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	When Elizabeth heard Mary’s greeting , the unborn baby inside her jumped , and she was filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001042	In a loud voice she said to Mary , “ God has blessed you more than any other woman . And God has blessed the baby you will have .
42001043	You are the mother of my Lord , and you have come to me ! Why has something so good happened to me ?
42001044	When I heard your voice , the baby inside me jumped with joy .
42001045	Great blessings are yours because you believed what the Lord said to you ! You believed this would happen . ”
42001046	Then Mary said , “ I praise the Lord with all my heart .
42001047	I am very happy because God is my Savior .
42001048	I am not important , but he has shown his care for me , his lowly servant . From now until the end of time , people will remember how much God blessed me .
42001049	Yes , the Powerful One has done great things for me . His name is very holy .

42001053	He filled the hungry with good things , but he sent the rich away with nothing .
42001054	God has helped Israel — the people he chose to serve him . He did not forget his promise to give us his mercy .
42001055	He has done what he promised to our ancestors , to Abraham and his children forever . ”
42001056	Mary stayed with Elizabeth for about three months and then went home .
42001057	When it was time for Elizabeth to give birth , she had a boy .
42001058	Her neighbors and relatives heard that the Lord was very good to her , and they were happy for her .
42001059	When the baby was eight days old , they came to circumcise him . They wanted to name him Zechariah because this was his father’s name .
42001060	But his mother said , “ No , he will be named John . ”

42001075	in a way that is holy and right for as long as we live .

42001077	You will make his people understand that they will be saved by having their sins forgiven .
42001078	“ With the loving mercy of our God , a new day from heaven will shine on us .
42001079	It will bring light to those who live in darkness , in the fear of death . It will guide us into the way that brings peace . ”
42001080	And so the little boy John grew up and became stronger in spirit . Then he lived in areas away from other people until the time when he came out to tell God’s message to the people of Israel .
42002001	It was about that same time that Augustus Caesar sent out an order to all people in the countries that were under Roman rule . The order said that everyone’s name must be put on a list .
42002002	This was the first counting of all the people while Quirinius was governor of Syria .
42002003	Everyone traveled to their own hometowns to have their name put on the list .
42002004	So Joseph left Nazareth , a town in Galilee , and went to the town of Bethlehem in Judea . It was known as the town of David . Joseph went there because he was from the family of David .
42002005	Joseph registered with Mary because she was engaged to marry him . ( She was now pregnant . )
42002006	While Joseph and Mary were in Bethlehem , the time came for her to have the baby .
42002007	She gave birth to her first son . She wrapped him up well and laid him in a box where cattle are fed . She put him there because the guest room was full .
42002008	That night , some shepherds were out in the fields near Bethlehem watching their sheep .
42002009	An angel of the Lord appeared to them , and the glory of the Lord was shining around them . The shepherds were very afraid .

42002018	Everyone was surprised when they heard what the shepherds told them .
42002019	Mary continued to think about these things , trying to understand them .

42002021	When the baby was eight days old , he was circumcised , and he was named Jesus . This name was given by the angel before the baby began to grow inside Mary .

42002023	It is written in the law of the Lord : “ When a mother’s first baby is a boy , he shall be called ‘ special for the Lord . ’ ”
42002024	The law of the Lord also says that people must give a sacrifice : “ You must sacrifice two doves or two young pigeons . ” So Joseph and Mary went to Jerusalem to do this .
42002025	A man named Simeon lived in Jerusalem . He was a good man who was devoted to God . He was waiting for the time when God would come to help Israel . The Holy Spirit was with him .
42002026	The Holy Spirit told him that he would not die before he saw the Messiah from the Lord .

42002031	Now all people can see your plan .

42002035	So the secret thoughts of many will be made known . And the things that happen will be painful for you — like a sword cutting through your heart . ”
42002036	Anna , a prophetess , was there at the Temple . She was from the family of Phanuel in the tribe of Asher . She was now very old . She had lived with her husband seven years
42002037	before he died and left her alone . She was now 84 years old . Anna was always at the Temple ; she never left . She worshiped God by fasting and praying day and night .
42002038	Anna was there when Joseph and Mary came to the Temple . She praised God and talked about Jesus to all those who were waiting for God to free Jerusalem .
42002039	Joseph and Mary finished doing all the things that the law of the Lord commanded . Then they went home to Nazareth , their own town in Galilee .
42002040	The little boy Jesus was developing into a mature young man , full of wisdom . God was blessing him .
42002041	Every year Jesus’ parents went to Jerusalem for the Passover festival .
42002042	When Jesus was twelve years old , they went to the festival as usual .
42002043	When the festival was over , they went home , but Jesus stayed in Jerusalem . His parents did not know about it .
42002044	They traveled for a whole day thinking that Jesus was with them in the group . They began looking for him among their family and close friends ,
42002045	but they did not find him . So they went back to Jerusalem to look for him there .

42002047	Everyone who heard him was amazed at his understanding and wise answers .
42002048	When his parents saw him , they wondered how this was possible . And his mother said , “ Son , why did you do this to us ? Your father and I were very worried about you . We have been looking for you . ”
42002049	Jesus said to them , “ Why did you have to look for me ? You should have known that I must be where my Father’s work is . ”
42002050	But they did not understand the meaning of what he said to them .
42002051	Jesus went with them to Nazareth and obeyed them . His mother was still thinking about all these things .
42002052	As Jesus grew taller , he continued to grow in wisdom . God was pleased with him and so were the people who knew him .
42003001	It was the 15th year of the rule of Tiberius Caesar . These men were under Caesar : “ There is someone shouting in the desert : ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord . Make the road straight for him .
42003005	Every valley will be filled , and every mountain and hill will be made flat . Crooked roads will be made straight , and rough roads will be made smooth .
42003006	Then everyone will see how God will save his people ! ’ ”
42003007	Crowds of people came to be baptized by John . But he said to them , “ You are all snakes ! Who warned you to run from God’s judgment that is coming ?
42003008	Change your hearts ! And show by your lives that you have changed . I know what you are about to say — ‘ but Abraham is our father ! ’ That means nothing . I tell you that God can make children for Abraham from these rocks !
42003009	The ax is now ready to cut down the trees . Every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire . ”
42003010	The people asked John , “ What should we do ? ”
42003011	He answered , “ If you have two shirts , share with someone who does not have one . If you have food , share that too . ”
42003012	Even the tax collectors came to John . They wanted to be baptized . They said to him , “ Teacher , what should we do ? ”
42003013	He told them , “ Don’t take more taxes from people than you have been ordered to collect . ”

42003020	So Herod added another bad thing to all his other wrongs : He put John in jail .
42003021	When all the people were being baptized , Jesus came and was baptized too . And while he was praying , the sky opened ,

42003023	When Jesus began to teach , he was about 30 years old . People thought that Jesus was Joseph’s son .
42004001	Now filled with the Holy Spirit , Jesus returned from the Jordan River . And then the Spirit led him into the desert .
42004002	There the devil tempted Jesus for 40 days . Jesus ate nothing during this time , and when it was finished , he was very hungry .
42004003	The devil said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , tell this rock to become bread . ”
42004004	Jesus answered , “ The Scriptures say , ‘ It is not just bread that keeps people alive . ’ ”
42004005	Then the devil took Jesus and in a moment of time showed him all the kingdoms of the world .
42004006	The devil said to him , “ I will make you king over all these places . You will have power over them , and you will get all the glory . It has all been given to me . I can give it to anyone I want .
42004007	I will give it all to you , if you will only worship me . ”
42004008	Jesus answered , “ The Scriptures say , ‘ You must worship the Lord your God . Serve only him . ’ ”
42004009	Then the devil led Jesus to Jerusalem and put him on a high place at the edge of the Temple area . He said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , jump off !
42004010	The Scriptures say , ‘ God will command his angels to take care of you . ’ ‘ Their hands will catch you so that you will not hit your foot on a rock . ’ ”
42004012	Jesus answered , “ But the Scriptures also say , ‘ You must not test the Lord your God . ’ ”
42004013	The devil finished tempting Jesus in every way and went away to wait until a better time .
42004014	Jesus went back to Galilee with the power of the Spirit . Stories about him spread all over the area around Galilee .
42004015	He began to teach in the synagogues , and everyone praised him .
42004016	Jesus traveled to Nazareth , the town where he grew up . On the Sabbath day he went to the synagogue as he always did . He stood up to read .
42004017	The book of Isaiah the prophet was given to him . He opened the book and found the place where this is written :
42004018	“ The Spirit of the Lord is on me . He has chosen me to tell good news to the poor . He sent me to tell prisoners that they are free and to tell the blind that they can see again . He sent me to free those who have been treated badly
42004019	and to announce that the time has come for the Lord to show his kindness . ”
42004020	Jesus closed the book , gave it back to the helper , and sat down . As everyone in the synagogue watched him closely ,
42004021	he began to speak to them . He said , “ While you heard me reading these words just now , they were coming true ! ”
42004022	Everyone there said good things about Jesus . They were amazed to hear him speak such wonderful words . They said , “ How is this possible ? Isn’t he Joseph’s son ? ”
42004023	Jesus said to them , “ I know you will tell me the old saying : ‘ Doctor , heal yourself . ’ You want to say , ‘ We heard about the things you did in Capernaum . Do those same things here in your own hometown ! ’ ”
42004024	Then he said , “ The truth is , a prophet is not accepted in his own hometown .
42004027	“ And there were many people with leprosy living in Israel during the time of the prophet Elisha . But none of them were healed ; the only one was Naaman . And he was from the country of Syria , not Israel . ”
42004028	When the people in the synagogue heard this , they were very angry .
42004029	They got up and forced Jesus to go out of town . Their town was built on a hill . They took Jesus to the edge of the hill to throw him off .
42004030	But he walked through the middle of the crowd and went away .
42004031	Jesus went to Capernaum , a city in Galilee . On the Sabbath day he taught the people .
42004032	They were amazed at his teaching because he spoke with authority .
42004033	In the synagogue there was a man who had an evil spirit from the devil inside him . The man shouted loudly ,
42004034	“ Jesus of Nazareth ! What do you want with us ? Did you come here to destroy us ? I know who you are — God’s Holy One ! ”
42004035	But Jesus warned the evil spirit to stop . He said , “ Be quiet ! Come out of the man ! ” The evil spirit threw the man down on the ground in front of everyone . Then the evil spirit left the man and did not hurt him .
42004036	The people were amazed . They said to each other , “ What does this mean ? With authority and power he commands evil spirits and they come out . ”
42004037	And so the news about Jesus spread to every place in the whole area .
42004038	Jesus left the synagogue and went to Simon’s house . Simon’s mother-in-law was very sick . She had a high fever . They asked Jesus to do something to help her .
42004039	He stood very close to her and ordered the sickness to go away . The sickness left her , and she got up and began serving them .
42004040	When the sun went down , the people brought their sick friends to Jesus . They had many different kinds of sicknesses . Jesus laid his hands on each sick person and healed them all .
42004041	Demons came out of many people . The demons shouted , “ You are the Son of God . ” But Jesus gave a strong command for the demons not to speak , because they knew he was the Messiah .
42004042	The next day Jesus went to a place to be alone . The people looked for him . When they found him , they tried to stop him from leaving .
42004043	But he said to them , “ I must tell the Good News about God’s kingdom to other towns too . This is why I was sent . ”
42004044	Then Jesus told the Good News in the synagogues in Judea .
42005001	As Jesus stood beside Lake Galilee , a crowd of people pushed to get closer to him and to hear the teachings of God .
42005002	Jesus saw two boats at the shore of the lake . The fishermen were washing their nets .
42005003	Jesus got into the boat that belonged to Simon . He asked Simon to push off a little from the shore . Then he sat down in the boat and taught the people on the shore .
42005004	When Jesus finished speaking , he said to Simon , “ Take the boat into the deep water . If all of you will put your nets into the water , you will catch some fish . ”
42005005	Simon answered , “ Master , we worked hard all night trying to catch fish and caught nothing . But you say I should put the nets into the water , so I will . ”
42005006	The fishermen put their nets into the water . Their nets were filled with so many fish that they began to break .
42005007	They called to their friends in the other boat to come and help them . The friends came , and both boats were filled so full of fish that they were almost sinking .
42005010	James and John , the sons of Zebedee , were amazed too . ( James and John worked together with Simon . ) Jesus said to Simon , “ Don’t be afraid . From now on your work will be to bring in people , not fish ! ”
42005011	The men brought their boats to the shore . They left everything and followed Jesus .
42005012	One time Jesus was in a town where a very sick man lived . This man was covered with leprosy . When the man saw Jesus , he bowed before Jesus and begged him , “ Lord , you have the power to heal me if you want . ”
42005013	Jesus said , “ I want to heal you . Be healed ! ” Then he touched the man , and immediately the leprosy disappeared .
42005014	Then Jesus said , “ Don’t tell anyone about what happened . But go and let the priest look at you . And offer a gift to God for your healing as Moses commanded . This will show people that you are healed . ”
42005015	But the news about Jesus spread more and more . Many people came to hear him and to be healed of their sicknesses .
42005016	Jesus often went away to other places to be alone so that he could pray .
42005017	One day Jesus was teaching the people . The Pharisees and teachers of the law were sitting there too . They had come from every town in Galilee and Judea and from Jerusalem . The Lord was giving Jesus the power to heal people .
42005018	There was a man who was paralyzed , and some other men were carrying him on a mat . They tried to bring him and put him down before Jesus .
42005019	But there were so many people that they could not find a way to Jesus . So they went up on the roof and lowered the crippled man down through a hole in the ceiling . They lowered the mat into the room so that the crippled man was lying before Jesus .
42005020	Jesus saw how much faith they had and said to the sick man , “ Friend , your sins are forgiven . ”
42005021	The Jewish teachers of the law and the Pharisees thought to themselves , “ Who is this man who dares to say such things ? What an insult to God ! No one but God can forgive sins . ”
42005022	But Jesus knew what they were thinking and said , “ Why do you have these questions in your minds ?
42005025	The man immediately stood up in front of everyone . He picked up his mat and walked home , praising God .
42005026	Everyone was completely amazed and began to praise God . They were filled with great respect for God’s power . They said , “ Today we saw amazing things ! ”
42005027	After this Jesus went out and saw a tax collector sitting at his place for collecting taxes . His name was Levi . Jesus said to him , “ Follow me ! ”
42005028	Levi got up , left everything , and followed Jesus .
42005029	Then Levi gave a big dinner at his house for Jesus . At the table there were many tax collectors and some other people too .
42005030	But the Pharisees and those who taught the law for the Pharisees began to complain to the followers of Jesus , “ Why do you eat and drink with tax collectors and other sinners ? ”
42005031	Jesus answered them , “ It is the sick people who need a doctor , not those who are healthy .
42005032	I have not come to ask good people to change . I have come to ask sinners to change the way they live . ”
42005033	They said to Jesus , “ John’s followers often fast and pray , the same as the followers of the Pharisees . But your followers eat and drink all the time . ”
42005034	Jesus said to them , “ At a wedding you can’t ask the friends of the bridegroom to be sad and fast while he is still with them .
42005035	But the time will come when the groom will be taken away from them . Then his friends will fast . ”
42005036	Jesus told them this story : “ No one takes cloth off a new coat to cover a hole in an old coat . That would ruin the new coat , and the cloth from the new coat would not be the same as the old cloth .
42005037	Also , no one ever pours new wine into old wineskins . The new wine would break them . The wine would spill out , and the wineskins would be ruined .
42005038	You always put new wine into new wineskins .
42005039	No one who drinks old wine wants new wine . They say , ‘ The old wine is just fine . ’ ”
