42006001	One time on a Sabbath day , Jesus was walking through some grain fields . His followers picked the grain , rubbed it in their hands , and ate it .
42006002	Some Pharisees said , “ Why are you doing that ? It is against the Law of Moses to do that on the Sabbath day . ”
42006003	Jesus answered , “ You have read about what David did when he and the people with him were hungry .
42006004	David went into God’s house . He took the bread that was offered to God and ate it . And he gave some of the bread to the people with him . This was against the Law of Moses , which says that only the priests can eat that bread . ”
42006005	Then Jesus said to the Pharisees , “ The Son of Man is Lord over the Sabbath day . ”
42006006	On another Sabbath day Jesus went into the synagogue and taught the people . A man with a crippled right hand was there .
42006007	The teachers of the law and the Pharisees were watching Jesus closely . They were waiting to see if he would heal on the Sabbath day . They wanted to see him do something wrong so that they could accuse him .
42006008	But Jesus knew what they were thinking . He said to the man with the crippled hand , “ Get up and stand here where everyone can see . ” The man got up and stood there .
42006009	Then Jesus said to them , “ I ask you , which is the right thing to do on the Sabbath day : to do good or to do evil ? Is it right to save a life or to destroy one ? ”
42006010	Jesus looked around at all of them and then said to the man , “ Hold out your hand . ” The man held out his hand , and it was healed .
42006011	The Pharisees and the teachers of the law got so mad they couldn’t think straight . They talked to each other about what they could do to Jesus .
42006012	A few days later , Jesus went out to a mountain to pray . He stayed there all night praying to God .
42006013	The next morning he called his followers . He chose twelve of them and called them apostles . These are the ones he chose :
42006017	Jesus and the apostles came down from the mountain . Jesus stood on a flat place . A large crowd of his followers was there . Also , there were many people from all around Judea , Jerusalem , and the seacoast cities of Tyre and Sidon .
42006018	They all came to hear Jesus teach and to be healed of their sicknesses . He healed the people who were troubled by evil spirits .
42006019	Everyone was trying to touch him , because power was coming out from him . Jesus healed them all .
42006020	Jesus looked at his followers and said , “ Great blessings belong to you who are poor . God’s kingdom belongs to you .
42006021	Great blessings belong to you who are hungry now . You will be filled . Great blessings belong to you who are crying now . You will be happy and laughing .
42006022	“ People will hate you because you belong to the Son of Man . They will make you leave their group . They will insult you . They will think it is wrong even to say your name . When these things happen , know that great blessings belong to you .
42006023	You can be happy then and jump for joy , because you have a great reward in heaven . The ancestors of those people did the same things to the prophets .
42006024	“ But how bad it will be for you rich people , because you had your easy life .
42006025	How bad it will be for you people who are full now , because you will be hungry . How bad it will be for you people who are laughing now , because you will be sad and cry .
42006026	“ How bad it is when everyone says nothing but good about you . Just look at the false prophets . Their ancestors always said good things about them .
42006027	“ But I say to you people who are listening to me , love your enemies . Do good to those who hate you .
42006028	Ask God to bless the people who ask for bad things to happen to you . Pray for the people who are mean to you .
42006029	If someone hits you on the side of your face , let them hit the other side too . If someone takes your coat , don’t stop them from taking your shirt too .
42006030	Give to everyone who asks you for something . When someone takes something that is yours , don’t ask for it back .
42006031	Do for others what you want them to do for you .
42006032	“ If you love only those who love you , should you get any special praise for doing that ? No , even sinners love those who love them !
42006033	If you do good only to those who do good to you , should you get any special praise for doing that ? No , even sinners do that !
42006034	If you lend things to people , always expecting to get something back , should you get any special praise for that ? No , even sinners lend to other sinners so that they can get back the same amount !
42006035	“ I’m telling you to love your enemies and do good to them . Lend to people without expecting to get anything back . If you do this , you will have a great reward . You will be children of the Most High God . Yes , because God is good even to the people who are full of sin and not thankful .
42006036	Give love and mercy the same as your Father gives love and mercy .
42006037	“ Don’t judge others , and God will not judge you . Don’t condemn others , and you will not be condemned . Forgive others , and you will be forgiven .
42006038	Give to others , and you will receive . You will be given much . It will be poured into your hands — more than you can hold . You will be given so much that it will spill into your lap . The way you give to others is the way God will give to you . ”
42006039	Jesus told them this story : “ Can a blind man lead another blind man ? No . Both of them will fall into a ditch .
42006040	Students are not better than their teacher . But when they have been fully taught , they will be like their teacher .
42006041	“ Why do you notice the small piece of dust that is in your friend’s eye , but you don’t see the big piece of wood that is in your own eye ?
42006042	You say to your friend , ‘ Let me get that little piece of dust out of your eye . ’ Why do you say this ? Can’t you see that big piece of wood in your own eye ? You are a hypocrite . First , take the wood out of your own eye . Then you will see clearly to get the dust out of your friend’s eye .
42006043	“ A good tree does not produce bad fruit . And a bad tree does not produce good fruit .
42006044	Every tree is known by the kind of fruit it produces . You won’t find figs on thorny weeds . And you can’t pick grapes from thornbushes !
42006045	Good people have good things saved in their hearts . That’s why they say good things . But those who are evil have hearts full of evil , and that’s why they say things that are evil . What people say with their mouths comes from what fills their hearts .
42006046	“ Why do you call me , ‘ Lord , Lord , ’ but you don’t do what I say ?
42006047	The people who come to me , who listen to my teachings and obey them — I will show you what they are like :
42006048	They are like a man building a house . He digs deep and builds his house on rock . The floods come , and the water crashes against the house . But the flood cannot move the house , because it was built well .
42006049	“ But the people who hear my words and do not obey are like a man who builds a house without preparing a foundation . When the floods come , the house falls down easily and is completely destroyed . ”
42007001	Jesus finished saying all these things to the people . Then he went into Capernaum .
42007002	In Capernaum there was an army officer . He had a servant who was very sick ; he was near death . The officer loved the servant very much .
42007003	When he heard about Jesus , he sent some older Jewish leaders to him . He wanted the men to ask Jesus to come and save the life of his servant .
42007004	The men went to Jesus . They begged Jesus to help the officer . They said , “ This officer is worthy to have your help .
42007005	He loves our people and he built the synagogue for us . ”
42007006	So Jesus went with them . He was coming near the officer’s house when the officer sent friends to say , “ Lord , you don’t need to do anything special for me . I am not good enough for you to come into my house .
42007007	That is why I did not come to you myself . You need only to give the order , and my servant will be healed .
42007008	I know this because I am a man under the authority of other men . And I have soldiers under my authority . I tell one soldier , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes . And I tell another soldier , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes . And I say to my servant , ‘ Do this , ’ and my servant obeys me . ”
42007009	When Jesus heard this , he was amazed . He turned to the people following him and said , “ I tell you , this is the most faith I have seen anywhere , even in Israel . ”
42007010	The group that was sent to Jesus went back to the house . There they found that the servant was healed .
42007011	The next day Jesus and his followers went to a town called Nain . A big crowd was traveling with them .
42007012	When Jesus came near the town gate , he saw some people carrying a dead body . It was the only son of a woman who was a widow . Walking with her were many other people from the town .
42007013	When the Lord saw the woman , he felt very sorry for her and said , “ Don’t cry . ”
42007014	He walked to the open coffin and touched it . The men who were carrying the coffin stopped . Jesus spoke to the dead son : “ Young man , I tell you , get up ! ”
42007015	Then the boy sat up and began to talk , and Jesus gave him back to his mother .
42007016	Everyone was filled with fear . They began praising God and said , “ A great prophet is here with us ! ” and “ God is taking care of his people . ”
42007017	This news about Jesus spread all over Judea and to all the other places around there .
42007018	John’s followers told him about all these things . John called for two of his followers .
42007019	He sent them to the Lord to ask , “ Are you the one we heard was coming , or should we wait for someone else ? ”
42007020	So the men came to Jesus . They said , “ John the Baptizer sent us to you with this question : ‘ Are you the one who is coming , or should we wait for someone else ? ’ ”
42007021	Right then Jesus healed many people of their sicknesses and diseases . He healed those who had evil spirits and made many who were blind able to see again .
42007022	Then he said to John’s followers , “ Go tell John what you have seen and heard : The blind can see . The crippled can walk . People with leprosy are healed . The deaf can hear . The dead are brought back to life . And the Good News is being told to the poor .
42007023	Great blessings belong to those who don’t have a problem accepting me . ”
42007024	When John’s followers left , Jesus began talking to the people about John : “ What did you people go out into the desert to see ? Someone who is weak , like a stem of grass blowing in the wind ?
42007025	Really , what did you expect to see ? Someone dressed in fine clothes ? Of course not . People who wear fancy clothes and live in luxury are all in kings’ palaces .
42007026	So what did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes , John is a prophet . But I tell you , he is more than that .
42007027	This Scripture was written about him : ‘ Listen ! I will send my messenger ahead of you . He will prepare the way for you . ’
42007029	( When the people heard this , they all agreed that God’s teaching was good . Even the tax collectors agreed . These were the people who were baptized by John .
42007030	But the Pharisees and experts in the law refused to accept God’s plan for themselves ; they did not let John baptize them . )
42007031	“ What shall I say about the people of this time ? What can I compare them to ? What are they like ?
42007032	They are like children sitting in the marketplace . One group of children calls to the other children and says , ‘ We played flute music for you , but you did not dance ; we sang a sad song , but you did not cry . ’
42007036	One of the Pharisees asked Jesus to eat with him . Jesus went into the Pharisee’s house and took a place at the table .
42007037	There was a sinful woman in that town . She knew that Jesus was eating at the Pharisee’s house . So the woman brought some expensive perfume in an alabaster jar .
42007038	She stood at Jesus’ feet , crying . Then she began to wash his feet with her tears . She dried his feet with her hair . She kissed his feet many times and rubbed them with the perfume .
42007039	When the Pharisee who asked Jesus to come to his house saw this , he thought to himself , “ If this man were a prophet , he would know that the woman who is touching him is a sinner ! ”
42007040	In response , Jesus said to the Pharisee , “ Simon , I have something to say to you . ” Simon said , “ Let me hear it , Teacher . ”
42007041	Jesus said , “ There were two men . Both men owed money to the same banker . One man owed him 500 silver coins . The other man owed him 50 silver coins .
42007042	The men had no money , so they could not pay their debt . But the banker told the men that they did not have to pay him . Which one of those two men will love him more ? ”
42007043	Simon answered , “ I think it would be the one who owed him the most money . ” Jesus said to him , “ You are right . ”
42007044	Then he turned to the woman and said to Simon , “ Do you see this woman ? When I came into your house , you gave me no water for my feet . But she washed my feet with her tears and dried my feet with her hair .
42007045	You did not greet me with a kiss , but she has been kissing my feet since I came in .
42007046	You did not honor me with oil for my head , but she rubbed my feet with her sweet-smelling oil .
42007047	I tell you that her many sins are forgiven . This is clear , because she showed great love . People who are forgiven only a little will love only a little . ”
42007048	Then Jesus said to her , “ Your sins are forgiven . ”
42007049	The people sitting at the table began to think to themselves , “ Who does this man think he is ? How can he forgive sins ? ”
42007050	Jesus said to the woman , “ Because you believed , you are saved from your sins . Go in peace . ”
42008001	The next day , Jesus traveled through some cities and small towns . Jesus told the people a message from God , the Good News about God’s kingdom . The twelve apostles were with him .
42008002	There were also some women with him . Jesus had healed these women of sicknesses and evil spirits . One of them was Mary , who was called Magdalene . Seven demons had come out of her .
42008003	Also with these women were Joanna , the wife of Chuza ( the manager of Herod’s property ) , Susanna , and many other women . These women used their own money to help Jesus and his apostles .
42008004	A large crowd came together . People came to Jesus from every town , and he told them this story :
42008005	“ A farmer went out to sow seed . While he was scattering the seed , some of it fell beside the road . People walked on the seed , and the birds ate it all .
42008006	Other seed fell on rock . It began to grow but then died because it had no water .
42008007	Some other seed fell among thorny weeds . This seed grew , but later the weeds stopped the plants from growing .
42008008	The rest of the seed fell on good ground . This seed grew and made 100 times more grain . ” Jesus finished the story . Then he called out , “ You people who hear me , listen ! ”
42008009	Jesus’ followers asked him , “ What does this story mean ? ”
42008010	He said , “ You have been chosen to know the secret truths about God’s kingdom . But I use stories to speak to other people . I do this so that ‘ They will look , but they will not see , and they will listen , but they will not understand . ’
42008011	“ This is what the story means : The seed is God’s teaching .
42008012	Some people are like the seed that fell beside the path . They hear God’s teaching , but then the devil comes and causes them to stop thinking about it . This keeps them from believing it and being saved .
42008013	Others are like the seed that fell on rock . That is like the people who hear God’s teaching and gladly accept it . But they don’t have deep roots . They believe for a while . But when trouble comes , they turn away from God .
42008014	“ What about the seed that fell among the thorny weeds ? That is like the people who hear God’s teaching , but they let the worries , riches , and pleasures of this life stop them from growing . So they never produce a crop .
42008015	And what about the seed that fell on the good ground ? That is like the people who hear God’s teaching with a good , honest heart . They obey it and patiently produce a good crop .
42008016	“ No one lights a lamp and then covers it with a bowl or hides it under a bed . Instead , they put the lamp on a lampstand so that the people who come in will have enough light to see .
42008017	Everything that is hidden will become clear . Every secret thing will be made known , and everyone will see it .
42008018	So think carefully about what you are hearing . The people who have some understanding will receive more . But those who do not have understanding will lose even what they think they have . ”
42008019	Jesus’ mother and brothers came to visit him . But they could not get close to him , because there were so many people .
42008020	Someone said to Jesus , “ Your mother and your brothers are standing outside . They want to see you . ”
42008021	Jesus answered them , “ My mother and my brothers are those who listen to God’s teaching and obey it . ”
42008022	One day Jesus and his followers got into a boat . He said to them , “ Come with me across the lake . ” And so they started across .
42008023	While they were sailing , Jesus slept . A big storm blew across the lake , and the boat began to fill with water . They were in danger .
42008024	The followers went to Jesus and woke him . They said , “ Master ! Master ! We will drown ! ” Jesus got up . He gave a command to the wind and the waves . The wind stopped , and the lake became calm .
42008025	He said to his followers , “ Where is your faith ? ” They were afraid and amazed . They said to each other , “ What kind of man is this ? He commands the wind and the water , and they obey him . ”
42008026	Jesus and his followers sailed on across the lake . They sailed to the area where the Gerasene people live , across from Galilee .
42008027	When Jesus got out of the boat , a man from that town came to him . This man had demons inside him . For a long time he had worn no clothes . He did not live in a house but in the caves where the dead are buried .
42008030	Jesus asked him , “ What is your name ? ” The man answered , “ Legion . ” ( He said his name was “ Legion ” because many demons had gone into him . )
42008031	The demons begged Jesus not to send them into the bottomless pit .
42008032	On that hill there was a big herd of pigs eating . The demons begged Jesus to allow them to go into the pigs . So he allowed them to do this .
42008033	Then the demons came out of the man and went into the pigs . The herd of pigs ran down the hill into the lake , and all were drowned .
42008034	The men who were caring for the pigs ran away and told the story in the fields and in the town .
42008035	People went out to see what had happened . They came to Jesus and found the man sitting there at the feet of Jesus . The man had clothes on and was in his right mind again ; the demons were gone . This made the people afraid .
42008036	The men who saw these things happen told the others all about how Jesus made the man well .
42008037	All those who lived in the area around Gerasa asked Jesus to go away because they were afraid . So Jesus got into the boat to go back to Galilee .
42008038	The man he had healed begged to go with him . But Jesus sent him away , saying ,
42008039	“ Go back home and tell people what God did for you . ” So the man went all over town telling what Jesus had done for him .
42008040	When Jesus went back to Galilee , the people welcomed him . Everyone was waiting for him .
42008043	A woman was there who had been bleeding for twelve years . She had spent all her money on doctors , but no doctor was able to heal her .
42008044	The woman came behind Jesus and touched the bottom of his coat . At that moment , her bleeding stopped .
42008045	Then Jesus said , “ Who touched me ? ” They all said they had not touched him . And Peter said , “ Master , people are all around you , pushing against you . ”
42008046	But Jesus said , “ Someone touched me . I felt power go out from me . ”
42008047	When the woman saw that she could not hide , she came forward , shaking . She bowed down before Jesus . While everyone listened , she told why she touched him . Then she said that she was healed immediately when she touched him .
42008048	Jesus said to her , “ My daughter , you are made well because you believed . Go in peace . ”
42008049	While Jesus was still speaking , someone came from the house of the synagogue leader and said , “ Your daughter has died ! Don’t bother the Teacher anymore . ”
42008050	Jesus heard this and said to Jairus , “ Don’t be afraid ! Just believe and your daughter will be well . ”
42008051	Jesus went to the house . He let only Peter , John , James , and the girl’s father and mother go inside with him .
42008052	Everyone was crying and feeling sad because the girl was dead . But Jesus said , “ Don’t cry . She is not dead . She is only sleeping . ”
42008053	The people laughed at him , because they knew that the girl was dead .
42008054	But Jesus held her hand and called to her , “ Little girl , stand up ! ”
42008055	Her spirit came back into her , and she stood up immediately . Jesus said , “ Give her something to eat . ”
42008056	The girl’s parents were amazed . He told them not to tell anyone about what happened .
42009001	Jesus called his twelve apostles together . He gave them power to heal sicknesses and power to force demons out of people .
42009002	He sent them to tell about God’s kingdom and to heal the sick .
42009003	He said to them , “ When you travel , don’t take a walking stick . Also , don’t carry a bag , food , or money . Take for your trip only the clothes you are wearing .
42009004	When you go into a house , stay there until it is time to leave .
42009005	If the people in the town will not welcome you , go outside the town and shake the dust off your feet as a warning to them . ”
42009006	So the apostles went out . They traveled through all the towns . They told the Good News and healed people everywhere .
42009007	Herod the ruler heard about all these things that were happening . He was confused because some people said , “ John the Baptizer has risen from death . ”
42009008	Others said , “ Elijah has come to us . ” And some others said , “ One of the prophets from long ago has risen from death . ”
42009009	Herod said , “ I cut off John’s head . So who is this man I hear these things about ? ” Herod continued trying to see Jesus .
42009010	When the apostles came back , they told Jesus what they had done on their trip . Then he took them away to a town called Bethsaida . There , he and his apostles could be alone together .
42009011	But the people learned where Jesus went and followed him . He welcomed them and talked with them about God’s kingdom . He healed the people who were sick .
42009012	Late in the afternoon , the twelve apostles came to Jesus and said , “ No one lives in this place . Send the people away . They need to find food and places to sleep in the farms and towns around here . ”
42009013	But Jesus said to the apostles , “ You give them something to eat . ” They said , “ We have only five loaves of bread and two fish . Do you want us to go buy food for all these people ? ” There are too many !
42009014	( There were about 5000 men there . ) Jesus said to his followers , “ Tell the people to sit in groups of about 50 people . ”
42009015	So the followers did this and everyone sat down .
42009016	Then Jesus took the five loaves of bread and two fish . He looked up into the sky and thanked God for the food . Then he broke it into pieces , which he gave to the followers to give to the people .
42009017	They all ate until they were full . And there was a lot of food left . Twelve baskets were filled with the pieces of food that were not eaten .
42009018	One time Jesus was praying alone . His followers came together there , and he asked them , “ Who do the people say I am ? ”
42009019	They answered , “ Some people say you are John the Baptizer . Others say you are Elijah . And some people say you are one of the prophets from long ago that has come back to life . ”
42009020	Then Jesus said to his followers , “ And who do you say I am ? ” Peter answered , “ You are the Messiah from God . ”
42009021	Jesus warned them not to tell anyone .
42009022	Then Jesus said , “ The Son of Man must suffer many things . He will be rejected by the older Jewish leaders , the leading priests , and teachers of the law . And he will be killed . But after three days he will be raised from death . ”
42009023	Jesus continued to say to all of them , “ Any of you who want to be my follower must stop thinking about yourself and what you want . You must be willing to carry the cross that is given to you every day for following me .
42009024	Any of you who try to save the life you have will lose it . But you who give up your life for me will save it .
42009025	It is worth nothing for you to have the whole world if you yourself are destroyed or lost .
42009026	Don’t be ashamed of me and my teaching . If that happens , I will be ashamed of you when I come with my divine greatness and that of the Father and the holy angels .
42009027	Believe me when I say that some of you people standing here will see God’s kingdom before you die . ”
42009028	About eight days after Jesus said these things , he took Peter , John , and James and went up on a mountain to pray .
42009029	While Jesus was praying , his face began to change . His clothes became shining white .
42009030	Then two men were there , talking with him . They were Moses and Elijah .
42009031	They also looked bright and glorious . They were talking with Jesus about his death that would happen in Jerusalem .
42009032	Peter and the others were asleep . But they woke up and saw the glory of Jesus . They also saw the two men who were standing with him .
42009033	When Moses and Elijah were leaving , Peter said , “ Master , it is good that we are here . We will put three tents here — one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ” ( He did not know what he was saying . )
42009034	While Peter was saying these things , a cloud came all around them . Peter , John , and James were afraid when the cloud covered them .
42009035	A voice came from the cloud and said , “ This is my Son . He is the one I have chosen . Obey him . ”
42009036	When the voice stopped , only Jesus was there . Peter , John , and James said nothing . And for a long time after that , they told no one about what they had seen .
42009037	The next day , Jesus , Peter , John , and James came down from the mountain . A large group of people met Jesus .
42009038	A man in the group shouted to him , “ Teacher , please come and look at my son . He is the only child I have .
42009039	An evil spirit comes into him , and then he shouts . He loses control of himself and foams at the mouth . The evil spirit continues to hurt him and almost never leaves him .
42009040	I begged your followers to make the evil spirit leave my son , but they could not do it . ”
42009041	Jesus answered , “ You people today have no faith . Your lives are all wrong . How long must I be with you and be patient with you ? ” Then Jesus said to the man , “ Bring your son here . ”
42009042	While the boy was coming , the demon threw the boy to the ground . The boy lost control of himself . But Jesus gave a strong command to the evil spirit . Then the boy was healed , and Jesus gave him back to his father .
42009043	All the people were amazed at the great power of God . The people were still amazed about all the things Jesus did . He said to his followers ,
42009044	“ Don’t forget what I will tell you now : The Son of Man will soon be handed over to the control of other men . ”
42009045	But the followers did not understand what he meant . The meaning was hidden from them so that they could not understand it . But they were afraid to ask Jesus about what he said .
42009046	Jesus’ followers began to have an argument about which one of them was the greatest .
42009047	Jesus knew what they were thinking , so he took a little child and stood the child beside him .
42009048	Then he said to the followers , “ Whoever accepts a little child like this in my name is accepting me . And anyone who accepts me is also accepting the one who sent me . The one among you who is the most humble — this is the one who is great . ”
42009049	John answered , “ Master , we saw someone using your name to force demons out of people . We told him to stop because he does not belong to our group . ”
42009050	Jesus said to him , “ Don’t stop him . Whoever is not against you is for you . ”
42009051	The time was coming near when Jesus would leave and go back to heaven . He decided to go to Jerusalem .
42009052	He sent some men ahead of him . They went into a town in Samaria to make everything ready for him .
42009053	But the people there would not welcome Jesus because he was going toward Jerusalem .
42009054	James and John , the followers of Jesus , saw this . They said , “ Lord , do you want us to call fire down from heaven and destroy those people ? ”
42009055	But Jesus turned and criticized them for saying this .
42009056	Then he and his followers went to another town .
42009057	They were all traveling along the road . Someone said to Jesus , “ I will follow you anywhere you go . ”
42009058	He answered , “ The foxes have holes to live in . The birds have nests . But the Son of Man has no place where he can rest his head . ”
42009059	Jesus said to another man , “ Follow me ! ” But the man said , “ Lord , let me go and bury my father first . ”
42009060	But Jesus said to him , “ Let the people who are dead bury their own dead . You must go and tell about God’s kingdom . ”
42009061	Another man said , “ I will follow you , Lord , but first let me go and say goodbye to my family . ”
42009062	Jesus said , “ Anyone who begins to plow a field but looks back is not prepared for God’s kingdom . ”
42010001	After this , the Lord chose 72 more followers . He sent them out in groups of two . He sent them ahead of him into every town and place where he planned to go .
42010002	He said to them , “ There is such a big harvest of people to bring in . But there are only a few workers to help harvest them . God owns the harvest . Ask him to send more workers to help bring in his harvest .
42010003	“ You can go now . But listen ! I am sending you , and you will be like sheep among wolves .
42010004	Don’t carry any money , a bag , or sandals . Don’t stop to talk with people on the road .
42010005	Before you go into a house , say , ‘ Peace be with this home . ’
42010006	If the people living there love peace , your blessing of peace will stay with them . But if not , your blessing of peace will come back to you .
42010007	Stay in the peace-loving house . Eat and drink what the people there give you . A worker should be given his pay . Don’t leave that house to stay in another house .
42010008	“ If you go into a town and the people welcome you , eat the food they give you .
42010009	Heal the sick people who live there , and tell them , ‘ God’s kingdom is now very near you ! ’
42010010	“ But if you go into a town and the people don’t welcome you , then go out into the streets of that town and say ,
42010011	‘ Even the dirt from your town that sticks to our feet we wipe off against you . But remember that God’s kingdom is coming soon . ’
42010012	I tell you , on the judgment day it will be worse for the people of that town than for the people of Sodom .
42010013	“ It will be bad for you , Chorazin ! It will be bad for you , Bethsaida ! I did many miracles in you . If those same miracles had happened in Tyre and Sidon , then the people in those cities would have changed their lives and stopped sinning a long time ago . They would have worn sackcloth and sat in ashes to show that they were sorry for their sins .
42010014	But on the judgment day it will be worse for you than for Tyre and Sidon .
42010015	And you , Capernaum , will you be lifted up to heaven ? No , you will be thrown down to the place of death !
42010016	“ When anyone listens to you my followers , they are really listening to me . But when anyone refuses to accept you , they are really refusing to accept me . And when anyone refuses to accept me , they are refusing to accept the one who sent me . ”
42010017	When the 72 followers came back from their trip , they were very happy . They said , “ Lord , even the demons obeyed us when we used your name ! ”
42010018	Jesus said to them , “ I saw Satan falling like lightning from the sky .
42010019	He is the enemy , but know that I have given you more power than he has . I have given you power to crush his snakes and scorpions under your feet . Nothing will hurt you .
42010020	Yes , even the spirits obey you . And you can be happy , not because you have this power , but because your names are written in heaven . ”
42010021	Then the Holy Spirit made Jesus feel very happy . Jesus said , “ I praise you , Father , Lord of heaven and earth . I am thankful that you have hidden these things from those who are so wise and so smart . But you have shown them to people who are like little children . Yes , Father , you did this because it’s what you really wanted to do .
42010022	“ My Father has given me all things . No one knows who the Son is — only the Father knows . And only the Son knows who the Father is . The only people who will know about the Father are those the Son chooses to tell . ”
42010023	Then Jesus turned to his followers . They were there alone with him . He said , “ It is a great blessing for you to see what you now see !
42010024	I tell you , many prophets and kings wanted to see what you now see , but they could not . And they wanted to hear what you now hear , but they could not . ”
42010025	Then an expert in the law stood up to test Jesus . He said , “ Teacher , what must I do to get eternal life ? ”
42010026	Jesus said to him , “ What is written in the law ? What do you understand from it ? ”
42010027	The man answered , “ ‘ Love the Lord your God with all your heart , all your soul , all your strength , and all your mind . ’ Also , ‘ Love your neighbor the same as you love yourself . ’ ”
42010028	Jesus said , “ Your answer is right . Do this and you will have eternal life . ”
42010029	But the man wanted to show that the way he was living was right . So he said to Jesus , “ But who is my neighbor ? ”
42010030	To answer this question , Jesus said , “ A man was going down the road from Jerusalem to Jericho . Some robbers surrounded him , tore off his clothes , and beat him . Then they left him lying there on the ground almost dead .
42010031	“ It happened that a Jewish priest was going down that road . When he saw the man , he did not stop to help him . He walked away .
42010032	Next , a Levite came near . He saw the hurt man , but he went around him . He would not stop to help him either . He just walked away .
42010033	“ Then a Samaritan man traveled down that road . He came to the place where the hurt man was lying . He saw the man and felt very sorry for him .
42010034	The Samaritan went to him and poured olive oil and wine on his wounds . Then he covered the man’s wounds with cloth . The Samaritan had a donkey . He put the hurt man on his donkey , and he took him to an inn . There he cared for him .
42010035	The next day , the Samaritan took out two silver coins and gave them to the man who worked at the inn . He said , ‘ Take care of this hurt man . If you spend more money on him , I will pay it back to you when I come again . ’ ”
42010036	Then Jesus said , “ Which one of these three men do you think was really a neighbor to the man who was hurt by the robbers ? ”
42010037	The teacher of the law answered , “ The one who helped him . ” Jesus said , “ Then you go and do the same . ”
42010038	While Jesus and his followers were traveling , he went into a town , and a woman named Martha let him stay at her house .
42010039	She had a sister named Mary . Mary was sitting at Jesus’ feet and listening to him teach .
42010040	But her sister Martha was busy doing all the work that had to be done . Martha went in and said , “ Lord , don’t you care that my sister has left me to do all the work by myself ? Tell her to help me ! ”
42010041	But the Lord answered her , “ Martha , Martha , you are getting worried and upset about too many things .
42010042	Only one thing is important . Mary has made the right choice , and it will never be taken away from her . ”
42011001	One time Jesus was out praying , and when he finished , one of his followers said to him , “ John taught his followers how to pray . Lord , teach us how to pray too . ”
42011002	Jesus said to the followers , “ This is how you should pray : ‘ Father , we pray that your name will always be kept holy . We pray that your kingdom will come .
42011003	Give us the food we need for each day .
42011004	Forgive our sins , just as we forgive everyone who has done wrong to us . And don’t let us be tempted . ’ ”
42011007	Your friend inside the house answers , ‘ Go away ! Don’t bother me ! The door is already locked . My children and I are in bed . I cannot get up and give you the bread now . ’
42011008	I tell you , maybe friendship is not enough to make him get up to give you the bread . But he will surely get up to give you what you need if you continue to ask .
42011009	So I tell you , continue to ask , and God will give to you . Continue to search , and you will find . Continue to knock , and the door will open for you .
42011010	Yes , whoever continues to ask will receive . Whoever continues to look will find . And whoever continues to knock will have the door opened for them .
42011011	Do any of you have a son ? What would you do if your son asked you for a fish ? Would any father give him a snake ?
42011012	Or , if he asked for an egg , would you give him a scorpion ? Of course not !
42011013	Even you who are bad know how to give good things to your children . So surely your heavenly Father knows how to give the Holy Spirit to the people who ask him . ”
42011014	One time Jesus was sending a demon out of a man who could not talk . When the demon came out , the man was able to speak . The crowds were amazed .
42011015	But some of the people said , “ He uses the power of Satan to force demons out of people . Satan is the ruler of demons . ”
42011016	Some others there wanted to test Jesus . They asked him to do a miracle as a sign from God .
42011017	But he knew what they were thinking . So he said to them , “ Every kingdom that fights against itself will be destroyed . And a family that fights against itself will break apart .
42011018	So if Satan is fighting against himself , how will his kingdom survive ? You say that I use the power of Satan to force out demons .
42011019	But if I use Satan’s power to force out demons , then what power do your people use when they force out demons ? So your own people will prove that you are wrong .
42011020	But I use the power of God to force out demons . This shows that God’s kingdom has now come to you .
42011021	“ When a strong man with many weapons guards his own house , the things in his house are safe .
42011022	But suppose a stronger man comes and defeats him . The stronger man will take away the weapons that the first man trusted to keep his house safe . Then the stronger man will do what he wants with the other man’s things .
42011023	“ Whoever is not with me is against me . And anyone who does not work with me is working against me .
42011024	“ When an evil spirit comes out of someone , it travels through dry places , looking for a place to rest . But it finds no place to rest . So it says , ‘ I will go back to the home I left . ’
42011025	When it comes back , it finds that home all neat and clean .
42011026	Then the evil spirit goes out and brings back seven other spirits more evil than itself . They all go and live there , and that person has even more trouble than before . ”
42011027	As Jesus was saying these things , a woman with the people there called out to him , “ Blessings from God belong to the woman who gave birth to you and fed you ! ”
42011028	But Jesus said , “ The people who hear the teaching of God and obey it — they are the ones who have God’s blessing . ”
42011029	The crowd grew larger and larger . Jesus said , “ The people who live today are evil . They ask for a miracle as a sign from God . But no miracle will be done to prove anything to them . The only sign will be the miracle that happened to Jonah .
42011030	Jonah was a sign for those who lived in Nineveh . It is the same with the Son of Man . He will be a sign for the people of this time .
42011031	“ On the judgment day , you people who live now will be compared with the queen of the South , and she will be a witness who shows how guilty you are . Why do I say this ? Because she traveled from far , far away to listen to Solomon’s wise teaching . And I tell you that someone greater than Solomon is right here , but you won’t listen !
42011032	“ On the judgment day , you people who live now will also be compared with the people from Nineveh , and they will be witnesses who show how guilty you are . I say this because when Jonah preached to those people , they changed their hearts and lives . And you are listening to someone greater than Jonah , but you refuse to change !
42011033	“ No one takes a light and puts it under a bowl or hides it . Instead , they put it on a lampstand so that the people who come in can see .
42011034	The only source of light for the body is the eye . When you look at people and want to help them , you are full of light . But when you look at people in a selfish way , you are full of darkness .
42011035	So be careful ! Don’t let the light in you become darkness .
42011036	If you are full of light , and there is no part of you that is dark , then you will be all bright , as though you have the light of a lamp shining on you . ”
42011037	After Jesus had finished speaking , a Pharisee asked Jesus to eat with him . So he went and took a place at the table .
42011038	But the Pharisee was surprised when he saw that Jesus did not wash his hands first before the meal .
42011039	The Lord said to him , “ The washing you Pharisees do is like cleaning only the outside of a cup or a dish . But what is inside you ? You want only to cheat and hurt people .
42011040	You are foolish ! The same one who made what is outside also made what is inside .
42011041	So pay attention to what is inside . Give to the people who need help . Then you will be fully clean .
42011042	“ But it will be bad for you Pharisees ! You give God a tenth of the food you get , even your mint , your rue , and every other little plant in your garden . But you forget to be fair to others and to love God . These are the things you should do . And you should also continue to do those other things .
42011043	“ It will be bad for you Pharisees because you love to have the most important seats in the synagogues . And you love for people to show respect to you in the marketplaces .
42011044	It will be bad for you , because you are like hidden graves . People walk on them without knowing it . ”
42011045	One of the experts in the law said to Jesus , “ Teacher , when you say these things about the Pharisees , you are criticizing our group too . ”
42011046	Jesus answered , “ It will be bad for you , you experts in the law ! You make strict rules that are very hard for people to obey . You try to force others to obey your rules . But you yourselves don’t even try to follow any of those rules .
42011047	It will be bad for you , because you build tombs for the prophets . But these are the same prophets your ancestors killed !
42011048	And now you show all people that you agree with what your ancestors did . They killed the prophets , and you build tombs for the prophets !
42011049	This is why God in his wisdom said , ‘ I will send prophets and apostles to them . Some of my prophets and apostles will be killed by evil men . Others will be treated badly . ’
42011050	“ So you people who live now will be punished for the deaths of all the prophets who were killed since the beginning of the world .
42011051	You will be punished for the killing of Abel . And you will be punished for the killing of Zechariah , who was killed between the altar and the Temple . Yes , I tell you that you people will be punished for them all .
42011052	“ It will be bad for you , you experts in the law ! You have taken away the key to learning about God . You yourselves would not learn , and you stopped others from learning too . ”
42011053	When Jesus went out , the teachers of the law and the Pharisees began to give him much trouble . They tried to make him answer questions about many things .
42011054	They were trying to find a way to catch Jesus saying something wrong .
42012001	Many thousands of people came together . There were so many people that they were stepping on each other . Before Jesus spoke to the people , he said to his followers , “ Be careful of the yeast of the Pharisees . I mean that they are hypocrites .
42012002	Everything that is hidden will be shown , and everything that is secret will be made known .
42012003	What you say in the dark will be told in the light . And what you whisper in a private room will be shouted from the top of the house . ”
42012004	Then Jesus said to the people , “ I tell you , my friends , don’t be afraid of people . They can kill the body , but after that they can do nothing more to hurt you .
42012005	I will show you the one to fear . You should fear God , who has the power to kill you and also to throw you into hell . Yes , he is the one you should fear .
42012006	“ When birds are sold , five small birds cost only two pennies . But God does not forget any of them .
42012007	Yes , God even knows how many hairs you have on your head . Don’t be afraid . You are worth much more than many birds .
42012008	“ I tell you , if you stand before others and are willing to say you believe in me , then I will say that you belong to me . I will say this in the presence of God’s angels .
42012009	But if you stand before others and say you do not believe in me , then I will say that you do not belong to me . I will say this in the presence of God’s angels .
42012010	“ Whoever says something against the Son of Man can be forgiven . But whoever speaks against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven .
42012011	“ When men bring you into the synagogues before the leaders and other important men , don’t worry about what you will say .
42012012	The Holy Spirit will teach you at that time what you should say . ”
42012013	One of the men in the crowd said to Jesus , “ Teacher , our father just died and left some things for us . Tell my brother to share them with me . ”
42012014	But Jesus said to him , “ Who said I should be your judge or decide how to divide your father’s things between you two ? ”
42012015	Then Jesus said to them , “ Be careful and guard against all kinds of greed . People do not get life from the many things they own . ”
42012016	Then Jesus used this story : “ There was a rich man who had some land . His land grew a very good crop of food .
42012017	He thought to himself , ‘ What will I do ? I have no place to keep all my crops . ’
42012018	“ Then he said , ‘ I know what I will do . I will tear down my barns and build bigger barns ! I will put all my wheat and good things together in my new barns .
42012019	Then I can say to myself , I have many good things stored . I have saved enough for many years . Rest , eat , drink , and enjoy life ! ’
42012020	“ But God said to that man , ‘ Foolish man ! Tonight you will die . So what about the things you prepared for yourself ? Who will get those things now ? ’
42012021	“ This is how it will be for anyone who saves things only for himself . To God that person is not rich . ”
42012022	Jesus said to his followers , “ So I tell you , don’t worry about the things you need to live — what you will eat or what you will wear .
42012023	Life is more important than food , and the body is more important than what you put on it .
42012024	Look at the birds . They don’t plant , harvest , or save food in houses or barns , but God feeds them . And you are worth much more than crows .
42012025	None of you can add any time to your life by worrying about it .
42012026	And if you can’t do the little things , why worry about the big things ?
42012027	“ Think about how the wildflowers grow . They don’t work or make clothes for themselves . But I tell you that even Solomon , the great and rich king , was not dressed as beautifully as one of these flowers .
42012028	If God makes what grows in the field so beautiful , what do you think he will do for you ? That’s just grass — one day it’s alive , and the next day someone throws it into a fire . But God cares enough to make it beautiful . Surely he will do much more for you . Your faith is so small !
42012029	“ So don’t always think about what you will eat or what you will drink . Don’t worry about it .
42012030	That’s what all those people who don’t know God are always thinking about . But your Father knows that you need these things .
42012031	What you should be thinking about is God’s kingdom . Then he will give you all these other things you need .
42012032	“ Don’t fear , little flock . Your Father wants to share his kingdom with you .
42012033	Sell the things you have and give that money to those who need it . This is the only way you can keep your riches from being lost . You will be storing treasure in heaven that lasts forever . Thieves can’t steal that treasure , and moths can’t destroy it .
42012034	Your heart will be where your treasure is .
42012035	“ Be ready ! Be fully dressed and have your lights shining .
42012036	Be like servants who are waiting for their master to come home from a wedding party . The master comes and knocks , and the servants immediately open the door for him .
42012037	When their master sees that they are ready and waiting for him , it will be a great day for those servants . I can tell you without a doubt , the master will get himself ready to serve a meal and tell the servants to sit down . Then he will serve them .
42012038	Those servants might have to wait until midnight or later for their master . But they will be glad they did when he comes in and finds them still waiting .
42012039	“ What would a homeowner do if he knew when a thief was coming ? You know he would not let the thief break in .
42012040	So you also must be ready , because the Son of Man will come at a time when you don’t expect him ! ”
42012041	Peter said , “ Lord , did you tell this story for us or for all people ? ”
42012042	The Lord said , “ Who is the wise and trusted servant ? The master trusts one servant to give the other servants their food at the right time . Who is the servant that the master trusts to do that work ?
42012043	When the master comes and finds him doing the work he gave him , it will be a day of blessing for that servant !
42012044	I can tell you without a doubt , the master will choose that servant to take care of everything he owns .
42012045	“ But what will happen if that servant is evil and thinks his master will not come back soon ? He will begin to beat the other servants , men and women . He will eat and drink until he has had too much .
42012046	Then the master will come when the servant is not ready , at a time when the servant is not expecting him . Then the master will punish that servant and send him away to be with the other people who don’t obey .
42012047	“ That servant knew what his master wanted him to do . But he did not make himself ready or try to do what his master wanted . So that servant will be punished very much !
42012048	But what about the servant who does not know what his master wants ? He also does things that deserve punishment . But he will get less punishment than the servant who knew what he should do . Whoever has been given much will be responsible for much . Much more will be expected from the one who has been given more . ”
42012049	Jesus continued speaking : “ I came to bring fire to the world . I wish it were already burning !
42012050	There is a kind of baptism that I must suffer through . I feel very troubled until it is finished .
42012051	Do you think I came to give peace to the world ? No , I came to divide the world !
42012052	From now on , a family of five will be divided , three against two , and two against three .
42012053	A father and son will be divided : The son will turn against his father . The father will turn against his son . A mother and her daughter will be divided : The daughter will turn against her mother . The mother will turn against her daughter . A mother-in-law and her daughter-in-law will be divided : The daughter-in-law will turn against her mother-in-law . The mother-in-law will turn against her daughter-in-law . ”
42012054	Then Jesus said to the people , “ When you see clouds growing bigger in the west , you say , ‘ A rainstorm is coming . ’ And soon it begins to rain .
42012055	When you feel the wind begin to blow from the south , you say , ‘ It will be a hot day . ’ And you are right .
42012056	You hypocrites ! You can understand the weather . Why don’t you understand what is happening now ?
42012057	“ Why can’t you decide for yourselves what is right ?
42012058	Suppose someone is suing you , and you are both going to court . Try hard to settle it on the way . If you don’t settle it , you may have to go before the judge . And the judge will hand you over to the officer , who will throw you into jail .
42012059	I tell you , you will not get out of there until you have paid every cent you owe . ”
42013001	Some people there with Jesus at that time told him about what had happened to some worshipers from Galilee . Pilate had them killed . Their blood was mixed with the blood of the animals they had brought for sacrificing .
42013002	Jesus answered , “ Do you think this happened to those people because they were more sinful than all other people from Galilee ?
42013003	No , they were not . But if you don’t decide now to change your lives , you will all be destroyed like those people !
42013004	And what about those 18 people who died when the tower of Siloam fell on them ? Do you think they were more sinful than everyone else in Jerusalem ?
42013005	They were not . But I tell you if you don’t decide now to change your lives , you will all be destroyed too ! ”
42013006	Jesus told this story : “ A man had a fig tree . He planted it in his garden . He came looking for some fruit on it , but he found none .
42013007	He had a servant who took care of his garden . So he said to his servant , ‘ I have been looking for fruit on this tree for three years , but I never find any . Cut it down ! Why should it waste the ground ? ’
42013008	But the servant answered , ‘ Master , let the tree have one more year to produce fruit . Let me dig up the dirt around it and fertilize it .
42013009	Maybe the tree will have fruit on it next year . If it still does not produce , then you can cut it down . ’ ”
42013010	Jesus taught in one of the synagogues on the Sabbath day .
42013011	A woman was there who had an evil spirit inside her . It had made the woman crippled for 18 years . Her back was always bent ; she could not stand up straight .
42013012	When Jesus saw her , he called to her , “ Woman , you have been made free from your sickness ! ”
42013013	He laid his hands on her , and immediately she was able to stand up straight . She began praising God .
42013014	The synagogue leader was angry because Jesus healed on the Sabbath day . He said to the people , “ There are six days for work . So come to be healed on one of those days . Don’t come for healing on the Sabbath day . ”
42013015	The Lord answered , “ You people are hypocrites ! All of you untie your work animals and lead them to drink water every day — even on the Sabbath day .
42013016	This woman that I healed is a true descendant of Abraham . But Satan has held her for 18 years . Surely it is not wrong for her to be made free from her sickness on a Sabbath day ! ”
42013017	When Jesus said this , all those who were criticizing him felt ashamed of themselves . And all the people were happy for the wonderful things he was doing .
42013018	Then Jesus said , “ What is God’s kingdom like ? What can I compare it to ?
42013019	God’s kingdom is like the seed of the mustard plant . Someone plants this seed in their garden . The seed grows and becomes a tree , and the birds build nests on its branches . ”
42013020	Jesus said again , “ What can I compare God’s kingdom with ?
42013021	It is like yeast that a woman mixes into a big bowl of flour to make bread . The yeast makes all the dough rise . ”
42013022	Jesus was teaching in every town and village . He continued to travel toward Jerusalem .
42013023	Someone said to him , “ Lord , how many people will be saved ? Only a few ? ” Jesus said ,
42013024	“ The door to heaven is narrow . Try hard to enter it . Many people will want to enter there , but they will not be able to go in .
42013025	If a man locks the door of his house , you can stand outside and knock on the door , but he won’t open it . You can say , ‘ Sir , open the door for us . ’ But he will answer , ‘ I don’t know you . Where did you come from ? ’
42013026	Then you will say , ‘ We ate and drank with you . You taught in the streets of our town . ’
42013027	Then he will say to you , ‘ I don’t know you . Where did you come from ? Get away from me ! You are all people who do wrong ! ’
42013028	“ You will see Abraham , Isaac , Jacob , and all the prophets in God’s kingdom . But you will be left outside . There you will cry and grind your teeth with pain .
42013029	People will come from the east , west , north , and south . They will sit down at the table in God’s kingdom .
42013030	People who have the lowest place in life now will have the highest place in God’s kingdom . And people who have the highest place now will have the lowest place in God’s kingdom . ”
42013031	Just then some Pharisees came to Jesus and said , “ Go away from here and hide . Herod wants to kill you ! ”
42013032	Jesus said to them , “ Go tell that fox , ‘ Today and tomorrow I am forcing demons out of people and finishing my work of healing . Then , the next day , the work will be finished . ’
42013033	After that I must go , because all prophets should die in Jerusalem .
42013034	“ Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! You kill the prophets . You stone to death the people God has sent to you . How many times I wanted to help your people . I wanted to gather them together as a hen gathers her chicks under her wings . But you did not let me .
42013035	Now your home will be left completely empty . I tell you , you will not see me again until that time when you will say , ‘ Welcome ! God bless the one who comes in the name of the Lord . ’ ”
42014001	On a Sabbath day , Jesus went to the home of a leading Pharisee to eat with him . The people there were all watching him very closely .
42014002	A man with a bad disease was there in front of him .
42014003	Jesus said to the Pharisees and experts in the law , “ Is it right or wrong to heal on the Sabbath day ? ”
42014004	But they would not answer his question . So he took the man and healed him . Then he sent the man away .
42014005	Jesus said to the Pharisees and teachers of the law , “ If your son or work animal falls into a well on the Sabbath day , you know you would pull him out immediately . ”
42014006	The Pharisees and teachers of the law could say nothing against what he said .
42014007	Then Jesus noticed that some of the guests were choosing the best places to sit . So he told this story :
42014008	“ When someone invites you to a wedding , don’t sit in the most important seat . They may have invited someone more important than you .
42014009	And if you are sitting in the most important seat , they will come to you and say , ‘ Give this man your seat ! ’ Then you will have to move down to the last place and be embarrassed .
42014010	“ So when someone invites you , go sit in the seat that is not important . Then they will come to you and say , ‘ Friend , move up here to this better place ! ’ What an honor this will be for you in front of all the other guests .
42014011	Everyone who makes themselves important will be made humble . But everyone who makes themselves humble will be made important . ”
42014012	Then Jesus said to the Pharisee who had invited him , “ When you give a lunch or a dinner , don’t invite only your friends , brothers , relatives , and rich neighbors . At another time they will pay you back by inviting you to eat with them .
42014013	Instead , when you give a feast , invite the poor , the crippled , and the blind .
42014014	Then you will have great blessings , because these people cannot pay you back . They have nothing . But God will reward you at the time when all godly people rise from death . ”
42014015	One of the men sitting at the table with Jesus heard these things . The man said to him , “ It will be a great blessing for anyone to eat a meal in God’s kingdom ! ”
42014016	Jesus said to him , “ A man gave a big dinner . He invited many people .
42014017	When it was time to eat , he sent his servant to tell the guests , ‘ Come . The food is ready . ’
42014018	But all the guests said they could not come . Each one made an excuse . The first one said , ‘ I have just bought a field , so I must go look at it . Please excuse me . ’
42014019	Another man said , ‘ I have just bought five pairs of work animals ; I must go and try them out . Please excuse me . ’
42014020	A third man said , ‘ I just got married ; I can’t come . ’
42014021	“ So the servant returned and told his master what happened . The master was angry . He said , ‘ Hurry ! Go into the streets and alleys of the town . Bring me the poor , the crippled , the blind , and the lame . ’
42014022	“ Later , the servant said to him , ‘ Master , I did what you told me to do , but we still have places for more people . ’
42014023	The master said to the servant , ‘ Go out to the highways and country roads . Tell the people there to come . I want my house to be full !
42014024	I tell you , not one of those people I invited first will eat any of this food I prepared . ’ ”
42014025	Many people were traveling with Jesus . He said to them ,
42014026	“ If you come to me but will not leave your family , you cannot be my follower . You must love me more than your father , mother , wife , children , brothers , and sisters — even more than your own life !
42014027	Whoever will not carry the cross that is given to them when they follow me cannot be my follower .
42014028	“ If you wanted to build a building , you would first sit down and decide how much it would cost . You must see if you have enough money to finish the job .
42014029	If you don’t do that , you might begin the work , but you would not be able to finish . And if you could not finish it , everyone would laugh at you .
42014030	They would say , ‘ This man began to build , but he was not able to finish . ’
42014031	“ If a king is going to fight against another king , first he will sit down and plan . If he has only 10,000 men , he will try to decide if he is able to defeat the other king who has 20,000 men .
42014032	If he thinks he cannot defeat the other king , he will send some men to ask for peace while that king’s army is still far away .
42014033	“ It is the same for each of you . You must leave everything you have to follow me . If not , you cannot be my follower .
42014034	“ Salt is a good thing . But if the salt loses its salty taste , you can’t make it salty again .
42014035	It is worth nothing . You can’t even use it as dirt or dung . People just throw it away . “ You people who hear me , listen ! ”
42015001	Many tax collectors and sinners came to listen to Jesus .
42015002	Then the Pharisees and the teachers of the law began to complain , “ Look , this man welcomes sinners and even eats with them ! ”
42015003	Then Jesus told them this story :
42015004	“ Suppose one of you has 100 sheep , but one of them gets lost . What will you do ? You will leave the other 99 sheep there in the field and go out and look for the lost sheep . You will continue to search for it until you find it .
42015005	And when you find it , you will be very happy . You will carry it
42015006	home , go to your friends and neighbors and say to them , ‘ Be happy with me because I found my lost sheep ! ’
42015007	In the same way , I tell you , heaven is a happy place when one sinner decides to change . There is more joy for that one sinner than for 99 good people who don’t need to change .
42015008	“ Suppose a woman has ten silver coins , but she loses one of them . She will take a light and clean the house . She will look carefully for the coin until she finds it .
42015009	And when she finds it , she will call her friends and neighbors and say to them , ‘ Be happy with me because I have found the coin that I lost ! ’
42015010	In the same way , it’s a happy time for the angels of God when one sinner decides to change . ”
42015011	Then Jesus said , “ There was a man who had two sons .
42015012	The younger son said to his father , ‘ Give me now the part of your property that I am supposed to receive someday . ’ So the father divided his wealth between his two sons .
42015013	“ A few days later the younger son gathered up all that he had and left . He traveled far away to another country , and there he wasted his money living like a fool .
42015014	After he spent everything he had , there was a terrible famine throughout the country . He was hungry and needed money .
42015015	So he went and got a job with one of the people who lived there . The man sent him into the fields to feed pigs .
42015016	He was so hungry that he wanted to eat the food the pigs were eating . But no one gave him anything .
42015017	“ The son realized that he had been very foolish . He thought , ‘ All my father’s hired workers have plenty of food . But here I am , almost dead because I have nothing to eat .
42015018	I will leave and go to my father . I will say to him : Father , I have sinned against God and have done wrong to you .
42015019	I am no longer worthy to be called your son . But let me be like one of your hired workers . ’
42015020	So he left and went to his father . “ While the son was still a long way off , his father saw him coming and felt sorry for him . So he ran to him and hugged and kissed him .
42015021	The son said , ‘ Father , I have sinned against God and have done wrong to you . I am no longer worthy to be called your son . ’
42015022	“ But the father said to his servants , ‘ Hurry ! Bring the best clothes and put them on him . Also , put a ring on his finger and good sandals on his feet .
42015023	And bring our best calf and kill it so that we can celebrate with plenty to eat .
42015024	My son was dead , but now he is alive again ! He was lost , but now he is found ! ’ So they began to have a party .
42015025	“ The older son had been out in the field . When he came near the house , he heard the sound of music and dancing .
42015026	So he called to one of the servant boys and asked , ‘ What does all this mean ? ’
42015027	The boy said , ‘ Your brother has come back , and your father killed the best calf to eat . He is happy because he has his son back safe and sound . ’
42015028	“ The older son was angry and would not go in to the party . So his father went out and begged him to come in .
42015029	But he said to his father , ‘ Look , for all these years I have worked like a slave for you . I have always done what you told me to do , and you never gave me even a young goat for a party with my friends .
42015030	But then this son of yours comes home after wasting your money on prostitutes , and you kill the best calf for him ! ’
42015031	“ His father said to him , ‘ Oh , my son , you are always with me , and everything I have is yours .
42015032	But this was a day to be happy and celebrate . Your brother was dead , but now he is alive . He was lost , but now he is found . ’ ”
42016001	Jesus said to his followers , “ Once there was a rich man . He hired a manager to take care of his business . Later , he learned that his manager was cheating him .
42016002	So he called the manager in and said to him , ‘ I have heard bad things about you . Give me a report of what you have done with my money . You can’t be my manager anymore . ’
42016003	“ So , the manager thought to himself , ‘ What will I do ? My master is taking my job away from me . I am not strong enough to dig ditches . I am too proud to beg .

42021025	“ Amazing things will happen to the sun , moon , and stars . And people all over the earth will be upset and confused by the noise of the sea and its crashing waves .
42021026	They will be afraid and worried about what will happen to the world . Everything in the sky will be changed .
42021027	Then people will see the Son of Man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
42021028	When these things begin to happen , stand up tall and don’t be afraid . Know that it is almost time for God to free you ! ”
42021029	Then Jesus told this story : “ Look at all the trees . The fig tree is a good example .
42021030	When it turns green , you know that summer is very near .
42021031	In the same way , when you see all these things happening , you will know that God’s kingdom is very near .
42021032	“ I assure you that all these things will happen while some of the people of this time are still living .
42021033	The whole world , earth and sky , will be destroyed , but my words will last forever .
42021034	“ Be careful not to spend your time having parties and getting drunk or worrying about this life . If you do that , you won’t be able to think straight , and the end might come when you are not ready .
42021035	It will come as a surprise to everyone on earth .
42021036	So be ready all the time . Pray that you will be able to get through all these things that will happen and stand safe before the Son of Man . ”
42021037	During the day Jesus taught the people in the Temple area . At night he went out of the city and stayed all night on the Mount of Olives .
42021038	Every morning all the people got up early to go listen to Jesus at the Temple .
42022001	It was almost time for the Jewish Festival of Unleavened Bread , called the Passover .
42022002	The leading priests and teachers of the law wanted to kill Jesus . But they were trying to find a quiet way to do it , because they were afraid of what the people would do .
42022003	One of Jesus’ twelve apostles was named Judas Iscariot . Satan entered him ,
42022004	and he went and talked with the leading priests and some of the soldiers who guarded the Temple . He talked to them about a way to hand Jesus over to them .
42022005	The priests were very happy about this . They promised to give Judas money for doing this .
42022006	He agreed . Then he waited for the best time to hand him over to them . He wanted to do it when no one was around to see it .
42022007	The Day of Unleavened Bread came . This was the day when the Jews always killed the lambs for the Passover .
42022008	Jesus said to Peter and John , “ Go and prepare the Passover meal for us to eat . ”

42023001	Then the whole group stood up and led Jesus away to Pilate .

43001001	Before the world began , the Word was there . The Word was with God , and the Word was God .
43001002	He was there with God in the beginning .
43001003	Everything was made through him , and nothing was made without him .
43001004	In him there was life , and that life was a light for the people of the world .
43001005	The light shines in the darkness , and the darkness has not defeated it .
43001006	There was a man named John , who was sent by God .
43001007	He came to tell people about the light . Through him all people could hear about the light and believe .
43001008	John was not the light . But he came to tell people about the light .
43001009	The true light was coming into the world . This is the true light that gives light to all people .
43001010	The Word was already in the world . The world was made through him , but the world did not know him .
43001011	He came to the world that was his own . And his own people did not accept him .
43001012	But some people did accept him . They believed in him , and he gave them the right to become children of God .
43001013	They became God’s children , but not in the way babies are usually born . It was not because of any human desire or plan . They were born from God himself .
43001014	The Word became a man and lived among us . We saw his divine greatness — the greatness that belongs to the only Son of the Father . The Word was full of grace and truth .
43001015	John told people about him . He said loudly , “ This is the one I was talking about when I said , ‘ The one who is coming after me is greater than I am , because he was living before I was even born . ’ ”
43001016	Yes , the Word was full of grace and truth , and from him we all received one blessing after another .
43001017	That is , the law was given to us through Moses , but grace and truth came through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No one has ever seen God . The only Son is the one who has shown us what God is like . He is himself God and is very close to the Father .

43001037	The two followers heard him say this , so they followed Jesus .

43001039	He answered , “ Come with me and you will see . ” So the two men went with him . They saw the place where he was staying , and they stayed there with him that day . It was about four o’clock .
43001040	These men followed Jesus after they had heard about him from John . One of them was Andrew , the brother of Simon Peter .

43002001	Two days later there was a wedding in the town of Cana in Galilee , and Jesus’ mother was there .
43002002	Jesus and his followers were also invited .
43002003	At the wedding there was not enough wine , so Jesus’ mother said to him , “ They have no more wine . ”

43002005	His mother said to the servants , “ Do what he tells you . ”
43002006	There were six large stone waterpots there that were used by the Jews in their washing ceremonies . Each one held about 20 or 30 gallons .
43002007	Jesus said to the servants , “ Fill the waterpots with water . ” So they filled them to the top .
43002008	Then he said to them , “ Now dip out some water and take it to the man in charge of the feast . ” So they did what he said .
43002009	Then the man in charge tasted it , but the water had become wine . He did not know where the wine had come from , but the servants who brought the water knew . He called the bridegroom
43002010	and said to him , “ People always serve the best wine first . Later , when the guests are drunk , they serve the cheaper wine . But you have saved the best wine until now . ”
43002011	This was the first of all the miraculous signs Jesus did . He did it in the town of Cana in Galilee . By this he showed his divine greatness , and his followers believed in him .
43002012	Then Jesus went to the town of Capernaum . His mother and brothers and his followers went with him . They all stayed there a few days .
43002013	It was almost time for the Jewish Passover , so Jesus went to Jerusalem .
43002014	There in the Temple area he saw men selling cattle , sheep , and doves . He saw others sitting at tables , exchanging and trading people’s money .
43002015	Jesus made a whip with some pieces of rope . Then he forced all these men and the sheep and cattle to leave the Temple area . He turned over the tables of the money traders and scattered their money .
43002016	Then he said to those who were selling pigeons , “ Take these things out of here ! Don’t make my Father’s house a place for buying and selling ! ”
43002017	When this happened , his followers remembered what was written in the Scriptures : “ My strong devotion to your Temple will destroy me . ”
43002018	Some Jews said to Jesus , “ Show us a miracle as a sign from God . Prove that you have the right to do these things . ”
43002019	Jesus answered , “ Destroy this temple and I will build it again in three days . ”
43002020	They answered , “ People worked 46 years to build this Temple ! Do you really believe you can build it again in three days ? ”
43002021	But the temple Jesus meant was his own body .
43002022	After he was raised from death , his followers remembered that he had said this . So they believed the Scriptures , and they believed the words Jesus said .
43002023	Jesus was in Jerusalem for the Passover festival . Many people believed in him because they saw the miraculous signs he did .
43002024	But Jesus did not trust them , because he knew how all people think .
43002025	He did not need anyone to tell him what a person was like . He already knew .
43003001	There was a man named Nicodemus , one of the Pharisees . He was an important Jewish leader .
43003002	One night he came to Jesus and said , “ Teacher , we know that you are a teacher sent from God . No one can do these miraculous signs that you do unless they have God’s help . ”
43003003	Jesus answered , “ I assure you , everyone must be born again . Anyone who is not born again cannot be in God’s kingdom . ”
43003004	Nicodemus said , “ How can a man who is already old be born again ? Can he go back into his mother’s womb and be born a second time ? ”
43003005	Jesus answered , “ Believe me when I say that everyone must be born from water and the Spirit . Anyone who is not born from water and the Spirit cannot enter God’s kingdom .
43003006	The only life people get from their human parents is physical . But the new life that the Spirit gives a person is spiritual .
43003007	Don’t be surprised that I told you , ‘ You must be born again . ’
43003008	The wind blows wherever it wants to . You hear it , but you don’t know where it is coming from or where it is going . It is the same with everyone who is born from the Spirit . ”
43003009	Nicodemus asked , “ How is all this possible ? ”
43003010	Jesus said , “ You are an important teacher of Israel , and you still don’t understand these things ?
43003011	The truth is , we talk about what we know . We tell about what we have seen . But you people don’t accept what we tell you .
43003012	I have told you about things here on earth , but you do not believe me . So I’m sure you will not believe me if I tell you about heavenly things !
43003013	The only one who has ever gone up to heaven is the one who came down from heaven — the Son of Man .
43003014	“ Moses lifted up the snake in the desert . It is the same with the Son of Man . He must be lifted up too .
43003015	Then everyone who believes in him can have eternal life . ”
43003016	Yes , God loved the world so much that he gave his only Son , so that everyone who believes in him would not be lost but have eternal life .
43003017	God sent his Son into the world . He did not send him to judge the world guilty , but to save the world through him .
43003018	People who believe in God’s Son are not judged guilty . But people who do not believe are already judged , because they have not believed in God’s only Son .
