43003019	They are judged by this fact : The light has come into the world . But they did not want light . They wanted darkness , because they were doing evil things .
43003020	Everyone who does evil hates the light . They will not come to the light , because the light will show all the bad things they have done .
43003021	But anyone who follows the true way comes to the light . Then the light will show that whatever they have done was done through God .
43003022	After this , Jesus and his followers went into the area of Judea . There he stayed with his followers and baptized people .
43003023	John was also baptizing people in Aenon , a place near Salim with plenty of water . People were going there to be baptized .
43003024	This was before John was put in prison .
43003025	Some of John’s followers had an argument with another Jew about religious washing .
43003026	Then they came to John and said , “ Teacher , remember the man who was with you on the other side of the Jordan River ? He is the one you were telling everyone about . He is also baptizing people , and many are going to him . ”
43003027	John answered , “ A person can receive only what God gives .
43003028	You yourselves heard me say , ‘ I am not the Messiah . I am only the one God sent to prepare the way for him . ’
43003029	The bride always belongs to the bridegroom . The friend who helps the bridegroom just waits and listens . He is happy just to hear the bridegroom talk . That’s how I feel now . I am so happy that he is here .
43003030	He must become more and more important , and I must become less important .
43003031	“ The one who comes from above is greater than all others . The one who is from the earth belongs to the earth . He talks about things that are on the earth . But the one who comes from heaven is greater than all others .
43003032	He tells what he has seen and heard , but people don’t accept what he says .
43003033	Whoever accepts what he says has given proof that God speaks the truth .
43003034	God sent him , and he tells people what God says . God gives him the Spirit fully .
43003035	The Father loves the Son and has given him power over everything .
43003036	Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life . But those who do not obey the Son will never have that life . They cannot get away from God’s anger . ”
43004001	Jesus learned that the Pharisees had heard the report that he was making and baptizing more followers than John .
43004002	( But really , Jesus himself did not baptize anyone ; his followers baptized people for him . )
43004003	So he left Judea and went back to Galilee .
43004004	On the way to Galilee , he had to go through the country of Samaria .
43004005	In Samaria Jesus came to the town called Sychar , which is near the field that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
43004006	Jacob’s well was there . Jesus was tired from his long trip , so he sat down beside the well . It was about noon .
43004007	A Samaritan woman came to the well to get some water , and Jesus said to her , “ Please give me a drink . ”
43004008	This happened while his followers were in town buying some food .
43004009	The woman answered , “ I am surprised that you ask me for a drink ! You are a Jew and I am a Samaritan woman ! ” ( Jews have nothing to do with Samaritans . )
43004010	Jesus answered , “ You don’t know what God can give you . And you don’t know who I am , the one who asked you for a drink . If you knew , you would have asked me , and I would have given you living water . ”
43004011	The woman said , “ Sir , where will you get that living water ? The well is very deep , and you have nothing to get water with .
43004012	Are you greater than our ancestor Jacob ? He is the one who gave us this well . He drank from it himself , and his sons and all his animals drank from it too . ”
43004013	Jesus answered , “ Everyone who drinks this water will be thirsty again .
43004014	But anyone who drinks the water I give will never be thirsty again . The water I give people will be like a spring flowing inside them . It will bring them eternal life . ”
43004015	The woman said to Jesus , “ Sir , give me this water . Then I will never be thirsty again and won’t have to come back here to get more water . ”
43004016	Jesus told her , “ Go get your husband and come back . ”
43004017	The woman answered , “ But I have no husband . ” Jesus said to her , “ You are right to say you have no husband .
43004018	That’s because , although you have had five husbands , the man you live with now is not your husband . That much was the truth . ”
43004019	The woman said , “ Sir , I can see that you are a prophet .
43004020	Our fathers worshiped on this mountain . But you Jews say that Jerusalem is the place where people must worship . ”
43004021	Jesus said , “ Believe me , woman ! The time is coming when you will not have to be in Jerusalem or on this mountain to worship the Father .
43004022	You Samaritans worship something you don’t understand . We Jews understand what we worship , since salvation comes from the Jews .
43004023	But the time is coming when the true worshipers will worship the Father in spirit and truth . In fact , that time is now here . And these are the kind of people the Father wants to be his worshipers .
43004024	God is spirit . So the people who worship him must worship in spirit and truth . ”
43004025	The woman said , “ I know that the Messiah is coming . ” ( He is the one called Christ . ) “ When he comes , he will explain everything to us . ”
43004026	Then Jesus said , “ He is talking to you now — I am the Messiah . ”
43004027	Just then Jesus’ followers came back from town . They were surprised because they saw Jesus talking with a woman . But none of them asked , “ What do you want ? ” or “ Why are you talking with her ? ”
43004028	Then the woman left her water jar and went back to town . She told the people there ,
43004029	“ A man told me everything I have ever done . Come see him . Maybe he is the Messiah . ”
43004030	So the people left the town and went to see Jesus .
43004031	While the woman was in town , Jesus’ followers were begging him , “ Teacher , eat something ! ”
43004032	But Jesus answered , “ I have food to eat that you know nothing about . ”
43004033	So the followers asked themselves , “ Did someone already bring him some food ? ”
43004034	Jesus said , “ My food is to do what the one who sent me wants me to do . My food is to finish the work that he gave me to do .
43004035	When you plant , you always say , ‘ Four more months to wait before we gather the grain . ’ But I tell you , open your eyes , and look at the fields . They are ready for harvesting now .
43004036	Even now , the people who harvest the crop are being paid . They are gathering crops for eternal life . So now the people who plant can be happy together with those who harvest .
43004037	It is true when we say , ‘ One person plants , but another person harvests the crop . ’
43004038	I sent you to harvest a crop that you did not work for . Others did the work , and you get the profit from their work . ”
43004039	Many of the Samaritan people in that town believed in Jesus . They believed because of what the woman had told them about him . She had told them , “ He told me everything I have ever done . ”
43004040	The Samaritans went to Jesus . They begged him to stay with them . So he stayed there two days .
43004041	Many more people became believers because of the things he said .
43004042	The people said to the woman , “ First we believed in Jesus because of what you told us . But now we believe because we heard him ourselves . We know now that he really is the one who will save the world . ”
43004043	Two days later Jesus left and went to Galilee .
43004044	( Jesus had said before that a prophet is not respected in his own country . )
43004045	When he arrived in Galilee , the people there welcomed him . They had been at the Passover festival in Jerusalem and had seen everything he did there .
43004046	Jesus went to visit Cana in Galilee again . Cana is where he had changed the water into wine . One of the king’s important officials lived in the city of Capernaum . This man’s son was sick .
43004047	The man heard that Jesus had come from Judea and was now in Galilee . So he went to Jesus and begged him to come to Capernaum and heal his son , who was almost dead .
43004048	Jesus said to him , “ You people must see miraculous signs and wonders before you will believe in me . ”
43004049	The king’s official said , “ Sir , come before my little son dies . ”
43004050	Jesus answered , “ Go . Your son will live . ” The man believed what Jesus told him and went home .
43004051	On the way home , the man’s servants came and met him . They said , “ Your son is well . ”
43004052	The man asked , “ What time did my son begin to get well ? ” They answered , “ It was about one o’clock yesterday when the fever left him . ”
43004053	The father knew that one o’clock was the same time that Jesus had said , “ Your son will live . ” So the man and everyone in his house believed in Jesus .
43004054	That was the second miraculous sign that Jesus did after coming from Judea to Galilee .
43005001	Later , Jesus went to Jerusalem for a special Jewish festival .
43005002	In Jerusalem there is a pool with five covered porches . In Aramaic it is called Bethzatha . This pool is near the Sheep Gate .
43005003	Many sick people were lying on the porches beside the pool . Some of them were blind , some were crippled , and some were paralyzed .
43005005	One of the men lying there had been sick for 38 years .
43005006	Jesus saw him lying there and knew that he had been sick for a very long time . So he asked him , “ Do you want to be well ? ”
43005007	The sick man answered , “ Sir , there is no one to help me get into the water when it starts moving . I try to be the first one into the water . But when I try , someone else always goes in before I can . ”
43005008	Then Jesus said , “ Stand up ! Pick up your mat and walk . ”
43005009	Immediately the man was well . He picked up his mat and started walking . The day all this happened was a Sabbath day .
43005010	So some Jews said to the man who had been healed , “ Today is the Sabbath . It is against our law for you to carry your mat on the Sabbath day . ”
43005011	But he answered , “ The man who made me well told me , ‘ Pick up your mat and walk . ’ ”
43005012	They asked him , “ Who is the man who told you to pick up your mat and walk ? ”
43005013	But the man who had been healed did not know who it was . There were many people there , and Jesus had left .
43005014	Later , Jesus found the man at the Temple and said to him , “ See , you are well now . But stop sinning or something worse may happen to you ! ”
43005015	Then the man left and went back to the Jews who questioned him . He told them that Jesus was the one who made him well .
43005016	Jesus was doing all this on the Sabbath day . So these Jews began trying to make him stop .
43005017	But he said to them , “ My Father never stops working , and so I work too . ”
43005018	This made them even more determined to kill him . They thought it was bad enough that he was breaking the law about the Sabbath day . And now he was saying that God is his Father , making himself equal with God !
43005019	But Jesus answered , “ I assure you that the Son can do nothing alone . He does only what he sees his Father doing . The Son does the same things that the Father does .
43005020	The Father loves the Son and shows him everything he does . This man was healed . But the Father will show the Son greater things than this to do . Then you will all be amazed .
43005021	The Father raises the dead and gives them life . In the same way , the Son gives life to those he wants to .
43005022	“ Also , the Father judges no one . He has given the Son power to do all the judging .
43005023	God did this so that all people will respect the Son the same as they respect the Father . Anyone who does not respect the Son does not respect the Father . He is the one who sent the Son .
43005024	“ I assure you , anyone who hears what I say and believes in the one who sent me has eternal life . They will not be judged guilty . They have already left death and have entered into life .
43005025	Believe me , an important time is coming . That time is already here . People who are dead will hear the voice of the Son of God . And those who listen will live .
43005026	Life comes from the Father himself . So the Father has also allowed the Son to give life .
43005027	And the Father has given him the power to judge all people because he is the Son of Man .
43005028	“ Don’t be surprised at this . A time is coming when all people who are dead and in their graves will hear his voice .
43005029	Then they will come out of their graves . Those who did good in this life will rise and have eternal life . But those who did evil will rise to be judged guilty .
43005030	“ I can do nothing alone . I judge only the way I am told . And my judgment is right , because I am not trying to please myself . I want only to please the one who sent me .
43005031	“ If I tell people about myself , they cannot be sure that what I say is true .
43005032	But there is someone else who tells people about me , and I know that what he says about me is true .
43005033	“ You sent men to John , and he told you what is true .
43005034	I don’t need anyone to tell people about me , but I remind you of what John said so that you can be saved .
43005035	John was like a lamp that burned and gave light , and you were happy to enjoy his light for a while .
43005036	“ But I have a proof about myself that is greater than anything John said . The things I do are my proof . These are what my Father gave me to do . They show that the Father sent me .
43005037	And the Father who sent me has given proof about me himself . But you have never heard his voice . You have never seen what he looks like .
43005038	The Father’s teaching does not live in you , because you don’t believe in the one the Father sent .
43005039	You carefully study the Scriptures . You think that they give you eternal life . These same Scriptures tell about me !
43005040	But you refuse to come to me to have that life .
43005041	“ I don’t want praise from you or any other human .
43005042	But I know you — I know that you have no love for God .
43005043	I have come from my Father and speak for him , but you don’t accept me . But when other people come speaking only for themselves , you accept them .
43005044	You like to have praise from each other . But you never try to get the praise that comes from the only God . So how can you believe ?
43005045	Don’t think that I will be the one to stand before the Father and accuse you . Moses is the one to accuse you . And he is the one you hoped would save you .
43005046	If you really believed Moses , you would believe me , because he wrote about me .
43005047	But you don’t believe what he wrote , so you can’t believe what I say . ”
43006001	Later , Jesus went across Lake Galilee ( also known as Lake Tiberias ) .
43006002	A great crowd of people followed him because they saw the miraculous signs he did in healing the sick .
43006003	Jesus went up on the side of the hill and sat there with his followers .
43006004	It was almost the time for the Jewish Passover festival .
43006005	Jesus looked up and saw a crowd of people coming toward him . He said to Philip , “ Where can we buy enough bread for all these people to eat ? ”
43006006	He asked Philip this question to test him . Jesus already knew what he planned to do .
43006007	Philip answered , “ We would all have to work a month to buy enough bread for each person here to have only a little piece ! ”
43006008	Another follower there was Andrew , the brother of Simon Peter . Andrew said ,
43006009	“ Here is a boy with five loaves of barley bread and two little fish . But that is not enough for so many people . ”
43006010	Jesus said , “ Tell everyone to sit down . ” This was a place with a lot of grass , and about 5000 men sat down there .
43006011	Jesus took the loaves of bread and gave thanks for them . Then he gave them to the people who were waiting to eat . He did the same with the fish . He gave them as much as they wanted .
43006012	They all had plenty to eat . When they finished , Jesus said to his followers , “ Gather the pieces of fish and bread that were not eaten . Don’t waste anything . ”
43006013	So they gathered up the pieces that were left . The people had started eating with only five loaves of barley bread . But the followers filled twelve large baskets with the pieces of food that were left .
43006014	The people saw this miraculous sign that Jesus did and said , “ He must be the Prophet who is coming into the world . ”
43006015	Jesus knew that the people planned to come get him and make him their king . So he left and went into the hills alone .
43006016	That evening Jesus’ followers went down to the lake .
43006017	It was dark now , and Jesus had not yet come back to them . They got into a boat and started going across the lake to Capernaum .
43006018	The wind was blowing very hard . The waves on the lake were becoming bigger .
43006019	They rowed the boat about three or four miles . Then they saw Jesus . He was walking on the water , coming to the boat . They were afraid .
43006020	But he said to them , “ Don’t be afraid . It’s me . ”
43006021	When he said this , they were glad to take him into the boat . And then the boat reached the shore at the place they wanted to go .
43006022	The next day came . Some people had stayed on the other side of the lake . They knew that Jesus did not go with his followers in the boat . They knew that the followers had left in the boat alone . And they knew it was the only boat that was there .
43006023	But then some boats from Tiberias came and landed near the place where the people had eaten the day before . This was where they had eaten the bread after the Lord gave thanks .
43006024	The people saw that Jesus and his followers were not there now . So they got into the boats and went to Capernaum to find Jesus .
43006025	The people found Jesus on the other side of the lake . They asked him , “ Teacher , when did you come here ? ”
43006026	He answered , “ Why are you looking for me ? Is it because you saw miraculous signs ? The truth is , you are looking for me because you ate the bread and were satisfied .
43006027	But earthly food spoils and ruins . So don’t work to get that kind of food . But work to get the food that stays good and gives you eternal life . The Son of Man will give you that food . He is the only one qualified by God the Father to give it to you . ”
43006028	The people asked Jesus , “ What does God want us to do ? ”
43006029	Jesus answered , “ The work God wants you to do is this : to believe in the one he sent . ”
43006030	So the people asked , “ What miraculous sign will you do for us ? If we can see you do a miracle , then we will believe you . What will you do ?
43006031	Our ancestors were given manna to eat in the desert . As the Scriptures say , ‘ He gave them bread from heaven to eat . ’ ”
43006032	Jesus said , “ I can assure you that Moses was not the one who gave your people bread from heaven . But my Father gives you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	God’s bread is the one who comes down from heaven and gives life to the world . ”
43006034	The people said , “ Sir , from now on give us bread like that . ”
43006035	Then Jesus said , “ I am the bread that gives life . No one who comes to me will ever be hungry . No one who believes in me will ever be thirsty .
43006036	I told you before that you have seen me , and still you don’t believe .
43006037	The Father gives me my people . Every one of them will come to me . I will always accept them .
43006038	I came down from heaven to do what God wants , not what I want .
43006039	I must not lose anyone God has given me . But I must raise them up on the last day . This is what the one who sent me wants me to do .
43006040	Everyone who sees the Son and believes in him has eternal life . I will raise them up on the last day . This is what my Father wants . ”
43006041	Some Jews began to complain about Jesus because he said , “ I am the bread that comes down from heaven . ”
43006042	They said , “ This is Jesus . We know his father and mother . He is only Joseph’s son . How can he say , ‘ I came down from heaven ’ ? ”
43006043	But Jesus said , “ Stop complaining to each other .
43006044	The Father is the one who sent me , and he is the one who brings people to me . I will raise them up on the last day . Anyone the Father does not bring to me cannot come to me .
43006045	It is written in the prophets : ‘ God will teach them all . ’ People listen to the Father and learn from him . They are the ones who come to me .
43006046	I don’t mean that there is anyone who has seen the Father . The only one who has ever seen the Father is the one who came from God . He has seen the Father .
43006047	“ I can assure you that anyone who believes has eternal life .
43006048	I am the bread that gives life .
43006049	Your ancestors ate the manna God gave them in the desert , but it didn’t keep them from dying .
43006050	Here is the bread that comes down from heaven . Whoever eats this bread will never die .
43006051	I am the living bread that came down from heaven . Whoever eats this bread will live forever . This bread is my body . I will give my body so that the people in the world can have life . ”
43006052	Then the Jews began to argue among themselves . They said , “ How can this man give us his body to eat ? ”
43006053	Jesus said , “ Believe me when I say that you must eat the body of the Son of Man , and you must drink his blood . If you don’t do this , you have no real life .
43006054	Those who eat my body and drink my blood have eternal life . I will raise them up on the last day .
43006055	My body is true food , and my blood is true drink .
43006056	Those who eat my body and drink my blood live in me , and I live in them .
43006057	“ The Father sent me . He lives , and I live because of him . So everyone who eats me will live because of me .
43006058	I am not like the bread that your ancestors ate . They ate that bread , but they still died . I am the bread that came down from heaven . Whoever eats this bread will live forever . ”
43006059	Jesus said all this while he was teaching in the synagogue in the city of Capernaum .
43006060	When Jesus’ followers heard this , many of them said , “ This teaching is hard . Who can accept it ? ”
43006061	Jesus already knew that his followers were complaining about this . So he said , “ Is this teaching a problem for you ?
43006062	Then what will you think when you see the Son of Man going up to where he came from ?
43006063	It is the Spirit that gives life . The body is of no value for that . But the things I have told you are from the Spirit , so they give life .
43006064	But some of you don’t believe . ” ( Jesus knew the people who did not believe . He knew this from the beginning . And he knew the one who would hand him over to his enemies . )
43006065	Jesus said , “ That is why I said , ‘ Anyone the Father does not help to come to me cannot come . ’ ”
43006066	After Jesus said these things , many of his followers left and stopped following him .
43006067	Jesus asked the twelve apostles , “ Do you want to leave too ? ”
43006068	Simon Peter answered him , “ Lord , where would we go ? You have the words that give eternal life .
43006069	We believe in you . We know that you are the Holy One from God . ”
43006070	Then Jesus answered , “ I chose all twelve of you . But one of you is a devil . ”
43006071	He was talking about Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot . Judas was one of the twelve apostles , but later he would hand Jesus over to his enemies .
43007001	After this , Jesus traveled around the country of Galilee . He did not want to travel in Judea , because the Jewish leaders there wanted to kill him .
43007002	It was time for the Jewish Festival of Shelters .
43007003	So his brothers said to him , “ You should leave here and go to the festival in Judea . Then your followers there can see the miracles you do .
43007004	If you want to be well known , you must not hide what you do . So , if you can do such amazing things , let the whole world see you do them . ”
43007005	Jesus’ brothers said this because even they did not believe in him .
43007006	Jesus said to them , “ The right time for me has not yet come , but any time is right for you to go .
43007007	The world cannot hate you . But the world hates me , because I tell the people in the world that they do evil things .
43007008	So you go to the festival . I will not go now , because the right time for me has not yet come . ”
43007009	After Jesus said this , he stayed in Galilee .
43007010	So his brothers left to go to the festival . After they left , Jesus went too , but he did not let people see him .
43007011	At the festival the Jewish leaders were looking for him . They said , “ Where is that man ? ”
43007012	There was a large group of people there . Many of them were talking secretly to each other about Jesus . Some people said , “ He is a good man . ” But others said , “ No , he fools the people . ”
43007013	But no one was brave enough to talk about him openly . They were afraid of the Jewish leaders .
43007014	When the festival was about half finished , Jesus went to the Temple area and began to teach .
43007015	The Jewish leaders were amazed and said , “ How did this man learn so much ? He never had the kind of teaching we had ! ”
43007016	Jesus answered , “ What I teach is not my own . My teaching comes from the one who sent me .
43007017	People who really want to do what God wants will know that my teaching comes from God . They will know that this teaching is not my own .
43007018	If I taught my own ideas , I would just be trying to get honor for myself . But if I am trying to bring honor to the one who sent me , I can be trusted . Anyone doing that is not going to lie .
43007019	Moses gave you the law , right ? But you don’t obey that law . If you do , then why are you trying to kill me ? ”
43007020	The people answered , “ A demon is making you crazy ! We are not trying to kill you . ”
43007021	Jesus said to them , “ I did one miracle on a Sabbath day , and you were all surprised .
43007022	But you obey the law Moses gave you about circumcision — and sometimes you do it on a Sabbath day . ( Really , Moses is not the one who gave you circumcision . It came from our ancestors who lived before Moses . ) Yes , you often circumcise baby boys on a Sabbath day .
43007023	This shows that someone can be circumcised on a Sabbath day to obey the Law of Moses . So why are you angry with me for healing a person’s whole body on the Sabbath day ?
43007024	Stop judging by the way things look . Be fair and judge by what is really right . ”
43007025	Then some of the people who lived in Jerusalem said , “ This is the man they are trying to kill .
43007026	But he is teaching where everyone can see and hear him . And no one is trying to stop him from teaching . Maybe the leaders have decided that he really is the Messiah .
43007027	But when the real Messiah comes , no one will know where he comes from . And we know where this man’s home is . ”
43007028	Jesus was still teaching in the Temple area when he said loudly , “ Do you really know me and where I am from ? I am here , but not by my own decision . I was sent by one who is very real . But you don’t know him .
43007029	I know him because I am from him . He is the one who sent me . ”
43007030	When Jesus said this , the people tried to grab him . But no one was able even to touch him , because the right time for him had not yet come .
43007031	But many of the people believed in Jesus . They said , “ We are waiting for the Messiah to come . When he comes , will he do more miraculous signs than this man has done ? ”
43007032	The Pharisees heard what the people were saying about Jesus . So the leading priests and the Pharisees sent some Temple police to arrest him .
43007033	Then Jesus said , “ I will be with you a little while longer . Then I will go back to the one who sent me .
43007034	You will look for me , but you will not find me . And you cannot come where I am . ”
43007035	These Jews said to each other , “ Where will this man go that we cannot find him ? Will he go to the Greek cities where our people live ? Will he teach the Greek people there ?
43007036	He says , ‘ You will look for me , but you will not find me . ’ He also says , ‘ You cannot come where I am . ’ What does this mean ? ”
43007037	The last day of the festival came . It was the most important day . On that day Jesus stood up and said loudly , “ Whoever is thirsty may come to me and drink .
43007038	If anyone believes in me , rivers of living water will flow out from their heart . That is what the Scriptures say . ”
43007039	Jesus was talking about the Spirit . The Spirit had not yet been given to people , because Jesus had not yet been raised to glory . But later , those who believed in Jesus would receive the Spirit .
43007040	When the people heard the things that Jesus said , some of them said , “ This man really is the Prophet . ”
43007041	Other people said , “ He is the Messiah . ” And others said , “ The Messiah will not come from Galilee .
43007042	The Scriptures say that the Messiah will come from the family of David . And they say that he will come from Bethlehem , the town where David lived . ”
43007043	So the people did not agree with each other about Jesus .
43007044	Some of the people wanted to arrest him . But no one tried to do it .
43007045	The Temple police went back to the leading priests and the Pharisees . The priests and the Pharisees asked , “ Why didn’t you bring Jesus ? ”
43007046	The Temple police answered , “ We have never heard anyone say such amazing things ! ”
43007047	The Pharisees answered , “ So he has fooled you too !
43007048	You don’t see any of the leaders or any of us Pharisees believing in him , do you ?
43007049	But those people out there know nothing about the law . They are under God’s curse ! ”
43007050	But Nicodemus was there in that group . He was the one who had gone to see Jesus before . He said ,
43007051	“ Our law will not let us judge anyone without first hearing them and finding out what they have done . ”
43007052	The Jewish leaders answered , “ You must be from Galilee too ! Study the Scriptures . You will find nothing about a prophet coming from Galilee . ”
43007053	Then they all left and went home .
43008001	Jesus went to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	Early in the morning he went back to the Temple area . The people all came to him , and he sat and taught them .
43008003	The teachers of the law and the Pharisees brought a woman they had caught in bed with a man who was not her husband . They forced her to stand in front of the people .
43008004	They said to Jesus , “ Teacher , this woman was caught in the act of adultery .
43008005	The Law of Moses commands us to stone to death any such woman . What do you say we should do ? ”
43008006	They were saying this to trick Jesus . They wanted to catch him saying something wrong so that they could have a charge against him . But Jesus stooped down and started writing on the ground with his finger .
43008007	The Jewish leaders continued to ask him their question . So he stood up and said , “ Anyone here who has never sinned should throw the first stone at her . ”
43008008	Then Jesus stooped down again and wrote on the ground .
43008009	When they heard this , they began to leave one by one . The older men left first , and then the others . Jesus was left alone with the woman standing there in front of him .
43008010	He looked up again and said to her , “ Where did they all go ? Did no one judge you guilty ? ”
43008011	She answered , “ No one , sir . ” Then Jesus said , “ I don’t judge you either . You can go now , but don’t sin again . ”
43008012	Later , Jesus talked to the people again . He said , “ I am the light of the world . Whoever follows me will never live in darkness . They will have the light that gives life . ”
43008013	But the Pharisees said to Jesus , “ When you talk about yourself , you are the only one to say that these things are true . So we cannot accept what you say . ”
43008014	Jesus answered , “ Yes , I am saying these things about myself . But people can believe what I say , because I know where I came from . And I know where I am going . But you don’t know where I came from or where I am going .
43008015	You judge me the way people judge other people . I don’t judge anyone .
43008016	But if I judge , my judging is true , because when I judge I am not alone . The Father who sent me is with me .
43008017	Your own law says that when two witnesses say the same thing , you must accept what they say .
43008018	I am one of the witnesses who speaks about myself . And the Father who sent me is my other witness . ”
43008019	The people asked , “ Where is your father ? ” Jesus answered , “ You don’t know me or my Father . But if you knew me , you would know my Father too . ”
43008020	Jesus said these things while he was teaching in the Temple area , near the room where the Temple offerings were kept . But no one arrested him , because the right time for him had not yet come .
43008021	Again , Jesus said to the people , “ I will leave you . You will look for me , but you will die in your sin . You cannot come where I am going . ”
43008022	So the Jewish leaders asked themselves , “ Will he kill himself ? Is that why he said , ‘ You cannot come where I am going ’ ? ”
43008023	But Jesus said to them , “ You people are from here below , but I am from above . You belong to this world , but I don’t belong to this world .
43008024	I told you that you would die in your sins . Yes , if you don’t believe that I AM , you will die in your sins . ”
43008025	They asked , “ Then who are you ? ” Jesus answered , “ I am what I have told you from the beginning .
43008026	I have much more I could say to judge you . But I tell people only what I have heard from the one who sent me , and he speaks the truth . ”
43008027	They did not understand who he was talking about . He was telling them about the Father .
43008028	So he said to them , “ You will lift up the Son of Man . Then you will know that I AM . You will know that whatever I do is not by my own authority . You will know that I say only what the Father has taught me .
43008029	The one who sent me is with me . I always do what pleases him . So he has not left me alone . ”
43008030	While he was saying these things , many people believed in him .
43008031	So Jesus said to the Jews who believed in him , “ If you continue to accept and obey my teaching , you are really my followers .
43008032	You will know the truth , and the truth will make you free . ”
43008033	They answered , “ We are Abraham’s descendants . And we have never been slaves . So why do you say that we will be free ? ”
43008034	Jesus said , “ The truth is , everyone who sins is a slave — a slave to sin .
43008035	A slave does not stay with a family forever . But a son belongs to the family forever .
43008036	So if the Son makes you free , you are really free .
43008037	I know you are Abraham’s descendants . But you want to kill me , because you don’t want to accept my teaching .
43008038	I am telling you what my Father has shown me . But you do what your father has told you . ”
43008039	They said , “ Our father is Abraham . ” Jesus said , “ If you were really Abraham’s descendants , you would do what Abraham did .
43008040	I am someone who has told you the truth I heard from God . But you are trying to kill me . Abraham did nothing like that .
43008041	So you are doing what your own father did . ” But they said , “ We are not like children who never knew who their father was . God is our Father . He is the only Father we have . ”
43008042	Jesus said to them , “ If God were really your Father , you would love me . I came from God , and now I am here . I did not come by my own authority . God sent me .
43008043	You don’t understand the things I say , because you cannot accept my teaching .
43008044	Your father is the devil . You belong to him . You want to do what he wants . He was a murderer from the beginning . He was always against the truth . There is no truth in him . He is like the lies he tells . Yes , the devil is a liar . He is the father of lies .
43008045	“ I am telling you the truth , and that’s why you don’t believe me .
43008046	Can any of you prove that I am guilty of sin ? If I tell the truth , why don’t you believe me ?
43008047	Whoever belongs to God accepts what he says . But you don’t accept what God says , because you don’t belong to God . ”
43008048	The Jews there answered , “ We say you are a Samaritan . We say a demon is making you crazy ! Are we not right when we say this ? ”
43008049	Jesus answered , “ I have no demon in me . I give honor to my Father , but you give no honor to me .
43008050	I am not trying to get honor for myself . There is one who wants this honor for me . He is the judge .
43008051	I promise you , whoever continues to obey my teaching will never die . ”
43008052	The Jews said to Jesus , “ Now we know that you have a demon in you ! Even Abraham and the prophets died . But you say , ‘ Whoever obeys my teaching will never die . ’
43008053	Do you think you are greater than our father Abraham ? He died , and so did the prophets . Who do you think you are ? ”
43008054	Jesus answered , “ If I give honor to myself , that honor is worth nothing . The one who gives me honor is my Father . And you say that he is your God .
43008055	But you don’t really know him . I know him . If I said I did not know him , I would be a liar like you . But I do know him , and I obey what he says .
43008056	Your father Abraham was very happy that he would see the day when I came . He saw that day and was happy . ”
43008057	The Jews said to Jesus , “ What ? How can you say you have seen Abraham ? You are not even 50 years old ! ”
43008058	Jesus answered , “ The fact is , before Abraham was born , I AM . ”
43008059	When he said this , they picked up stones to throw at him . But Jesus hid , and then he left the Temple area .
43009001	While Jesus was walking , he saw a man who had been blind since the time he was born .
43009002	Jesus’ followers asked him , “ Teacher , why was this man born blind ? Whose sin made it happen ? Was it his own sin or that of his parents ? ”
43009003	Jesus answered , “ It was not any sin of this man or his parents that caused him to be blind . He was born blind so that he could be used to show what great things God can do .
43009004	While it is daytime , we must continue doing the work of the one who sent me . The night is coming , and no one can work at night .
43009005	While I am in the world , I am the light of the world . ”
43009006	After Jesus said this , he spit on the dirt , made some mud and put it on the man’s eyes .
43009007	Jesus told him , “ Go and wash in Siloam pool . ” ( Siloam means “ Sent . ” ) So the man went to the pool , washed and came back . He was now able to see .
43009008	His neighbors and some others who had seen him begging said , “ Look ! Is this the same man who always sits and begs ? ”
43009009	Some people said , “ Yes ! He is the one . ” But others said , “ No , he can’t be the same man . He only looks like him . ” So the man himself said , “ I am that same man . ”
43009010	They asked , “ What happened ? How did you get your sight ? ”
43009011	He answered , “ The man they call Jesus made some mud and put it on my eyes . Then he told me to go to Siloam and wash . So I went there and washed . And then I could see . ”
43009012	They asked him , “ Where is this man ? ” He answered , “ I don’t know . ”
43009013	Then the people brought the man to the Pharisees .
43009014	The day Jesus had made mud and healed the man’s eyes was a Sabbath day .
43009015	So the Pharisees asked the man , “ How did you get your sight ? ” He answered , “ He put mud on my eyes . I washed , and now I can see . ”
43009016	Some of the Pharisees said , “ That man does not obey the law about the Sabbath day . So he is not from God . ” Others said , “ But someone who is a sinner cannot do these miraculous signs . ” So they could not agree with each other .
43009017	They asked the man again , “ Since it was your eyes he healed , what do you say about him ? ” He answered , “ He is a prophet . ”
43009018	The Jewish leaders still did not believe that this really happened to the man — that he was blind and was now healed . But later they sent for his parents .
43009019	They asked them , “ Is this your son ? You say he was born blind . So how can he see ? ”
43009020	His parents answered , “ We know that this man is our son . And we know that he was born blind .
43009021	But we don’t know why he can see now . We don’t know who healed his eyes . Ask him . He is old enough to answer for himself . ”
43009022	They said this because they were afraid of the Jewish leaders . The leaders had already decided that they would punish anyone who said Jesus was the Messiah . They would stop them from coming to the synagogue .
43009023	That is why his parents said , “ He is old enough . Ask him . ”
43009024	So the Jewish leaders called the man who had been blind . They told him to come in again . They said , “ You should honor God by telling the truth . We know that this man is a sinner . ”
43009025	The man answered , “ I don’t know if he is a sinner . But I do know this : I was blind , and now I can see . ”
43009026	They asked , “ What did he do to you ? How did he heal your eyes ? ”
43009027	He answered , “ I have already told you that . But you would not listen to me . Why do you want to hear it again ? Do you want to be his followers too ? ”
43009028	At this they shouted insults at him and said , “ You are his follower , not us ! We are followers of Moses .
43009029	We know that God spoke to Moses . But we don’t even know where this man comes from ! ”
43009030	The man answered , “ This is really strange ! You don’t know where he comes from , but he healed my eyes .
43009031	We all know that God does not listen to sinners , but he will listen to anyone who worships and obeys him .
43009032	This is the first time we have ever heard of anyone healing the eyes of someone born blind .
43009033	This man must be from God . If he were not from God , he could not do anything like this . ”
43009034	The Jewish leaders answered , “ You were born full of sin ! Are you trying to teach us ? ” And they told the man to get out of the synagogue and to stay out .
43009035	When Jesus heard that they had forced the man to leave , he found him and asked him , “ Do you believe in the Son of Man ? ”
43009036	The man said , “ Tell me who he is , sir , so I can believe in him . ”
43009037	Jesus said to him , “ You have already seen him . The Son of Man is the one talking with you now . ”
43009038	The man answered , “ Yes , I believe , Lord ! ” Then he bowed and worshiped Jesus .
43009039	Jesus said , “ I came into this world so that the world could be judged . I came so that people who are blind could see . And I came so that people who think they see would become blind . ”
43009040	Some of the Pharisees were near Jesus . They heard him say this . They asked , “ What ? Are you saying that we are blind too ? ”
43009041	Jesus said , “ If you were really blind , you would not be guilty of sin . But you say that you see , so you are still guilty . ”
43010001	Jesus said , “ It is certainly true that when a man enters the sheep pen , he should use the gate . If he climbs in some other way , he is a robber . He is trying to steal the sheep .
43010002	But the man who takes care of the sheep enters through the gate . He is the shepherd .
43010003	The man who guards the gate opens the gate for the shepherd . And the sheep listen to the voice of the shepherd . He calls his own sheep , using their names , and he leads them out .
43010004	He brings all of his sheep out . Then he goes ahead of them and leads them . The sheep follow him , because they know his voice .
43010005	But sheep will never follow someone they don’t know . They will run away from him , because they don’t know his voice . ”
43010006	Jesus told the people this story , but they did not understand what it meant .
43010007	So Jesus said again , “ I assure you , I am the gate for the sheep .
43010008	All those who came before me were thieves and robbers . The sheep did not listen to them .
43010009	I am the gate . Whoever enters through me will be saved . They will be able to come in and go out . They will find everything they need .
43010010	A thief comes to steal , kill , and destroy . But I came to give life — life that is full and good .
43010011	“ I am the good shepherd , and the good shepherd gives his life for the sheep .
43010012	The worker who is paid to keep the sheep is different from the shepherd . The paid worker does not own the sheep . So when he sees a wolf coming , he runs away and leaves the sheep alone . Then the wolf attacks the sheep and scatters them .
43010013	The man runs away because he is only a paid worker . He does not really care for the sheep .
43010016	I have other sheep too . They are not in this flock here . I must lead them also . They will listen to my voice . In the future there will be one flock and one shepherd .
43010017	The Father loves me because I give my life . I give my life so that I can get it back again .
43010018	No one takes my life away from me . I give my own life freely . I have the right to give my life , and I have the right to get it back again . This is what the Father told me . ”
43010019	Again the Jews were divided over what Jesus was saying .
43010020	Many of them said , “ A demon has come into him and made him crazy . Why listen to him ? ”
43010021	But others said , “ These aren’t the words of someone controlled by a demon . A demon cannot heal the eyes of a blind man . ”
43010022	It was winter , and the time came for the Festival of Dedication at Jerusalem .
43010023	Jesus was in the Temple area at Solomon’s Porch .
43010024	The Jewish leaders gathered around him . They said , “ How long will you make us wonder about you ? If you are the Messiah , then tell us clearly . ”
43010025	Jesus answered , “ I told you already , but you did not believe . I do miracles in my Father’s name . These miracles show who I am .
43010026	But you do not believe , because you are not my sheep .
43010027	My sheep listen to my voice . I know them , and they follow me .
43010028	I give my sheep eternal life . They will never die , and no one can take them out of my hand .
43010029	My Father is the one who gave them to me , and he is greater than all . No one can steal my sheep out of his hand .
43010030	The Father and I are one . ”
43010031	Again the Jews there picked up stones to kill Jesus .
43010032	But he said to them , “ The many wonderful things you have seen me do are from the Father . Which of these good things are you killing me for ? ”
43010033	They answered , “ We are not killing you for any good thing you did . But you say things that insult God . You are only a man , but you say you are the same as God ! That is why we are trying to kill you ! ”
43010034	Jesus answered , “ It is written in your law that God said , ‘ I said you are gods . ’
43010035	This Scripture called those people gods — the people who received God’s message . And Scripture is always true .
43010036	So why do you accuse me of insulting God for saying , ‘ I am God’s Son ’ ? I am the one God chose and sent into the world .
43010037	If I don’t do what my Father does , then don’t believe what I say .
43010038	But if I do what my Father does , you should believe in what I do . You might not believe in me , but you should believe in the things I do . Then you will know and understand that the Father is in me and I am in the Father . ”
43010039	They tried to get Jesus again , but he escaped from them .
43010040	Then he went back across the Jordan River to the place where John began his work of baptizing people . Jesus stayed there ,
43010041	and many people came to him . They said , “ John never did any miraculous signs , but everything John said about this man is true . ”
43010042	And many people there believed in Jesus .
43011001	There was a man named Lazarus who was sick . He lived in the town of Bethany , where Mary and her sister Martha lived .
43011002	( Mary is the same woman who put perfume on the Lord and wiped his feet with her hair . ) Mary’s brother was Lazarus , the man who was now sick .
43011003	So Mary and Martha sent someone to tell Jesus , “ Lord , your dear friend Lazarus is sick . ”
43011004	When Jesus heard this he said , “ The end of this sickness will not be death . No , this sickness is for the glory of God . This has happened to bring glory to the Son of God . ”
43011005	Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus .
43011006	So when he heard that Lazarus was sick , he stayed where he was two more days
43011007	and then said to his followers , “ We should go back to Judea . ”
43011008	They answered , “ But Teacher , those Jews there tried to stone you to death . That was only a short time ago . Now you want to go back there ? ”
43011009	Jesus answered , “ There are twelve hours of light in the day . Whoever walks in the day will not stumble and fall because they can see with the light from the sun .
43011010	But whoever walks at night will stumble because there is no light . ”
43011011	Then Jesus said , “ Our friend Lazarus is now sleeping , but I am going there to wake him . ”
43011012	The followers answered , “ But , Lord , if he can sleep , he will get well . ”
43011013	They thought Jesus meant that Lazarus was literally sleeping , but he really meant that Lazarus was dead .
43011014	So then Jesus said plainly , “ Lazarus is dead .
43011015	And I am glad I was not there . I am happy for you because now you will believe in me . We will go to him now . ”
43011016	Then Thomas , the one called “ Twin , ” said to the other followers , “ We will go too . We will die there with Jesus . ”
43011017	Jesus arrived in Bethany and found that Lazarus had already been dead and in the tomb for four days .
43011018	Bethany was about two miles from Jerusalem .
43011019	Many Jews had come to see Martha and Mary . They came to comfort them about their brother Lazarus .
43011020	When Martha heard that Jesus was coming , she went out to greet him . But Mary stayed home .
43011021	Martha said to Jesus , “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died .
43011022	But I know that even now God will give you anything you ask . ”
43011023	Jesus said , “ Your brother will rise and be alive again . ”
43011024	Martha answered , “ I know that he will rise to live again at the time of the resurrection on the last day . ”
43011025	Jesus said to her , “ I am the resurrection . I am life . Everyone who believes in me will have life , even if they die .
43011026	And everyone who lives and believes in me will never really die . Martha , do you believe this ? ”
43011027	Martha answered , “ Yes , Lord . I believe that you are the Messiah , the Son of God . You are the one who was coming to the world . ”
43011028	After Martha said these things , she went back to her sister Mary . She talked to Mary alone and said , “ The Teacher is here . He is asking for you . ”
43011029	When Mary heard this , she stood up and went quickly to Jesus .
43011030	He had not yet come into the village . He was still at the place where Martha met him .
43011031	The Jews who were in the house comforting Mary saw her get up and leave quickly . They thought she was going to the tomb to cry there . So they followed her .
43011032	Mary went to the place where Jesus was . When she saw him , she bowed at his feet and said , “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died . ”
43011033	When Jesus saw Mary crying and the people with her crying too , he was very upset and deeply troubled .
43011034	He asked , “ Where did you put him ? ” They said , “ Lord , come and see . ”
43011035	Jesus cried .
43011036	And the Jews said , “ Look ! He loved Lazarus very much ! ”
43011037	But some of them said , “ Jesus healed the eyes of the blind man . Why didn’t he help Lazarus and stop him from dying ? ”
43011038	Again feeling very upset , Jesus came to the tomb . It was a cave with a large stone covering the entrance .
43011039	He said , “ Move the stone away . ” Martha said , “ But , Lord , it has been four days since Lazarus died . There will be a bad smell . ” Martha was the sister of the dead man .
43011040	Then Jesus said to her , “ Remember what I told you ? I said that if you believed , you would see God’s divine greatness . ”
43011041	So they moved the stone away from the entrance . Then Jesus looked up and said , “ Father , I thank you that you heard me .
43011042	I know that you always hear me . But I said these things because of the people here around me . I want them to believe that you sent me . ”
43011043	After Jesus said this he called in a loud voice , “ Lazarus , come out ! ”
43011044	The dead man came out . His hands and feet were wrapped with pieces of cloth . He had a handkerchief covering his face . Jesus said to the people , “ Take off the cloth and let him go . ”
43011045	There were many Jews who came to visit Mary . When they saw what Jesus did , many of them believed in him .
43011046	But some of them went to the Pharisees and told them what Jesus did .
43011047	Then the leading priests and Pharisees called a meeting of the high council . They said , “ What should we do ? This man is doing many miraculous signs .
43011048	If we let him continue doing these things , everyone will believe in him . Then the Romans will come and take away our Temple and our nation . ”
43011049	One of the men there was Caiaphas . He was the high priest that year . He said , “ You people know nothing !
43011050	It is better for one man to die for the people than for the whole nation to be destroyed . But you don’t realize this . ”
43011051	Caiaphas did not think of this himself . As that year’s high priest , he was really prophesying that Jesus would die for the Jewish people .
43011052	Yes , he would die for the Jewish people . But he would also die for God’s other children scattered all over the world . He would die to bring them all together and make them one people .
43011053	That day the Jewish leaders began planning to kill Jesus .
43011054	So Jesus stopped traveling around openly among the Jews . He went away to a town called Ephraim in an area near the desert . He stayed there with his followers .
43011055	It was almost time for the Jewish Passover festival . Many people from the country went to Jerusalem before the Passover . They went to do the special things to make themselves pure for the festival .
43011056	The people looked for Jesus . They stood in the Temple area and asked each other , “ Is he coming to the festival ? What do you think ? ”
43011057	But the leading priests and the Pharisees had given a special order about Jesus . They said that anyone who knew where he was must tell them so that they could arrest him .
43012001	Six days before the Passover festival , Jesus went to Bethany . That is where Lazarus lived , the man Jesus raised from death .
43012002	There they had a dinner for Jesus . Martha served the food , and Lazarus was one of the people eating with Jesus .
43012003	Mary brought in a pint of expensive perfume made of pure nard . She poured the perfume on Jesus’ feet . Then she wiped his feet with her hair . And the sweet smell from the perfume filled the whole house .
43012004	Judas Iscariot , one of Jesus’ followers , was there — the one who would later hand Jesus over to his enemies . Judas said ,
43012005	“ That perfume was worth a full year’s pay . It should have been sold , and the money should have been given to the poor people . ”
43012006	But Judas did not really care about the poor . He said this because he was a thief . He was the one who kept the moneybag for the group of followers . And he often stole money from the bag .
43012007	Jesus answered , “ Don’t stop her . It was right for her to save this perfume for today — the day for me to be prepared for burial .
43012008	You will always have those who are poor with you . But you will not always have me . ”
43012009	Many of the Jews heard that Jesus was in Bethany , so they went there to see him . They also went there to see Lazarus , the one Jesus raised from death .
43012010	So the leading priests made plans to kill Lazarus too .
43012011	Because of him , many Jews were leaving them and believing in Jesus . That is why they wanted to kill Lazarus too .
43012012	The next day the people in Jerusalem heard that Jesus was coming there . These were the crowds of people who had come to the Passover festival .
43012013	They took branches of palm trees and went out to meet Jesus . They shouted , “ ‘ Praise Him ! ’ ‘ Welcome ! God bless the one who comes in the name of the Lord ! ’ God bless the King of Israel ! ”
43012014	Jesus found a donkey and rode on it , as the Scriptures say ,
43012015	“ Do not be afraid , people of Zion ! Look ! Your king is coming . He is riding on a young donkey . ”
43012016	The followers of Jesus did not understand at that time what was happening . But after he was raised to glory , they understood that this was written about him . Then they remembered that they had done these things for him .
43012017	There were many people with Jesus when he raised Lazarus from death and told him to come out of the tomb . Now they were telling others about what Jesus did .
43012018	That’s why so many people went out to meet him — because they had heard about this miraculous sign he did .
43012019	So the Pharisees said to each other , “ Look ! Our plan is not working . The people are all following him ! ”
43012020	There were some Greeks there too . These were some of the people who went to Jerusalem to worship at the Passover festival .
43012021	They went to Philip , who was from Bethsaida in Galilee . They said , “ Sir , we want to meet Jesus . ”
43012022	Philip went and told Andrew . Then Andrew and Philip went and told Jesus .
43012023	Jesus said to them , “ The time has come for the Son of Man to receive his glory .
43012024	It is a fact that a grain of wheat must fall to the ground and die before it can grow and produce much more wheat . If it never dies , it will never be more than a single seed .
43012025	Whoever loves the life they have now will lose it . But whoever is willing to give up their life in this world will keep it . They will have eternal life .
43012026	Whoever serves me must follow me . My servants must be with me everywhere I am . My Father will give honor to anyone who serves me .
43012027	“ Now I am very troubled . What should I say ? Should I say , ‘ Father save me from this time of suffering ’ ? No , I came to this time so that I could suffer .
43012028	Father , do what will bring you glory ! ” Then a voice came from heaven , “ I have already brought glory to myself . I will do it again . ”
43012029	The people standing there heard the voice . They said it was thunder . But others said , “ An angel spoke to him ! ”
43012030	Jesus said , “ That voice was for you and not for me .
43012031	Now is the time for the world to be judged . Now the ruler of this world will be thrown out .
43012032	I will be lifted up from the earth . When that happens , I will draw all people to myself . ”
43012033	Jesus said this to show how he would die .
43012034	The people said , “ But our law says that the Messiah will live forever . So why do you say , ‘ The Son of Man must be lifted up’ ? Who is this ‘ Son of Man ’ ? ”
43012035	Then Jesus said , “ The light will be with you for only a short time more . So walk while you have the light . Then the darkness will not catch you . People who walk in the darkness don’t know where they are going .
43012036	So put your trust in the light while you still have it . Then you will be children of light . ” When Jesus finished saying these things , he went away to a place where the people could not find him .
43012037	The people saw all these miraculous signs Jesus did , but they still did not believe in him .
43012038	This was to give full meaning to what Isaiah the prophet said : “ Lord , who believed what we told them ? Who has seen the Lord’s power ? ”
43012040	“ God made the people blind . He closed their minds . He did this so that they would not see with their eyes and understand with their minds . He did it so that they would not turn and be healed . ”
43012042	But many people believed in Jesus . Even many of the Jewish leaders believed in him , but they were afraid of the Pharisees , so they did not say openly that they believed . They were afraid they would be ordered to stay out of the synagogue .
43012043	They loved praise from people more than praise from God .
43012044	Then Jesus said loudly , “ Everyone who believes in me is really believing in the one who sent me .
43012045	Everyone who sees me is really seeing the one who sent me .
43012046	I came into this world as a light . I came so that everyone who believes in me will not stay in darkness .
43012047	“ I did not come into the world to judge people . I came to save the people in the world . So I am not the one who judges those who hear my teaching and do not obey .
43012048	But there is a judge for all those who refuse to believe in me and do not accept what I say . The message I have spoken will judge them on the last day .
43012049	That is because what I taught was not from myself . The Father who sent me told me what to say and what to teach .
43012050	And I know that whatever he says to do will bring eternal life . So the things I say are exactly what the Father told me to say . ”
43013001	It was almost time for the Jewish Passover festival . Jesus knew that the time had come for him to leave this world and go back to the Father . Jesus had always loved the people in the world who were his . Now was the time he showed them his love the most .
43013002	Jesus and his followers were at the evening meal . The devil had already persuaded Judas Iscariot to hand Jesus over to his enemies . ( Judas was the son of Simon . )
43013003	The Father had given Jesus power over everything . Jesus knew this . He also knew that he had come from God . And he knew that he was going back to God .
43013004	So while they were eating , Jesus stood up and took off his robe . He got a towel and wrapped it around his waist .
43013005	Then he poured water into a bowl and began to wash the followers’ feet . He dried their feet with the towel that was wrapped around his waist .
43013006	He came to Simon Peter . But Peter said to him , “ Lord , you should not wash my feet . ”
43013007	Jesus answered , “ You don’t know what I am doing now . But later you will understand . ”
43013008	Peter said , “ No ! You will never wash my feet . ” Jesus answered , “ If I don’t wash your feet , you are not one of my people . ”
43013009	Simon Peter said , “ Lord , after you wash my feet , wash my hands and my head too ! ”
43013010	Jesus said , “ After a person has a bath , his whole body is clean . He needs only to wash his feet . And you are clean , but not all of you . ”
43013011	Jesus knew who would hand him over to his enemies . That is why he said , “ Not all of you are clean . ”
43013012	When Jesus finished washing their feet , he put on his clothes and went back to the table . He asked , “ Do you understand what I did for you ?
43013013	You call me ‘ Teacher . ’ And you call me ‘ Lord . ’ And this is right , because that is what I am .
43013014	I am your Lord and Teacher . But I washed your feet . So you also should wash each other’s feet .
43013015	I did this as an example for you . So you should serve each other just as I served you .
43013016	Believe me , servants are not greater than their master . Those who are sent to do something are not greater than the one who sent them .
43013017	If you know these things , great blessings will be yours if you do them .
43013018	“ I am not talking about all of you . I know the people I have chosen . But what the Scriptures say must happen : ‘ The man who shared my food has turned against me . ’
43013019	I am telling you this now before it happens . Then when it happens , you will believe that I AM .
43013020	I assure you , whoever accepts the person I send also accepts me . And whoever accepts me also accepts the one who sent me . ”
43013021	After Jesus said these things , he felt very troubled . He said openly , “ Believe me when I say that one of you will hand me over to my enemies . ”
43013022	His followers all looked at each other . They did not understand who Jesus was talking about .
43013023	One of the followers was next to Jesus and was leaning close to him . This was the one Jesus loved very much .
43013024	Simon Peter made signs to this follower to ask Jesus who he was talking about .
43013025	That follower leaned closer to Jesus and asked , “ Lord , who is it ? ”
43013026	Jesus answered him , “ I will dip this bread into the dish . The man I give it to is the one . ” So Jesus took a piece of bread , dipped it , and gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
43013027	When Judas took the bread , Satan entered him . Jesus said to Judas , “ What you will do — do it quickly ! ”
43013028	No one at the table understood why Jesus said this to Judas .
43013029	Since Judas was the one in charge of the money , some of them thought that Jesus meant for him to go and buy some things they needed for the feast . Or they thought that Jesus wanted him to go give something to the poor .
43013030	Judas ate the bread Jesus gave him . Then he immediately went out . It was night .
43013031	When Judas was gone , Jesus said , “ Now is the time for the Son of Man to receive his glory . And God will receive glory through him .
43013032	If God receives glory through him , he will give glory to the Son through himself . And that will happen very soon . ”
43013033	Jesus said , “ My children , I will be with you only a short time more . You will look for me , but I tell you now what I told the Jewish leaders : Where I am going you cannot come .
43013034	“ I give you a new command : Love each other . You must love each other just as I loved you .
43013035	All people will know that you are my followers if you love each other . ”
43013036	Simon Peter asked Jesus , “ Lord , where are you going ? ” Jesus answered , “ Where I am going you cannot follow now . But you will follow later . ”
43013037	Peter asked , “ Lord , why can’t I follow you now ? I am ready to die for you ! ”
43013038	Jesus answered , “ Will you really give your life for me ? The truth is , before the rooster crows , you will say three times that you don’t know me . ”
43014001	Jesus said , “ Don’t be troubled . Trust in God , and trust in me .
43014002	There are many rooms in my Father’s house . I would not tell you this if it were not true . I am going there to prepare a place for you .
43014003	After I go and prepare a place for you , I will come back . Then I will take you with me , so that you can be where I am .
43014004	You know the way to the place where I am going . ”
43014005	Thomas said , “ Lord , we don’t know where you are going , so how can we know the way ? ”
43014006	Jesus answered , “ I am the way , the truth , and the life . The only way to the Father is through me .
43014007	If you really knew me , you would know my Father too . But now you know the Father . You have seen him . ”
43014008	Philip said to him , “ Lord , show us the Father . That is all we need . ”
43014009	Jesus answered , “ Philip , I have been with you for a long time . So you should know me . Anyone who has seen me has seen the Father too . So why do you say , ‘ Show us the Father ’ ?
43014010	Don’t you believe that I am in the Father and the Father is in me ? The things I have told you don’t come from me . The Father lives in me , and he is doing his own work .
43014011	Believe me when I say that I am in the Father and the Father is in me . Or believe because of the miracles I have done .
43014012	“ I can assure you that whoever believes in me will do the same things I have done . And they will do even greater things than I have done , because I am going to the Father .
43014013	And if you ask for anything in my name , I will do it for you . Then the Father’s glory will be shown through the Son .
43014014	If you ask me for anything in my name , I will do it .
43014015	“ If you love me , you will do what I command .
43014016	I will ask the Father , and he will give you another Helper to be with you forever .
43014017	The Helper is the Spirit of truth . The people of the world cannot accept him , because they don’t see him or know him . But you know him . He lives with you , and he will be in you .
43014018	“ I will not leave you all alone like orphans . I will come back to you .
43014019	In a very short time the people in the world will not see me anymore . But you will see me . You will live because I live .
43014020	On that day you will know that I am in the Father . You will know that you are in me and I am in you .
43014021	Those who really love me are the ones who not only know my commands but also obey them . My Father will love such people , and I will love them . I will make myself known to them . ”
43014022	Then Judas ( not Judas Iscariot ) said , “ Lord , how will you make yourself known to us , but not to the world ? ”
43014023	Jesus answered , “ All who love me will obey my teaching . My Father will love them . My Father and I will come to them and live with them .
43014024	But anyone who does not love me does not obey my teaching . This teaching that you hear is not really mine . It is from my Father who sent me .
43014025	“ I have told you all these things while I am with you .
43014026	But the Helper will teach you everything and cause you to remember all that I told you . This Helper is the Holy Spirit that the Father will send in my name .
43014027	“ I leave you peace . It is my own peace I give you . I give you peace in a different way than the world does . So don’t be troubled . Don’t be afraid .
43014028	You heard me say to you , ‘ I am leaving , but I will come back to you . ’ If you loved me , you would be happy that I am going back to the Father , because the Father is greater than I am .
43014029	I have told you this now , before it happens . Then when it happens , you will believe .
43014030	“ I will not talk with you much longer . The ruler of this world is coming . He has no power over me .
43014031	But the world must know that I love the Father . So I do exactly what the Father told me to do . “ Come now , let’s go . ”
43015001	Jesus said , “ I am the true vine , and my Father is the gardener .
43015002	He cuts off every branch of mine that does not produce fruit . He also trims every branch that produces fruit to prepare it to produce even more .
43015003	You have already been prepared to produce more fruit by the teaching I have given you .
43015004	Stay joined to me and I will stay joined to you . No branch can produce fruit alone . It must stay connected to the vine . It is the same with you . You cannot produce fruit alone . You must stay joined to me .
43015005	“ I am the vine , and you are the branches . If you stay joined to me , and I to you , you will produce plenty of fruit . But separated from me you won’t be able to do anything .
43015006	If you don’t stay joined to me , you will be like a branch that has been thrown out and has dried up . All the dead branches like that are gathered up , thrown into the fire and burned .
43015007	Stay joined together with me , and follow my teachings . If you do this , you can ask for anything you want , and it will be given to you .
43015008	Show that you are my followers by producing much fruit . This will bring honor to my Father .
43015009	“ I have loved you as the Father has loved me . Now continue in my love .
43015010	I have obeyed my Father’s commands , and he continues to love me . In the same way , if you obey my commands , I will continue to love you .
43015011	I have told you these things so that you can have the true happiness that I have . I want you to be completely happy .
43015012	This is what I command you : Love each other as I have loved you .
43015013	The greatest love people can show is to die for their friends .
43015014	You are my friends if you do what I tell you to do .
43015015	I no longer call you servants , because servants don’t know what their master is doing . But now I call you friends , because I have told you everything that my Father told me .
43015016	“ You did not choose me . I chose you . And I gave you this work : to go and produce fruit — fruit that will last . Then the Father will give you anything you ask for in my name .
43015017	This is my command : Love each other .
43015018	“ If the world hates you , remember that they hated me first .
43015019	If you belonged to the world , the world would love you as it loves its own people . But I have chosen you to be different from those in the world . So you don’t belong to the world , and that is why the world hates you .
43015020	“ Remember the lesson I told you : Servants are not greater than their master . If people treated me badly , they will treat you badly too . And if they obeyed my teaching , they will obey yours too .
43015021	They will do to you whatever they did to me , because you belong to me . They don’t know the one who sent me .
43015022	If I had not come and spoken to the people of the world , they would not be guilty of sin . But now I have spoken to them . So they have no excuse for their sin .
43015023	“ Whoever hates me also hates my Father .
43015024	I did things among the people of the world that no one else has ever done . If I had not done those things , they would not be guilty of sin . But they have seen what I did , and still they hate me and my Father .
43015025	But this happened to make clear the full meaning of what is written in their law : ‘ They hated me for no reason . ’
43015026	“ I will send you the Helper from the Father . The Helper is the Spirit of truth who comes from the Father . When he comes , he will tell about me .
43015027	And you will tell people about me too , because you have been with me from the beginning .
43016001	“ I have told you all this so that you won’t lose your faith when you face troubles .
43016002	People will tell you to leave their synagogues and never come back . In fact , the time will come when they will think that killing you would be doing service for God .
43016003	They will do this because they have not known the Father , and they have not known me .
43016004	I have told you all this now to prepare you . So when the time comes for these things to happen , you will remember that I warned you . “ I did not tell you these things at the beginning , because I was with you then .
43016005	Now I am going back to the one who sent me . And none of you asks me , ‘ Where are you going ? ’
43016006	But you are filled with sadness because I have told you all this .
43016007	Let me assure you , it is better for you that I go away . I say this because when I go away I will send the Helper to you . But if I did not go , the Helper would not come .
43016008	“ When the Helper comes , he will show the people of the world how wrong they are about sin , about being right with God , and about judgment .
43016009	He will prove that they are guilty of sin , because they don’t believe in me .
43016010	He will show them how wrong they are about how to be right with God . The Helper will do this , because I am going to the Father . You will not see me then .
43016011	And he will show them how wrong their judgment is , because their leader has already been condemned .
43016012	“ I have so much more to tell you , but it is too much for you to accept now .
43016013	But when the Spirit of truth comes , he will lead you into all truth . He will not speak his own words . He will speak only what he hears and will tell you what will happen in the future .
43016014	The Spirit of truth will bring glory to me by telling you what he receives from me .
43016015	All that the Father has is mine . That is why I said that the Spirit will tell you what he receives from me .
43016016	“ After a short time you won’t see me . Then after another short time you will see me again . ”
43016017	Some of the followers said to each other , “ What does he mean when he says , ‘ After a short time you won’t see me . Then after another short time you will see me again ’ ? And what does he mean when he says , ‘ Because I am going to the Father’ ? ”
43016018	They also asked , “ What does he mean by ‘ a short time ’ ? We don’t understand what he is saying . ”
43016019	Jesus saw that the followers wanted to ask him about this . So he said to them , “ Are you asking each other what I meant when I said , ‘ After a short time you won’t see me . Then after another short time you will see me again ’ ?
43016020	The truth is , you will cry and be sad , but the world will be happy . You will be sad , but then your sadness will change to happiness .
43016021	“ When a woman gives birth to a baby , she has pain , because her time has come . But when her baby is born , she forgets the pain . She forgets because she is so happy that a child has been born into the world .
43016022	It is the same with you . Now you are sad , but I will see you again , and you will be happy . You will have a joy that no one can take away .
43016023	In that day you will not have to ask me about anything . And I assure you , my Father will give you anything you ask him for in my name .
43016024	You have never asked for anything in this way before . But ask in my name , and you will receive . And you will have the fullest joy possible .
43016025	“ I have told you these things , using words that hide the meaning . But the time will come when I will not use words like that to tell you things . I will speak to you in plain words about the Father .
43016026	Then you will be able to ask the Father for things in my name . I’m not saying that I will have to ask the Father for you .
43016027	The Father himself loves you because you have loved me . And he loves you because you have believed that I came from God .
43016028	I came from the Father into the world . Now I am leaving the world and going back to the Father . ”
43016029	Then his followers said , “ You are already speaking plainly to us . You are not using words that hide the meaning .
43016030	We can see now that you know all things . You answer our questions even before we ask them . This makes us believe that you came from God . ”
43016031	Jesus said , “ So now you believe ?
43016032	Listen to me . A time is coming when you will be scattered , each to his own home . In fact , that time is already here . You will leave me , and I will be alone . But I am never really alone , because the Father is with me .
43016033	“ I have told you these things so that you can have peace in me . In this world you will have troubles . But be brave ! I have defeated the world ! ”
43017001	After Jesus said these things , he looked toward heaven and prayed , “ Father , the time has come . Give glory to your Son so that the Son can give glory to you .
43017002	You gave the Son power over all people so that he could give eternal life to all those you have given to him .
