43017003	And this is eternal life : that people can know you , the only true God , and that they can know Jesus Christ , the one you sent .
43017004	I finished the work you gave me to do . I brought you glory on earth .
43017005	And now , Father , give me glory with you . Give me the glory I had with you before the world was made .
43017006	“ You gave me some people from the world . I have shown them what you are like . They belonged to you , and you gave them to me . They have obeyed your teaching .
43017007	Now they know that everything I have came from you .
43017008	I told them the words you gave me , and they accepted them . They realized the fact that I came from you and believed that you sent me .
43017009	I pray for them now . I am not praying for the people in the world . But I am praying for these people you gave me , because they are yours .
43017010	All I have is yours , and all you have is mine . And my glory is seen in them .
43017011	“ Now I am coming to you . I will not stay in the world , but these followers of mine are still in the world . Holy Father , keep them safe by the power of your name — the name you gave me . Then they will be one , just as you and I are one .
43017012	While I was with them , I kept them safe by the power of your name — the name you gave me . I protected them . And only one of them was lost — the one who was sure to be lost . This was to show the truth of what the Scriptures said would happen .
43017013	“ I am coming to you now . But I pray these things while I am still in the world . I say all this so that these followers can have the true happiness that I have . I want them to be completely happy .
43017014	I have given them your teaching . And the world has hated them , because they don’t belong to the world , just as I don’t belong to the world .
43017015	“ I am not asking you to take them out of the world . But I am asking that you keep them safe from the Evil One .
43017016	They don’t belong to the world , just as I don’t belong to the world .
43017017	Make them ready for your service through your truth . Your teaching is truth .
43017018	I have sent them into the world , just as you sent me into the world .
43017019	I am making myself completely ready to serve you . I do this for them , so that they also might be fully qualified for your service .
43017020	“ I pray not only for these followers but also for those who will believe in me because of their teaching .
43017021	Father , I pray that all who believe in me can be one . You are in me and I am in you . I pray that they can also be one in us . Then the world will believe that you sent me .
43017022	I have given them the glory that you gave me . I gave them this glory so that they can be one , just as you and I are one .
43017023	I will be in them , and you will be in me . So they will be completely one . Then the world will know that you sent me and that you loved them just as you loved me .
43017024	“ Father , I want these people you have given me to be with me in every place I am . I want them to see my glory — the glory you gave me because you loved me before the world was made .
43017025	Father , you are the one who always does what is right . The world does not know you , but I know you , and these followers of mine know that you sent me .
43017026	I showed them what you are like , and I will show them again . Then they will have the same love that you have for me , and I will live in them . ”
43018001	When Jesus finished praying , he left with his followers and went across the Kidron Valley . He went into a garden there , his followers still with him .
43018002	Judas , the one responsible for handing Jesus over , knew where this place was . He knew because Jesus often met there with his followers .
43018003	So Judas led a group of soldiers to the garden , along with some guards from the leading priests and the Pharisees . They were carrying torches , lanterns , and weapons .
43018004	Jesus already knew everything that would happen to him . So he went out and asked them , “ Who are you looking for ? ”
43018005	They answered , “ Jesus from Nazareth . ” He said , “ I am Jesus . ” ( Judas , the one responsible for handing Jesus over , was standing there with them . )
43018006	When Jesus said , “ I am Jesus , ” the men moved back and fell to the ground .
43018007	He asked them again , “ Who are you looking for ? ” They said , “ Jesus from Nazareth . ”
43018008	Jesus said , “ I told you that I am Jesus . So if you are looking for me , let these other men go free . ”
43018009	This was to show the truth of what Jesus said earlier : “ I have not lost anyone you gave me . ”
43018010	Simon Peter had a sword , which he pulled out . He struck the servant of the high priest and cut off his right ear . ( The servant’s name was Malchus . )
43018011	Jesus said to Peter , “ Put your sword back in its place ! I must drink from the cup the Father has given me . ”
43018012	Then the soldiers with their commander and the Jewish guards arrested Jesus . They tied him
43018013	and brought him to Annas , the father-in-law of Caiaphas . Caiaphas was the high priest that year .
43018014	He was also the one who had told the other Jewish leaders that it would be better if one man died for all the people .
43018015	Simon Peter and another one of Jesus’ followers went with Jesus . This follower knew the high priest . So he went with Jesus into the yard of the high priest’s house .
43018016	But Peter waited outside near the door . The follower who knew the high priest came back outside and spoke to the gatekeeper . Then he brought Peter inside .
43018017	The girl at the gate said to Peter , “ Are you also one of the followers of that man ? ” Peter answered , “ No , I am not ! ”
43018018	It was cold , so the servants and guards had built a fire . They were standing around it , warming themselves , and Peter was standing with them .
43018019	The high priest asked Jesus questions about his followers and what he taught them .
43018020	Jesus answered , “ I have always spoken openly to all people . I always taught in the synagogues and in the Temple area . All the Jews come together there . I never said anything in secret .
43018021	So why do you question me ? Ask the people who heard my teaching . They know what I said . ”
43018022	When Jesus said this , one of the guards standing there hit him . The guard said , “ You should not talk to the high priest like that ! ”
43018023	Jesus answered , “ If I said something wrong , tell everyone here what was wrong . But if what I said is right , then why do you hit me ? ”
43018024	So Annas sent Jesus to Caiaphas the high priest . He was still tied .
43018025	Simon Peter was standing at the fire , keeping himself warm . The other people said to Peter , “ Aren’t you one of the followers of that man ? ” Peter denied it . He said , “ No , I am not . ”
43018026	One of the servants of the high priest was there . He was a relative of the man whose ear Peter had cut off . The servant said , “ I think I saw you with him in the garden ! ”
43018027	But again Peter said , “ No , I was not with him ! ” As soon as he said this , a rooster crowed .
43018028	Then the guards took Jesus from Caiaphas’ house to the Roman governor’s palace . It was early in the morning . The Jews there would not go inside the palace . They did not want to make themselves unclean , because they wanted to eat the Passover meal .
43018029	So Pilate went outside to them and asked , “ What do you say this man has done wrong ? ”
43018030	They answered , “ He is a bad man . That is why we brought him to you . ”
43018031	Pilate said to them , “ You take him yourselves and judge him by your own law . ” The Jewish leaders answered , “ But your law does not allow us to punish anyone by killing them . ”
43018032	( This was to show the truth of what Jesus said about how he would die . )
43018033	Then Pilate went back inside the palace . He called for Jesus and asked him , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ”
43018034	Jesus said , “ Is that your own question , or did other people tell you about me ? ”
43018035	Pilate said , “ I’m not a Jew ! It was your own people and their leading priests who brought you before me . What have you done wrong ? ”
43018036	Jesus said , “ My kingdom does not belong to this world . If it did , my servants would fight so that I would not be handed over to the Jewish leaders . No , my kingdom is not an earthly one . ”
43018037	Pilate said , “ So you are a king . ” Jesus answered , “ You are right to say that I am a king . I was born for this : to tell people about the truth . That is why I came into the world . And everyone who belongs to the truth listens to me . ”
43018038	Pilate said , “ What is truth ? ” Then he went out to the Jewish leaders again and said to them , “ I can find nothing against this man .
43018039	But it is one of your customs for me to free one prisoner to you at the time of the Passover . Do you want me to free this ‘ king of the Jews ’ ? ”
43018040	They shouted back , “ No , not him ! Let Barabbas go free ! ” ( Barabbas was a rebel . )
43019001	Then Pilate ordered that Jesus be taken away and whipped .
43019002	The soldiers made a crown from thorny branches and put it on his head . Then they put a purple robe around him .
43019003	They kept coming up to him and saying , “ Hail to the king of the Jews ! ” And they hit him in the face .
43019004	Again Pilate came out and said to the Jewish leaders , “ Look ! I am bringing Jesus out to you . I want you to know that I find nothing I can charge him with . ”
43019005	Then Jesus came out wearing the crown of thorns and the purple robe . Pilate said to the Jews , “ Here is the man ! ”
43019006	When the leading priests and the Jewish guards saw Jesus they shouted , “ Kill him on a cross ! Kill him on a cross ! ” But Pilate answered , “ You take him and nail him to a cross yourselves . I find nothing I can charge him with . ”
43019007	The Jewish leaders answered , “ We have a law that says he must die , because he said he is the Son of God . ”
43019008	When Pilate heard this , he was more afraid .
43019009	So he went back inside the palace and asked Jesus , “ Where are you from ? ” But Jesus did not answer him .
43019010	Pilate said , “ You refuse to speak to me ? Remember , I have the power to make you free or to kill you on a cross . ”
43019011	Jesus answered , “ The only power you have over me is the power given to you by God . So the one who handed me over to you is guilty of a greater sin . ”
43019012	After this , Pilate tried to let Jesus go free . But the Jewish leaders shouted , “ Anyone who makes himself a king is against Caesar . So if you let this man go free , that means you are not Caesar’s friend . ”
43019013	When Pilate heard this , he brought Jesus out to the place called “ The Stone Pavement . ” ( In Aramaic the name is Gabbatha . ) Pilate sat down on the judge’s seat there .
43019014	It was now almost noon on Preparation day of Passover week . Pilate said to the Jews , “ Here is your king ! ”
43019015	They shouted , “ Take him away ! Take him away ! Kill him on a cross ! ” Pilate asked them , “ Do you want me to kill your king on a cross ? ” The leading priests answered , “ The only king we have is Caesar ! ”
43019016	So Pilate handed Jesus over to them to be killed on a cross . The soldiers took Jesus .
43019017	He carried his own cross to a place called “ The Place of the Skull . ” ( In Aramaic the name of this place is “ Golgotha . ” )
43019018	There they nailed Jesus to the cross . They also nailed two other men to crosses . They put them on each side of Jesus with him in the middle .
43019019	Pilate told them to write a sign and put it on the cross . The sign said , “ jesus of nazareth , the king of the jews . ”
43019020	The sign was written in Aramaic , in Latin , and in Greek . Many of the Jews read this sign , because the place where Jesus was nailed to the cross was near the city .
43019021	The leading Jewish priests said to Pilate , “ Don’t write , ‘ The King of the Jews . ’ But write , ‘ This man said , I am the King of the Jews . ’ ”
43019022	Pilate answered , “ I will not change what I have written . ”
43019023	After the soldiers nailed Jesus to the cross , they took his clothes and divided them into four parts . Each soldier got one part . They also took his tunic . It was all one piece of cloth woven from top to bottom .
43019024	So the soldiers said to each other , “ We should not tear this into parts . Let’s throw lots to see who will get it . ” This happened to make clear the full meaning of what the Scriptures say : “ They divided my clothes among them , and they threw lots for what I was wearing . ”
43019025	Jesus’ mother stood near his cross . Her sister was also standing there with Mary the wife of Clopas , and Mary Magdalene .
43019026	Jesus saw his mother . He also saw the follower he loved very much standing there . He said to his mother , “ Dear woman , here is your son . ”
43019027	Then he said to the follower , “ Here is your mother . ” So after that , this follower took Jesus’ mother to live in his home .
43019028	Later , Jesus knew that everything had been done . To make the Scriptures come true he said , “ I am thirsty . ”
43019029	There was a jar full of sour wine there , so the soldiers soaked a sponge in it . They put the sponge on a branch of a hyssop plant and lifted it to Jesus’ mouth .
43019030	When he tasted the wine , he said , “ It is finished . ” Then he bowed his head and died .
43019031	This day was Preparation day . The next day was a special Sabbath day . The Jewish leaders did not want the bodies to stay on the cross on the Sabbath day . So they asked Pilate to order that the legs of the men be broken . And they asked that the bodies be taken down from the crosses .
43019032	So the soldiers came and broke the legs of the two men on the crosses beside Jesus .
43019033	But when the soldiers came close to Jesus , they saw that he was already dead . So they did not break his legs .
43019034	But one of the soldiers stuck his spear into Jesus’ side . Immediately blood and water came out .
43019035	( The one who saw this happen has told about it . He told about it so that you also can believe . The things he says are true . He knows that he tells the truth . )
43019036	These things happened to give full meaning to the Scriptures that said , “ None of his bones will be broken ”
43019037	and “ People will look at the one they stabbed . ”
43019038	Later , a man named Joseph from Arimathea asked Pilate for the body of Jesus . ( Joseph was a follower of Jesus , but he did not tell anyone , because he was afraid of the Jewish leaders . ) Pilate said Joseph could take Jesus’ body , so he came and took it away .
43019039	Nicodemus went with Joseph . He was the man who had come to Jesus before and talked to him at night . He brought about 100 pounds of spices — a mixture of myrrh and aloes .
43019040	These two men took Jesus’ body and wrapped it in pieces of linen cloth with the spices . ( This is how the Jews bury people . )
43019041	In the place where Jesus was killed on the cross , there was a garden . In the garden there was a new tomb . No one had ever been buried there before .
43019042	The men put Jesus in that tomb because it was near , and the Jews were preparing to start their Sabbath day .
43020001	Early on Sunday morning , while it was still dark , Mary Magdalene went to the tomb . She saw that the large stone was moved away from the entrance .
43020002	So she ran to Simon Peter and the other follower ( the one Jesus loved very much ) . She said , “ They have taken the Lord out of the tomb , and we don’t know where they put him . ”
43020003	So Peter and the other follower started going to the tomb .
43020004	They were both running , but the other follower ran faster than Peter and reached the tomb first .
43020005	He bent down and looked in . He saw the pieces of linen cloth lying there , but he did not go in .
43020006	Then Simon Peter finally reached the tomb and went in . He saw the pieces of linen lying there .
43020007	He also saw the cloth that had been around Jesus’ head . It was folded up and laid in a different place from the pieces of linen .
43020008	Then the other follower went in — the one who had reached the tomb first . He saw what had happened and believed .
43020009	( These followers did not yet understand from the Scriptures that Jesus must rise from death . )
43020010	Then the followers went back home .
43020011	But Mary stood outside the tomb , crying . While she was crying , she bent down and looked inside the tomb .
43020012	She saw two angels dressed in white sitting where Jesus’ body had been . One was sitting where the head had been ; the other was sitting where the feet had been .
43020013	The angels asked Mary , “ Woman , why are you crying ? ” Mary answered , “ They took away the body of my Lord , and I don’t know where they put him . ”
43020014	When Mary said this , she turned around and saw Jesus standing there . But she did not know that it was Jesus .
43020015	He asked her , “ Woman , why are you crying ? Who are you looking for ? ” She thought he was the man in charge of the garden . So she said to him , “ Did you take him away , sir ? Tell me where you put him . I will go and get him . ”
43020016	Jesus said to her , “ Mary . ” She turned toward him and said in Aramaic , “ Rabboni , ” which means “ Teacher . ”
43020017	Jesus said to her , “ You don’t need to hold on to me ! I have not yet gone back up to the Father . But go to my followers and tell them this : ‘ I am going back to my Father and your Father . I am going back to my God and your God . ’ ”
43020018	Mary Magdalene went to the followers and told them , “ I saw the Lord ! ” And she told them what he had said to her .
43020019	The day was Sunday , and that same evening the followers were together . They had the doors locked because they were afraid of the Jewish leaders . Suddenly , Jesus was standing there among them . He said , “ Peace be with you ! ”
43020020	As soon as he said this , he showed them his hands and his side . When the followers saw the Lord , they were very happy .
43020021	Then Jesus said again , “ Peace be with you . It was the Father who sent me , and I am now sending you in the same way . ”
43020022	Then he breathed on them and said , “ Receive the Holy Spirit .
43020023	If you forgive the sins of anyone , their sins are forgiven . If there is anyone whose sins you don’t forgive , their sins are not forgiven . ”
43020024	Thomas ( called Didymus ) was one of the twelve , but he was not with the other followers when Jesus came .
43020025	They told him , “ We saw the Lord . ” Thomas said , “ That’s hard to believe . I will have to see the nail holes in his hands , put my finger where the nails were , and put my hand into his side . Only then will I believe it . ”
43020026	A week later the followers were in the house again , and Thomas was with them . The doors were locked , but Jesus came and stood among them . He said , “ Peace be with you ! ”
43020027	Then he said to Thomas , “ Put your finger here . Look at my hands . Put your hand here in my side . Stop doubting and believe . ”
43020028	Thomas said to Jesus , “ My Lord and my God ! ”
43020029	Jesus said to him , “ You believe because you see me . Great blessings belong to the people who believe without seeing me ! ”
43020030	Jesus did many other miraculous signs that his followers saw , which are not written in this book .
43020031	But these are written so that you can believe that Jesus is the Messiah , the Son of God . Then , by believing , you can have life through his name .
43021001	Later , Jesus appeared again to his followers by Lake Galilee . This is how it happened :
43021002	Some of the followers were together — Simon Peter , Thomas ( called Didymus ) , Nathanael from Cana in Galilee , the two sons of Zebedee , and two other followers .
43021003	Simon Peter said , “ I am going out to fish . ” The other followers said , “ We will go with you . ” So all of them went out and got into the boat . They fished that night but caught nothing .
43021004	Early the next morning Jesus stood on the shore . But the followers did not know it was Jesus .
43021005	Then he said to them , “ Friends , have you caught any fish ? ” They answered , “ No . ”
43021006	He said , “ Throw your net into the water on the right side of your boat . You will find some fish there . ” So they did this . They caught so many fish that they could not pull the net back into the boat .
43021007	The follower Jesus loved very much said to Peter , “ That man is the Lord ! ” When Peter heard him say it was the Lord , he wrapped his coat around himself . ( He had taken his clothes off to work . ) Then he jumped into the water .
43021008	The other followers went to shore in the boat . They pulled the net full of fish . They were not very far from shore , only about 100 yards .
43021009	When they stepped out of the boat and onto the shore , they saw a fire of hot coals . There were fish on the fire and some bread there too .
43021010	Then Jesus said , “ Bring some of the fish that you caught . ”
43021011	Simon Peter got into the boat and pulled the net to the shore . It was full of big fish — 153 of them ! But even with that many fish , the net did not tear .
43021012	Jesus said to them , “ Come and eat . ” None of the followers would ask him , “ Who are you ? ” They knew he was the Lord .
43021013	Jesus walked over to get the bread and gave it to them . He also gave them the fish .
43021014	This was now the third time Jesus appeared to his followers after he was raised from death .
43021015	When they finished eating , Jesus said to Simon Peter , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me more than these other men love me ? ” Peter answered , “ Yes , Lord , you know that I love you . ” Then Jesus said to him , “ Take care of my lambs . ”
43021016	Again Jesus said to him , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me ? ” Peter answered , “ Yes , Lord , you know that I love you . ” Then Jesus said , “ Take care of my sheep . ”
43021017	A third time Jesus said , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me ? ” Peter was sad because Jesus asked him three times , “ Do you love me ? ” He said , “ Lord , you know everything . You know that I love you ! ” Jesus said to him , “ Take care of my sheep .
43021018	The truth is , when you were young , you tied your own belt and went where you wanted . But when you are old , you will put out your hands , and someone else will tie your belt . They will lead you where you don’t want to go . ”
43021019	( Jesus said this to show how Peter would die to give glory to God . ) Then he said to Peter , “ Follow me ! ”
43021020	Peter turned and saw the follower Jesus loved very much walking behind them . ( This was the follower who had leaned against Jesus at the supper and said , “ Lord , who is it that will hand you over ? ” )
43021021	When Peter saw him behind them , he asked Jesus , “ Lord , what about him ? ”
43021022	Jesus answered , “ Maybe I want him to live until I come . That should not matter to you . You follow me ! ”
43021023	So a story spread among the followers of Jesus . They were saying that this follower would not die . But Jesus did not say he would not die . He only said , “ Maybe I want him to live until I come . That should not matter to you . ”
43021024	That follower is the one who is telling these things . He is the one who has now written them all down . We know that what he says is true .
43021025	There are many other things that Jesus did . If every one of them were written down , I think the whole world would not be big enough for all the books that would be written .
44001001	Dear Theophilus , The first book I wrote was about everything Jesus did and taught from the beginning
44001002	until the day he was carried up into heaven . Before he went , he talked to the apostles he had chosen . With the help of the Holy Spirit , he told them what they should do .
44001003	This was after his death , but he showed them that he was alive , proving it to them in many ways . The apostles saw Jesus many times during the 40 days after he was raised from death . He spoke to them about God’s kingdom .
44001004	One time when Jesus was eating with them , he told them not to leave Jerusalem . He said , “ Wait here until you receive what the Father promised to send . Remember , I told you about it before .
44001005	John baptized people with water , but in a few days you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit . ”
44001006	The apostles were all together . They asked Jesus , “ Lord , is this the time for you to give the people of Israel their kingdom again ? ”
44001007	Jesus said to them , “ The Father is the only one who has the authority to decide dates and times . They are not for you to know .
44001008	But the Holy Spirit will come on you and give you power . You will be my witnesses . You will tell people everywhere about me — in Jerusalem , in the rest of Judea , in Samaria , and in every part of the world . ”
44001009	After Jesus said this , he was lifted up into the sky . While they were watching , he went into a cloud , and they could not see him .
44001010	They were staring into the sky where he had gone . Suddenly two men wearing white clothes were standing beside them .
44001011	They said , “ Men from Galilee , why are you standing here looking into the sky ? You saw Jesus carried away from you into heaven . He will come back in the same way you saw him go . ”
44001012	Then the apostles went back to Jerusalem from the Mount of Olives . This mountain is about a half mile from Jerusalem .
44001013	When they entered the city , they went to the upstairs room where they were staying . These are the ones who were there : Peter , John , James , Andrew , Philip , Thomas , Bartholomew , Matthew , James ( the son of Alphaeus ) , Simon , the Zealot , and Judas ( the son of James ) .
44001014	The apostles were all together . They were constantly praying with the same purpose . Some women , Mary the mother of Jesus , and his brothers were there with the apostles .
44001015	After a few days there was a meeting of the believers . There were about 120 of them . Peter stood up and said ,
44001018	( Judas was paid money for doing this . His money was used to buy him a field . But he fell on his head , his body broke open , and all his intestines poured out .
44001019	And all the people of Jerusalem learned about this . That is why they named that field Akeldama , which in their language means “ field of blood . ” )
44001020	Peter said , “ In the book of Psalms , this is written about Judas : ‘ People should not go near his land ; no one should live there . ’ ‘ Let another man have his work . ’
44001023	They put two men before the group . One was Joseph Barsabbas . He was also called Justus . The other man was Matthias .
44001026	Then they used lots to choose one of the two men . The lots showed that Matthias was the one the Lord wanted . So he became an apostle with the other eleven .
44002001	When the day of Pentecost came , they were all together in one place .
44002002	Suddenly a noise came from heaven . It sounded like a strong wind blowing . This noise filled the whole house where they were sitting .
44002003	They saw something that looked like flames of fire . The flames were separated and stood over each person there .
44002004	They were all filled with the Holy Spirit , and they began to speak different languages . The Holy Spirit was giving them the power to do this .
44002005	There were some godly Jews in Jerusalem at this time . They were from every country in the world .
44002006	A large crowd came together because they heard the noise . They were surprised because , as the apostles were speaking , everyone heard in their own language .
44002007	They were all amazed at this . They did not understand how the apostles could do this . They said , “ Look ! These men we hear speaking are all from Galilee .
44002008	But we hear them in our own languages . How is this possible ? We are from all these different places :
44002009	Parthia , Media , Elam , Mesopotamia , Judea , Cappadocia , Pontus , Asia ,
44002010	Phrygia , Pamphylia , Egypt , the areas of Libya near the city of Cyrene , Rome ,
44002011	Crete , and Arabia . Some of us were born Jews , and others have changed their religion to worship God like Jews . We are from these different countries , but we can hear these men in our own languages ! We can all understand the great things they are saying about God . ”
44002012	The people were all amazed and confused . They asked each other , “ What is happening ? ”
44002013	But others were laughing at the apostles , saying they were drunk from too much wine .
44002014	Then Peter stood up with the other eleven apostles . He spoke loudly so that all the people could hear . He said , “ My Jewish brothers and all of you who live in Jerusalem , listen to me . I will tell you something you need to know . Listen carefully .
44002015	These men are not drunk as you think ; it’s only nine o’clock in the morning .
44002016	But Joel the prophet wrote about what you see happening here today . This is what he wrote :
44002017	‘ God says : In the last days I will pour out my Spirit on all people . Your sons and daughters will prophesy . Your young men will see visions . Your old men will have special dreams .
44002018	In those days I will pour out my Spirit on my servants , men and women , and they will prophesy .
44002019	I will work wonders in the sky above . I will cause miraculous signs on the earth below . There will be blood , fire , and thick smoke .
44002020	The sun will be changed into darkness , and the moon will be as red as blood . Then the great and glorious day of the Lord will come .
44002021	And everyone who trusts in the Lord will be saved . ’
44002022	“ My fellow Israelites , listen to these words : Jesus from Nazareth was a very special man . God clearly showed this to you . He proved it by the miracles , wonders , and miraculous signs he did through Jesus . You all saw these things , so you know this is true .
44002023	Jesus was handed over to you , and you killed him . With the help of evil men , you nailed him to a cross . But God knew all this would happen . It was his plan — a plan he made long ago .
44002024	Jesus suffered the pain of death , but God made him free . He raised him from death . There was no way for death to hold him .
44002025	David said this about him : ‘ I saw the Lord before me always ; he is at my right side to keep me safe .
44002026	So my heart is happy , and the words I speak are words of joy . Yes , even my body will live with hope ,
44002027	because you will not leave me in the place of death . You will not let the body of your Holy One rot in the grave .
44002028	You taught me how to live . You will come close to me and give me great joy . ’
44002029	“ My brothers , I can tell you for sure about David , our great ancestor . He died , was buried , and his tomb is still here with us today .
44002030	He was a prophet and knew something that God had said . God had promised David that someone from his own family would sit on David’s throne as king .
44002031	David knew this before it happened . That is why he said this about that future king : ‘ He was not left in the place of death . His body did not rot in the grave . ’ ‘ The Lord God said to my Lord : Sit at my right side ,
44002035	until I put your enemies under your power . ’
44002036	“ So , all the people of Israel should know this for certain : God has made Jesus to be Lord and Messiah . He is the man you nailed to the cross ! ”
44002037	When the people heard this , they felt very , very sorry . They asked Peter and the other apostles , “ Brothers , what should we do ? ”
44002038	Peter said to them , “ Change your hearts and lives and be baptized , each one of you , in the name of Jesus Christ . Then God will forgive your sins , and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit .
44002039	This promise is for you . It is also for your children and for the people who are far away . It is for everyone the Lord our God calls to himself . ”
44002040	Peter warned them with many other words ; he begged them , “ Save yourselves from the evil of the people who live now ! ”
44002041	Then those who accepted what Peter said were baptized . On that day about 3000 people were added to the group of believers .
44002042	The believers spent their time listening to the teaching of the apostles . They shared everything with each other . They ate together and prayed together .
44002043	Many wonders and miraculous signs were happening through the apostles , and everyone felt great respect for God .
44002044	All the believers stayed together and shared everything .
44002045	They sold their land and the things they owned . Then they divided the money and gave it to those who needed it .
44002046	The believers shared a common purpose , and every day they spent much of their time together in the Temple area . They also ate together in their homes . They were happy to share their food and ate with joyful hearts .
44002047	The believers praised God and were respected by all the people . More and more people were being saved every day , and the Lord was adding them to their group .
44003001	One day Peter and John went to the Temple area . It was three o’clock in the afternoon , which was the time for the daily Temple prayer service .
44003002	As they were entering the Temple area , a man was there who had been crippled all his life . He was being carried by some friends who brought him to the Temple every day . They put him by one of the gates outside the Temple . It was called Beautiful Gate . There he begged for money from the people going to the Temple .
44003003	That day he saw Peter and John going into the Temple area . He asked them for money .
44003004	Peter and John looked at the crippled man and said , “ Look at us ! ”
44003005	He looked at them ; he thought they would give him some money .
44003006	But Peter said , “ I don’t have any silver or gold , but I do have something else I can give you . By the power of Jesus Christ from Nazareth — stand up and walk ! ”
44003007	Then Peter took the man’s right hand and lifted him up . Immediately his feet and legs became strong .
44003008	He jumped up , stood on his feet , and began to walk . He went into the Temple area with them . He was walking and jumping and praising God .
44003011	The man was holding on to Peter and John . All the people were amazed . They ran to Peter and John at Solomon’s Porch .
44003012	When Peter saw this , he said to the people , “ My Jewish brothers , why are you surprised at this ? You are looking at us as if it was our power that made this man walk . Do you think this was done because we are good ?
44003013	No , God did it ! He is the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . He is the God of all our fathers . He gave glory to Jesus , his special servant . But you handed him over to be killed . Pilate decided to let him go free . But you told Pilate you did not want him .
44003014	Jesus was holy and good , but you said you did not want him . You told Pilate to give you a murderer instead of Jesus .
44003015	And so you killed the one who gives life ! But God raised him from death . We are witnesses of this — we saw it with our own eyes .
44003016	“ This crippled man was healed because we trusted in Jesus . It was Jesus’ power that made him well . You can see this man , and you know him . He was made completely well because of faith in Jesus . You all saw it happen !
44003017	“ My brothers , I know that what you did to Jesus was done because you did not understand what you were doing . And your leaders did not understand any more than you did .
44003018	But God said these things would happen . Through the prophets he said that his Messiah would suffer and die . I have told you how God made this happen .
44003019	So you must change your hearts and lives . Come back to God , and he will forgive your sins .
44003020	Then the Lord will give you times of spiritual rest . He will send you Jesus , the one he chose to be the Messiah .
44003021	“ But Jesus must stay in heaven until the time when all things will be made right again . God told about this time when he spoke long ago through his holy prophets .
44003022	Moses said , ‘ The Lord your God will give you a prophet . That prophet will come from among your own people . He will be like me . You must obey everything he tells you .
44003023	And anyone who refuses to obey that prophet will die , separated from God’s people . ’
44003024	“ Samuel , and all the other prophets who spoke for God after Samuel , said that this time would come .
44003025	And what those prophets talked about is for you , their descendants . You have received the agreement that God made with your fathers . God said to your father Abraham , ‘ Every nation on earth will be blessed through your descendants . ’
44003026	God has sent his special servant Jesus . He sent him to you first . He sent him to bless you by causing each of you to turn away from your evil ways . ”
44004001	While Peter and John were speaking to the people , some Jewish leaders came up to them . There were some priests , the captain of the soldiers that guarded the Temple , and some Sadducees .
44004002	They were upset because of what Peter and John were teaching the people . By telling people about Jesus , the apostles were teaching that people will rise from death .
44004003	The Jewish leaders arrested Peter and John and put them in jail . It was already night , so they kept them in jail until the next day .
44004004	But many of the people who heard the apostles believed what they said . There were now about 5000 men in the group of believers .
44004005	The next day the Jewish rulers , the older Jewish leaders , and the teachers of the law met in Jerusalem .
44004006	Annas the high priest , Caiaphas , John , and Alexander were there . Everyone from the high priest’s family was there .
44004007	They made Peter and John stand before all the people . They asked them over and over , “ How did you make this crippled man well ? What power did you use ? By whose authority did you do this ? ”
44004008	Then Peter was filled with the Holy Spirit and said to them , “ Rulers of the people and you older leaders ,
44004009	are you questioning us today about what we did to help this crippled man ? Are you asking us what made him well ?
44004010	We want all of you and all the people of Israel to know that this man was made well by the power of Jesus Christ from Nazareth . You nailed Jesus to a cross , but God raised him from death . This man was crippled , but he is now well . He is able to stand here before you because of the power of Jesus !
44004011	Jesus is ‘ the stone that you builders thought was not important . But this stone has become the cornerstone . ’
44004013	The Jewish leaders understood that Peter and John had no special training or education . But they also saw that they were not afraid to speak . So the leaders were amazed . They also realized that Peter and John had been with Jesus .
44004014	They saw the crippled man standing there beside the apostles . They saw that he was healed , so they could say nothing against the apostles .
44004015	The Jewish leaders told them to leave the council meeting . Then the leaders talked to each other about what they should do .
44004016	They said , “ What shall we do with these men ? Everyone in Jerusalem knows about the miracle they did as a sign from God . It’s too obvious . We can’t say it didn’t happen .
44004017	But we must make them afraid to talk to anyone again using that name . Then this problem will not spread among the people . ”
44004018	So the Jewish leaders called Peter and John in again . They told the apostles not to say anything or to teach anything in the name of Jesus .
44004019	But Peter and John answered them , “ What do you think is right ? What would God want ? Should we obey you or God ?
44004020	We cannot be quiet . We must tell people about what we have seen and heard . ”
44004023	Peter and John left the meeting of Jewish leaders and went to their own group . They told the group everything that the leading priests and the older Jewish leaders had said to them .
44004024	When the believers heard this , they all prayed to God with one purpose . They said , “ Master , you are the one who made the sky , the earth , the sea , and everything in the world .
44004025	Our ancestor David was your servant . With the help of the Holy Spirit he wrote these words : ‘ Why are the nations shouting ? Why are the people planning such useless things ?
44004026	‘ The kings of the earth prepare themselves to fight , and the rulers all come together against the Lord and against his Messiah . ’
44004031	After the believers prayed , the place where they were meeting shook . They were all filled with the Holy Spirit , and they continued to speak God’s message without fear .
44004032	The whole group of believers was united in their thinking and in what they wanted . None of them said that the things they had were their own . Instead , they shared everything .
44004033	With great power the apostles were making it known to everyone that the Lord Jesus was raised from death . And God blessed all the believers very much .
44004034	None of them could say they needed anything . Everyone who owned fields or houses sold them . They brought the money they got
44004035	and gave it to the apostles . Then everyone was given whatever they needed .
44004036	One of the believers was named Joseph . The apostles called him Barnabas , a name that means “ one who encourages others . ” He was a Levite born in Cyprus .
44004037	Joseph sold a field he owned . He brought the money and gave it to the apostles .
44005001	There was a man named Ananias . His wife’s name was Sapphira . Ananias sold some land he had ,
44005002	but he gave only part of the money to the apostles . He secretly kept some of the money for himself . His wife knew this , and she agreed with it .
44005003	Peter said , “ Ananias , why did you let Satan fill your mind with such an idea ? You kept part of the money for yourself and lied about it to the Holy Spirit !
44005004	Before you sold the field , it belonged to you , right ? And even after you sold it , you could have used the money any way you wanted . How could you even think of doing such a thing ? You lied to God , not to us ! ”
44005007	About three hours later his wife came in . Sapphira did not know about what had happened to her husband .
44005008	Peter said to her , “ Tell me how much money you got for your field . Was it this much ? ” Sapphira answered , “ Yes , that was all we got for the field . ”
44005009	Peter said to her , “ Why did you and your husband agree to test the Spirit of the Lord ? Listen ! Do you hear those footsteps ? The men who buried your husband are at the door . They will carry you out in the same way . ”
44005010	At that moment Sapphira fell down by his feet and died . The young men came in and saw that she was dead . They carried her out and buried her beside her husband .
44005011	The whole church and all the other people who heard about this were filled with fear .
44005012	The apostles were given the power to do many miraculous signs and wonders among the people . They were together in Solomon’s Porch , and they all had the same purpose .
44005013	None of the other people dared to stand with the apostles , but everyone was saying wonderful things about them .
44005014	More and more people believed in the Lord , and many men and women were added to the group of believers .
44005015	So the people brought those who were sick into the streets and put them on little beds and mats . They were hoping that Peter’s shadow might fall on them as he walked by .
44005016	People came from all the towns around Jerusalem . They brought those who were sick or troubled by evil spirits . All of them were healed .
44005017	The high priest and all his friends , a group called the Sadducees , became very jealous .
44005018	They grabbed the apostles and put them in jail .
44005019	But during the night , an angel of the Lord opened the doors of the jail . The angel led the apostles outside and said ,
44005020	“ Go and stand in the Temple area . Tell the people everything about this new life . ”
44005021	When the apostles heard this , they did what they were told . They went into the Temple area about sunrise and began to teach the people . The high priest and his friends came together and called a meeting of the high council and all the older Jewish leaders . They sent some men to the jail to bring the apostles to them .
44005022	When the men went to the jail , they could not find the apostles there . So they went back and told the Jewish leaders about this .
44005023	They said , “ The jail was closed and locked . The guards were standing at the doors . But when we opened the doors , the jail was empty ! ”
44005024	The captain of the Temple guards and the leading priests heard this . They were confused and wondered what it all meant .
44005025	Then another man came and told them , “ Listen ! The men you put in jail are standing in the Temple area teaching the people . ”
44005026	The captain and his men went out and brought the apostles back . But the soldiers did not use force , because they were afraid of the people . They were afraid the people would stone them to death .
44005027	The soldiers brought the apostles in and made them stand before the council . The high priest questioned them .
44005028	He said , “ We told you never again to teach using that name . But look at what you have done ! You have filled Jerusalem with your teaching . And you are trying to blame us for his death . ”
44005029	Peter and the other apostles answered , “ We must obey God , not you !
44005030	You killed Jesus by nailing him to a cross . But God , the same God our fathers had , raised Jesus up from death .
44005031	Jesus is the one God honored by giving him a place at his right side . He made him our Leader and Savior . God did this to give all the people of Israel the opportunity to change and turn to God to have their sins forgiven .
44005032	We saw all these things happen , and we can say that they are true . The Holy Spirit also shows that these things are true . God has given this Spirit to all those who obey him . ”
44005033	When the council members heard this , they became very angry . They began to plan a way to kill the apostles .
44005034	But one member of the council , a Pharisee named Gamaliel , stood up . He was a teacher of the law , and all the people respected him . He told the men to make the apostles leave the meeting for a few minutes .
44005035	Then he said to them , “ Men of Israel , be careful of what you are planning to do to these men .
44005036	Remember when Theudas appeared ? He said he was an important man , and about 400 men joined him . But he was killed , and all who followed him were scattered and ran away . They were not able to do anything .
44005037	Later , during the time of the census , a man named Judas came from Galilee . Many people joined his group , but he was also killed , and all his followers were scattered .
44005038	And so now I tell you , stay away from these men . Leave them alone . If their plan is something they thought up , it will fail .
44005039	But if it is from God , you will not be able to stop them . You might even be fighting against God himself ! ” The Jewish leaders agreed with what Gamaliel said .
44005040	They called the apostles in again . They beat them and told them not to speak anymore using the name of Jesus . Then they let them go free .
44005041	The apostles left the council meeting . They were happy because they were given the honor of suffering dishonor for Jesus .
44005042	The apostles did not stop teaching the people . They continued to tell the Good News — that Jesus is the Messiah . They did this every day in the Temple area and in people’s homes .
44006001	More and more people were becoming followers of Jesus . But during this same time , the Greek-speaking followers began to complain against the other Jewish followers . They said that their widows were not getting their share of what the followers received every day .
44006002	The twelve apostles called the whole group of followers together . The apostles said to them , “ It would not be right for us to give up our work of teaching God’s word in order to be in charge of getting food to people .
44006003	So , brothers and sisters , choose seven of your men who have a good reputation . They must be full of wisdom and the Spirit . We will give them this work to do .
44006004	Then we can use all our time to pray and to teach the word of God . ”
44006005	The whole group liked the idea . So they chose these seven men : Stephen ( a man with great faith and full of the Holy Spirit ) , Philip , Prochorus , Nicanor , Timon , Parmenas , and Nicolaus ( a man from Antioch who had become a Jew ) .
44006006	Then they put these men before the apostles , who prayed and laid their hands on them .
44006007	The word of God was reaching more and more people . The group of followers in Jerusalem became larger and larger . Even a big group of Jewish priests believed and obeyed .
44006008	Stephen received a great blessing . God gave him power to do great wonders and miraculous signs among the people .
44006009	But some of the Jews there were from the synagogue of Free Men , as it was called . The group included Jews from Cyrene , Alexandria , Cilicia , and Asia . They started arguing with Stephen .
44006010	But the Spirit was helping him speak with wisdom . His words were so strong that these Jews could not argue with him .
44006011	So they told some men to say , “ We heard Stephen say bad things against Moses and against God ! ”
44006012	By doing this , these Jews upset the people , the older Jewish leaders , and the teachers of the law . They became so angry that they came and grabbed Stephen and took him to a meeting of the high council .
44006013	The Jews brought some men into the meeting to tell lies about Stephen . These men said , “ This man is always saying things against this holy place and against the Law of Moses .
44006014	We heard him say that Jesus from Nazareth will destroy this place and change what Moses told us to do . ”
44006015	Everyone there in the council meeting was staring at Stephen . They saw that his face looked like the face of an angel .
44007001	The high priest said to Stephen , “ Is all this true ? ”
44007002	Stephen answered , “ My Jewish fathers and brothers , listen to me . Our great and glorious God appeared to Abraham , our ancestor , when he was in Mesopotamia . This was before he lived in Haran .
44007003	God said to him , ‘ Leave your country and your people , and go to the country I will show you . ’
44007004	“ So Abraham left the country of Chaldea . He went to live in Haran . After his father died , God sent him to this place , where you live now .
44007005	But God did not give Abraham any of this land , not even a foot of it . But God promised that in the future he would give Abraham this land for himself and for his children . This was before Abraham had any children .
44007006	“ This is what God said to him : ‘ Your descendants will live in another country . They will be strangers . The people there will make them slaves and mistreat them for 400 years .
44007007	But I will punish the nation that made them slaves . ’ And God also said , ‘ After those things happen , your people will come out of that country . Then they will worship me here in this place . ’
44007008	“ God made an agreement with Abraham ; the sign for this agreement was circumcision . And so when Abraham had a son , he circumcised him when he was eight days old . His son’s name was Isaac . Isaac also circumcised his son Jacob . And Jacob did the same for his sons , who became the twelve great ancestors of our people .
44007009	“ These ancestors of ours became jealous of their brother Joseph and sold him to be a slave in Egypt . But God was with him
44007010	and saved him from all his troubles . Pharaoh was the king of Egypt then . He liked Joseph and respected him because of the wisdom God gave him . Pharaoh gave Joseph the job of being a governor of Egypt . He even let him rule over all the people in Pharaoh’s house .
44007011	But all the land of Egypt and of Canaan became dry . It became so dry that food could not grow , and the people suffered very much . Our people could not find anything to eat .
44007012	“ But Jacob heard that there was food in Egypt . So he sent our people there . This was their first trip to Egypt .
44007013	Then they went there a second time . This time Joseph told his brothers who he was . And Pharaoh learned about Joseph’s family .
44007014	Then Joseph sent some men to tell Jacob , his father , to come to Egypt . He also invited all his relatives , a total of 75 people .
44007015	So Jacob went down to Egypt . He and our other ancestors lived there until they died .
44007016	Later , their bodies were moved to Shechem , where they were put in a tomb . It was the same tomb that Abraham had bought in Shechem from the sons of Hamor . He paid them with silver .
44007017	“ The number of our people in Egypt grew . There were more and more of our people there . The promise that God made to Abraham was soon to come true .
44007018	Then a different king began to rule Egypt , one who knew nothing about Joseph .
44007019	This king tricked our people . He treated them badly , making them leave their children outside to die .
44007020	“ This was the time when Moses was born . He was a very beautiful child , and for three months his parents took care of him at home .
44007021	When they put him outside , Pharaoh’s daughter took him . She raised him as her own son .
44007022	The Egyptians taught Moses everything they knew . He was powerful in all he said and did .
44007023	“ When Moses was about 40 years old , he decided to visit his own people , the people of Israel .
44007024	He saw one of them being mistreated by an Egyptian , so he defended him . Moses hit the Egyptian to pay him back for hurting the man . He hit him so hard that it killed him .
44007025	Moses thought that his people would understand that God was using him to save them . But they did not understand .
44007026	“ The next day , Moses saw two of his own people fighting . He tried to make peace between them . He said , ‘ Men , you are brothers ! Why are you trying to hurt each other ? ’
44007027	The man who was hurting the other one pushed Moses away and said to him , ‘ Did anyone say you could be our ruler and judge ?
44007028	Will you kill me just as you killed that Egyptian yesterday ? ’
44007029	When Moses heard him say this , he left Egypt . He went to live in the land of Midian , where he was a stranger . During the time he lived there , he had two sons .
44007030	“ Forty years later Moses was in the desert near Mount Sinai . An angel appeared to him in the flame of a burning bush .
44007031	When Moses saw this , he was amazed . He went near to look closer at it . He heard a voice ; it was the Lord’s .
44007032	The Lord said , ‘ I am the same God your ancestors had — the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’ Moses began to shake with fear . He was afraid to look at the bush .
44007033	“ The Lord said to him , ‘ Take off your sandals , because the place where you are now standing is holy ground .
44007034	I have seen my people suffer much in Egypt . I have heard my people crying and have come down to save them . Come now , Moses , I am sending you back to Egypt . ’
44007035	“ This Moses was the one his people said they did not want . They said , ‘ Did anyone say you could be our ruler and judge ? ’ But he is the one God sent to be a ruler and savior . God sent him with the help of an angel , the one Moses saw in the burning bush .
44007036	So Moses led the people out of Egypt . He worked wonders and miraculous signs in Egypt , at the Red Sea , and then in the desert for 40 years .
44007037	“ This is the same Moses who said these words to the people of Israel : ‘ God will give you a prophet . That prophet will come from among your own people . He will be like me . ’
44007038	This same Moses was with the gathering of God’s people in the desert . He was with the angel who spoke to him at Mount Sinai , and he was with our ancestors . He received life-giving words from God to give to us .
44007039	“ But our ancestors did not want to obey Moses . They rejected him . They wanted to go back to Egypt again .
44007040	They said to Aaron , ‘ Moses led us out of the country of Egypt . But we don’t know what has happened to him . So make some gods to go before us and lead us . ’
44007041	So the people made an idol that looked like a calf . Then they brought sacrifices to it . They were very happy with what they had made with their own hands .
44007042	But God turned against them and let them continue worshiping the army of false gods in the sky . This is what God says in the book that contains what the prophets wrote : ‘ People of Israel , you did not bring me blood offerings and sacrifices in the desert for 40 years ;
44007043	You carried with you the tent for worshiping Moloch and the image of the star of your god Rephan . These were the idols you made to worship . So I will send you away beyond Babylon . ’
44007044	“ The Holy Tent was with our ancestors in the desert . God told Moses how to make this tent . He made it like the plan that God showed him .
44007045	Later , Joshua led our ancestors to capture the lands of the other nations . Our people went in and God made the other people go out . When our people went into this new land , they took with them this same tent . Our people received this tent from their fathers , and our people kept it until the time of David .
44007046	God was very pleased with David . He asked God to let him build a Temple for the people of Jacob .
44007047	But Solomon was the one who built the Temple .
44007048	“ But the Most High God does not live in houses built by human hands . This is what the prophet writes :
44007049	‘ The Lord says , Heaven is my throne , and the earth is where I rest my feet . So do you think you can build a house for me ? Do I need a place to rest ?
44007050	Remember , I made all these things ! ’ ”
44007051	Then Stephen said , “ You stubborn Jewish leaders ! You refuse to give your hearts to God or even listen to him . You are always against what the Holy Spirit wants you to do . That’s how your ancestors were , and you are just like them !
44007052	They persecuted every prophet who ever lived . They even killed those who long ago said that the Righteous One would come . And now you have turned against that Righteous One and killed him .
44007053	You are the people who received God’s law , which he gave you through his angels . But you don’t obey it ! ”
44007054	When those in the council meeting heard this , they became very angry . They were so mad they were grinding their teeth at him .
44007055	But Stephen was full of the Holy Spirit . He looked up into heaven and saw the glory of God . And he saw Jesus standing at God’s right side .
44007056	Stephen said , “ Look ! I see heaven open . And I see the Son of Man standing at God’s right side . ”
44007057	Everyone there started shouting loudly , covering their ears with their hands . Together they all ran at Stephen .
44007058	They took him out of the city and began throwing stones at him . The men who told lies against Stephen gave their coats to a young man named Saul .
44007059	As they were throwing the stones at him , Stephen was praying . He said , “ Lord Jesus , receive my spirit ! ”
44007060	He fell on his knees and shouted , “ Lord , don’t blame them for this sin ! ” These were his last words before he died .
44008004	They were scattered everywhere , and in every place they went , they told people the Good News .
44008005	Philip went to the city of Samaria and told people about the Messiah .
44008006	The people there heard Philip and saw the miraculous signs he was doing . They all listened carefully to what he said .
44008007	Many of these people had evil spirits inside them , but Philip made the evil spirits leave them . The spirits made a lot of noise as they came out . There were also many weak and crippled people there . Philip made these people well too .
44008008	What a happy day this was for that city !
44008009	Now there was a man named Simon who lived in that city . Before Philip came there , Simon had been doing magic and amazing all the people of Samaria . He bragged and called himself a great man .
44008010	All the people — the least important and the most important — believed what he said . They said , “ This man has the power of God that is called ‘ the Great Power . ’ ”
44008011	Simon amazed the people with his magic for so long that the people became his followers .
44008012	But Philip told the people the Good News about God’s kingdom and the power of Jesus Christ . Men and women believed Philip and were baptized .
44008013	Simon himself also believed , and after he was baptized , he stayed close to Philip . When he saw the miraculous signs and powerful things Philip did , he was amazed .
44008014	The apostles in Jerusalem heard that the people of Samaria had accepted the word of God . So they sent Peter and John to the people in Samaria .
44008015	When Peter and John arrived , they prayed for the Samaritan believers to receive the Holy Spirit .
44008016	These people had been baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus , but the Holy Spirit had not yet come down on any of them . This is why Peter and John prayed .
44008017	When the two apostles laid their hands on the people , they received the Holy Spirit .
44008018	Simon saw that the Spirit was given to people when the apostles laid their hands on them . So he offered the apostles money .
44008019	He said , “ Give me this power so that when I lay my hands on someone , they will receive the Holy Spirit . ”
44008020	Peter said to Simon , “ You and your money should both be destroyed because you thought you could buy God’s gift with money .
44008021	You cannot share with us in this work . Your heart is not right before God .
44008022	Change your heart ! Turn away from these evil thoughts and pray to the Lord . Maybe he will forgive you .
44008023	I see that you are full of bitter jealousy and cannot stop yourself from doing wrong . ”
44008024	Simon answered , “ Both of you pray to the Lord for me , so that what you have said will not happen to me . ”
44008025	Then the two apostles told the people what they had seen Jesus do . They told them the message of the Lord . Then they went back to Jerusalem . On the way , they went through many Samaritan towns and told people the Good News .
44008026	An angel of the Lord spoke to Philip . The angel said , “ Get ready and go south on the road that leads down to Gaza from Jerusalem — the road that goes through the desert . ”
44008027	So Philip got ready and went . On the road he saw a man from Ethiopia . He was a eunuch and an important official in the service of Candace , the queen of the Ethiopians . He was responsible for taking care of all her money . This man had gone to Jerusalem to worship .
44008028	Now he was on his way home . He was sitting in his chariot reading from the book of Isaiah the prophet .
44008029	The Spirit said to Philip , “ Go to that chariot and stay near it . ”
44008030	So he went toward the chariot , and he heard the man reading from Isaiah the prophet . Philip asked him , “ Do you understand what you are reading ? ”
44008031	The man answered , “ How can I understand ? I need someone to explain it to me . ” Then he invited Philip to climb in and sit with him .
44008032	The part of the Scriptures that he was reading was this : “ He was like a sheep being led to the butcher . He was like a lamb that makes no sound as its wool is being cut off . He said nothing .
44008033	He was shamed , and all his rights were taken away . His life on earth has ended . So there will be no story about his descendants . ”
44008034	The official said to Philip , “ Please , tell me , who is the prophet talking about ? Is he talking about himself or about someone else ? ”
44008035	Philip began to speak . He started with this same Scripture and told the man the Good News about Jesus .
44008036	While they were traveling down the road , they came to some water . The official said , “ Look , here is water ! What is stopping me from being baptized ? ”
44008038	Then the official ordered the chariot to stop . Both Philip and the official went down into the water , and Philip baptized him .
44008039	When they came up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord took Philip away ; the official never saw him again . The official continued on his way home . He was very happy .
44008040	But Philip appeared in a city called Azotus . He was going to the city of Caesarea . He told people the Good News in all the towns on the way from Azotus to Caesarea .
44009001	In Jerusalem Saul was still trying to scare the followers of the Lord , even saying he would kill them . He went to the high priest
44009002	and asked him to write letters to the synagogues in the city of Damascus . Saul wanted the high priest to give him the authority to find people in Damascus who were followers of the Way . If he found any believers there , men or women , he would arrest them and bring them back to Jerusalem .
44009003	So Saul went to Damascus . When he came near the city , a very bright light from heaven suddenly shined around him .
44009004	He fell to the ground and heard a voice saying to him , “ Saul , Saul ! Why are you persecuting me ? ”
44009005	Saul said , “ Who are you , Lord ? ” The voice answered , “ I am Jesus , the one you are persecuting .
44009006	Get up now and go into the city . Someone there will tell you what you must do . ”
44009007	The men traveling with Saul just stood there , unable to speak . They heard the voice , but they saw no one .
44009008	Saul got up from the ground and opened his eyes , but he could not see . So the men with him held his hand and led him into Damascus .
44009009	For three days , Saul could not see ; he did not eat or drink .
44009010	There was a follower of Jesus in Damascus named Ananias . In a vision the Lord said to him , “ Ananias ! ” Ananias answered , “ Here I am , Lord . ”
44009011	The Lord said to him , “ Get up and go to the street called Straight Street . Find the house of Judas and ask for a man named Saul from the city of Tarsus . He is there now , praying .
44009012	He has seen a vision in which a man named Ananias came and laid his hands on him so that he could see again . ”
44009013	But Ananias answered , “ Lord , many people have told me about this man . They told me about the many bad things he did to your holy people in Jerusalem .
44009014	Now he has come here to Damascus . The leading priests have given him the power to arrest all people who trust in you . ”
44009015	But the Lord Jesus said to Ananias , “ Go ! I have chosen Saul for an important work . I want him to tell other nations , their rulers , and the people of Israel about me .
44009016	I will show him all that he must suffer for me . ”
44009017	So Ananias left and went to the house of Judas . He laid his hands on Saul and said , “ Saul , my brother , the Lord Jesus sent me . He is the one you saw on the road when you came here . He sent me so that you can see again and also be filled with the Holy Spirit . ”
44009018	Immediately , something that looked like fish scales fell off Saul’s eyes . He was able to see ! Then he got up and was baptized .
44009019	After he ate , he began to feel strong again . Saul stayed with the followers of Jesus in Damascus for a few days .
44009020	Soon he began to go to the synagogues and tell people about Jesus . He told the people , “ Jesus is the Son of God ! ”
44009021	All the people who heard Saul were amazed . They said , “ This is the same man who was in Jerusalem trying to destroy the people who trust in Jesus ! And that’s why he has come here — to arrest the followers of Jesus and take them back to the leading priests . ”
44009022	But Saul became more and more powerful in proving that Jesus is the Messiah . His proofs were so strong that the Jews who lived in Damascus could not argue with him .
44009023	After many days , some Jews made plans to kill Saul .
44009024	They were watching the city gates day and night . They wanted to kill Saul , but he learned about their plan .
44009025	One night some followers that Saul had taught helped him leave the city . They put him in a basket and lowered it down through a hole in the city wall .
44009026	Then Saul went to Jerusalem . He tried to join the group of followers , but they were all afraid of him . They did not believe that he was really a follower of Jesus .
44009027	But Barnabas accepted Saul and took him to the apostles . He told them how Saul had seen the Lord on the road and how the Lord had spoken to Saul . Then he told them how boldly Saul had spoken for the Lord in Damascus .
44009028	And so Saul stayed with the followers and went all around Jerusalem speaking boldly for the Lord .
44009029	He often had arguments with the Greek-speaking Jews , who began making plans to kill him .
44009030	When the believers learned about this , they took Saul to Caesarea , and from there they sent him to the city of Tarsus .
44009031	The church in Judea , Galilee , and Samaria had a time of peace . And with the help of the Holy Spirit , these groups of believers became stronger in faith and showed their respect for the Lord by the way they lived . So the church everywhere grew in numbers .
44009032	Peter was traveling through all the areas around Jerusalem , and he stopped to visit the believers who lived in Lydda .
44009033	There he met a man named Aeneas , who was paralyzed and had not been able to get out of bed for the past eight years .
44009034	Peter said to him , “ Aeneas , Jesus Christ heals you . Get up and make your bed ! ” He stood up immediately .
44009035	All the people living in Lydda and on the plain of Sharon saw him , and they decided to follow the Lord .
44009036	In the city of Joppa there was a follower of Jesus named Tabitha . Her Greek name , Dorcas , means “ a deer . ” She was always doing good things for people and giving money to those in need .
44009037	While Peter was in Lydda , Tabitha became sick and died . They washed her body and put it in an upstairs room .
44009038	The followers in Joppa heard that Peter was in Lydda , which was not far away . So they sent two men , who begged him , “ Hurry , please come quickly ! ”
44009039	Peter got ready and went with them . When he arrived , they took him to the upstairs room . All the widows stood around him . They were crying and showing him the coats and other clothes that Tabitha had made during her time with them .
44009040	Peter sent all the people out of the room . He knelt down and prayed . Then he turned to Tabitha’s body and said , “ Tabitha , stand up ! ” She opened her eyes . When she saw Peter , she sat up .
44009041	He gave her his hand and helped her stand up . Then he called the believers and the widows into the room . He showed them Tabitha ; she was alive !
44009042	People everywhere in Joppa learned about this , and many believed in the Lord .
44009043	Peter stayed in Joppa for many days at the home of a man named Simon , who was a leatherworker .
44010001	In the city of Caesarea there was a man named Cornelius , a Roman army officer in what was called the Italian Unit .
44010002	He was a religious man . He and all the others who lived in his house were worshipers of the true God . He gave much of his money to help the poor people and always prayed to God .
44010003	One afternoon about three o’clock , Cornelius had a vision . He clearly saw an angel from God coming to him and saying , “ Cornelius ! ”
44010004	Staring at the angel and feeling afraid , Cornelius said , “ What do you want , sir ? ” The angel said to him , “ God has heard your prayers and has seen your gifts to the poor . He remembers you and all you have done .
44010005	Send some men now to the city of Joppa to get a man named Simon , who is also called Peter .
44010006	He is staying with someone also named Simon , a leatherworker who has a house beside the sea . ”
44010007	The angel who spoke to Cornelius left . Then Cornelius called two of his servants and a soldier . The soldier was a religious man , one of his close helpers .
44010008	Cornelius explained everything to these three men and sent them to Joppa .
44010009	The next day they were coming near Joppa about noon , when Peter was going up to the roof to pray .
44010010	He was hungry and wanted to eat . But while they were preparing the food for Peter to eat , he had a vision .
44010011	He saw something coming down through the open sky . It looked like a big sheet being lowered to the ground by its four corners .
44010012	In it were all kinds of animals , reptiles , and birds .
44010013	Then a voice said to him , “ Get up , Peter ; kill anything here and eat it . ”
44010014	But Peter said , “ I can’t do that , Lord ! I have never eaten anything that is not pure or fit to be used for food . ”
44010015	But the voice said to him again , “ God has made these things pure . Don’t say they are unfit to eat . ”
44010016	This happened three times . Then the whole thing was taken back up into heaven .
44010017	Peter wondered what this vision meant . The men Cornelius sent had found Simon’s house . They were standing at the door .
44010018	They asked , “ Is Simon Peter staying here ? ”
44010019	While Peter was still thinking about the vision , the Spirit said to him , “ Listen , three men are looking for you .
44010020	Get up and go downstairs . Go with these men without wondering if it’s all right , because I sent them . ”
44010021	So Peter went downstairs and said to them , “ I think I’m the man you are looking for . Why did you come here ? ”
44010022	The men said , “ A holy angel told Cornelius to invite you to his house . He is an army officer . He is a good man , one who worships God , and all the Jewish people respect him . The angel told him to invite you to his house so that he can listen to what you have to say . ”
44010023	Peter asked the men to come in and stay for the night . The next day Peter got ready and went away with the three men . Some of the believers from Joppa went with him .
44010024	The next day they came to the city of Caesarea . Cornelius was waiting for them and had already gathered his relatives and close friends at his house .
44010025	When Peter entered the house , Cornelius met him . He fell down at Peter’s feet and worshiped him .
44010026	But Peter told him to get up . Peter said , “ Stand up ! I am only a man like you . ”
44010027	Peter continued talking with Cornelius . Then Peter went inside and saw a large group of people gathered there .
44010028	Peter said to the people , “ You understand that it is against our law for a Jew to associate with or visit anyone who is not a Jew . But God has shown me that I should not consider anyone unfit or say they are not pure .
44010029	That’s why I didn’t argue when your men asked me to come here . Now , please tell me why you sent for me . ”
44010030	Cornelius said , “ Four days ago , I was praying in my house . It was at this same time — three o’clock in the afternoon . Suddenly there was someone standing before me wearing bright , shiny clothes .
44010031	He said , ‘ Cornelius , God has heard your prayer and has seen your gifts to the poor . He remembers you and all you have done .
44010032	So send some men to the city of Joppa and tell Simon Peter to come . He is staying with another man named Simon , a leatherworker who has a house beside the sea . ’
44010033	So I sent for you immediately . It was very good of you to come here . Now we are all here before God to hear everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us . ”
44010034	Peter began to speak : “ I really understand now that God does not consider some people to be better than others .
44010035	He accepts anyone who worships him and does what is right . It is not important what nation they come from .
44010036	God has spoken to the people of Israel . He sent them the Good News that peace has come through Jesus Christ , the Lord of all people .
44010037	“ You know what has happened all over Judea . It began in Galilee after John told the people they needed to be baptized .
44010038	You know about Jesus from Nazareth . God made him the Messiah by giving him the Holy Spirit and power . Jesus went everywhere doing good for people . He healed those who were ruled by the devil , showing that God was with him .
44010039	“ We saw all that Jesus did in Judea and in Jerusalem . But he was killed . They put him on a cross made of wood .
44010040	But on the third day after his death , God raised him to life and let him be seen openly .
44010041	He was not seen by everyone , but only by us , the ones God had already chosen to be witnesses . We ate and drank with him after he was raised from death .
44010042	“ Jesus told us to go and speak to the people . He told us to tell them that he is the one God chose to be the Judge of all who are living and all who have died .
44010043	Everyone who believes in Jesus will have their sins forgiven through his name . All the prophets agree that this is true . ”
44010044	While Peter was still speaking these words , the Holy Spirit came down on all those who were listening to his speech .
44010045	The Jewish believers who came with Peter were amazed that the Holy Spirit had been poured out as a gift also to people who were not Jews .
44010046	They heard them speaking different languages and praising God . Then Peter said ,
44010047	“ How can anyone object to these people being baptized in water ? They have received the Holy Spirit the same as we did ! ”
44010048	So Peter told them to baptize Cornelius and his relatives and friends in the name of Jesus Christ . Then they asked Peter to stay with them for a few days .
44011001	The apostles and the believers in Judea heard that non-Jewish people had accepted God’s teaching too .
44011002	But when Peter came to Jerusalem , some Jewish believers argued with him .
44011003	They said , “ You went into the homes of people who are not Jews and are not circumcised , and you even ate with them ! ”
44011004	So Peter explained the whole story to them .
44011005	He said , “ I was in the city of Joppa . While I was praying , I had a vision . I saw something coming down from heaven . It looked like a big sheet being lowered to the ground by its four corners . It came down close to me ,
44011006	and I looked inside . I saw all kinds of animals , including wild ones , as well as reptiles and birds .
44011007	I heard a voice say to me , ‘ Get up , Peter . Kill anything here and eat it ! ’
44011008	“ But I said , ‘ I can’t do that , Lord ! I have never eaten anything that is not pure or fit to be used for food . ’
44011009	“ But the voice from heaven answered again , ‘ God has made these things pure . Don’t say they are unfit to eat ! ’
44011010	“ This happened three times . Then the whole thing was taken back into heaven .
44011011	Suddenly there were three men standing outside the house where I was staying . They had been sent from Caesarea to get me .
