44027002	We got on a ship from the city of Adramyttium that was ready to sail to different places in Asia . Aristarchus , a man from Thessalonica in Macedonia , went with us .
44027003	The next day we came to the city of Sidon . Julius was very good to Paul and gave him freedom to go visit his friends there , who gave him whatever he needed .
44027004	We left that city and sailed close to the island of Cyprus because the wind was blowing against us .
44027005	We went across the sea by Cilicia and Pamphylia . Then we came to the city of Myra in Lycia .
44027006	There the army officer found a ship from the city of Alexandria that was going to Italy . So he put us on it .
44027007	We sailed slowly for many days . It was hard for us to reach the city of Cnidus because the wind was blowing against us . We could not go any farther that way , so we sailed by the south side of the island of Crete near Salmone .
44027008	We sailed along the coast , but the sailing was hard . Then we came to a place called Safe Harbors , near the city of Lasea .
44027009	We had lost much time , and it was now dangerous to sail , because it was already after the Jewish day of fasting . So Paul warned them ,
44027010	“ Men , I can see that there will be a lot of trouble on this trip . The ship , everything in it , and even our lives may be lost ! ”
44027011	But the captain and the owner of the ship did not agree with Paul . So the army officer accepted what they said instead of believing Paul .
44027012	Also , that harbor was not a good place for the ship to stay for the winter , so most of the men decided that we should leave there . They hoped we could reach Phoenix , where the ship could stay for the winter . Phoenix was a city on the island of Crete . It had a harbor that faced southwest and northwest .
44027013	Then a good wind began to blow from the south . The men on the ship thought , “ This is the wind we wanted , and now we have it ! ” So they pulled up the anchor . We sailed very close to the island of Crete .
44027014	But then a very strong wind called the “ Northeaster ” came from across the island .
44027015	This wind took the ship and carried it away . The ship could not sail against the wind , so we stopped trying and let the wind blow us .
44027016	We went below a small island named Cauda . With the island protecting us from the wind , we were able to bring in the lifeboat , but it was very hard to do .
44027017	After the men brought the lifeboat in , they tied ropes around the ship to hold it together . The men were afraid that the ship would hit the sandbanks of Syrtis . So they lowered the sail and let the wind carry the ship .
44027018	The next day the storm was blowing against us so hard that the men threw some things out of the ship .
44027019	A day later they threw out the ship’s equipment .
44027020	For many days we could not see the sun or the stars . The storm was very bad . We lost all hope of staying alive — we thought we would die .
44027021	The men did not eat for a long time . Then one day Paul stood up before them and said , “ Men , I told you not to leave Crete . You should have listened to me . Then you would not have all this trouble and loss .
44027022	But now I tell you to be happy . None of you will die , but the ship will be lost .
44027023	Last night an angel came to me from God — the God I worship and belong to .
44027024	The angel said , ‘ Paul , don’t be afraid ! You must stand before Caesar . And God has given you this promise : He will save the lives of all those sailing with you . ’
44027025	So men , there is nothing to worry about . I trust God , and I am sure everything will happen just as his angel told me .
44027026	But we will crash on an island . ”
44027027	On the fourteenth night we were still being blown around in the Adriatic Sea . The sailors thought we were close to land .
44027028	They threw a rope into the water with a weight on the end of it . They found that the water was 120 feet deep . They went a little farther and threw the rope in again . It was 90 feet deep .
44027029	The sailors were afraid that we would hit the rocks , so they threw four anchors into the water . Then they prayed for daylight to come .
44027030	Some of the sailors wanted to leave the ship , and they lowered the lifeboat to the water . They wanted the other men to think that they were throwing more anchors from the front of the ship .
44027031	But Paul told the army officer and the other soldiers , “ If these men do not stay in the ship , you will lose all hope of survival . ”
44027032	So the soldiers cut the ropes and let the lifeboat fall into the water .
44027033	Just before dawn Paul began persuading all the people to eat something . He said , “ For the past two weeks you have been waiting and watching . You have not eaten for 14 days .
44027034	Now I beg you to eat something . You need it to stay alive . None of you will lose even one hair off your heads . ”
44027035	After he said this , Paul took some bread and thanked God for it before all of them . He broke off a piece and began eating .
44027036	All the men felt better and started eating too .
44027037	( There were 276 people on the ship . )
44027038	We ate all we wanted . Then we began making the ship lighter by throwing the grain into the sea .
44027039	When daylight came , the sailors saw land , but they did not know what land it was . They saw a bay with a beach and wanted to sail the ship to the beach if they could .
44027040	So they cut the ropes to the anchors and left the anchors in the sea . At the same time , they untied the ropes that were holding the rudders . Then they raised the front sail into the wind and sailed toward the beach .
44027041	But the ship hit a sandbank . The front of the ship stuck there and could not move . Then the big waves began to break the back of the ship to pieces .
44027042	The soldiers decided to kill the prisoners so that none of the prisoners could swim away and escape .
44027043	But Julius the army officer wanted to let Paul live . So he did not allow the soldiers to kill the prisoners . He told the people who could swim to jump into the water and swim to land .
44027044	The others used wooden boards or pieces of the ship . And this is how all the people went safely to land .
44028001	When we were safe on land , we learned that the island was called Malta .
44028002	The people who lived there were very good to us . It was raining and very cold , so they built a fire and welcomed all of us .
44028003	Paul gathered a pile of sticks for the fire . He was putting the sticks on the fire , and a poisonous snake came out because of the heat and bit him on the hand .
44028004	When the people living on the island saw the snake hanging from his hand , they said , “ This man must be a murderer ! He did not die in the sea , but Justice does not want him to live . ”
44028005	But Paul shook the snake off into the fire and was not hurt .
44028006	The people thought he would swell up or fall down dead . They waited and watched him for a long time , but nothing bad happened to him . So they changed their opinion . They said , “ He is a god ! ”
44028007	There were some fields around that same area . They were owned by a man named Publius , the most important Roman official on the island . He welcomed us into his home and was very good to us . We stayed in his house for three days .
44028008	Publius’ father was very sick . He had a fever and dysentery , but Paul went to him and prayed for him . He laid his hands on the man and healed him .
44028009	After this happened , all the other sick people on the island came to Paul , and he healed them too .
44028012	We stopped at the city of Syracuse . We stayed there three days and then left .
44028013	We came to the city of Rhegium . The next day a wind began to blow from the southwest , so we were able to leave . A day later we came to the city of Puteoli .
44028014	We found some believers there , who asked us to stay with them a week . Finally , we came to Rome .
44028015	The brothers and sisters in Rome heard about us and came out to meet us at the Market of Appius and at the Three Inns . When Paul saw these believers , he thanked God and felt encouraged .
44028016	When we came to Rome , Paul was allowed to live alone . But a soldier stayed with him to guard him .
44028017	Three days later Paul sent for some of the most important Jews . When they came together , he said , “ My brothers , I have done nothing against our people or against the customs of our fathers . But I was arrested in Jerusalem and handed over to the Romans .
44028018	They asked me many questions , but they could not find any reason why I should be put to death . So they wanted to let me go free .
44028019	But the Jews there did not want that . So I had to ask to come to Rome to have my trial before Caesar . That doesn’t mean I am accusing my people of doing anything wrong .
44028020	That is why I wanted to see you and talk with you . I am bound with this chain because I believe in the hope of Israel . ”
44028021	The Jews answered Paul , “ We have received no letters from Judea about you . None of our Jewish brothers who have traveled from there brought news about you or told us anything bad about you .
44028022	We want to hear your ideas . We know that people everywhere are speaking against this new group . ”
44028023	Paul and the Jews chose a day for a meeting . On that day many more of these Jews met with Paul at his house . He spoke to them all day long , explaining God’s kingdom to them . He used the Law of Moses and the writings of the prophets to persuade them to believe in Jesus .
44028024	Some of the Jews believed what he said , but others did not believe .
44028025	They had an argument among themselves and were ready to leave . But Paul said one more thing to them : “ The Holy Spirit spoke the truth to your fathers through Isaiah the prophet . He said ,
44028026	‘ Go to this people and tell them : You will listen and you will hear , but you will not understand . You will look and you will see , but you will not understand what you see .
44028027	Yes , the minds of these people are now closed . They have ears , but they don’t listen . They have eyes , but they refuse to see . If their minds were not closed , they might see with their eyes ; they might hear with their ears ; they might understand with their minds . Then they might turn back to me and be healed . ’
44028028	“ I want you Jews to know that God has sent his salvation to the non-Jewish people . They will listen ! ”
44028030	Paul stayed two full years in his own rented house . He welcomed all the people who came and visited him .
44028031	He told them about God’s kingdom and taught them about the Lord Jesus Christ . He was very bold , and no one tried to stop him from speaking .
45001001	Greetings from Paul , a servant of Christ Jesus . God chose me to be an apostle and gave me the work of telling his Good News .
45001002	God promised long ago through his prophets in the Holy Scriptures to give this Good News to his people .
45001005	Through Christ , God gave me the special work of an apostle — to lead people of all nations to believe and obey him . I do all this to honor Christ .
45001006	You are some of those who have been chosen to belong to Jesus Christ .
45001007	This letter is to all of you in Rome . God loves you , and he has chosen you to be his holy people . Grace and peace to you from God our Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
45001008	First I want to say that I thank my God through Jesus Christ for all of you . I thank him because people everywhere in the world are talking about your great faith .
45001011	I want very much to see you and give you some spiritual gift to make your faith stronger .
45001012	I mean that I want us to help each other with the faith that we have . Your faith will help me , and my faith will help you .
45001013	Brothers and sisters , I want you to know that I have planned many times to come to you , but something always happens to change my plans . I would like to see the same good result among you that I have had from my work among the other non-Jewish people .
45001014	I must serve all people — those who share in Greek culture and those who are less civilized , the educated as well as the ignorant .
45001015	That is why I want so much to tell the Good News to you there in Rome .
45001016	I am proud of the Good News , because it is the power God uses to save everyone who believes — to save the Jews first , and now to save those who are not Jews .
45001017	The Good News shows how God makes people right with himself . God’s way of making people right begins and ends with faith . As the Scriptures say , “ The one who is right with God by faith will live forever . ”
45001018	God shows his anger from heaven against all the evil and wrong things that people do . Their evil lives hide the truth they have .
45001019	This makes God angry because they have been shown what he is like . Yes , God has made it clear to them .
45001020	There are things about God that people cannot see — his eternal power and all that makes him God . But since the beginning of the world , those things have been easy for people to understand . They are made clear in what God has made . So people have no excuse for the evil they do .
45001021	People knew God , but they did not honor him as God , and they did not thank him . Their ideas were all useless . There was not one good thought left in their foolish minds .
45001022	They said they were wise , but they became fools .
45001023	Instead of honoring the divine greatness of God , who lives forever , they traded it for the worship of idols — things made to look like humans , who get sick and die , or like birds , animals , and snakes .
45001024	People wanted only to do evil . So God left them and let them go their sinful way . And so they became completely immoral and used their bodies in shameful ways with each other .
45001025	They traded the truth of God for a lie . They bowed down and worshiped the things God made instead of worshiping the God who made those things . He is the one who should be praised forever . Amen .
45001026	Because people did those things , God left them and let them do the shameful things they wanted to do . Women stopped having natural sex with men and started having sex with other women .
45001027	In the same way , men stopped having natural sex with women and began wanting each other all the time . Men did shameful things with other men , and in their bodies they received the punishment for those wrongs .
45001028	People did not think it was important to have a true knowledge of God . So God left them and allowed them to have their own worthless thinking . And so they do what they should not do .
45001029	They are filled with every kind of sin , evil , greed , and hatred . They are full of jealousy , murder , fighting , lying , and thinking the worst things about each other . They gossip
45001030	and say evil things about each other . They hate God . They are rude , proud , and brag about themselves . They invent ways of doing evil . They don’t obey their parents ,
45001031	they are foolish , they don’t keep their promises , and they show no kindness or mercy to others .
45001032	They know God’s law says that anyone who lives like that should die . But they not only continue to do these things themselves , but they also encourage others who do them .
45002001	So do you think that you can judge those other people ? You are wrong . You too are guilty of sin . You judge them , but you do the same things they do . So when you judge them , you are really condemning yourself .
45002002	God judges all who do such things , and we know his judgment is right .
45002003	And since you do the same things as those people you judge , surely you understand that God will punish you too . How could you think you would be able to escape his judgment ?
45002004	God has been kind to you . He has been very patient , waiting for you to change . But you think nothing of his kindness . Maybe you don’t understand that God is kind to you so that you will decide to change your lives .
45002005	But you are so stubborn ! You refuse to change . So you are making your own punishment greater and greater . You will be punished on the day when God will show his anger . On that day everyone will see how right God is to judge people .
45002006	He will reward or punish everyone for what they have done .
45002007	Some people live for God’s glory , for honor , and for life that cannot be destroyed . They live for those things by always continuing to do good . God will give eternal life to them .
45002008	But others are selfish and refuse to follow truth . They follow evil . God will show his anger and punish them .
45002009	He will give trouble and suffering to everyone who does evil — to the Jews first and also to those who are not Jews .
45002010	But he will give glory , honor , and peace to everyone who does good — to the Jews first and also to those who are not Jews .
45002011	God judges everyone the same . It doesn’t matter who they are .
45002012	People who have the law and those who have never heard of the law are all the same when they sin . People who don’t have the law and are sinners will be lost . And , in the same way , those who have the law and are sinners will be judged by the law .
45002013	Hearing the law does not make people right with God . They will be right before him only if they always do what the law says .
45002014	Those who are not Jews don’t have the law . But when they naturally do what the law commands without even knowing the law , then they are their own law . This is true even though they don’t have the written law .
45002015	They show that in their hearts they know what is right and wrong , the same as the law commands , and their consciences agree . Sometimes their thoughts tell them that they have done wrong , and this makes them guilty . And sometimes their thoughts tell them that they have done right , and this makes them not guilty .
45002016	All this will happen on the day when God will judge people’s secret thoughts through Jesus Christ . This is part of the Good News that I tell everyone .
45002017	What about you ? You say you are a Jew . You trust in the law and proudly claim to be close to God .
45002018	You know what God wants you to do . And you know what is important , because you have learned the law .
45002019	You think you are a guide for people who don’t know the right way , a light for those who are in the dark .
45002020	You think you can show foolish people what is right . And you think you are a teacher for those who are just beginning to learn . You have the law , and so you think you know everything and have all truth .
45002021	You teach others , so why don’t you teach yourself ? You tell them not to steal , but you yourself steal .
45002022	You say they must not commit adultery , but you yourself are guilty of that sin . You hate idols , but you steal them from their temples .
45002023	You are so proud that you have God’s law , but you bring shame to God by breaking his law .
45002024	As the Scriptures say , “ People in other nations insult God because of you . ”
45002025	If you follow the law , then your circumcision has meaning . But if you break the law , then it is as if you were never circumcised .
45002026	Those who are not Jews are not circumcised . But if they do what the law says , it is as if they were circumcised .
45002027	You have the written law and circumcision , but you break the law . So those who are not circumcised in their bodies , but still obey the law , will show that you are guilty .
45002028	You are not a true Jew if you are only a Jew in your physical body . True circumcision is not only on the outside of the body .
45002029	A true Jew is one who is a Jew inside . True circumcision is done in the heart . It is done by the Spirit , not by the written law . And anyone who is circumcised in the heart by the Spirit gets praise from God , not from people .
45003001	So , do Jews have anything that others don’t have ? Do they get any benefit from being circumcised ?
45003002	Yes , the Jews have many benefits . The most important one is this : God trusted the Jews with his teachings .
45003003	It is true that some Jews were not faithful to God . But will that stop God from doing what he promised ?
45003004	No , even if everyone else is a liar , God will always do what he says . As the Scriptures say about him , “ You will be proved right in what you say , and you will win when people accuse you . ”
45003005	When we do wrong , that shows more clearly that God is right . So can we say that God does wrong when he punishes us ? ( That’s the way some people think . )
45003006	Of course not . If God could not punish us , how could he judge the world ?
45003007	Someone might say , “ When I lie , it really gives God glory , because my lie makes his truth easier to see . So why am I judged a sinner ? ”
45003008	It would be the same to say , “ We should do evil so that good will come . ” Many people criticize us , saying that’s what we teach . They are wrong , and they should be condemned for saying that .
45003009	So are we Jews better than other people ? No , we have already said that those who are Jews , as well as those who are not Jews , are the same . They are all guilty of sin .
45003010	As the Scriptures say , “ There is no one doing what is right , not even one .
45003011	There is no one who understands . There is no one who is trying to be with God .
45003012	They have all turned away from him , and now they are of no use to anyone . There is no one who does good , not even one . ”
45003013	“ Their words come from mouths that are like open graves . They use their lying tongues to deceive others . ” “ Their words are like the poison of snakes . ”
45003014	“ Their mouths are full of cursing and angry words . ”
45003015	“ They are always ready to kill someone .
45003016	Everywhere they go they cause trouble and ruin .
45003017	They don’t know how to live in peace . ”
45003018	“ They have no fear or respect for God . ”
45003019	What the law says is for those who are under the law . It stops anyone from making excuses . And it brings the whole world under God’s judgment ,
45003020	because no one can be made right with God by following the law . The law only shows us our sin .
45003021	But God has a way to make people right , and it has nothing to do with the law . He has now shown us that new way , which the law and the prophets told us about .
45003022	God makes people right through their faith in Jesus Christ . He does this for all who believe in Christ . Everyone is the same .
45003023	All have sinned and are not good enough to share God’s divine greatness .
45003024	They are made right with God by his grace . This is a free gift . They are made right with God by being made free from sin through Jesus Christ .
45003027	So do we have any reason to boast about ourselves ? No reason at all . And why not ? Because we are depending on the way of faith , not on what we have done in following the law .
45003028	I mean we are made right with God through faith , not through what we have done to follow the law . This is what we believe .
45003029	God is not only the God of the Jews . He is also the God of those who are not Jews .
45003030	There is only one God . He will make Jews right with him by their faith , and he will also make non-Jews right with him through their faith .
45003031	So do we destroy the law by following the way of faith ? Not at all ! In fact , faith causes us to be what the law actually wants .
45004001	So what can we say about Abraham , the father of our people ? What did he learn about faith ?
45004002	If Abraham was made right by the things he did , he had a reason to boast about himself . But God knew different .
45004003	That’s why the Scriptures say , “ Abraham believed God , and because of this he was accepted as one who is right with God . ”
45004004	When people work , their pay is not given to them as a gift . They earn the pay they get .
45004005	But people cannot do any work that will make them right with God . So they must trust in him . Then he accepts their faith , and that makes them right with him . He is the one who makes even evil people right .
45004006	David said the same thing when he was talking about the blessing people have when God accepts them as good without looking at what they have done :
45004007	“ It is a great blessing when people are forgiven for the wrongs they have done , when their sins are erased !
45004008	It is a great blessing when the Lord accepts people as if they are without sin ! ”
45004009	Is this blessing only for those who are circumcised ? Or is it also for those who are not circumcised ? We have already said that it was because of Abraham’s faith that he was accepted as one who is right with God .
45004010	So how did this happen ? Did God accept Abraham before or after he was circumcised ? God accepted him before his circumcision .
45004011	Abraham was circumcised later to show that God accepted him . His circumcision was proof that he was right with God through faith before he was circumcised . So Abraham is the father of all those who believe but are not circumcised . They believe and are accepted as people who are right with God .
45004012	And Abraham is also the father of those who have been circumcised . But it is not their circumcision that makes him their father . He is their father only if they live following the faith that our father Abraham had before he was circumcised .
45004013	Abraham and his descendants received the promise that they would get the whole world . But Abraham did not receive that promise because he followed the law . He received that promise because he was right with God through his faith .
45004014	If people could get God’s promise by following the law , then faith is worthless . And God’s promise to Abraham is worthless ,
45004015	because the law can only bring God’s anger on those who disobey it . But if there is no law , then there is nothing to disobey .
45004016	So people get what God promised by having faith . This happens so that the promise can be a free gift . And if the promise is a free gift , then all of Abraham’s people will get that promise . The promise is not just for those who live under the Law of Moses . It is for all who live with faith as Abraham did . He is the father of us all .
45004017	As the Scriptures say , “ I have made you a father of many nations . ” This is true before God , the one Abraham believed — the God who gives life to the dead and speaks of things that don’t yet exist as if they are real .
45004018	There was no hope that Abraham would have children , but Abraham believed God and continued to hope . And that is why he became the father of many nations . As God told him , “ You will have many descendants . ”
45004019	Abraham was almost a hundred years old , so he was past the age for having children . Also , Sarah could not have children . Abraham was well aware of this , but his faith in God never became weak .
45004020	He never doubted that God would do what he promised . He never stopped believing . In fact , he grew stronger in his faith and just praised God .
45004021	Abraham felt sure that God was able to do what he promised .
45004022	So that’s why “ he was accepted as one who is right with God . ”
45004023	These words ( “ he was accepted ” ) were written not only for Abraham .
45004024	They were also written for us . God will also accept us because we believe . We believe in the one who raised Jesus our Lord from death .
45004025	Jesus was handed over to die for our sins , and he was raised from death to make us right with God .
45005001	We have been made right with God because of our faith . So we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ .
45005002	Through our faith , Christ has brought us into that blessing of God’s grace that we now enjoy . And we are very happy because of the hope we have of sharing God’s glory .
45005003	And we are also happy with the troubles we have . Why are we happy with troubles ? Because we know that these troubles make us more patient .
45005004	And this patience is proof that we are strong . And this proof gives us hope .
45005005	And this hope will never disappoint us . We know this because God has poured out his love to fill our hearts through the Holy Spirit he gave us .
45005006	Christ died for us when we were unable to help ourselves . We were living against God , but at just the right time Christ died for us .
45005007	Very few people will die to save the life of someone else , even if it is for a good person . Someone might be willing to die for an especially good person .
45005008	But Christ died for us while we were still sinners , and by this God showed how much he loves us .
45005009	We have been made right with God by the blood sacrifice of Christ . So through Christ we will surely be saved from God’s anger .
45005010	I mean that while we were God’s enemies , he made friends with us through his Son’s death . And the fact that we are now God’s friends makes it even more certain that he will save us through his Son’s life .
45005011	And not only will we be saved , but we also rejoice right now in what God has done for us through our Lord Jesus Christ . It is because of Jesus that we are now God’s friends .
45005012	Sin came into the world because of what one man did . And with sin came death . So this is why all people must die — because all people have sinned .
45005013	Sin was in the world before the Law of Moses . But God does not consider people guilty of sin if there is no law .
45005014	But from the time of Adam to the time of Moses , everyone had to die . Adam died because he sinned by not obeying God’s command . But even those who did not sin that same way had to die . That one man , Adam , can be compared to Christ , the one who was coming in the future .
45005015	But God’s free gift is not like Adam’s sin . Many people died because of the sin of that one man . But the grace that people received from God was much greater . Many received God’s gift of life by the grace of this other man , Jesus Christ .
45005016	After Adam sinned once , he was judged guilty . But the gift of God is different . His free gift came after many sins , and it makes people right with him .
45005017	One man sinned , and so death ruled all people because of that one man . But now some people accept God’s full grace and his great gift of being made right . Surely they will have true life and rule through the one man , Jesus Christ .
45005018	So that one sin of Adam brought the punishment of death to all people . But in the same way , Christ did something so good that it makes all people right with God . And that brings them true life .
45005019	One man disobeyed God and many became sinners . But in the same way , one man obeyed God and many will be made right .
45005020	The law was brought in so that more people would sin the way Adam did . But where sin increased , there was even more of God’s grace .
45005021	Sin once used death to rule us . But God gave us more of his grace so that grace could rule by making us right with him . And this brings us eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
45006001	So do you think we should continue sinning so that God will give us more and more grace ?
45006002	Of course not ! Our old sinful life ended . It’s dead . So how can we continue living in sin ?
45006003	Did you forget that all of us became part of Christ Jesus when we were baptized ? In our baptism we shared in his death .
45006004	So when we were baptized , we were buried with Christ and took part in his death . And just as Christ was raised from death by the wonderful power of the Father , so we can now live a new life .
45006005	Christ died , and we have been joined with him by dying too . So we will also be joined with him by rising from death as he did .
45006006	We know that our old life was put to death on the cross with Christ . This happened so that our sinful selves would have no power over us . Then we would not be slaves to sin .
45006007	Anyone who has died is made free from sin’s control .
45006008	If we died with Christ , we know that we will also live with him .
45006009	Christ was raised from death . And we know that he cannot die again . Death has no power over him now .
45006010	Yes , when Christ died , he died to defeat the power of sin one time — enough for all time . He now has a new life , and his new life is with God .
45006011	In the same way , you should see yourselves as being dead to the power of sin and alive for God through Christ Jesus .
45006012	But don’t let sin control your life here on earth . You must not be ruled by the things your sinful self makes you want to do .
45006013	Don’t offer the parts of your body to serve sin . Don’t use your bodies to do evil , but offer yourselves to God , as people who have died and now live . Offer the parts of your body to God to be used for doing good .
45006014	Sin will not be your master , because you are not under law . You now live under God’s grace .
45006015	So what should we do ? Should we sin because we are under grace and not under law ? Certainly not !
45006016	Surely you know that you become the slaves of whatever you give yourselves to . Anything or anyone you follow will be your master . You can follow sin , or you can obey God . Following sin brings spiritual death , but obeying God makes you right with him .
45006017	In the past you were slaves to sin — sin controlled you . But thank God , you fully obeyed what you were taught .
45006018	You were made free from sin , and now you are slaves to what is right .
45006019	I use this example from everyday life because you need help in understanding spiritual truths . In the past you offered the parts of your body to be slaves to your immoral and sinful thoughts . The result was that you lived only for sin . In the same way , you must now offer yourselves to be slaves to what is right . Then you will live only for God .
45006020	In the past you were slaves to sin , and you did not even think about doing right .
45006021	You did evil things , and now you are ashamed of what you did . Did those things help you ? No , they only brought death .
45006022	But now you are free from sin . You have become slaves of God , and the result is that you live only for God . This will bring you eternal life .
45006023	When people sin , they earn what sin pays — death . But God gives his people a free gift — eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord .
45007001	Brothers and sisters , you all understand the Law of Moses . So surely you know that the law rules over people only while they are alive .
45007002	It’s like what the law says about marriage : A woman must stay married to her husband as long as he is alive . But if her husband dies , she is made free from the law of marriage .
45007003	But if she marries another man while her husband is still alive , the law says she is guilty of adultery . But if her husband dies , she is made free from the law of marriage . So if she marries another man after her husband dies , she is not guilty of adultery .
45007004	In the same way , my brothers and sisters , your old selves died and you became free from the law through the body of Christ . Now you belong to someone else . You belong to the one who was raised from death . We belong to Christ so that we can be used in service to God .
45007005	In the past we were ruled by our sinful selves . The law made us want to do sinful things . And those sinful desires controlled our bodies , so that what we did only brought us spiritual death .
45007006	In the past the law held us as prisoners , but our old selves died , and we were made free from the law . So now we serve God in a new way , not in the old way , with the written rules . Now we serve God in the new way , with the Spirit .
45007007	You might think I am saying that sin and the law are the same . That is not true . But the law was the only way I could learn what sin means . I would never have known it is wrong to want something that is not mine . But the law said , “ You must not want what belongs to someone else . ”
45007008	And sin found a way to use that command and make me want all kinds of things that weren’t mine . So sin came to me because of the command . But without the law , sin has no power .
45007009	Before I knew the law , I was alive . But when I heard the law’s command , sin began to live ,
45007010	and I died spiritually . The command was meant to bring life , but for me it brought death .
45007011	Sin found a way to fool me by using the command to make me die .
45007012	Now the law is holy , and the command is holy and right and good .
45007013	Does this mean that something that is good brought death to me ? No , it was sin that used the good command to bring me death . This shows how terrible sin really is . It can use a good command to produce a result that shows sin at its very worst .
45007014	We know that the law is spiritual , but I am not . I am so human . Sin rules me as if I were its slave .
45007015	I don’t understand why I act the way I do . I don’t do the good I want to do , and I do the evil I hate .
45007016	And if I don’t want to do what I do , that means I agree that the law is good .
45007017	But I am not really the one doing the evil . It is sin living in me that does it .
45007018	Yes , I know that nothing good lives in me — I mean nothing good lives in the part of me that is not spiritual . I want to do what is good , but I don’t do it .
45007019	I don’t do the good that I want to do . I do the evil that I don’t want to do .
45007020	So if I do what I don’t want to do , then I am not really the one doing it . It is the sin living in me that does it .
45007021	So I have learned this rule : When I want to do good , evil is there with me .
45007022	In my mind I am happy with God’s law .
45007023	But I see another law working in my body . That law makes war against the law that my mind accepts . That other law working in my body is the law of sin , and that law makes me its prisoner .
45007024	What a miserable person I am ! Who will save me from this body that brings me death ?
45007025	I thank God for his salvation through Jesus Christ our Lord ! So in my mind I am a slave to God’s law , but in my sinful self I am a slave to the law of sin .
45008001	So now anyone who is in Christ Jesus is not judged guilty .
45008002	That is because in Christ Jesus the law of the Spirit that brings life made you free . It made you free from the law that brings sin and death .
45008003	The law was without power because it was made weak by our sinful selves . But God did what the law could not do : He sent his own Son to earth with the same human life that everyone else uses for sin . God sent him to be an offering to pay for sin . So God used a human life to destroy sin .
45008004	He did this so that we could be right just as the law said we must be . Now we don’t live following our sinful selves . We live following the Spirit .
45008005	People who live following their sinful selves think only about what they want . But those who live following the Spirit are thinking about what the Spirit wants them to do .
45008006	If your thinking is controlled by your sinful self , there is spiritual death . But if your thinking is controlled by the Spirit , there is life and peace .
45008007	Why is this true ? Because anyone whose thinking is controlled by their sinful self is against God . They refuse to obey God’s law . And really they are not able to obey it .
45008008	Those who are ruled by their sinful selves cannot please God .
45008009	But you are not ruled by your sinful selves . You are ruled by the Spirit , if that Spirit of God really lives in you . But whoever does not have the Spirit of Christ does not belong to Christ .
45008010	Your body will always be dead because of sin . But if Christ is in you , then the Spirit gives you life , because Christ made you right with God .
45008011	God raised Jesus from death . And if God’s Spirit lives in you , he will also give life to your bodies that die . Yes , God is the one who raised Christ from death , and he will raise you to life through his Spirit living in you .
45008012	So , my brothers and sisters , we must not be ruled by our sinful selves . We must not live the way our sinful selves want .
45008013	If you use your lives to do what your sinful selves want , you will die spiritually . But if you use the Spirit’s help to stop doing the wrong things you do with your body , you will have true life .
45008014	The true children of God are those who let God’s Spirit lead them .
45008015	The Spirit that we received is not a spirit that makes us slaves again and causes us to fear . The Spirit that we have makes us God’s chosen children . And with that Spirit we cry out , “ Abba , Father . ”
45008016	And the Spirit himself speaks to our spirits and makes us sure that we are God’s children .
45008017	If we are God’s children , we will get the blessings God has for his people . He will give us all that he has given Christ . But we must suffer like Christ suffered . Then we will be able to share his glory .
45008018	We have sufferings now , but these are nothing compared to the great glory that will be given to us .
45008019	Everything that God made is waiting with excitement for the time when he will show the world who his children are . The whole world wants very much for that to happen .
45008020	Everything God made was allowed to become like something that cannot fulfill its purpose . That was not its choice , but God made it happen with this hope in view :
45008021	That the creation would be made free from ruin — that everything God made would have the same freedom and glory that belong to God’s children .
45008022	We know that everything God made has been waiting until now in pain like a woman ready to give birth to a child .
45008023	Not only the world , but we also have been waiting with pain inside us . We have the Spirit as the first part of God’s promise . So we are waiting for God to finish making us his own children . I mean we are waiting for our bodies to be made free .
45008024	We were saved to have this hope . If we can see what we are waiting for , that is not really hope . People don’t hope for something they already have .
45008025	But we are hoping for something we don’t have yet , and we are waiting for it patiently .
45008026	Also , the Spirit helps us . We are very weak , but the Spirit helps us with our weakness . We don’t know how to pray as we should , but the Spirit himself speaks to God for us . He begs God for us , speaking to him with feelings too deep for words .
45008027	God already knows our deepest thoughts . And he understands what the Spirit is saying , because the Spirit speaks for his people in the way that agrees with what God wants .
45008028	We know that in everything God works for the good of those who love him . These are the people God chose , because that was his plan .
45008029	God knew them before he made the world . And he decided that they would be like his Son . Then Jesus would be the firstborn of many brothers and sisters .
45008030	God planned for them to be like his Son . He chose them and made them right with him . And after he made them right , he gave them his glory .
45008031	So what should we say about this ? If God is for us , no one can stand against us . And God is with us .
45008032	He even let his own Son suffer for us . God gave his Son for all of us . So now with Jesus , God will surely give us all things .
45008033	Who can accuse the people God has chosen ? No one ! God is the one who makes them right .
45008034	Who can say that God’s people are guilty ? No one ! Christ Jesus died for us , but that is not all . He was also raised from death . And now he is at God’s right side , speaking to him for us .
45008035	Can anything separate us from Christ’s love ? Can trouble or problems or persecution separate us from his love ? If we have no food or clothes or face danger or even death , will that separate us from his love ?
45008036	As the Scriptures say , “ For you we are in danger of death all the time . People think we are worth no more than sheep to be killed . ”
45008037	But in all these troubles we have complete victory through God , who has shown his love for us .
45009001	I am in Christ and I am telling you the truth . I am not lying . And my conscience , ruled by the Holy Spirit , agrees that what I say now is true .
45009002	I have great sorrow and always feel much sadness
45009003	for my own people . They are my brothers and sisters , my earthly family . I wish I could help them . I would even have a curse on me and cut myself off from Christ if that would help them .
45009004	They are the people of Israel , God’s chosen children . They have the glory of God and the agreements he made between himself and his people . God gave them the Law of Moses , the Temple worship , and his promises .
45009005	They are the descendants of our great fathers , and they are the earthly family of the Messiah , who is God over all things . Praise him forever ! Amen .
45009006	I don’t mean that God failed to keep his promise to the Jewish people . But only some of the people of Israel are really God’s people .
45009007	And only some of Abraham’s descendants are true children of Abraham . This is what God said to Abraham : “ Your true descendants will be those who come through Isaac . ”
45009008	This means that not all of Abraham’s descendants are God’s true children . Abraham’s true children are those who become God’s children because of the promise he made to Abraham .
45009009	Here is what God said in that promise : “ About this time next year I will come back , and Sarah will have a son . ”
45009010	And that is not all . Rebecca also had sons , and they had the same father . He is our father Isaac .
45009013	As the Scriptures say , “ I loved Jacob , but I hated Esau . ”
45009014	So what does this mean ? That God is not fair ? We cannot say that .
45009015	God said to Moses , “ I will show mercy to anyone I want to show mercy to . I will show pity to anyone I choose . ”
45009016	So God will choose anyone he decides to show mercy to , and his choice does not depend on what people want or try to do .
45009017	In the Scriptures God says to Pharaoh : “ I made you king so that you could do this for me . I wanted to show my power through you . I wanted my name to be announced throughout the world . ”
45009018	So God shows mercy to those he wants to show mercy to and makes stubborn those he wants to make stubborn .
45009019	So one of you will ask me , “ If God controls what we do , why does he blame us for our sins ? ”
45009020	Don’t ask that . You are only human and have no right to question God . A clay jar does not question the one who made it . It does not say , “ Why did you make me like this ? ”
45009021	The one who makes the jar can make anything he wants . He uses the same clay to make different things . He might make one thing for special purposes and another for daily use .
45009022	It is the same way with what God has done . He wanted to show his anger and to let people see his power . But he patiently endured those he was angry with — people who were ready to be destroyed .
45009023	He waited with patience so that he could make known the riches of his glory to the people he has chosen to receive his mercy . God has already prepared them to share his glory .
45009024	We are those people , the ones God chose not only from the Jews but also from those who are not Jews .
45009025	As the Scriptures say in the book of Hosea , “ The people who are not mine — I will say they are my people . And the people I did not love — I will say they are the people I love . ” “ Where God said in the past , ‘ You are not my people ’ — there they will be called children of the living God . ” “ There are so many people of Israel , they are like the grains of sand by the sea . But only a few of them will be saved .
45009028	Yes , the Lord will quickly finish judging the people on the earth . ” “ The Lord All-Powerful allowed some of our people to live . If he had not done that , we would now be like Sodom , and we would be like Gomorrah . ”
45009030	So what does all this mean ? It means that people who are not Jews were made right with God because of their faith , even though they were not trying to make themselves right .
45009031	And the people of Israel , who tried to make themselves right with God by following the law , did not succeed .
45009032	They failed because they tried to make themselves right by the things they did . They did not trust in God to make them right . They fell over the stone that makes people fall .
45009033	The Scriptures talk about that stone : “ Look , I put in Zion a stone that will make people stumble . It is a rock that will make people fall . But anyone who trusts in him will never be disappointed . ”
45010001	Brothers and sisters , what I want most is for all the people of Israel to be saved . That is my prayer to God .
45010002	I can say this about them : They really try hard to follow God , but they don’t know the right way .
45010003	They did not know the way that God makes people right with him . And they tried to make themselves right in their own way . So they did not accept God’s way of making people right .
45010004	Christ ended the law so that everyone who believes in him is made right with God .
45010005	Moses writes about being made right by following the law . He says , “ The person who obeys these laws is the one who will have life through them . ”
45010006	But this is what the Scriptures say about being made right through faith : “ Don’t say to yourself , ‘ Who will go up into heaven ? ’ ” ( This means “ Who will go up to heaven to get Christ and bring him down to earth ? ” )
45010007	“ And don’t say , ‘ Who will go down into the world below ? ’ ” ( This means “ Who will go down to get Christ and bring him up from death ? ” )
45010008	This is what the Scripture says : “ God’s teaching is near you ; it is in your mouth and in your heart . ” It is the teaching of faith that we tell people .
45010009	If you openly say , “ Jesus is Lord ” and believe in your heart that God raised him from death , you will be saved .
45010010	Yes , we believe in Jesus deep in our hearts , and so we are made right with God . And we openly say that we believe in him , and so we are saved .
45010011	Yes , the Scriptures say , “ Anyone who trusts in him will never be disappointed . ”
45010012	It says this because there is no difference between those who are Jews and those who are not . The same Lord is the Lord of all people . And he richly blesses everyone who looks to him for help .
45010013	Yes , “ everyone who trusts in the Lord will be saved . ”
45010014	But before people can pray to the Lord for help , they must believe in him . And before they can believe in the Lord , they must hear about him . And for anyone to hear about the Lord , someone must tell them .
45010015	And before anyone can go and tell them , they must be sent . As the Scriptures say , “ How wonderful it is to see someone coming to tell good news ! ”
45010016	But not all the people accepted that good news . Isaiah said , “ Lord , who believed what we told them ? ”
45010017	So faith comes from hearing the Good News . And people hear the Good News when someone tells them about Christ .
45010018	But I ask , “ Did those people not hear the Good News ? ” Yes , they heard — as the Scriptures say , “ Their voices went out all around the world . Their words went everywhere in the world . ” “ I will use those who are not really a nation to make you jealous . I will use a nation that does not understand to make you angry . ” “ The people who were not looking for me — they are the ones who found me . I made myself known to those who did not ask for me . ” “ All day long I stood ready to accept those people , but they are stubborn and refuse to obey me . ”
45011001	So I ask , “ Did God force his people to leave him ? ” Of course not . I myself am an Israelite . I am from the family of Abraham , from the tribe of Benjamin .
45011002	God chose the Israelites to be his people before they were born . And he did not force them to leave . Surely you know what the Scriptures say about Elijah . The Scriptures tell about Elijah praying to God against the people of Israel . He said ,
45011003	“ Lord , they have killed your prophets and destroyed your altars . I am the only prophet still living , and they are trying to kill me now . ”
45011004	But what answer did God give to Elijah ? God said , “ I have kept for myself seven thousand men who have never given worship to Baal . ”
45011005	It is the same now . God has chosen a few people by his grace .
45011006	And if he chose them by grace , then it is not what they have done that made them his people . If they could be made his people by what they did , his gift of grace would not really be a gift .
45011007	So this is what has happened : The people of Israel wanted God’s blessing , but they did not all get it . The people he chose did get his blessing , but the others became hard and refused to listen to him .
45011008	As the Scriptures say , “ God caused the people to fall asleep . ” “ God closed their eyes so that they could not see , and he closed their ears so that they could not hear . This continues until now . ” “ Let those people be caught and trapped at their own feasts . Let them fall and be punished .
45011010	Let their eyes be closed so that they cannot see . And let them be troubled forever . ”
45011011	So I ask : When the Jews fell , did that fall destroy them ? No ! But their mistake brought salvation to those who are not Jews . The purpose of this was to make the Jews jealous .
45011012	Their mistake brought rich blessings to the world . And what they lost brought rich blessings to the non-Jewish people . So surely the world will get much richer blessings when enough Jews become the kind of people God wants .
45011013	Now I am speaking to you people who are not Jews . I am an apostle to the non-Jewish people . So while I have that work , I will do the best I can .
45011014	I hope I can make my own people jealous . That way , maybe I can help some of them to be saved .
45011015	God turned away from the Jews . When that happened , he became friends with the other people in the world . So when he accepts the Jews , it will be like bringing people to life after death .
45011016	If the first piece of bread is offered to God , then the whole loaf is made holy . If the roots of a tree are holy , the tree’s branches are holy too .
45011017	It is as if some of the branches from an olive tree have been broken off , and the branch of a wild olive tree has been joined to that first tree . If you are not a Jew , you are the same as that wild branch , and you now share the strength and life of the first tree .
45011018	But don’t act as if you are better than those branches that were broken off . You have no reason to be proud of yourself , because you don’t give life to the root . The root gives life to you .
45011019	You might say , “ Branches were broken off so that I could be joined to their tree . ”
45011020	That is true . But those branches were broken off because they did not believe . And you continue to be part of the tree only because you believe . Don’t be proud , but be afraid .
45011021	If God did not let the natural branches of that tree stay , he will not let you stay if you stop believing .
45011022	So you see that God is kind , but he can also be very strict . He punishes those who stop following him . But he is kind to you , if you continue trusting in his kindness . If you don’t continue depending on him , you will be cut off from the tree .
45011023	And if the Jews will believe in God again , he will accept them back . He is able to put them back where they were .
45011024	It is not natural for a wild branch to become part of a good tree . But you non-Jewish people are like a branch cut from a wild olive tree . And you were joined to a good olive tree . But those Jews are like a branch that grew from the good tree . So surely they can be joined to their own tree again .
45011025	I want you to understand this secret truth , brothers and sisters . This truth will help you understand that you don’t know everything . The truth is this : Part of Israel has been made stubborn , but that will change when enough non-Jewish people have come to God .
45011026	And that is how all Israel will be saved . The Scriptures say , “ The Savior will come from Zion ; he will take away all evil from the family of Jacob .
45011027	And I will make this agreement with those people when I take away their sins . ”
45011028	The Jews refuse to accept the Good News , so they are God’s enemies . This has happened to help you who are not Jews . But they are still God’s chosen people , and he loves them because of the promises he made to their ancestors .
45011029	God never changes his mind about the people he calls . He never decides to take back the blessings he has given them .
45011030	At one time you refused to obey God . But now you have received mercy , because the Jews refused to obey .
45011031	And now they are the ones who refuse to obey , because God showed mercy to you . But this happened so that they can also receive mercy from him .
45011032	All people have refused to obey God . And he has put them all together as people who don’t obey him so that he can show mercy to everyone .
45011033	Yes , God’s riches are very great ! His wisdom and knowledge have no end ! No one can explain what God decides . No one can understand his ways .
45011034	As the Scriptures say , “ Who can know what is on the Lord’s mind ? Who is able to give him advice ? ”
45011035	“ Who has ever given God anything ? God owes nothing to anyone . ”
45011036	Yes , God made all things . And everything continues through him and for him . To God be the glory forever ! Amen .
45012001	So I beg you , brothers and sisters , because of the great mercy God has shown us , offer your lives as a living sacrifice to him — an offering that is only for God and pleasing to him . Considering what he has done , it is only right that you should worship him in this way .
45012002	Don’t change yourselves to be like the people of this world , but let God change you inside with a new way of thinking . Then you will be able to understand and accept what God wants for you . You will be able to know what is good and pleasing to him and what is perfect .
45012003	God has given me a special gift , and that is why I have something to say to each one of you . Don’t think that you are better than you really are . You must see yourself just as you are . Decide what you are by the faith God has given each of us .
45012004	Each one of us has one body , and that body has many parts . These parts don’t all do the same thing .
45012005	In the same way , we are many people , but in Christ we are all one body . We are the parts of that body , and each part belongs to all the others .
45012006	We all have different gifts . Each gift came because of the grace God gave us . Whoever has the gift of prophecy should use that gift in a way that fits the kind of faith they have .
45012007	Whoever has the gift of serving should serve . Whoever has the gift of teaching should teach .
45012008	Whoever has the gift of comforting others should do that . Whoever has the gift of giving to help others should give generously . Whoever has the gift of leading should work hard at it . Whoever has the gift of showing kindness to others should do it gladly .
45012009	Your love must be real . Hate what is evil . Do only what is good .
45012010	Love each other in a way that makes you feel close like brothers and sisters . And give each other more honor than you give yourself .
45012011	As you serve the Lord , work hard and don’t be lazy . Be excited about serving him !
45012012	Be happy because of the hope you have . Be patient when you have troubles . Pray all the time .
45012013	Share with God’s people who need help . Look for people who need help and welcome them into your homes .
45012014	Wish only good for those who treat you badly . Ask God to bless them , not curse them .
45012015	When others are happy , you should be happy with them . And when others are sad , you should be sad too .
45012016	Live together in peace with each other . Don’t be proud , but be willing to be friends with people who are not important to others . Don’t think of yourself as smarter than everyone else .
45012017	If someone does you wrong , don’t try to pay them back by hurting them . Try to do what everyone thinks is right .
45012018	Do the best you can to live in peace with everyone .
45012019	My friends , don’t try to punish anyone who does wrong to you . Wait for God to punish them with his anger . In the Scriptures the Lord says , “ I am the one who punishes ; I will pay people back . ” “ If you have enemies who are hungry , give them something to eat . If you have enemies who are thirsty , give them something to drink . In doing this you will make them feel ashamed . ”
45013001	All of you must obey the government rulers . Everyone who rules was given the power to rule by God . And all those who rule now were given that power by God .
45013002	So anyone who is against the government is really against something God has commanded . Those who are against the government bring punishment on themselves .
45013003	People who do right don’t have to fear the rulers . But those who do wrong must fear them . Do you want to be free from fearing them ? Then do only what is right , and they will praise you .
45013004	Rulers are God’s servants to help you . But if you do wrong , you have reason to be afraid . They have the power to punish , and they will use it . They are God’s servants to punish those who do wrong .
45013005	So you must obey the government , not just because you might be punished , but because you know it is the right thing to do .
45013006	And this is why you pay taxes too . Those rulers are working for God , and they give all their time to the work of ruling .
45013007	Give everyone what you owe them . If you owe them any kind of tax , then pay it . Show respect to those you should respect . And show honor to those you should honor .
45013008	You should owe nothing to anyone , except that you will always owe love to each other . The person who loves others has done all that the law commands .
45013009	The law says , “ You must not commit adultery , you must not murder anyone , you must not steal , you must not want what belongs to someone else . ” All these commands and all other commands are really only one rule : “ Love your neighbor the same as you love yourself . ”
45013010	Love doesn’t hurt others . So loving is the same as obeying all the law .
45013011	I say this because you know that we live in an important time . Yes , it is now time for you to wake up from your sleep . Our salvation is nearer now than when we first believed .
45013012	The night is almost finished . The day is almost here . So we should stop doing whatever belongs to darkness . We should prepare ourselves to fight evil with the weapons that belong to the light .
45013013	We should live in a right way , like people who belong to the day . We should not have wild parties or be drunk . We should not be involved in sexual sin or any kind of immoral behavior . We should not cause arguments and trouble or be jealous .
45013014	But be like the Lord Jesus Christ , so that when people see what you do , they will see Christ . Don’t think about how to satisfy the desires of your sinful self .
45014001	Be willing to accept those who still have doubts about what believers can do . And don’t argue with them about their different ideas .
45014002	Some people believe they can eat any kind of food , but those who have doubts eat only vegetables .
45014003	Those who know they can eat any kind of food must not feel that they are better than those who eat only vegetables . And those who eat only vegetables must not decide that those who eat all foods are wrong . God has accepted them .
45014004	You cannot judge the servants of someone else . Their own master decides if they are doing right or wrong . And the Lord’s servants will be right , because the Lord is able to make them right .
45014005	Some people might believe that one day is more important than another . And others might believe that every day is the same . Everyone should be sure about their beliefs in their own mind .
45014006	Those who think one day is more important than other days are doing that for the Lord . And those who eat all kinds of food are doing that for the Lord . Yes , they give thanks to God for that food . And those who refuse to eat some foods do that for the Lord . They also give thanks to God .
45014007	We don’t live or die just for ourselves .
45014008	If we live , we are living for the Lord . And if we die , we are dying for the Lord . So living or dying , we belong to the Lord .
45014009	That is why Christ died and rose from death to live again — so that he could be Lord over those who have died and those who are living .
45014010	So why do you judge your brother or sister in Christ ? Or why do you think that you are better than they are ? We will all stand before God , and he will judge us all .
45014011	Yes , the Scriptures say , “ ‘ As surely as I live , ’ says the Lord , ‘ Everyone will bow before me ; everyone will say that I am God . ’ ”
45014013	So we should stop judging each other . Let’s decide not to do anything that will cause a problem for a brother or sister or hurt their faith .
45014014	I know that there is no food that is wrong to eat . The Lord Jesus is the one who convinced me of that . But if someone believes that something is wrong , then it is wrong for that person .
45014015	If you hurt the faith of your brother or sister because of something you eat , you are not really following the way of love . Don’t destroy anyone’s faith by eating something they think is wrong . Christ died for them .
45014016	Don’t allow what is good for you to become something they say is evil .
45014017	In God’s kingdom , what we eat and drink is not important . Here is what is important : a right way of life , peace , and joy — all from the Holy Spirit .
45014018	Whoever serves Christ by living this way is pleasing God , and they will be accepted by others .
45014019	So let’s try as hard as we can to do what will bring peace . Let’s do whatever will help each other grow stronger in faith .
45014020	Don’t let the eating of food destroy the work of God . All food is right to eat , but it is wrong for anyone to eat something that hurts the faith of another person .
45014021	It is better not to eat meat or drink wine or do anything else that hurts the faith of your brother or sister .
45014022	You should keep your beliefs about these things a secret between yourself and God . It is a blessing to be able to do what you think is right without feeling guilty .
45014023	But anyone who eats something without being sure it is right is doing wrong . That is because they did not believe it was right . And if you do anything that you believe is not right , it is sin .
45015001	Some of us have no problem with these things . So we should be patient with those who are not so strong and have doubts . We should not do what pleases us
45015002	but do what pleases them and is for their good . We should do whatever helps everyone grow stronger in faith .
45015003	Even Christ did not live trying to please himself . As the Scriptures say about him , “ Those people who insulted you have also insulted me . ”
45015004	Everything that was written in the past was written to teach us . Those things were written so that we could have hope . That hope comes from the patience and encouragement that the Scriptures give us .
45015005	All patience and encouragement come from God . And I pray that God will help you all agree with each other , as Christ Jesus wants .
45015006	Then you will all be joined together . And all together you will give glory to God the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
45015007	Christ accepted you , so you should accept each other . This will bring honor to God .
45015008	I tell you that Christ became a servant of the Jews to show that God has done what he promised their great ancestors .
45015009	Christ also did this so that the non-Jewish people could praise God for the mercy he gives to them . The Scriptures say , “ So I will give thanks to you among the people of other nations ; I will sing praise to your name . ” “ You people of other nations should be happy together with God’s people . ” “ Praise the Lord all you people of other nations ; all people should praise the Lord . ” “ Someone will come from Jesse’s family . He will come to rule over the nations , and they will put their hope in him . ”
45015013	I pray that the God who gives hope will fill you with much joy and peace as you trust in him . Then you will have more and more hope , and it will flow out of you by the power of the Holy Spirit .
45015014	My brothers and sisters , I know without a doubt that you are full of goodness and have all the knowledge you need . So you are certainly able to counsel each other .
45015015	But I have written to you very openly about some things that I wanted you to remember . I did this because God gave me this special gift :
45015016	to be a servant of Christ Jesus for those who are not Jews . I serve like a priest whose duty it is to tell God’s Good News . He gave me this work so that you non-Jewish people could be an offering that he will accept — an offering made holy by the Holy Spirit .
45015017	That is why I feel so good about what I have done for God in my service to Christ Jesus .
45015018	I will not talk about anything I did myself . I will talk only about what Christ has done with me in leading the non-Jewish people to obey God . They have obeyed him because of what I have said and done .
45015019	And they obeyed him because of the power of the miraculous signs and wonders that happened — all because of the power of God’s Spirit . I have told people the Good News about Christ in every place from Jerusalem to Illyricum . And so I have finished that part of my work .
45015020	I always want to tell the Good News in places where people have never heard of Christ . I do this because I don’t want to build on the work that someone else has already started .
45015021	But as the Scriptures say , “ Those who were not told about him will see , and those who have not heard about him will understand . ”
45015022	That’s what has kept me so busy and prevented my coming to see you even though I have wanted to come many times .
45015023	Now I have finished my work in these areas . And for many years I have wanted to visit you .
45015024	So I will visit you when I go to Spain . Yes , I hope to visit you while I am traveling to Spain , and I will stay and enjoy being with you . Then you can help me continue on my trip .
45015025	Now I am going to Jerusalem to help God’s people there .
45015026	Some of them are poor , and the believers in Macedonia and Achaia wanted to help them . So they gathered some money to send them .
45015027	They were happy to do this . And it was like paying something they owed them , because as non-Jews they have been blessed spiritually by the Jews . So now they should use the material blessings they have to help the Jews .
45015028	I am going to Jerusalem to make sure the poor get this money that has been given for them . After I finish that , I will leave for Spain and stop to visit you on the way .
45015029	And I know that when I visit you , I will bring you Christ’s full blessing .
45015030	Brothers and sisters , I beg you to help me in my work by praying to God for me . Do this because of our Lord Jesus and the love that the Spirit gives us .
45015031	Pray that I will be saved from those in Judea who refuse to accept our message . And pray that this help I am bringing to Jerusalem will please God’s people there .
45015032	Then , if God wants me to , I will come to you . I will come with joy , and together you and I will have a time of rest .
45015033	The God who gives peace be with you all . Amen .
45016001	I want you to know that you can trust our sister in Christ , Phoebe . She is a special servant of the church in Cenchrea .
45016002	I ask you to accept her in the Lord . Accept her the way God’s people should . Help her with anything she needs from you . She has helped me very much , and she has helped many others too .
45016017	Brothers and sisters , I want you to be very careful of those who cause arguments and hurt people’s faith by teaching things that are against what you learned . Stay away from them .
45016018	People like that are not serving our Lord Christ . They are only pleasing themselves . They use fancy talk and say nice things to fool those who don’t know about evil .
45016019	Everyone has heard that you do what you were taught , and I am very happy about that . But I want you to be wise about what is good and to know nothing about what is evil .
45016020	The God who brings peace will soon defeat Satan and give you power over him . The grace of our Lord Jesus be with you .
45016021	Timothy , a worker together with me , sends you his greetings . Also Lucius , Jason , and Sosipater ( these are my relatives ) send their greetings .
45016022	I am Tertius , the one writing this letter for Paul . I send you my own greetings as one who belongs to the Lord .
45016023	Gaius is letting me and the whole church here use his home . He sends his greetings to you . Erastus and our brother Quartus also send their greetings . Erastus is the city treasurer here .
45016025	Praise God ! He is the one who can make you strong in faith . He can use the Good News that I teach to make you strong . It is the message about Jesus Christ that I tell people . That message is the secret truth that was hidden for ages and ages but has been made known .
45016026	It has now been shown to us . It was made known by what the prophets wrote , as God commanded . And it has now been made known to all people so that they can believe and obey God , who lives forever .
45016027	Glory forever to the only wise God through Jesus Christ . Amen .
46001001	Greetings from Paul . I was chosen to be an apostle of Christ Jesus . God chose me because that is what he wanted . Greetings also from Sosthenes , our brother in Christ .
46001002	To God’s church in Corinth , you who have been made holy because you belong to Christ Jesus . You were chosen to be God’s holy people together with all people everywhere who trust in the Lord Jesus Christ — their Lord and ours .
46001003	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
46001004	I always thank my God for you because of the grace that he has given you through Christ Jesus .
46001005	In him you have been blessed in every way . You have been blessed in all your speaking and all your knowledge .
46001006	This proves that what we told you about Christ is true .
46001007	Now you have every gift from God while you wait for our Lord Jesus Christ to come again .
46001008	He will keep you strong until the end so that on the day when our Lord Jesus Christ comes , you will be free from all blame .
46001009	God is faithful . He is the one who has chosen you to share life with his Son , Jesus Christ our Lord .
46001010	Brothers and sisters , by the authority of our Lord Jesus Christ , I beg all of you to agree with each other . You should not be divided into different groups . Be completely joined together again with the same kind of thinking and the same purpose .
46001011	My brothers and sisters , some members of Chloe’s family told me that there are arguments among you .
46001012	This is what I mean : One of you says , “ I follow Paul , ” and someone else says , “ I follow Apollos . ” Another says , “ I follow Peter , ” and someone else says , “ I follow Christ . ”
46001013	Christ cannot be divided into different groups . It wasn’t Paul who died on the cross for you , was it ? Were you baptized in Paul’s name ?
46001014	I am thankful that I did not baptize any of you except Crispus and Gaius .
46001015	I am thankful because now no one can say that you were baptized in my name .
46001016	( I also baptized the family of Stephanas , but I don’t remember that I myself baptized any others . )
46001017	Christ did not give me the work of baptizing people . He gave me the work of telling the Good News . But he sent me to tell the Good News without using clever speech , which would take away the power that is in the cross of Christ .
46001018	The teaching about the cross seems foolish to those who are lost . But to us who are being saved it is the power of God .
46001019	As the Scriptures say , “ I will destroy the wisdom of the wise . I will confuse the understanding of the intelligent . ”
46001020	So what does this say about the philosopher , the law expert , or anyone in this world who is skilled in making clever arguments ? God has made the wisdom of the world look foolish .
46001021	This is what God in his wisdom decided : Since the world did not find him through its own wisdom , he used the message that sounds foolish to save those who believe it .
46001022	The Jews ask for miraculous signs , and the Greeks want wisdom .
46001023	But this is the message we tell everyone : Christ was killed on a cross . This message is a problem for Jews , and to other people it is nonsense .
46001024	But Christ is God’s power and wisdom to the people God has chosen , both Jews and Greeks .
46001025	Even the foolishness of God is wiser than human wisdom . Even the weakness of God is stronger than human strength .
46001026	Brothers and sisters , God chose you to be his . Think about that ! Not many of you were wise in the way the world judges wisdom . Not many of you had great influence , and not many of you came from important families .
46001027	But God chose the foolish things of the world to shame the wise . He chose the weak things of the world to shame the strong .
46001028	And God chose what the world thinks is not important — what the world hates and thinks is nothing . He chose these to destroy what the world thinks is important .
46001029	God did this so that no one can stand before him and boast about anything .
46001030	It is God who has made you part of Christ Jesus . And Christ has become for us wisdom from God . He is the reason we are right with God and pure enough to be in his presence . Christ is the one who set us free from sin .
46001031	So , as the Scriptures say , “ Whoever boasts should boast only about the Lord . ”
46002001	Dear brothers and sisters , when I came to you , I told you the secret truth of God . But I did not use fancy words or great wisdom .
46002002	I decided that while I was with you I would forget about everything except Jesus Christ and his death on the cross .
46002003	When I came to you , I was weak and shook with fear .
46002004	My teaching and my speaking were not with wise words that persuade people . But the proof of my teaching was the power that the Spirit gives .
46002005	I did this so that your faith would be in God’s power , not in human wisdom .
