46002006	We teach wisdom to people who are mature , but the wisdom we teach is not from this world . It is not the wisdom of the rulers of this world , who are losing their power .
46002007	But we speak God’s secret wisdom that has been hidden from everyone until now . God planned this wisdom for our glory . He planned it before the world began .
46002008	None of the rulers of this world understood this wisdom . If they had understood it , they would not have killed our great and glorious Lord on a cross .
46002009	But as the Scriptures say , “ No one has ever seen , no one has ever heard , no one has ever imagined what God has prepared for those who love him . ” The Spirit knows all things . The Spirit even knows the deep secrets of God .
46002011	It is like this : No one knows the thoughts that another person has . Only the person’s spirit that lives inside knows those thoughts . It is the same with God . No one knows God’s thoughts except God’s Spirit .
46002012	We received the Spirit that is from God , not the spirit of the world . We received God’s Spirit so that we can know all that God has given us .
46002013	When we say this , we don’t use words taught to us by human wisdom . We use words taught to us by the Spirit . We use the Spirit’s words to explain spiritual truths .
46002014	People who do not have God’s Spirit do not accept the things that come from his Spirit . They think these things are foolish . They cannot understand them , because they can only be understood with the Spirit’s help .
46002015	We who have the Spirit are able to make judgments about all these things . But anyone without the Spirit is not able to make proper judgments about us .
46002016	As the Scriptures say , “ Who can know what is on the Lord’s mind ? Who is able to give him advice ? ”
46003001	Brothers and sisters , when I was there , I could not talk to you the way I talk to people who are led by the Spirit . I had to talk to you like ordinary people of the world . You were like babies in Christ .
46003002	And the teaching I gave you was like milk , not solid food . I did this because you were not ready for solid food . And even now you are not ready .
46003003	You are still not following the Spirit . You are jealous of each other , and you are always arguing with each other . This shows that you are still following your own selfish desires . You are acting like ordinary people of the world .
46003004	One of you says , “ I follow Paul , ” and someone else says , “ I follow Apollos . ” When you say things like that , you are acting like people of the world .
46003005	Is Apollos so important ? Is Paul so important ? We are only servants of God who helped you believe . Each one of us did the work God gave us to do .
46003006	I planted the seed and Apollos watered it . But God is the one who made the seed grow .
46003007	So the one who plants is not important , and the one who waters is not important . Only God is important , because he is the one who makes things grow .
46003008	The one who plants and the one who waters have the same purpose . And each one will be rewarded for his own work .
46003009	We are workers together for God , and you are like a farm that belongs to God . And you are a house that belongs to God .
46003010	Like an expert builder I built the foundation of that house . I used the gift that God gave me to do this . Other people are building on that foundation . But everyone should be careful how they build .
46003011	The foundation that has already been built is Jesus Christ , and no one can build any other foundation .
46003012	People can build on that foundation using gold , silver , jewels , wood , grass , or straw .
46003013	But the work that each person does will be clearly seen , because the Day will make it plain . That Day will appear with fire , and the fire will test everyone’s work .
46003014	If the building they put on the foundation still stands , they will get their reward .
46003015	But if their building is burned up , they will suffer loss . They will be saved , but it will be like someone escaping from a fire .
46003016	You should know that you yourselves are God’s temple . God’s Spirit lives in you .
46003017	If you destroy God’s temple , God will destroy you , because God’s temple is holy . You yourselves are God’s temple .
46003018	Don’t fool yourselves . Whoever thinks they are wise in this world should become a fool . That’s the only way they can be wise .
46003019	I say this because the wisdom of this world is foolishness to God . As the Scriptures say , “ He catches those who think they are wise in their own clever traps . ”
46003020	The Scriptures also say , “ The Lord knows the thoughts of the wise . He knows that their thoughts are worth nothing . ”
46003021	So there is not a person on earth that any of you should be boasting about . Everything is yours :
46003022	Paul , Apollos , Peter , the world , life , death , the present , and the future — all these are yours .
46003023	And you belong to Christ , and Christ belongs to God .
46004001	You should think of us as servants of Christ , the ones God has trusted to do the work of making known his secret truths .
46004002	Those who are trusted with such an important work must show that they are worthy of that trust .
46004003	But I don’t consider your judgment on this point to be worth anything . Even an opinion from a court of law would mean nothing . I don’t even trust my own judgment .
46004004	I don’t know of any wrong I have done , but that does not make me right . The Lord is the one who must decide if I have done well or not .
46004005	So don’t judge anyone now . The time for judging will be when the Lord comes . He will shine light on everything that is now hidden in darkness . He will make known the secret purposes of our hearts . Then the praise each person should get will come from God .
46004006	Brothers and sisters , I have used Apollos and myself as examples for you . I did this so that you could learn from us the meaning of the words , “ Follow what the Scriptures say . ” Then you will not brag about one person and criticize another .
46004007	Who do you think you are ? Everything you have was given to you . So , if everything you have was given to you , why do you act as if you got it all by your own power ?
46004008	You think you have everything you need . You think you are rich . You think you have become kings without us . I wish you really were kings . Then we could rule together with you .
46004009	But it seems to me that God has given me and the other apostles the last place . We are like prisoners condemned to die , led in a parade for the whole world to see — not just people but angels too .
46004010	We are fools for Christ , but you think you are so wise in Christ . We are weak , but you think you are so strong . People give you honor , but they don’t honor us .
46004011	Even now we still don’t have enough to eat or drink , and we don’t have enough clothes . We often get beatings . We have no homes .
46004012	We work hard with our own hands to feed ourselves . When people insult us , we ask God to bless them . When people treat us badly , we accept it .
46004013	When people say bad things about us , we try to say something that will help them . But people still treat us like the world’s garbage — everyone’s trash .
46004014	I am not trying to make you feel ashamed , but I am writing this to counsel you as my own dear children .
46004015	You may have ten thousand teachers in Christ , but you don’t have many fathers . Through the Good News I became your father in Christ Jesus .
46004016	So I beg you to be like me .
46004017	That is why I am sending Timothy to you . He is my son in the Lord . I love him and trust him . He will help you remember the way I live in Christ Jesus — a way of life that I teach in every meeting of the church wherever I am .
46004018	Some of you are acting so proud , it seems as though you think I won’t be coming there again .
46004019	But I will come to you very soon , the Lord willing . Then I will see if these proud talkers have the power to do anything more than talk .
46004020	God’s kingdom is not seen in talk but in power .
46004021	Which do you want : that I come to you with punishment , or that I come with love and gentleness ?
46005001	I don’t want to believe what I am hearing — that there is sexual sin among you . And it is such a bad kind of sexual sin that even those who have never known God don’t allow it . People say that a man there has his father’s wife .
46005002	And still you are proud of yourselves ! You should have been filled with sadness . And the man who committed that sin should be put out of your group .
46005003	I cannot be there with you in person , but I am with you in spirit . And I have already judged the man who did this . I judged him the same as I would if I were really there .
46005004	Come together in the name of our Lord Jesus . I will be with you in spirit , and you will have the power of our Lord Jesus with you .
46005005	Then turn this man over to Satan . His sinful self has to be destroyed so that his spirit will be saved on the day when the Lord comes again .
46005006	Your proud talk is not good . You know the saying , “ Just a little yeast makes the whole batch of dough rise . ”
46005007	Take out all the old yeast , so that you will be a new batch of dough . You really are bread without yeast — Passover bread . Yes , Christ our Passover Lamb has already been killed .
46005008	So let us eat our Passover meal , but not with the bread that has the old yeast , the yeast of sin and wrongdoing . But let us eat the bread that has no yeast . This is the bread of goodness and truth .
46005009	I wrote to you in my letter that you should not associate with people who sin sexually .
46005010	But I did not mean the people of this world . You would have to leave the world to get away from all the people who sin sexually , or who are greedy and cheat each other , or who worship idols .
46005011	I meant you must not associate with people who claim to be believers but continue to live in sin . Don’t even eat with a brother or sister who sins sexually , is greedy , worships idols , abuses others with insults , gets drunk , or cheats people .
46006001	When one of you has something against someone else in your group , why do you go to the judges in the law courts ? The way they think and live is wrong . So why do you let them decide who is right ? Why don’t you let God’s holy people decide who is right ?
46006002	Don’t you know that God’s people will judge the world ? So if you will judge the world , then surely you can judge small arguments like this .
46006003	You know that in the future we will judge angels . So surely we can judge life’s ordinary problems .
46006004	So if you have such matters to be judged , why do you take them to those who are not part of the church ? They mean nothing to you .
46006005	I say this to shame you . Surely there is someone in your group wise enough to judge a complaint between two believers .
46006006	But now one believer goes to court against another , and you let people who are not believers judge their case !
46006007	The lawsuits that you have against each other show that you are already defeated . It would be better for you to let someone wrong you . It would be better to let someone cheat you .
46006008	But you are the ones doing wrong and cheating . And you do this to your own brothers and sisters in Christ !
46006011	In the past some of you were like that . But you were washed clean , you were made holy , and you were made right with God in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and by the Spirit of our God .
46006012	“ I am allowed to do anything , ” you say . My answer to this is that not all things are good . Even if it is true that “ I am allowed to do anything , ” I will not let anything control me like a slave .
46006013	Someone else says , “ Food is for the stomach , and the stomach for food . ” Yes , and God will destroy them both . But the body is not for sexual sin . The body is for the Lord , and the Lord is for the body .
46006014	And God will raise our bodies from death with the same power he used to raise the Lord Jesus .
46006015	Surely you know that your bodies are parts of Christ himself . So I must never take what is part of Christ and join it to a prostitute !
46006016	The Scriptures say , “ The two people will become one . ” So you should know that anyone who is joined with a prostitute becomes one with her in body .
46006017	But anyone who is joined with the Lord is one with him in spirit .
46006018	So run away from sexual sin . It involves the body in a way that no other sin does . So if you commit sexual sin , you are sinning against your own body .
46006019	You should know that your body is a temple for the Holy Spirit that you received from God and that lives in you . You don’t own yourselves .
46006020	God paid a very high price to make you his . So honor God with your body .
46007001	Now I will discuss the things you wrote me about . You asked if it is better for a man not to have any sexual relations at all .
46007002	But sexual sin is a danger , so each man should enjoy his own wife , and each woman should enjoy her own husband .
46007003	The husband should give his wife what she deserves as his wife . And the wife should give her husband what he deserves as her husband .
46007004	The wife does not have power over her own body . Her husband has the power over her body . And the husband does not have power over his own body . His wife has the power over his body .
46007005	Don’t refuse to give your bodies to each other . But you might both agree to stay away from sex for a while so that you can give your time to prayer . Then come together again so that Satan will not be able to tempt you in your weakness .
46007006	I say this only to give you permission to be separated for a time . It is not a rule .
46007007	I wish everyone could be like me . But God has given each person a different ability . He makes some able to live one way , others to live a different way .
46007008	Now for those who are not married and for the widows I say this : It is good for you to stay single like me .
46007009	But if you cannot control your body , then you should marry . It is better to marry than to burn with sexual desire .
46007010	Now , I have a command for those who are married . Actually , it is not from me ; it is what the Lord commanded . A wife should not leave her husband .
46007011	But if a wife does leave , she should remain single or get back together with her husband . And a husband should not divorce his wife .
46007012	The advice I have for the others is from me . The Lord did not give us any teaching about this . If you have a wife who is not a believer , you should not divorce her if she will continue to live with you .
46007013	And if you have a husband who is not a believer , you should not divorce him if he will continue to live with you .
46007014	The husband who is not a believer is set apart for God through his believing wife . And the wife who is not a believer is set apart for God through her believing husband . If this were not true , your children would be unfit for God’s use . But now they are set apart for him .
46007015	But if the husband or wife who is not a believer decides to leave , let them leave . When this happens , the brother or sister in Christ is free . God chose you to have a life of peace .
46007016	Wives , maybe you will save your husband ; and husbands , maybe you will save your wife . You don’t know now what will happen later .
46007017	But each one of you should continue to live the way the Lord God has given you to live — the way you were when God chose you . I tell people in all the churches to follow this rule .
46007018	If a man was already circumcised when he was chosen , he should not change his circumcision . If a man was without circumcision when he was chosen , he should not be circumcised .
46007019	It is not important if anyone is circumcised or not . What is important is obeying God’s commands .
46007020	Each one of you should stay the way you were when God chose you .
46007021	If you were a slave when God chose you , don’t let that bother you . But if you can be free , then do it .
46007022	If you were a slave when the Lord chose you , you are now free in the Lord . You belong to the Lord . In the same way , if you were free when you were chosen , you are now Christ’s slave .
46007023	God paid a high price for you , so don’t be slaves to anyone else .
46007024	Brothers and sisters , in your new life with God , each one of you should continue the way you were when God chose you .
46007025	Now I write about people who are not married . I have no command from the Lord about this , but I give my opinion . And I can be trusted , because the Lord has given me mercy .
46007026	This is a time of trouble . So I think it is good for you to stay the way you are .
46007027	If you have a wife , don’t try to get free from her . If you are not married , don’t try to find a wife .
46007028	But if you decide to marry , that is not a sin . And it is not a sin for a girl who has never married to get married . But those who marry will have trouble in this life , and I want you to be free from this trouble .
46007029	Brothers and sisters , this is what I mean : We don’t have much time left . So starting now , those who have wives should be the same as those who don’t .
46007030	It should not be important whether you are sad or whether you are happy . If you buy something , it should not matter to you that you own it .
46007031	You should use the things of the world without letting them become important to you . This is how you should live , because this world , the way it is now , will soon be gone .
46007032	I want you to be free from worry . A man who is not married is busy with the Lord’s work . He is trying to please the Lord .
46007033	But a man who is married is busy with things of the world . He is trying to please his wife .
46007034	He must think about two things — pleasing his wife and pleasing the Lord . A woman who is not married or a girl who has never married is busy with the Lord’s work . She wants to give herself fully — body and spirit — to the Lord . But a married woman is busy with things of the world . She is trying to please her husband .
46007035	I am saying this to help you . I am not trying to limit you , but I want you to live in the right way . And I want you to give yourselves fully to the Lord without giving your time to other things .
46007036	A man might think that he is not doing the right thing with his fiancée . She might be almost past the best age to marry . So he might feel that he should marry her . He should do what he wants . It is no sin for them to get married .
46007037	But another man might be more sure in his mind . There may be no need for marriage , so he is free to do what he wants . If he has decided in his own heart not to marry his fiancée , he is doing the right thing .
46007038	So the man who marries his fiancée does right , and the man who does not marry does better .
46007039	A woman should stay with her husband as long as he lives . But if the husband dies , the woman is free to marry any man she wants , but he should belong to the Lord .
46007040	The woman is happier if she does not marry again . This is my opinion , and I believe that I have God’s Spirit .
46008001	Now I will write about meat that is sacrificed to idols . It is certainly true that “ we all have knowledge , ” as you say . But this knowledge only fills people with pride . It is love that helps the church grow stronger .
46008002	Those who think they know something do not yet know anything as they should .
46008003	But whoever loves God is known by God .
46008004	So this is what I say about eating meat : We know that an idol is really nothing in the world , and we know that there is only one God .
46008005	It’s really not important if there are things called gods in heaven or on earth — and there are many of these “ gods ” and “ lords ” out there .
46008006	For us there is only one God , and he is our Father . All things came from him , and we live for him . And there is only one Lord , Jesus Christ . All things were made through him , and we also have life through him .
46008007	But not all people know this . Some have had the habit of worshiping idols . So now when they eat meat , they still feel as if it belongs to an idol . They are not sure that it is right to eat this meat . So when they eat it , they feel guilty .
46008008	But food will not bring us closer to God . Refusing to eat does not make us less pleasing to God , and eating does not make us closer to him .
46008009	But be careful with your freedom . Your freedom to eat anything may make those who have doubts about what they can eat fall into sin .
46008010	You understand that it’s all right to eat anything , so you can eat even in an idol’s temple . But someone who has doubts might see you eating there , and this might encourage them to eat meat sacrificed to idols too . But they really think it is wrong .
46008011	So this weak brother or sister — someone Christ died for — is lost because of your better understanding .
46008012	When you sin against your brothers and sisters in Christ in this way and you hurt them by causing them to do things they feel are wrong , you are also sinning against Christ .
46008013	So if the food I eat makes another believer fall into sin , I will never eat meat again . I will stop eating meat , so that I will not make my brother or sister sin .
46009001	I am a free man . I am an apostle . I have seen Jesus our Lord . You people are an example of my work in the Lord .
46009002	Others may not accept me as an apostle , but surely you do . You are proof that I am an apostle in the Lord .
46009003	Some people want to judge me . So this is the answer I give them :
46009004	We have the right to eat and drink , don’t we ?
46009005	We have the right to bring a believing wife with us when we travel , don’t we ? The other apostles and the Lord’s brothers and Peter all do this .
46009006	And are Barnabas and I the only ones who must work to earn our living ?
46009007	No soldier ever serves in the army and pays his own salary . No one ever plants a vineyard without eating some of the grapes himself . No one takes care of a flock of sheep without drinking some of the milk himself .
46009008	These aren’t just my own thoughts . God’s law says the same thing .
46009009	Yes , it is written in the Law of Moses : “ When a work animal is being used to separate grain , don’t keep it from eating the grain . ” When God said this , was he thinking only about work animals ? No .
46009010	He was really talking about us . Yes , that was written for us . The one who plows and the one who separates the grain should both expect to get some of the grain for their work .
46009011	We planted spiritual seed among you , so we should be able to harvest from you some things for this life . Surely that is not asking too much .
46009012	Others have this right to get things from you . So surely we have this right too . But we don’t use this right . No , we endure everything ourselves so that we will not stop anyone from obeying the Good News of Christ .
46009013	Surely you know that those who work at the Temple get their food from the Temple . And those who serve at the altar get part of what is offered at the altar .
46009014	It is the same with those who have the work of telling the Good News . The Lord has commanded that those who tell the Good News should get their living from this work .
46009015	But I have not used any of these rights , and I am not trying to get anything from you . That is not my purpose for writing this . I would rather die than to have someone take away what for me is a great source of pride .
46009016	It’s not my work of telling the Good News that gives me any reason to boast . That is my duty — something I must do . If I don’t tell people the Good News , I am in real trouble .
46009017	If I did it because it was my own choice , I would deserve to be paid . But I have no choice . I must tell the Good News . So I am only doing the duty that was given to me .
46009018	So what do I get for doing it ? My reward is that when I tell people the Good News I can offer it to them for free and not use the rights that come with doing this work .
46009019	I am free . I belong to no other person , but I make myself a slave to everyone . I do this to help save as many people as I can .
46009020	To the Jews I became like a Jew so that I could help save Jews . I myself am not ruled by the law , but to those who are ruled by the law I became like someone who is ruled by the law . I did this to help save those who are ruled by the law .
46009021	To those who are without the law I became like someone who is without the law . I did this to help save those who are without the law . ( But really , I am not without God’s law — I am ruled by the law of Christ . )
46009022	To those who are weak , I became weak so that I could help save them . I have become all things to all people . I did this so that I could save people in any way possible .
46009023	I do all this to make the Good News known . I do it so that I can share in the blessings of the Good News .
46009024	You know that in a race all the runners run , but only one runner gets the prize . So run like that . Run to win !
46009025	All who compete in the games use strict training . They do this so that they can win a prize — one that doesn’t last . But our prize is one that will last forever .
46009026	So I run like someone who has a goal . I fight like a boxer who is hitting something , not just the air .
46009027	It is my own body I fight to make it do what I want . I do this so that I won’t miss getting the prize myself after telling others about it .
46010001	Brothers and sisters , I want you to know what happened to our ancestors who were with Moses . They were all under the cloud , and they all walked through the sea .
46010002	They were all baptized into Moses in the cloud and in the sea .
46010003	They all ate the same spiritual food ,
46010004	and they all drank the same spiritual drink . They drank from that spiritual rock that was with them , and that rock was Christ .
46010005	But God was not pleased with most of those people , so they were killed in the desert .
46010006	And these things that happened are examples for us . These examples should stop us from wanting evil things like those people did .
46010007	Don’t worship idols as some of them did . As the Scriptures say , “ The people sat down to eat and drink and then got up to have a wild party . ”
46010008	We should not commit sexual sins as some of them did . In one day 23,000 of them died because of their sin .
46010009	We should not test Christ as some of them did . Because of that , they were killed by snakes .
46010010	And don’t complain as some of them did . Because they complained , they were killed by the angel that destroys .
46010011	The things that happened to those people are examples . They were written to be warnings for us . We live in the time that all those past histories were pointing to .
46010012	So anyone who thinks they are standing strong should be careful that they don’t fall .
46010013	The only temptations that you have are the same temptations that all people have . But you can trust God . He will not let you be tempted more than you can bear . But when you are tempted , God will also give you a way to escape that temptation . Then you will be able to endure it .
46010014	So , my dear friends , stay away from worshiping idols .
46010015	You are intelligent people . Judge for yourselves the truth of what I say now .
46010016	The cup of blessing that we give thanks for is a sharing in the blood sacrifice of Christ , isn’t it ? And the bread that we break is a sharing in the body of Christ , isn’t it ?
46010017	There is one loaf of bread , so we who are many are one body , because we all share in that one loaf .
46010018	And think about what the people of Israel do . When they eat the sacrifices , they are united by sharing what was offered on the altar .
46010019	So , am I saying that sacrifices to idols are the same as those Jewish sacrifices ? No , because an idol is nothing , and the things offered to idols are worth nothing .
46010020	But I am saying that when food is sacrificed to idols , it is an offering to demons , not to God . And I don’t want you to share anything with demons .
46010021	You cannot drink the cup of the Lord and then go drink a cup that honors demons . You cannot share a meal at the Lord’s table and then go share a meal that honors demons .
46010022	Doing that would make the Lord jealous . Do you really want to do that ? Do you think we are stronger than he is ?
46010023	“ All things are allowed , ” you say . But not all things are good . “ All things are allowed . ” But some things don’t help anyone .
46010024	Try to do what is good for others , not just what is good for yourselves .
46010025	Eat any meat that is sold in the meat market . Don’t ask questions about it to see if it is something you think is wrong to eat .
46010026	You can eat it , “ because the earth and everything in it belong to the Lord . ”
46010027	Someone who is not a believer might invite you to eat with them . If you want to go , then eat anything that is put before you . Don’t ask questions to see if it is something you think is wrong to eat .
46010028	But if someone tells you , “ That food was offered to idols , ” then don’t eat it . That’s because some people think it is wrong , and it might cause a problem for the person who told you that .
46010029	I don’t mean that you think it is wrong . But the other person might think it is wrong . That’s the only reason not to eat it . My own freedom should not be judged by what another person thinks .
46010030	I eat the meal with thankfulness . So I don’t want to be criticized because of something I thank God for .
46010031	So if you eat , or if you drink , or if you do anything , do it for the glory of God .
46010032	Never do anything that might make other people do wrong — Jews , non-Jews , or anyone in God’s church .
46010033	I do the same thing . I try to please everyone in every way . I am not trying to do what is good for me . I am trying to do what is good for the most people so that they can be saved .
46011001	Follow my example , just as I follow the example of Christ .
46011002	I praise you because you remember me in all things . You follow closely the teachings I gave you .
46011003	But I want you to understand this : The head of every man is Christ . And the head of a woman is the man . And the head of Christ is God .
46011004	Every man who prophesies or prays with his head covered brings shame to his head .
46011005	But every woman who prays or prophesies should have her head covered . If her head is not covered , she brings shame to her head . Then she is the same as a woman who has her head shaved .
46011006	If a woman does not cover her head , it is the same as cutting off all her hair . But it is shameful for a woman to cut off her hair or to shave her head . So she should cover her head .
46011007	But a man should not cover his head , because he is made like God and is God’s glory . But woman is man’s glory .
46011008	Man did not come from woman . Woman came from man .
46011009	And man was not made for woman . Woman was made for man .
46011010	So that is why a woman should have her head covered with something that shows she is under authority . Also , she should do this because of the angels .
46011011	But in the Lord the woman needs the man , and the man needs the woman .
46011012	This is true because woman came from man , but also man is born from woman . Really , everything comes from God .
46011013	Decide this for yourselves : Is it right for a woman to pray to God without something on her head ?
46011014	Even nature itself teaches you that wearing long hair is shameful for a man .
46011015	But wearing long hair is a woman’s honor . Long hair is given to the woman to cover her head .
46011016	Some people may still want to argue about this . But we and the churches of God don’t accept what those people are doing .
46011017	In the things I tell you now I don’t praise you . Your meetings hurt you more than they help you .
46011018	First , I hear that when you meet together as a church you are divided . And this is not hard to believe
46011019	because of your idea that you must have separate groups to show who the real believers are !
46011020	When you all come together , it is not really the Lord’s Supper you are eating .
46011021	I say this because when you eat , each one eats without waiting for the others . Some people don’t get enough to eat or drink , while others have too much .
46011022	You can eat and drink in your own homes . It seems that you think God’s church is not important . You embarrass those who are poor . What can I say ? Should I praise you ? No , I cannot praise you for this .
46011023	The teaching I gave you is the same that I received from the Lord : On the night when the Lord Jesus was handed over to be killed , he took bread
46011024	and gave thanks for it . Then he divided the bread and said , “ This is my body ; it is for you . Eat this to remember me . ”
46011025	In the same way , after they ate , Jesus took the cup of wine . He said , “ This cup represents the new agreement from God , which begins with my blood sacrifice . When you drink this , do it to remember me . ”
46011026	This means that every time you eat this bread and drink this cup , you are telling others about the Lord’s death until he comes again .
46011027	So if you eat the bread or drink the cup of the Lord in a way that does not fit its meaning , you are sinning against the body and the blood of the Lord .
46011028	Before you eat the bread and drink the cup , you should examine your own attitude .
46011029	If you eat and drink without paying attention to those who are the Lord’s body , your eating and drinking will cause you to be judged guilty .
46011030	That is why many in your group are sick and weak , and many have died .
46011031	But if we judged ourselves in the right way , then God would not judge us .
46011032	But when the Lord judges us , he punishes us to show us the right way . He does this so that we will not be condemned with the world .
46011033	So , my brothers and sisters , when you come together to eat , wait for each other .
46011034	If some are too hungry to wait , they should eat at home . Do this so that your meeting together will not bring God’s judgment on you . I will tell you what to do about the other things when I come .
46012001	Now , brothers and sisters , I want you to understand about spiritual gifts .
46012002	You remember the lives you lived before you were believers . You let yourselves be influenced and led away to worship idols — things that have no life .
46012003	So I tell you that no one who is speaking with the help of God’s Spirit says , “ Jesus be cursed . ” And no one can say , “ Jesus is Lord , ” without the help of the Holy Spirit .
46012004	There are different kinds of spiritual gifts , but they are all from the same Spirit .
46012005	There are different ways to serve , but we serve the same Lord .
46012006	And there are different ways that God works in people , but it is the same God who works in all of us to do everything .
46012007	Something from the Spirit can be seen in each person . The Spirit gives this to each one to help others .
46012008	The Spirit gives one person the ability to speak with wisdom . And the same Spirit gives another person the ability to speak with knowledge .
46012009	The same Spirit gives faith to one person and to another he gives gifts of healing .
46012010	The Spirit gives to one person the power to do miracles , to another the ability to prophesy , and to another the ability to judge what is from the Spirit and what is not . The Spirit gives one person the ability to speak in different kinds of languages , and to another the ability to interpret those languages .
46012011	One Spirit , the same Spirit , does all these things . The Spirit decides what to give each one .
46012012	A person has only one body , but it has many parts . Yes , there are many parts , but all those parts are still just one body . Christ is like that too .
46012013	Some of us are Jews and some of us are not ; some of us are slaves and some of us are free . But we were all baptized to become one body through one Spirit . And we were all given the one Spirit .
46012014	And a person’s body has more than one part . It has many parts .
46012015	The foot might say , “ I am not a hand , so I don’t belong to the body . ” But saying this would not stop the foot from being a part of the body .
46012016	The ear might say , “ I am not an eye , so I don’t belong to the body . ” But saying this would not make the ear stop being a part of the body .
46012017	If the whole body were an eye , it would not be able to hear . If the whole body were an ear , it would not be able to smell anything .
46012020	So there are many parts , but only one body .
46012021	The eye cannot say to the hand , “ I don’t need you ! ” And the head cannot say to the foot , “ I don’t need you ! ”
46012022	No , those parts of the body that seem to be weaker are actually very important .
46012023	And the parts that we think are not worth very much are the parts we give the most care to . And we give special care to the parts of the body that we don’t want to show .
46012024	The more beautiful parts don’t need this special care . But God put the body together and gave more honor to the parts that need it .
46012025	God did this so that our body would not be divided . God wanted the different parts to care the same for each other .
46012026	If one part of the body suffers , then all the other parts suffer with it . Or if one part is honored , then all the other parts share its honor .
46012027	All of you together are the body of Christ . Each one of you is a part of that body .
46012028	And in the church God has given a place first to apostles , second to prophets , and third to teachers . Then God has given a place to those who do miracles , those who have gifts of healing , those who can help others , those who are able to lead , and those who can speak in different kinds of languages .
46012029	Not all are apostles . Not all are prophets . Not all are teachers . Not all do miracles .
46012030	Not all have gifts of healing . Not all speak in different kinds of languages . Not all interpret those languages .
46012031	Continue to give your attention to the spiritual gifts you consider to be the greatest . But now I want to point out a way of life that is even greater .
46013001	I may speak in different languages , whether human or even of angels . But if I don’t have love , I am only a noisy bell or a ringing cymbal .
46013002	I may have the gift of prophecy , I may understand all secrets and know everything there is to know , and I may have faith so great that I can move mountains . But even with all this , if I don’t have love , I am nothing .
46013003	I may give away everything I have to help others , and I may even give my body as an offering to be burned . But I gain nothing by doing all this if I don’t have love .
46013004	Love is patient and kind . Love is not jealous , it does not brag , and it is not proud .
46013005	Love is not rude , it is not selfish , and it cannot be made angry easily . Love does not remember wrongs done against it .
46013006	Love is never happy when others do wrong , but it is always happy with the truth .
46013007	Love never gives up on people . It never stops trusting , never loses hope , and never quits .
46013008	Love will never end . But all those gifts will come to an end — even the gift of prophecy , the gift of speaking in different kinds of languages , and the gift of knowledge .
46013009	These will all end because this knowledge and these prophecies we have are not complete .
46013010	But when perfection comes , the things that are not complete will end .
46013011	When I was a child , I talked like a child , I thought like a child , and I made plans like a child . When I became a man , I stopped those childish ways .
46013012	It is the same with us . Now we see God as if we are looking at a reflection in a mirror . But then , in the future , we will see him right before our eyes . Now I know only a part , but at that time I will know fully , as God has known me .
46013013	So these three things continue : faith , hope , and love . And the greatest of these is love .
46014001	Love should be the goal of your life , but you should also want to have the gifts that come from the Spirit . And the gift you should want most is to be able to prophesy .
46014002	I will explain why . Those who have the gift of speaking in a different language are not speaking to people . They are speaking to God . No one understands them — they are speaking secret things through the Spirit .
46014003	But those who prophesy are speaking to people . They help people grow stronger in faith , and they give encouragement and comfort .
46014004	Those who speak in a different language are helping only themselves . But those who prophesy are helping the whole church .
46014005	I would like all of you to have the gift of speaking in different languages . But what I want more is for you to prophesy . Anyone who prophesies is more important than those who can only speak in different languages . However , if they can also interpret those languages , they are as important as the one who prophesies . If they can interpret , then the church can be helped by what they say .
46014006	Brothers and sisters , will it help you if I come to you speaking in different languages ? No , it will help you only if I bring you a new truth or some knowledge , prophecy , or teaching .
46014007	This is true even with lifeless things that make sounds — like a flute or a harp . If the different musical notes are not made clear , you can’t understand what song is being played . Each note must be played clearly for you to be able to understand the tune .
46014008	And in a war , if the trumpet does not sound clearly , the soldiers will not know it is time to prepare for fighting .
46014009	It is the same with you . If you don’t speak clearly in a language people know , they cannot understand what you are saying . You will be talking to the air !
46014010	It is true that there are many different languages in the world , and they all have meaning .
46014011	But if I don’t understand the meaning of what someone is saying , it will just be strange sounds to me , and I will sound just as strange to them .
46014012	That’s why you who want spiritual gifts so much should prefer those gifts that help the church grow stronger .
46014013	So those who have the gift of speaking in a different language should pray that they can also interpret what they say .
46014014	If I pray in a different language , my spirit is praying , but my mind does nothing .
46014015	So what should I do ? I will pray with my spirit , but I will also pray with my mind . I will sing with my spirit , but I will also sing with my mind .
46014016	You might be praising God with your spirit . But someone there without understanding cannot say “ Amen ” to your prayer of thanks , because they don’t know what you are saying .
46014017	You may be thanking God in a good way , but others are not helped .
46014018	I thank God that my gift of speaking in different kinds of languages is greater than any of yours .
46014019	But in the church meetings I would rather speak five words that I understand than thousands of words in a different language . I would rather speak with my understanding , so that I can teach others .
46014020	Brothers and sisters , don’t think like children . In evil things be like babies , but in your thinking you should be like full-grown adults .
46014021	As the Scriptures say , “ Using those who speak a different language and using the lips of foreigners , I will speak to these people . But even then , they will not obey me . ”
46014022	And from this we see that the use of different languages shows how God deals with those who don’t believe , not with those who believe . And prophecy shows how God works through those who believe , not through unbelievers .
46014023	Suppose the whole church meets together and you all speak in different languages . If some people come in who are without understanding or don’t believe , they will say you are crazy .
46014024	But suppose you are all prophesying and someone comes in who does not believe or who is without understanding . Their sin will be shown to them , and they will be judged by everything you say .
46014025	The secret things in their heart will be made known . So they will bow down and worship God . They will say , “ Without a doubt , God is here with you . ”
46014026	So , brothers and sisters , what should you do ? When you meet together , one person has a song , another has a teaching , and another has a new truth from God . One person speaks in a different language , and another interprets that language . The purpose of whatever you do should be to help everyone grow stronger in faith .
46014027	When you meet together , if anyone speaks to the group in a different language , it should be only two or no more than three people who do this . And they should speak one after the other . And someone else should interpret what they say .
46014028	But if there is no interpreter , then anyone who speaks in a different language should be quiet in the church meeting . They should speak only to themselves and to God .
46014029	And only two or three prophets should speak . The others should judge what they say .
46014030	And if a message from God comes to someone who is sitting , the first speaker should be quiet .
46014031	You can all prophesy one after the other . This way everyone can be taught and encouraged .
46014032	The spirits of prophets are under the control of the prophets themselves .
46014033	God is not a God of confusion but a God of peace . This is the rule for all the meetings of God’s people .
46014034	The women should keep quiet in these church meetings . They are not allowed to speak out but should be under authority , as the Law of Moses says .
46014035	If there is something they want to know , they should ask their own husbands at home . It is shameful for a woman to speak up like that in the church meeting .
46014036	God’s teaching did not come from you , and you are not the only ones who have received it .
46014037	If you think you are a prophet or that you have a spiritual gift , you should understand that what I am writing to you is the Lord’s command .
46014038	If you do not accept this , you will not be accepted .
46014039	So my brothers and sisters , continue to give your attention to prophesying . And don’t stop anyone from using the gift of speaking in different languages .
46014040	But everything should be done in a way that is right and orderly .
46015001	Now , brothers and sisters , I want you to remember the Good News I told you . You received that Good News message , and you continue to base your life on it .
46015002	That Good News , the message you heard from me , is God’s way to save you . But you must continue believing it . If you don’t , you believed for nothing .
46015003	I gave you the message that I received . I told you the most important truths : that Christ died for our sins , as the Scriptures say ;
46015004	that he was buried and was raised to life on the third day , as the Scriptures say ;
46015005	and that he appeared to Peter and then to the twelve apostles .
46015006	After that Christ appeared to more than 500 other believers at the same time . Most of them are still living today , but some have died .
46015007	Then he appeared to James and later to all the apostles .
46015008	Last of all , he appeared to me . I was different , like a baby born before the normal time .
46015009	All the other apostles are greater than I am . I say this because I persecuted the church of God . That is why I am not even good enough to be called an apostle .
46015010	But , because of God’s grace , that is what I am . And his grace that he gave me was not wasted . I worked harder than all the other apostles . ( But I was not really the one working . It was God’s grace that was with me . )
46015011	So then it is not important if I told you God’s message or if it was the other apostles who told you — we all tell people the same message , and this is what you believed .
46015012	We tell everyone that Christ was raised from death . So why do some of you say that people will not be raised from death ?
46015013	If no one will ever be raised from death , then Christ has never been raised .
46015014	And if Christ has never been raised , then the message we tell is worth nothing . And your faith is worth nothing .
46015015	And we will also be guilty of lying about God , because we have told people about him , saying that he raised Christ from death . And if no one is raised from death , then God never raised Christ from death .
46015016	If those who have died are not raised , then Christ has not been raised either .
46015017	And if Christ has not been raised from death , then your faith is for nothing ; you are still guilty of your sins .
46015018	And those in Christ who have already died are lost .
46015019	If our hope in Christ is only for this life here on earth , then people should feel more sorry for us than for anyone else .
46015020	But Christ really has been raised from death — the first one of all those who will be raised .
46015021	Death comes to people because of what one man did . But now there is resurrection from death because of another man .
46015022	I mean that in Adam all of us die . And in the same way , in Christ all of us will be made alive again .
46015023	But everyone will be raised to life in the right order . Christ was first to be raised . Then , when Christ comes again , those who belong to him will be raised to life .
46015024	Then the end will come . Christ will destroy all rulers , authorities , and powers . Then he will give the kingdom to God the Father .
46015025	Christ must rule until God puts all enemies under his control .
46015026	The last enemy to be destroyed will be death .
46015027	As the Scriptures say , “ God put everything under his control . ” When it says that “ everything ” is put under him , it is clear that this does not include God himself . God is the one putting everything under Christ’s control .
46015028	After everything has been put under Christ , then the Son himself will be put under God . God is the one who put everything under Christ . And Christ will be put under God so that God will be the complete ruler over everything .
46015029	If no one will ever be raised from death , then what will the people do who are baptized for those who have died ? If the dead are never raised , then why are people baptized for them ?
46015030	And what about us ? Why do we put ourselves in danger every hour ?
46015031	I face death every day . That is true , brothers and sisters , just as it is true that I am proud of what you are because of Christ Jesus our Lord .
46015032	I fought wild animals in Ephesus . If I did that only for human reasons , then I have gained nothing . If we are not raised from death , “ Let us eat and drink , because tomorrow we die . ”
46015033	Don’t be fooled : “ Bad friends will ruin good habits . ”
46015034	Come back to your right way of thinking and stop sinning . Some of you don’t know God . I say this to shame you .
46015035	But someone may ask , “ How are the dead raised ? What kind of body will they have ? ”
46015036	These are stupid questions . When you plant something , it must die in the ground before it can live and grow .
46015037	And when you plant something , what you plant does not have the same “ body ” that it will have later . What you plant is only a seed , maybe wheat or something else .
46015038	But God gives it the body that he has planned for it , and he gives each kind of seed its own body .
46015039	All things made of flesh are not the same : People have one kind of flesh , animals have another , birds have another , and fish have yet another kind .
46015040	Also there are heavenly bodies and earthly bodies . But the beauty of the heavenly bodies is one kind , and the beauty of the earthly bodies is another .
46015041	The sun has one kind of beauty , the moon has another kind , and the stars have another . And each star is different in its beauty .
46015042	It will be the same when those who have died are raised to life . The body that is “ planted ” in the grave will ruin and decay , but it will be raised to a life that cannot be destroyed .
46015043	When the body is “ planted , ” it is without honor . But when it is raised , it will be great and glorious . When the body is “ planted , ” it is weak . But when it is raised , it will be full of power .
46015044	The body that is “ planted ” is a physical body . When it is raised , it will be a spiritual body . There is a physical body . So there is also a spiritual body .
46015045	As the Scriptures say , “ The first man , Adam , became a living person . ” But the last Adam is a life-giving spirit .
46015046	The spiritual man did not come first . It was the physical man that came first ; then came the spiritual .
46015047	The first man came from the dust of the earth . The second man came from heaven .
46015048	All people belong to the earth . They are like that first man of earth . But those who belong to heaven are like that man of heaven .
46015049	We were made like that man of earth , so we will also be made like that man of heaven .
46015050	I tell you this , brothers and sisters : Our bodies of flesh and blood cannot have a part in God’s kingdom . Something that will ruin cannot have a part in something that never ruins .
46015051	But listen , I tell you this secret : We will not all die , but we will all be changed .
46015052	It will only take the time of a second . We will be changed as quickly as an eye blinks . This will happen when the last trumpet blows . The trumpet will blow and those who have died will be raised to live forever . And we will all be changed .
46015053	This body that ruins must clothe itself with something that will never ruin . And this body that dies must clothe itself with something that will never die .
46015054	So this body that ruins will clothe itself with that which never ruins . And this body that dies will clothe itself with that which never dies . When this happens , the Scriptures will be made true : “ Death is swallowed in victory . ”
46015055	“ O death , where is your victory ? Where is your power to hurt ? ”
46015058	So , my dear brothers and sisters , stand strong . Don’t let anything change you . Always give yourselves fully to the work of the Lord . You know that your work in the Lord is never wasted .
46016001	Now , about the collection of money for God’s people : Do the same as I told the Galatian churches to do .
46016002	On the first day of every week , each of you should take some of your money and put it in a special place . Save up as much as you can from what you are blessed with . Then you will not have to gather it all after I come .
46016003	When I arrive , I will send some men to take your gift to Jerusalem . These will be the ones you all agree should go . I will send them with letters of introduction .
46016004	If it seems good for me to go too , we can all travel together .
46016005	I plan to go through Macedonia , so I will come to you after that .
46016006	Maybe I will stay with you for a time . I might even stay all winter . Then you can help me on my trip , wherever I go .
46016007	I don’t want to come see you now , because I would have to leave to go to other places . I hope to stay a longer time with you , if the Lord allows it .
46016008	But I will stay in Ephesus until Pentecost .
46016009	I will stay here , because a good opportunity for a great and growing work has been given to me now . And there are many people working against it .
46016010	Timothy might come to you . Try to make him feel comfortable with you . He is working for the Lord the same as I am .
46016011	So none of you should refuse to accept Timothy . Help him continue on his trip in peace so that he can come back to me . I am expecting him to come back with the other brothers .
46016012	Now about our brother Apollos : I strongly encouraged him to visit you with the other brothers . He prefers not to come now , but he will come when he has the opportunity .
46016013	Be careful . Hold firmly to your faith . Have courage and be strong .
46016014	Do everything in love .
46016015	You know that Stephanas and his family were the first believers in Achaia . They have given themselves to the service of God’s people . I ask you , brothers and sisters ,
46016016	to follow the leading of people like these and others who work hard and serve together with them .
46016017	I am happy that Stephanas , Fortunatus , and Achaicus have come . You are not here , but they have filled your place .
46016018	They have been a great encouragement to me and to you as well . You should recognize the value of such people .
46016019	The churches in Asia send you their greetings . Aquila and Priscilla greet you in the Lord . Also the church that meets in their house sends greetings .
46016020	All the brothers and sisters here send their greetings . Give each other the special greeting of God’s people .
46016021	Here’s my greeting in my own handwriting — Paul .
46016022	If anyone does not love the Lord , let that person be separated from God — lost forever ! Come , O Lord !
46016023	The grace of the Lord Jesus be with you .
46016024	My love be with all of you in Christ Jesus .
47001001	Greetings from Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus . I am an apostle because that is what God wanted . Greetings also from Timothy our brother in Christ . To God’s church in Corinth and to all of God’s holy people throughout Achaia .
47001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
47001003	Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ . He is the Father who is full of mercy , the God of all comfort .
47001004	He comforts us every time we have trouble so that when others have trouble , we can comfort them with the same comfort God gives us .
47001005	We share in the many sufferings of Christ . In the same way , much comfort comes to us through Christ .
47001006	If we have troubles , it is for your comfort and salvation . If we are comforted , it is so that we can comfort you . And this helps you patiently accept the same sufferings we have .
47001007	Our hope for you is strong . We know that you share in our sufferings . So we know that you also share in our comfort .
47001008	Brothers and sisters , we want you to know about the trouble we suffered in Asia . We had great burdens there , which were greater than our own strength . We even gave up hope for life .
47001009	In fact , it seems like God has been telling us we are going to die . But this is so that we will not trust in ourselves but in God , who raises people from death .
47001010	He saved us from these great dangers of death , and he will continue to save us . We feel sure he will always save us .
47001011	And you can help us with your prayers . Then many people will give thanks for us — that God blessed us because of their many prayers .
47001012	This is what we are proud of , and I can say with a clear conscience that it is true : In everything we have done in the world , we have done it with an honest and pure heart from God . And this is even truer in what we have done with you . We did this by God’s grace , not by the kind of wisdom the world has .
47001013	We write to you only what you can read and understand . And I hope you will fully understand ,
47001014	just as you already understand many things about us . I hope you will understand that you can be proud of us , just as we will be proud of you on the day when our Lord Jesus Christ comes again .
47001015	I was very sure of all this . That is why I made plans to visit you first . Then you could be blessed twice .
47001016	I planned to visit you on my way to Macedonia and again on my way back . I wanted to get help from you for my trip to Judea .
47001017	Do you think that I made these plans without really thinking ? Or maybe you think I make plans as the world does , saying yes and no at the same time .
47001018	But if you can believe God , then you can believe that what we tell you is never both yes and no .
47001019	The Son of God , Jesus Christ , the one that Silas , Timothy , and I told you about was not yes and no . In Christ it has always been yes .
47001020	The yes to all of God’s promises is in Christ . And that is why we say “ Amen ” through Christ to the glory of God .
47001021	And God is the one who makes you and us strong in Christ . God is also the one who chose us for his work .
47001022	He put his mark on us to show that we are his . Yes , he put his Spirit in our hearts as the first payment that guarantees all that he will give us .
47001023	I tell you this , and I ask God to be my witness that this is true : The reason I did not come back to Corinth was that I did not want to punish or hurt you .
47001024	I don’t mean that we are trying to control your faith . You are strong in faith . But we are workers with you for your own happiness .
47002001	So I decided that my next visit to you would not be another visit to make you sad .
47002002	If I make you sad , then who will make me happy ? Only you can make me happy — you , the ones I made sad .
47002003	I wrote you a letter so that when I came to you I would not be made sad by those who should make me happy . I felt sure that all of you would share my joy .
47002004	When I wrote to you before , I was very troubled and my heart was full of sadness . I wrote with many tears . I did not write to make you sad , but to let you know how much I love you .
47002005	Someone in your group has caused sadness — not to me , but to all of you . I mean he has caused sadness to all in some way . ( I don’t want to make it sound worse than it really is . )
47002006	The punishment that most of your group gave him is enough for him .
47002007	But now you should forgive him and encourage him . This will keep him from having too much sadness and giving up completely .
47002008	So I beg you to show him that you love him .
47002009	This is why I wrote to you . I wanted to test you and see if you obey in everything .
47002010	If you forgive someone , then I also forgive them . And what I have forgiven — if I had anything to forgive — I forgave it for you , and Christ was with me .
47002011	I did this so that Satan would not win anything from us . We know very well what his plans are .
47002012	I went to Troas to tell people the Good News of Christ . The Lord gave me a good opportunity there .
47002013	But I had no peace because I did not find my brother Titus . So I said goodbye and went to Macedonia .
47002014	But thanks be to God , who always leads us in victory through Christ . God uses us to spread his knowledge everywhere like a sweet-smelling perfume .
47002015	Our offering to God is to be the perfume of Christ that goes out to those who are being saved and to those who are being lost .
47002016	To those who are being lost , this perfume smells like death , and it brings them death . But to those who are being saved , it has the sweet smell of life , and it brings them life . So who is good enough to do this work ?
47002017	Certainly not those who are out there selling God’s message for a profit ! But we don’t do that . With Christ’s help we speak God’s truth honestly , knowing that we must answer to him .
47003001	Why are we beginning again to tell you all these good things about ourselves ? Do we need letters of introduction to you or from you , like some other people ?
47003002	No , you yourselves are our letter , written on our hearts . It is known and read by all people .
47003003	You show that you are a letter from Christ that he sent through us . This letter is not written with ink but with the Spirit of the living God . It is not written on stone tablets but on human hearts .
47003004	We can say this , because through Christ we feel sure before God .
47003005	I don’t mean that we are able to do anything good ourselves . It is God who makes us able to do all that we do .
47003006	He made us able to be servants of a new agreement from himself to his people . It is not an agreement of written laws , but it is of the Spirit . The written law brings death , but the Spirit gives life .
47003007	The old agreement that brought death , written with words on stone , came with God’s glory . In fact , the face of Moses was so bright with glory ( a glory that was ending ) that the people of Israel could not continue looking at his face .
47003008	So surely the new agreement that comes from the life-giving Spirit has even more glory .
47003009	This is what I mean : That old agreement judged people guilty of sin , but it had glory . So surely the new agreement that makes people right with God has much greater glory .
47003010	That old agreement had glory . But it really loses its glory when it is compared to the much greater glory of the new agreement .
47003011	If the agreement that was brought to an end came with glory , then the agreement that never ends has much greater glory .
47003012	We are so sure of this hope that we can speak very openly .
47003013	We are not like Moses , who put a covering over his face . He covered his face so that the people of Israel would not see it . The glory was disappearing , and Moses did not want them to see it end .
47003014	But their minds were closed . And even today , when those people read the writings of the old agreement , that same covering hides the meaning . That covering has not been removed for them . It is taken away only through Christ .
47003015	Yes , even today , when they read the Law of Moses , there is a covering over their minds .
47003016	But when someone changes and follows the Lord , that covering is taken away .
47003017	The Lord is the Spirit , and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is freedom .
47003018	And our faces are not covered . We all show the Lord’s glory , and we are being changed to be like him . This change in us brings more and more glory , which comes from the Lord , who is the Spirit .
47004001	God , with his mercy , gave us this work to do , so we don’t give up .
47004002	But we have turned away from secret and shameful ways . We don’t use trickery , and we don’t change the teaching of God . We teach the truth plainly . This is how we show people who we are . And this is how they can know in their hearts what kind of people we are before God .
47004003	The Good News that we tell people may be hidden , but it is hidden only to those who are lost .
47004004	The ruler of this world has blinded the minds of those who don’t believe . They cannot see the light of the Good News — the message about the divine greatness of Christ . Christ is the one who is exactly like God .
47004005	We don’t tell people about ourselves . But we tell people that Jesus Christ is Lord , and we tell them that we are your servants for Jesus .
47004006	God once said , “ Let light shine out of the darkness ! ” And this is the same God who made his light shine in our hearts to let us know that his own divine greatness is seen in the face of Christ .
47004007	We have this treasure from God , but we are only like clay jars that hold the treasure . This is to show that the amazing power we have is from God , not from us .
47004008	We have troubles all around us , but we are not defeated . We often don’t know what to do , but we don’t give up .
47004009	We are persecuted , but God does not leave us . We are hurt sometimes , but we are not destroyed .
47004010	So we constantly experience the death of Jesus in our own bodies , but this is so that the life of Jesus can also be seen in our bodies .
47004011	We are alive , but for Jesus we are always in danger of death , so that the life of Jesus can be seen in our bodies that die .
47004012	So death is working in us , but the result is that life is working in you .
47004013	The Scriptures say , “ I believed , so I spoke . ” Our faith is like that too . We believe , and so we speak .
47004014	God raised the Lord Jesus from death , and we know that he will also raise us with Jesus . God will bring us together with you , and we will stand before him .
47004015	All these things are for you . And so the grace of God is being given to more and more people . This will bring more and more thanks to God for his glory .
47004016	That is why we never give up . Our physical body is becoming older and weaker , but our spirit inside us is made new every day .
47004017	We have small troubles for a while now , but these troubles are helping us gain an eternal glory . That eternal glory is much greater than our troubles .
47004018	So we think about what we cannot see , not what we see . What we see lasts only a short time , and what we cannot see will last forever .
47005001	We know that our body — the tent we live in here on earth — will be destroyed . But when that happens , God will have a home for us to live in . It will not be the kind of home people build here . It will be a home in heaven that will continue forever .
47005002	But now we are tired of this body . We want God to give us our heavenly home .
47005003	It will clothe us and we will not be naked .
47005004	While we live in this tent , we have burdens and so we complain . I don’t mean that we want to remove this tent , but we want to be clothed with our heavenly home . Then this body that dies will be covered with life .
47005005	This is what God himself made us for . And he has given us the Spirit as the first payment to guarantee the life to come .
47005006	So we always have confidence . We know that while we live in this body , we are away from the Lord .
47005007	We live by what we believe will happen , not by what we can see .
47005008	So I say that we have confidence . And we really want to be away from this body and be at home with the Lord .
47005009	Our only goal is to always please the Lord , whether we are living here in this body or there with him .
47005010	We must all stand before Christ to be judged . Everyone will get what they should . They will be paid for whatever they did — good or bad — when they lived in this earthly body .
47005011	We know what it means to fear the Lord , so we try to help people accept the truth . God knows what we really are , and I hope that in your hearts you know us too .
47005012	We are not trying to prove ourselves to you again . But we are telling you about ourselves . We are giving you reasons to be proud of us . Then you will have an answer for those who are proud about what can be seen . They don’t care about what is in a person’s heart .
47005013	If we are crazy , it is for God . If we have our right mind , it is for you .
47005014	The love of Christ controls us , because we know that one person died for everyone . So all have died .
47005015	He died for all so that those who live would not continue to live for themselves . He died for them and was raised from death so that they would live for him .
47005016	From this time on we don’t think of anyone as the world thinks of people . It is true that in the past we thought of Christ as the world thinks . But we don’t think that way now .
47005017	When anyone is in Christ , it is a whole new world . The old things are gone ; suddenly , everything is new !
47005018	All this is from God . Through Christ , God made peace between himself and us . And God gave us the work of bringing people into peace with him .
47005019	I mean that God was in Christ , making peace between the world and himself . In Christ , God did not hold people guilty for their sins . And he gave us this message of peace to tell people .
47005020	So we have been sent to speak for Christ . It is like God is calling to people through us . We speak for Christ when we beg you to be at peace with God .
47005021	Christ had no sin , but God made him become sin so that in Christ we could be right with God .
47006001	We are workers together with God . So we beg you : Don’t let the grace that you received from God be for nothing .
47006002	God says , “ I heard you at the right time , and I gave you help on the day of salvation . ”
47006003	We don’t want people to find anything wrong with our work . So we do nothing that will be a problem to others .
47006004	But in every way we show that we are servants of God . We never give up , even though we face troubles , difficulties , and problems of every kind .
47006005	We are beaten and thrown into prison . People get upset at us and fight against us . We work hard , and sometimes we get no sleep or food .
47006006	We show that we are God’s servants by our pure lives , by our understanding , by our patience , and by our kindness . We show it by the Holy Spirit , by genuine love ,
47006007	by speaking the truth , and by depending on God’s power . This right way of living has prepared us to defend ourselves against every kind of attack .
47006008	Some people honor us , but others shame us . Some people say good things about us , but others say bad things . Some people say we are liars , but we speak the truth .
47006009	To some people we are not known , but we are well known . We seem to be dying , but look ! We continue to live . We are punished , but we are not killed .
47006010	We have much sadness , but we are always rejoicing . We are poor , but we are making many people rich in faith . We have nothing , but really we have everything .
47006011	We have spoken freely to you people in Corinth . We have opened our hearts to you .
47006012	Our feelings of love for you have not stopped . It is you who have stopped your feelings of love for us .
47006013	I speak to you as if you were my children . Do the same as we have done — open your hearts also .
47006014	You are not the same as those who don’t believe . So don’t join yourselves to them . Good and evil don’t belong together . Light and darkness cannot share the same room .
47006015	How can there be any unity between Christ and the devil ? What does a believer have in common with an unbeliever ?
47006016	God’s temple cannot have anything to do with idols , and we are the temple of the living God . As God said , “ I will live with them and walk with them ; I will be their God , and they will be my people . ”
47006017	“ So come away from those people and separate yourselves from them , says the Lord . Don’t touch anything that is not clean , and I will accept you . ”
47006018	“ I will be your father , and you will be my sons and daughters , says the Lord All-Powerful . ”
47007001	Dear friends , we have these promises from God . So we should make ourselves pure — free from anything that makes our body or our soul unclean . Our respect for God should make us try to be completely holy in the way we live .
47007002	Open your hearts to us . We have not done wrong to anyone or caused harm to anyone . And we have not cheated anyone .
47007003	I do not say this to blame you . I told you before that we love you so much we would live or die with you .
47007004	I feel that I can tell you anything . I am very proud of you . Even with all the troubles we have had , I am greatly encouraged and feel very happy .
47007005	When we came into Macedonia , we had no rest . We found trouble all around us . We had fighting on the outside and fear on the inside .
47007006	But God encourages those who are troubled , and he certainly encouraged us by bringing Titus to us .
47007007	It was so good to see him , but we were encouraged even more to hear about the encouragement you gave him . He told us that you really want to see me and that you are very sorry for what you did . And he told us how ready and willing you are to help me . When I heard this , I was so much happier .
47007008	Even if the letter I wrote you made you sad , I am not sorry I wrote it . I know that letter made you sad , and I was sorry for that . But it made you sad only for a short time .
47007009	Now I am happy , not because you were made sad , but because your sorrow made you decide to change . That is what God wanted , so you were not hurt by us in any way .
47007010	The kind of sorrow God wants makes people decide to change their lives . This leads them to salvation , and we cannot be sorry for that . But the kind of sorrow the world has will bring death .
47007011	You had the kind of sorrow God wanted you to have . Now see what that sorrow has brought you : It has made you very serious . It made you want to prove that you were not wrong . It made you angry and afraid . It made you want to see me . It made you care . It made you want the right thing to be done . You proved that you were not guilty in any part of that problem .
47007012	The main reason I wrote that letter was not because of the one who did the wrong or the one who was hurt . I wrote so that you would realize , before God , how very much you care for us .
47007013	And that is what was so encouraging to us . We were greatly encouraged , but we were especially pleased to see how happy Titus was . You all made him feel so much better .
47007014	I had bragged about you to Titus , and you didn’t embarrass me . We have always told you the truth , and now what we told Titus about you has been shown to be true .
47007015	And his love for you is stronger when he remembers that you were all ready to obey . You welcomed him with respect and fear .
47007016	I am so happy that I can trust you fully .
47008001	And now , brothers and sisters , we want to tell you what God’s grace has done in the churches in Macedonia .
47008002	These believers have been tested by great troubles , and they are very poor . But their great joy caused them to be very generous in their giving .
47008003	I can tell you that they gave as much as they were able and even more than they could afford . No one told them to do this . It was their idea .
47008004	But they asked us again and again — they begged us to let them share in this service for God’s people .
47008005	And they gave in a way that we did not expect : They gave themselves to the Lord and to us before they gave their money . This is what God wants .
47008006	So we asked Titus to help you finish this special work of giving . He is the one who started this work .
47008007	You are rich in everything — in faith , in speaking ability , in knowledge , in the willingness to help , and in the love you learned from us . So now we want you to be rich in this work of giving too .
47008008	I am not ordering you to give , but I want to see how real your love is by comparing you with others who have been so ready and willing to help .
47008009	You know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ . You know that he gave up his heavenly riches for you . He gave up everything so that you could be richly blessed .
47008010	This is what I think you should do : Last year you were the first to want to give , and you were the first who gave .
47008011	So now finish the work you started . Then your “ doing ” will be equal to your “ wanting to do . ” Give from what you have .
