47008012	If you want to give , your gift will be accepted . Your gift will be judged by what you have , not by what you don’t have .
47008013	We don’t want you to have troubles while others are comforted . We want everything to be equal .
47008014	At this time you have plenty and can provide what they need . Then later , when they have plenty , they can provide what you need . Then everyone will have an equal share .
47008015	As the Scriptures say , “ Those who gathered much did not have too much , and those who gathered little did not have too little . ”
47008016	I thank God because he gave Titus the same love for you that I have .
47008017	Titus agreed to do what we asked . In fact , he himself wanted very much to come see you .
47008018	We are sending with Titus the brother who is praised by all the churches . He is praised because of his service to the Good News .
47008019	Also , he was chosen by the churches to go with us when we carry this gift . We are doing this service to bring honor to the Lord and to show that we really want to help .
47008020	We are being careful so that no one will criticize us about the way we are caring for this large gift .
47008021	We are trying to do what is right . We want to do what the Lord accepts as right and also what people think is right .
47008022	Also , we are sending with them our brother who is always ready to help . He has proved this to us in many ways . And he wants to help even more now because he has much faith in you .
47008023	Now about Titus — he is my partner . He is working together with me to help you . And about the other brothers — they are sent from the churches , and they bring honor to Christ .
47008024	So show these men that you really have love . Show them why we are proud of you . Then all the churches can see it .
47009001	I really don’t need to write to you about this help for God’s people .
47009002	I know that you want to help . I have been bragging about you to the people in Macedonia . I told them that you people in Achaia have been ready to give since last year . And your desire to give has made most of the people here ready to give also .
47009003	But I am sending these brothers to you . I don’t want our bragging about you in this to be for nothing . I want you to be ready just as I said you would be .
47009004	If any of those from Macedonia come with me , and they find that you are not ready , we will be ashamed . We will be ashamed that we were so sure of you . And you will be ashamed too !
47009005	So I thought that I should ask these brothers to come there before we do . They will help in getting together the generous gift you promised . Then it will be ready when we come , and it will be seen as a blessing you are giving , not as something you were forced to do .
47009006	Remember this : The one who plants few seeds will have a small harvest . But the one who plants a lot will have a big harvest .
47009007	Each one of you should give what you have decided in your heart to give . You should not give if it makes you unhappy or if you feel forced to give . God loves those who are happy to give .
47009008	And God can give you more blessings than you need , and you will always have plenty of everything . You will have enough to give to every good work .
47009009	As the Scriptures say , “ He gives generously to the poor ; his goodness will continue forever . ”
47009012	The service you are offering helps God’s people with their needs , but that is not all it does . It is also bringing more and more thanks to God .
47009013	This service is a proof of your faith , and people will praise God because of it . They will praise God that you freely share what you have with them and with all people . They will praise him to see you following the Good News about Christ that you openly accepted . They will praise God because you freely share with them and with all people .
47009014	And when they pray , they will wish they could be with you . They will feel this way because of the great grace that God gave you .
47009015	Thanks be to God for his gift that is too wonderful to describe .
47010001	I , Paul , am begging you with the gentleness and the kindness of Christ . Some say that I am bold when I am writing you from a distance , but not when I am there with you .
47010002	They think our motives for what we do are like those of the world . I plan to be very bold against those people when I come . I hope I will not need to use that same boldness with you .
47010003	We live in this world , but we don’t fight our battles in the same way the world does .
47010004	The weapons we use are not human ones . Our weapons have power from God and can destroy the enemy’s strong places . We destroy people’s arguments ,
47010005	and we tear down every proud idea that raises itself against the knowledge of God . We also capture every thought and make it give up and obey Christ .
47010006	We are ready to punish anyone there who does not obey , but first we want you to be fully obedient .
47010007	You must look at the facts before you . If you feel sure you belong to Christ , you must remember that we belong to Christ the same as you do .
47010008	It may seem as though we boast too much about the authority the Lord gave us . But he gave us this authority to strengthen you , not to hurt you . So I will not be ashamed of whatever boasting we do .
47010009	I don’t want you to think that I am trying to scare you with my letters .
47010010	Some people say , “ Paul’s letters are powerful and sound important , but when he is with us , he is weak and the worst speaker you have ever heard . ”
47010011	Those people should know this : When we are there with you , we will show the same power that we show now in our letters .
47010012	We don’t dare put ourselves in the same class with those who think they are so important . We don’t compare ourselves to them . They use themselves to measure themselves , and they judge themselves by what they themselves are . This shows that they know nothing .
47010013	But we will not boast about anything outside the work that was given us to do . We will limit our boasting to the work God gave us , but this work includes our work with you .
47010014	We would be boasting too much only if we had not already come to you . But we have come to you with the Good News about Christ .
47010015	We limit our boasting to the work that is ours . We don’t boast about the work other people have done . We hope that your faith will continue to grow . We hope that you will help our work to grow much larger .
47010016	We want to tell the Good News in the areas beyond your city . We don’t want to boast about work that has already been done in someone else’s area .
47010017	“ Whoever boasts should boast only about the Lord . ”
47010018	What people say about themselves means nothing . What counts is whether the Lord says they have done well .
47011001	I wish you would be patient with me even when I am a little foolish . But you are already patient with me .
47011002	I am jealous for you with a jealousy that comes from God . I promised to give you to Christ . He must be your only husband . I want to give you to Christ to be his pure bride .
47011003	But I am afraid that your minds will be led away from your true and pure following of Christ . This could happen just as Eve was tricked by that snake with his clever lies .
47011004	You seem to be quite patient with anyone who comes to you and tells you about a Jesus that is different from the Jesus we told you about . You seem very willing to accept a spirit or a message that is different from the Spirit and message that you received from us .
47011005	I don’t think that those “ super apostles ” are any better than I am .
47011006	It is true that I am not a trained speaker , but I do have knowledge . We have shown this to you clearly in every way .
47011007	I did the work of telling God’s Good News to you without pay . I humbled myself to make you important . Do you think that was wrong ?
47011008	I accepted pay from other churches . I took their money so that I could serve you .
47011009	If I needed something when I was with you , I did not trouble any of you . The brothers who came from Macedonia gave me all that I needed . I did not allow myself to be a burden to you in any way . And I will never be a burden to you .
47011010	No one there in Achaia will stop me from boasting about that . I say this with the truth of Christ in me .
47011011	And why do I not burden you ? Do you think it is because I don’t love you ? God knows that I love you .
47011012	And I will continue doing what I am doing now , because I want to stop those people from having a reason to boast . They would like to say that the work they boast about is the same as ours .
47011013	They are false apostles , lying workers . They only pretend to be apostles of Christ .
47011014	That does not surprise us , because even Satan changes himself to look like an angel of light .
47011015	So it does not surprise us if Satan’s servants make themselves look like servants who work for what is right . But in the end those people will get the punishment they deserve .
47011016	I tell you again : No one should think that I am a fool . But if you think I am a fool , then accept me as you would accept a fool . Then I can boast a little too .
47011017	But I am not talking the way the Lord would talk . I am boasting like a fool .
47011018	Others are boasting about their lives in the world . So I will boast too .
47011019	You are wise , so you will gladly be patient with fools !
47011020	I say this because you are even patient with someone who forces you to do things and uses you . You are patient with those who trick you , or think they are better than you , or hit you in the face !
47011021	I am ashamed to say it , but we were too “ weak ” to do such things to you . But if anyone dares to boast , I will too . ( I am talking like a fool . )
47011022	Are those people Hebrews ? So am I . Are they Israelites ? So am I . Are they from Abraham’s family ? So am I .
47011023	Are they serving Christ ? I am serving him more . ( I am crazy to talk like this . ) I have worked much harder than they have . I have been in prison more often . I have been hurt more in beatings . I have been near death many times .
47011024	Five times the Jews have given me their punishment of 39 lashes with a whip .
47011025	Three different times I was beaten with rods . One time I was almost killed with rocks . Three times I was in ships that were wrecked , and one of those times I spent the night and the next day in the sea .
47011026	In my constant traveling I have been in danger from rivers , from thieves , from my own people , and from people who are not Jews . I have been in danger in cities , in places where no one lives , and on the sea . And I have been in danger from people who pretend to be believers but are not .
47011027	I have done hard and tiring work , and many times I did not sleep . I have been hungry and thirsty . Many times I have been without food . I have been cold and without clothes .
47011028	And there are many other problems . One of these is the care I have for all the churches . I worry about each group of believers every day .
47011029	I feel weak every time another person is weak . I feel deeply upset every time another person is led into sin .
47011030	If I must boast , I will boast about the things that show I am weak .
47011031	God knows that I am not lying . He is the God and Father of the Lord Jesus , and he is to be praised forever .
47011032	When I was in Damascus , the governor under King Aretas wanted to arrest me , so he put guards around the city .
47011033	But some friends put me in a basket . Then they put the basket through a hole in the wall and lowered me down . So I escaped from the governor .
47012001	There is more that I have to say about myself . It won’t help , but I will talk now about visions and revelations from the Lord .
47012002	I know a man in Christ who was taken up to the third heaven . This happened 14 years ago . I don’t know if the man was in his body or out of his body , but God knows .
47012005	I will boast about a man like that , but I will not boast about myself . I will boast only about my weaknesses .
47012006	But if I wanted to say more about myself , I would not be a fool , because I would be telling the truth . But I won’t say any more , because I don’t want people to think more of me than what they see me do or hear me say .
47012007	But I must not be too proud of the wonderful things that were shown to me . So a painful problem was given to me — an angel from Satan , sent to make me suffer , so that I would not think that I am better than anyone else .
47012008	I begged the Lord three times to take this problem away from me .
47012009	But the Lord said , “ My grace is all you need . Only when you are weak can everything be done completely by my power . ” So I will gladly boast about my weaknesses . Then Christ’s power can stay in me .
47012010	Yes , I am glad to have weaknesses if they are for Christ . I am glad to be insulted and have hard times . I am glad when I am persecuted and have problems , because it is when I am weak that I am really strong .
47012011	I have been talking like a fool , but you made me do it . You people are the ones who should say good things about me . I am worth nothing , but those “ super apostles ” are not worth any more than I am !
47012012	When I was with you , I patiently did the things that prove I am an apostle — signs , wonders , and miracles .
47012013	So you received everything that the other churches have received . Only one thing was different : I was not a burden to you . Forgive me for this !
47012014	I am now ready to visit you for the third time , and I will not be a burden to you . I don’t want any of the things you own . I only want you . Children should not have to save things to give to their parents . Parents should save to give to their children .
47012015	So I am happy to give everything I have for you . I will even give myself for you . If I love you more , will you love me less ?
47012016	It is clear that I was not a burden to you , but you think that I was tricky and used lies to catch you .
47012017	Did I cheat you by using any of the men I sent to you ? You know I didn’t .
47012018	I asked Titus to go to you , and I sent our brother with him . Titus did not cheat you , did he ? No , you know that his actions and his attitude were the same as ours .
47012019	Do you think that we have been defending ourselves to you all this time ? No , we say these things in Christ and before God . You are our dear friends , and everything we do is to make you stronger .
47012020	I do this because I am afraid that when I come , you will not be what I want you to be . And I am afraid that I will not be what you want me to be . I am afraid that I will find arguing , jealousy , anger , selfish fighting , evil talk , gossip , pride , and confusion there .
47012021	I am afraid that when I come to you again , my God will make me humble before you . I may have to cry over the loss of some who sinned before . Many of them have still not changed their hearts to be sorry for their evil lives , their sexual sins , and the shameful things they have done .
47013001	This will be my third time to visit you . And remember , “ For every complaint there must be two or three people to say that they know it is true . ”
47013002	When I was with you the second time , I gave a warning to those who had sinned . I am not there now , but I am giving another warning to them and to anyone else who has sinned : When I come to you again , I will punish you .
47013003	You want proof that Christ is speaking through me . My proof is that he is not weak in dealing with you but is showing his power among you .
47013004	It is true that Christ was weak when he was killed on the cross , but he lives now by God’s power . It is also true that we share his weakness , but in dealing with you , we will be alive in him by God’s power .
47013005	Look closely at yourselves . Test yourselves to see if you are living in the faith . Don’t you realize that Christ Jesus is in you ? Of course , if you fail the test , he is not in you .
47013006	But I hope you will see that we have not failed the test .
47013007	We pray to God that you will not do anything wrong . Our concern here is not for people to see that we have passed the test in our work with you . Our main concern is that you do what is right , even if it looks as if we have failed the test .
47013008	We cannot do anything that is against the truth but only what promotes the truth .
47013009	We are happy to be weak if you are strong . And this is what we pray — that your lives will be made completely right again .
47013010	I’m writing this before I come so that when I am there I will not have to use my authority to punish you . The Lord gave me that authority to make you stronger , not to destroy you .
47013011	Now , brothers and sisters , be filled with joy . Try to make everything right , and do what I have asked you to do . Agree with each other , and live in peace . Then the God of love and peace will be with you .
47013012	Give each other the special greeting of God’s people . All of God’s holy people here send you their greetings .
47013013	
47013014	I pray that you will enjoy the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , the love of God , and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit .
48001001	Greetings from Paul , an apostle . I was chosen to be an apostle , but not by any group or person here on earth . My authority came from none other than Jesus Christ and God the Father , who raised Jesus from death .
48001002	Greetings also from all those in God’s family who are with me . To the churches in Galatia :
48001003	I pray that God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ will be good to you and give you peace .
48001004	Jesus gave himself for our sins to free us from this evil world we live in . This is what God our Father wanted .
48001005	The glory belongs to God forever and ever . Amen .
48001006	A short time ago God chose you to follow him . He chose you through his grace that came through Christ . But now I am amazed that you are already turning away and believing something different from the Good News we told you .
48001007	There is no other message that is the Good News , but some people are confusing you . They want to change the Good News about Christ .
48001008	We told you the true Good News message . So anyone who tells you a different message should be condemned — even if it’s one of us or even an angel from heaven !
48001009	I said this before . Now I say it again : You have already accepted the Good News . Anyone who tells you another way to be saved should be condemned !
48001010	Now do you think I am trying to make people accept me ? No , God is the one I am trying to please . Am I trying to please people ? If I wanted to please people , I would not be a servant of Christ .
48001011	Brothers and sisters , I want you to know that the Good News message I told you was not made up by anyone .
48001012	I did not get my message from any other human . The Good News is not something I learned from other people . Jesus Christ himself gave it to me . He showed me the Good News that I should tell people .
48001013	You have heard about my past life in the Jewish religion . I persecuted the church of God very much . I tried to destroy his people .
48001014	I was becoming a leader in the Jewish religion . I did better than most other Jews my own age . I tried harder than anyone else to follow the traditions we got from our ancestors .
48001015	But God had special plans for me even before I was born . So he chose me through his grace .
48001016	It pleased him to let me see and know his Son so that I could tell the Good News about him to the non-Jewish people . I immediately prepared to do this work without asking for advice or help from anyone .
48001017	I did not go to Jerusalem to see those who were apostles before I was . But , without waiting , I went away to Arabia . Later , I went back to the city of Damascus .
48001018	Three years later I went to Jerusalem to meet Peter . I stayed with him 15 days .
48001019	I met no other apostles — only James , the brother of the Lord .
48001020	God knows there is nothing untrue in any of this .
48001021	Later , I went to the areas of Syria and Cilicia .
48001022	No one in any of Christ’s churches in Judea had ever met me before .
48001023	They had only heard this about me : “ This man was persecuting us . But now he is telling people about the same faith that he once tried to destroy . ”
48001024	These believers praised God because of me .
48002001	After 14 years I went back to Jerusalem with Barnabas and took Titus with me .
48002002	I went there because God showed me that I should go . I explained to them the message that I tell the non-Jewish people . I also met alone with those who were considered to be the leaders . I wanted to be sure we were in agreement so that my past work and the work I do now would not be wasted .
48002003	Titus , who was with me , is a Greek . But these leaders still did not force him to be circumcised .
48002004	We needed to talk about these problems , because some who pretended to be our brothers had come into our group secretly . They came in like spies to find out about the freedom we have in Christ Jesus . They wanted to make us slaves ,
48002005	but we did not agree with anything those false brothers wanted . We wanted the truth of the Good News to continue for you .
48002006	Those men who were considered to be important did not change the Good News message I tell people . ( It doesn’t matter to me if they were “ important ” or not . To God everyone is the same . )
48002007	But these leaders saw that God had given me a special work , the same as Peter . God gave Peter the work of telling the Good News to the Jews . But God gave me the work of telling the Good News to the non-Jewish people .
48002008	God gave Peter the power to work as an apostle for the Jewish people . God gave me the power to work as an apostle too , but for those who are not Jews .
48002009	James , Peter , and John seemed to be the leaders . And they saw that God had given me this special gift of ministry , so they accepted Barnabas and me . They said to us , “ We agree that you should go to those who are not Jews , and we will go to the Jews . ”
48002010	They asked us to do only one thing — to remember to help those who are poor . And this was something that I really wanted to do .
48002011	When Peter came to Antioch , he did something that was not right . I stood against him , because he was wrong .
48002012	This is what happened : When Peter first came to Antioch , he ate and associated with the non-Jewish people . But when some Jewish men came from James , Peter separated himself from the non-Jews . He stopped eating with them , because he was afraid of the Jews who believe that all non-Jewish people must be circumcised .
48002013	So Peter was a hypocrite . The other Jewish believers joined with him , so they were hypocrites too . Even Barnabas was influenced by what these Jewish believers did .
48002014	They were not following the truth of the Good News . When I saw this , I spoke to Peter in front of everyone . I said , “ Peter , you are a Jew , but you don’t live like one . You live like someone who is not a Jew . So why are you trying to force those who are not Jewish to live like Jews ? ”
48002015	We are Jews by birth . We were not born “ sinners , ” as we call those who are not Jews .
48002016	But we know that no one is made right with God by following the law . It is trusting in Jesus Christ that makes a person right with God . So we have put our faith in Christ Jesus , because we wanted to be made right with God . And we are right with him because we trusted in Christ — not because we followed the law . I can say this because no one can be made right with God by following the law .
48002017	We Jews came to Christ to be made right with God , so it is clear that we were sinners too . Does this mean that Christ makes us sinners ? Of course not .
48002018	But I would be wrong to begin teaching again those things that I gave up .
48002019	It was the law itself that caused me to end my life under the law . I died to the law so that I could live for God . I have been nailed to the cross with Christ .
48002020	So I am not the one living now — it is Christ living in me . I still live in my body , but I live by faith in the Son of God . He is the one who loved me and gave himself to save me .
48002021	I am not the one destroying the meaning of God’s grace . If following the law is how people are made right with God , then Christ did not have to die .
48003001	You people in Galatia are so foolish ! Why do I say this ? Because I told you very clearly about the death of Jesus Christ on the cross . But now it seems as though you have let someone use their magical powers to make you forget .
48003002	Tell me this one thing : How did you receive the Spirit ? Did you receive the Spirit by following the law ? No , you received the Spirit because you heard the message about Jesus and believed it .
48003003	You began your life in Christ with the Spirit . Now do you try to complete it by your own power ? That is foolish .
48003004	You have experienced many things . Were all those experiences wasted ? I hope they were not wasted !
48003005	Does God give you the Spirit because you follow the law ? Does God work miracles among you because you follow the law ? No , God gives you his Spirit and works miracles among you because you heard the message about Jesus and believed it .
48003006	The Scriptures say the same thing about Abraham . “ Abraham believed God , and because of this faith he was accepted as one who is right with God . ”
48003007	So you should know that the true children of Abraham are those who have faith .
48003008	The Scriptures told what would happen in the future . These writings said that God would make the non-Jewish people right through their faith . God told this Good News to Abraham before it happened . God said to Abraham , “ I will use you to bless all the people on earth . ”
48003009	Abraham believed this , and because he believed , he was blessed . All people who believe are blessed the same as Abraham was .
48003010	But people who depend on following the law to make them right are under a curse . As the Scriptures say , “ They must do everything that is written in the law . If they do not always obey , they are under a curse . ”
48003011	So it is clear that no one can be made right with God by the law . The Scriptures say , “ The one who is right with God by faith will live forever . ”
48003012	The law does not depend on faith . No , it says that the only way a person will find life by the law is to obey its commands .
48003013	The law says we are under a curse for not always obeying it . But Christ took away that curse . He changed places with us and put himself under that curse . The Scriptures say , “ Anyone who is hung on a tree is under a curse . ”
48003014	Because of what Jesus Christ did , the blessing God promised to Abraham was given to all people . Christ died so that by believing in him we could have the Spirit that God promised .
48003015	Brothers and sisters , let me give you an example from everyday life : Think about an agreement that one person makes with another . After that agreement is made official , no one can stop it or add anything to it , and no one can ignore it .
48003016	God made promises to Abraham and his Descendant . The Scripture does not say , “ and to your descendants . ” That would mean many people . But it says , “ and to your Descendant . ” That means only one , and that one is Christ .
48003017	This is what I mean : The agreement that God gave to Abraham was made official long before the law came . The law came 430 years later . So the law could not take away the agreement and change God’s promise .
48003018	Can following the law give us the blessing God promised ? If we could receive it by following the law , then it would not be God’s promise that brings it to us . But God freely gave his blessings to Abraham through the promise God made .
48003019	So what was the law for ? The law was given to show the wrong things people do . The law would continue until the special Descendant of Abraham came . This is the Descendant mentioned in the promise , which came directly from God . But the law was given through angels , and the angels used Moses as a mediator to give the law to the people .
48003020	But when God gave the promise , there was no mediator , because a mediator is not needed when there is only one side , and God is one .
48003021	Does this mean that the law works against God’s promises ? Of course not . The law was never God’s way of giving new life to people . If it were , then we could be made right with God by following the law .
48003022	But this is not possible . The Scriptures put the whole world in prison under the control of sin , so that the only way for people to get what God promised would be through faith in Jesus Christ . It is given to those who believe in him .
48003023	Before this faith came , the law held us as prisoners . We had no freedom until God showed us the way of faith that was coming .
48003024	I mean the law was the guardian in charge of us until Christ came . After he came , we could be made right with God through faith .
48003025	Now that the way of faith has come , we no longer need the law to be our guardian .
48003028	Now , in Christ , it doesn’t matter if you are a Jew or a Greek , a slave or free , male or female . You are all the same in Christ Jesus .
48003029	You belong to Christ , so you are Abraham’s descendants . You get all of God’s blessings because of the promise that God made to Abraham .
48004001	This is what I am saying : When young children inherit all that their father owned , they are still no different from his slaves . It doesn’t matter that they own everything .
48004002	While they are children , they must obey those who are chosen to care for them . But when they reach the age the father set , they are free .
48004003	It is the same for us . We were once like children , slaves to the useless rules of this world .
48004004	But when the right time came , God sent his Son , who was born from a woman and lived under the law .
48004005	God did this so that he could buy the freedom of those who were under the law . God’s purpose was to make us his children .
48004006	Since you are now God’s children , he has sent the Spirit of his Son into your hearts . The Spirit cries out , “ Abba , Father . ”
48004007	Now you are not slaves like before . You are God’s children , and you will receive everything he promised his children .
48004008	In the past you did not know God . You were slaves to gods that were not real .
48004009	But now you know the true God . Really , though , it is God who knows you . So why do you turn back to the same kind of weak and useless rules you followed before ? Do you want to be slaves to those things again ?
48004012	Brothers and sisters , I became like you . So please become like me . You were very good to me before .
48004013	You know that I came to you the first time because I was sick . That was when I told the Good News to you .
48004014	My sickness was a burden to you , but you did not stop showing me respect or make me leave . Instead , you welcomed me as if I were an angel from God . You accepted me as if I were Jesus Christ himself !
48004015	You were very happy then . Where is that joy now ? I can say without a doubt that you would have done anything to help me . If it had been possible , you would have taken out your own eyes and given them to me .
48004016	Am I now your enemy because I tell you the truth ?
48004017	Those people are working hard to persuade you , but this is not good for you . They want to persuade you to turn against us and work hard for them .
48004018	It is good for you to work hard , of course , if it is for something good . That’s something you should do whether I am there or not .
48004019	My little children , I am in pain again over you , like a mother giving birth . I will feel this pain until people can look at you and see Christ .
48004020	I wish I could be with you now . Then maybe I could change the way I am talking to you . Now I don’t know what to do about you .
48004021	Some of you people want to be under the law . Tell me , do you know what the law says ?
48004022	The Scriptures say that Abraham had two sons . The mother of one son was a slave woman , and the mother of the other son was a free woman .
48004023	Abraham’s son from the slave woman was born in the normal human way . But the son from the free woman was born because of the promise God made to Abraham .
48004024	This true story makes a picture for us . The two women are like the two agreements between God and his people . One agreement is the law that God made on Mount Sinai . The people who are under this agreement are like slaves . The mother named Hagar is like that agreement .
48004025	So Hagar is like Mount Sinai in Arabia . She is a picture of the earthly Jewish city of Jerusalem . This city is a slave , and all its people are slaves to the law .
48004026	But the heavenly Jerusalem that is above is like the free woman , who is our mother .
48004027	The Scriptures say , “ Be happy , woman — you who cannot have children . Be glad you never gave birth . Shout and cry with joy ! You never felt those labor pains . The woman who is alone will have more children than the woman who has a husband . ”
48004028	My brothers and sisters , you are children who were born because of God’s promise , just as Isaac was .
48004029	But the other son of Abraham , who was born in the normal way , caused trouble for the one who was born by the power of the Spirit . It is the same today .
48004030	But what do the Scriptures say ? “ Throw out the slave woman and her son ! The son of the free woman will receive everything his father has , but the son of the slave woman will receive nothing . ”
48004031	So , my brothers and sisters , we are not children of the slave woman . We are children of the free woman .
48005001	We have freedom now , because Christ made us free . So stand strong in that freedom . Don’t go back into slavery again .
48005002	Listen ! I , Paul , tell you that if you start following the law by being circumcised , then Christ cannot help you .
48005003	Again , I warn everyone : If you allow yourselves to be circumcised , then you must follow the whole law .
48005004	If you try to be made right with God through the law , your life with Christ is finished — you have left God’s grace .
48005005	I say this because our hope of being right with God comes through faith . And the Spirit helps us feel sure as we wait for that hope .
48005006	When someone belongs to Christ Jesus , it is not important if they are circumcised or not . The important thing is faith — the kind of faith that works through love .
48005007	You were doing so well . Who caused you to stop following the truth ?
48005008	It certainly wasn’t the one who chose you .
48005009	Be careful ! “ Just a little yeast makes the whole batch of dough rise . ”
48005010	I trust in the Lord that you will not believe those different ideas . Someone is trying to confuse you . Whoever it is will be punished .
48005011	My brothers and sisters , I don’t teach that a man must be circumcised . If I do teach circumcision , then why am I still being persecuted ? If I still taught circumcision , then my message about the cross would not be a problem .
48005012	I wish those people who are bothering you would add castration to their circumcision .
48005013	My brothers and sisters , God chose you to be free . But don’t use your freedom as an excuse to do what pleases your sinful selves . Instead , serve each other with love .
48005014	The whole law is made complete in this one command : “ Love your neighbor the same as you love yourself . ”
48005015	If you continue hurting each other and tearing each other apart , be careful , or you will completely destroy each other .
48005016	So I tell you , live the way the Spirit leads you . Then you will not do the evil things your sinful self wants .
48005017	The sinful self wants what is against the Spirit , and the Spirit wants what is against the sinful self . They are always fighting against each other , so that you don’t do what you really want to do .
48005018	But if you let the Spirit lead you , you are not under law .
48005019	The wrong things the sinful self does are clear : committing sexual sin , being morally bad , doing all kinds of shameful things ,
48005020	worshiping false gods , taking part in witchcraft , hating people , causing trouble , being jealous , angry or selfish , causing people to argue and divide into separate groups ,
48005021	being filled with envy , getting drunk , having wild parties , and doing other things like this . I warn you now as I warned you before : The people who do these things will not have a part in God’s kingdom .
48005022	But the fruit that the Spirit produces in a person’s life is love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , faithfulness ,
48005023	gentleness , and self-control . There is no law against these kinds of things .
48005024	Those who belong to Christ Jesus have crucified their sinful self . They have given up their old selfish feelings and the evil things they wanted to do .
48005025	We get our new life from the Spirit , so we should follow the Spirit .
48005026	We must not feel proud and boast about ourselves . We must not cause trouble for each other or be jealous of each other .
48006001	Brothers and sisters , someone in your group might do something wrong . You who are following the Spirit should go to the one who is sinning . Help make that person right again , and do it in a gentle way . But be careful , because you might be tempted to sin too .
48006002	Help each other with your troubles . When you do this , you are obeying the law of Christ .
48006003	If you think you are too important to do this , you are only fooling yourself .
48006004	Don’t compare yourself with others . Just look at your own work to see if you have done anything to be proud of .
48006005	You must each accept the responsibilities that are yours .
48006006	Whoever is being taught God’s word should share the good things they have with the one who is teaching them .
48006007	If you think you can fool God , you are only fooling yourselves . You will harvest what you plant .
48006008	If you live to satisfy your sinful self , the harvest you will get from that will be eternal death . But if you live to please the Spirit , your harvest from the Spirit will be eternal life .
48006009	We must not get tired of doing good . We will receive our harvest of eternal life at the right time . We must not give up .
48006010	When we have the opportunity to do good to anyone , we should do it . But we should give special attention to those who are in the family of believers .
48006011	This is my own handwriting . You can see how big the letters are .
48006012	Those men who are trying to force you to be circumcised are only doing it so that their people will accept them . They are afraid they will be persecuted if they follow only the cross of Christ .
48006013	They are circumcised , but they don’t obey the law themselves . They want you to be circumcised so that they can boast about what they did to you .
48006014	I hope I will never boast about things like that . The cross of our Lord Jesus Christ is my only reason for boasting . Through Jesus’ death on the cross the world is dead to me , and I am dead to the world .
48006015	It doesn’t matter if anyone is circumcised or not . The only thing that matters is this new life we have from God .
48006016	Peace and mercy to those who follow this rule — to all God’s people .
48006017	So don’t give me any more trouble . I have scars on my body that show I belong to Jesus .
48006018	My brothers and sisters , I pray that the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ will be with your spirits . Amen .
49001001	Greetings from Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus . I am an apostle because that is what God wanted . To God’s holy people living in Ephesus , believers who belong to Christ Jesus .
49001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
49001003	Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ . In Christ , God has given us every spiritual blessing in heaven .
49001004	In Christ , he chose us before the world was made . He chose us in love to be his holy people — people who could stand before him without any fault .
49001005	And before the world was made , God decided to make us his own children through Jesus Christ . This was what God wanted , and it pleased him to do it .
49001006	And this brings praise to God because of his wonderful grace . God gave that grace to us freely . He gave us that grace in Christ , the one he loves .
49001007	In Christ we are made free by his blood sacrifice . We have forgiveness of sins because of God’s rich grace .
49001008	God gave us that grace fully and freely . With full wisdom and understanding
49001009	he let us know his secret plan . This was what God wanted , and he planned to do it through Christ .
49001010	God’s goal was to finish his plan when the right time came . He planned that all things in heaven and on earth be joined together with Christ as the head .
49001011	In Christ we were chosen to be God’s people . God had already planned for us to be his people , because that is what he wanted . And he is the one who makes everything agree with what he decides and wants .
49001012	We Jews were the first to hope in Christ . And we were chosen so that we would bring praise to God in all his glory .
49001013	It is the same with you . You heard the true message , the Good News about the way God saves you . When you heard that Good News , you believed in Christ . And in Christ , God put his special mark on you by giving you the Holy Spirit that he promised .
49001014	The Spirit is the first payment that guarantees we will get all that God has for us . Then we will enjoy complete freedom as people who belong to him . The goal for all of us is the praise of God in all his glory .
49001017	I always pray to the great and glorious Father , the God of our Lord Jesus Christ . I pray that he will give you the Spirit , who will let you know truths about God and help you understand them , so that you will know him better .
49001018	I pray that God will open your minds to see his truth . Then you will know the hope that he has chosen us to have . You will know that the blessings God has promised his holy people are rich and glorious .
49001019	And you will know that God’s power is very great for us who believe . It is the same as the mighty power
49001020	he used to raise Christ from death and put him at his right side in the heavenly places .
49001021	He put Christ over all rulers , authorities , powers , and kings . He gave him authority over everything that has power in this world or in the next world .
49001022	God put everything under Christ’s power and made him head over everything for the church .
49001023	The church is Christ’s body . It is filled with him . He makes everything complete in every way .
49002001	In the past you were spiritually dead because of your sins and the things you did against God .
49002002	Yes , in the past your lives were full of those sins . You lived the way the world lives , following the ruler of the evil powers that are above the earth . That same spirit is now working in those who refuse to obey God .
49002003	In the past all of us lived like that , trying to please our sinful selves . We did all the things our bodies and minds wanted . Like everyone else in the world , we deserved to suffer God’s anger just because of the way we were .
49002004	But God is rich in mercy , and he loved us very much .
49002005	We were spiritually dead because of all we had done against him . But he gave us new life together with Christ . ( You have been saved by God’s grace . )
49002006	Yes , it is because we are a part of Christ Jesus that God raised us from death and seated us together with him in the heavenly places .
49002007	God did this so that his kindness to us who belong to Christ Jesus would clearly show for all time to come the amazing richness of his grace .
49002008	I mean that you have been saved by grace because you believed . You did not save yourselves ; it was a gift from God .
49002009	You are not saved by the things you have done , so there is nothing to boast about .
49002010	God has made us what we are . In Christ Jesus , God made us new people so that we would spend our lives doing the good things he had already planned for us to do .
49002011	You were not born as Jews . You are the people the Jews call “ uncircumcised . ” Those Jews who call you “ uncircumcised ” call themselves “ circumcised . ” ( Their circumcision is only something they themselves do to their bodies . )
49002012	Remember that in the past you were without Christ . You were not citizens of Israel , and you did not know about the agreements with the promises that God made to his people . You had no hope , and you did not know God .
49002013	Yes , at one time you were far away from God , but now in Christ Jesus , you are brought near to him . You are brought near to God through the blood sacrifice of Christ .
49002014	Christ is the reason we are now at peace . He made us Jews and you who are not Jews one people . We were separated by a wall of hate that stood between us , but Christ broke down that wall . By giving his own body ,
49002015	Christ ended the law with its many commands and rules . His purpose was to make the two groups become one in him . By doing this he would make peace .
49002016	Through the cross Christ ended the hate between the two groups . And after they became one body , he wanted to bring them both back to God . He did this with his death on the cross .
49002017	Christ came and brought the message of peace to you non-Jews who were far away from God . And he brought that message of peace to those who were near to God .
49002018	Yes , through Christ we all have the right to come to the Father in one Spirit .
49002019	So now you non-Jewish people are not visitors or strangers , but you are citizens together with God’s holy people . You belong to God’s family .
49002020	You believers are like a building that God owns . That building was built on the foundation that the apostles and prophets prepared . Christ Jesus himself is the most important stone in that building .
49002021	The whole building is joined together in Christ , and he makes it grow and become a holy temple in the Lord .
49002022	And in Christ you are being built together with his other people . You are being made into a place where God lives through the Spirit .
49003001	So I , Paul , am a prisoner because I serve Christ Jesus for you who are not Jews .
49003002	Surely you know that God gave me this work through his grace to help you .
49003003	God let me know his secret plan by showing it to me . I have already written a little about this .
49003004	And if you read what I wrote , you can see that I understand the secret truth about Christ .
49003005	People who lived in other times were not told that secret truth . But now , through the Spirit , God has made it known to his holy apostles and prophets .
49003006	And this is the secret truth : that by hearing the Good News , those who are not Jews will share with the Jews in the blessings God has for his people . They are part of the same body , and they share in the promise God made through Christ Jesus .
49003007	By God’s special gift of grace , I became a servant to tell that Good News . He gave me that grace by using his power .
49003008	I am the least important of all God’s people . But he gave me this gift — to tell the non-Jewish people the Good News about the riches Christ has . These riches are too great to understand fully .
49003009	And God gave me the work of telling all people about the plan for his secret truth . That secret truth has been hidden in him since the beginning of time . He is the one who created everything .
49003010	His purpose was that all the rulers and powers in the heavenly places will now know the many different ways he shows his wisdom . They will know this because of the church .
49003011	This agrees with the plan God had since the beginning of time . He did what he planned , and he did it through Christ Jesus our Lord .
49003012	In Christ we come before God with freedom and without fear . We can do this because of our faith in Christ .
49003013	So I ask you not to be discouraged because of what is happening to me . My sufferings are for your benefit — for your honor and glory .
49003014	So I bow in prayer before the Father .
49003015	Every family in heaven and on earth gets its true name from him .
49003016	I ask the Father with his great glory to give you the power to be strong in your spirits . He will give you that strength through his Spirit .
49003017	I pray that Christ will live in your hearts because of your faith . I pray that your life will be strong in love and be built on love .
49003018	And I pray that you and all God’s holy people will have the power to understand the greatness of Christ’s love — how wide , how long , how high , and how deep that love is .
49003019	Christ’s love is greater than anyone can ever know , but I pray that you will be able to know that love . Then you can be filled with everything God has for you .
49003020	With God’s power working in us , he can do much , much more than anything we can ask or think of .
49003021	To him be glory in the church and in Christ Jesus for all time , forever and ever . Amen .
49004001	So , as a prisoner for the Lord , I beg you to live the way God’s people should live , because he chose you to be his .
49004002	Always be humble and gentle . Be patient and accept each other with love .
49004003	You are joined together with peace through the Spirit . Do all you can to continue as you are , letting peace hold you together .
49004004	There is one body and one Spirit , and God chose you to have one hope .
49004005	There is one Lord , one faith , and one baptism .
49004006	There is one God and Father of us all , who rules over everyone . He works through all of us and in all of us .
49004007	Christ gave each one of us a special gift . Everyone received what he wanted to give them .
49004008	That is why the Scriptures say , “ He went up high into the sky ; he took prisoners with him , and he gave gifts to people . ”
49004009	When it says , “ He went up , ” what does it mean ? It means that he first came down low to earth .
49004010	So Christ came down , and he is the same one who went up . He went up above the highest heaven in order to fill everything with himself .
49004011	And that same Christ gave these gifts to people : He made some to be apostles , some to be prophets , some to go and tell the Good News , and some to care for and teach God’s people .
49004012	Christ gave these gifts to prepare God’s holy people for the work of serving , to make the body of Christ stronger .
49004013	This work must continue until we are all joined together in what we believe and in what we know about the Son of God . Our goal is to become like a full-grown man — to look just like Christ and have all his perfection .
49004014	Then we will no longer be like babies . We will not be people who are always changing like a ship that the waves carry one way and then another . We will not be influenced by every new teaching we hear from people who are trying to deceive us — those who make clever plans and use every kind of trick to fool others into following the wrong way .
49004015	No , we will speak the truth with love . We will grow to be like Christ in every way . He is the head ,
49004016	and the whole body depends on him . All the parts of the body are joined and held together , with each part doing its own work . This causes the whole body to grow and to be stronger in love .
49004017	I have something from the Lord to tell you . I warn you : Don’t continue living like those who don’t believe . Their thoughts are worth nothing .
49004018	They have no understanding , and they know nothing because they refuse to listen . So they cannot have the life that God gives .
49004019	They have lost their feeling of shame and use their lives to do what is morally wrong . More and more they want to do all kinds of evil .
49004020	But that way of life is nothing like what you learned when you came to know Christ .
49004021	I know that you heard about him , and in him you were taught the truth . Yes , the truth is in Jesus .
49004022	You were taught to leave your old self . This means that you must stop living the evil way you lived before . That old self gets worse and worse , because people are fooled by the evil they want to do .
49004023	You must be made new in your hearts and in your thinking .
49004024	Be that new person who was made to be like God , truly good and pleasing to him .
49004025	So you must stop telling lies . “ You must always speak the truth to each other , ” because we all belong to each other in the same body .
49004026	“ When you are angry , don’t let that anger make you sin , ” and don’t stay angry all day .
49004027	Don’t give the devil a way to defeat you .
49004028	Whoever has been stealing must stop it and start working . They must use their hands for doing something good . Then they will have something to share with those who are poor .
49004029	When you talk , don’t say anything bad . But say the good things that people need — whatever will help them grow stronger . Then what you say will be a blessing to those who hear you .
49004030	And don’t make the Holy Spirit sad . God gave you his Spirit as proof that you belong to him and that he will keep you safe until the day he makes you free .
49004031	Never be bitter , angry , or mad . Never shout angrily or say things to hurt others . Never do anything evil .
49004032	Be kind and loving to each other . Forgive each other the same as God forgave you through Christ .
49005001	You are God’s dear children , so try to be like him .
49005002	Live a life of love . Love others just as Christ loved us . He gave himself for us — a sweet-smelling offering and sacrifice to God .
49005003	But there must be no sexual sin among you . There must not be any kind of evil or selfishly wanting more and more , because such things are not right for God’s holy people .
49005004	Also , there must be no evil talk among you . Don’t say things that are foolish or filthy . These are not for you . But you should be giving thanks to God .
49005005	You can be sure of this : No one will have a place in the kingdom of Christ and of God if that person commits sexual sins , or does evil things , or is a person who selfishly wants more and more . A greedy person like that is serving a false god .
49005006	Don’t let anyone fool you with words that are not true . God gets very angry when people who don’t obey him talk like that .
49005007	So don’t have anything to do with them .
49005008	In the past you were full of darkness , but now you are full of light in the Lord . So live like children who belong to the light .
49005009	This light produces every kind of goodness , right living , and truth .
49005010	Try to learn what pleases the Lord .
49005011	Have no part in the things that people in darkness do , which produce nothing good . Instead , tell everyone how wrong those things are .
49005012	Actually , it is shameful to even talk about the things those people do in secret .
49005013	But the light makes clear how wrong those things are .
49005014	Yes , everything is made clear by the light . This is why we say , “ Wake up , you who are sleeping ! Rise from death , and Christ will shine on you . ”
49005015	So be very careful how you live . Live wisely , not like fools .
49005016	I mean that you should use every opportunity you have for doing good , because these are evil times .
49005017	So don’t be foolish with your lives , but learn what the Lord wants you to do .
49005018	Don’t be drunk with wine , which will ruin your life , but be filled with the Spirit .
49005019	Encourage each other with psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs . Sing and make music in your hearts to the Lord .
49005020	Always give thanks to God the Father for everything in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
49005021	Be willing to serve each other out of respect for Christ .
49005022	Wives , be willing to serve your husbands the same as the Lord .
49005023	A husband is the head of his wife , just as Christ is the head of the church . Christ is the Savior of the church , which is his body .
49005024	The church serves under Christ , so it is the same with you wives . You should be willing to serve your husbands in everything .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives the same as Christ loved the church and gave his life for it .
49005026	He died to make the church holy . He used the telling of the Good News to make the church clean by washing it with water .
49005027	Christ died so that he could give the church to himself like a bride in all her beauty . He died so that the church could be holy and without fault , with no evil or sin or any other thing wrong in it .
49005028	And husbands should love their wives like that . They should love their wives as they love their own bodies . The man who loves his wife loves himself ,
49005029	because no one ever hates his own body , but feeds and takes care of it . And that is what Christ does for the church
49005030	because we are parts of his body .
49005031	The Scriptures say , “ That is why a man will leave his father and mother and join his wife , and the two people will become one . ”
49005032	That secret truth is very important — I am talking about Christ and the church .
49005033	But each one of you must love his wife as he loves himself . And a wife must respect her husband .
49006001	Children , obey your parents the way the Lord wants , because this is the right thing to do .
49006002	The command says , “ You must respect your father and mother . ” This is the first command that has a promise with it .
49006003	And this is the promise : “ Then all will go well with you , and you will have a long life on the earth . ”
49006004	Fathers , don’t make your children angry , but raise them with the kind of teaching and training you learn from the Lord .
49006005	Slaves , obey your masters here on earth with fear and respect . And do this with a heart that is true , just as you obey Christ .
49006006	You must do this not just to please your masters while they are watching , but all the time . Since you are really slaves of Christ , you must do with all your heart what God wants .
49006007	Do your work , and be happy to do it . Work as though it is the Lord you are serving , not just an earthly master .
49006008	Remember that the Lord will give everyone a reward for doing good . Everyone , slave or free , will get a reward for the good things they do .
49006009	Masters , in the same way , be good to your slaves . Don’t say things to scare them . You know that the one who is your Master and their Master is in heaven , and he treats everyone the same .
49006010	To end my letter I tell you , be strong in the Lord and in his great power .
49006011	Wear the full armor of God . Wear God’s armor so that you can fight against the devil’s clever tricks .
49006012	Our fight is not against people on earth . We are fighting against the rulers and authorities and the powers of this world’s darkness . We are fighting against the spiritual powers of evil in the heavenly places .
49006013	That is why you need to get God’s full armor . Then on the day of evil , you will be able to stand strong . And when you have finished the whole fight , you will still be standing .
49006014	So stand strong with the belt of truth tied around your waist , and on your chest wear the protection of right living .
49006015	On your feet wear the Good News of peace to help you stand strong .
49006016	And also use the shield of faith with which you can stop all the burning arrows that come from the Evil One .
49006017	Accept God’s salvation as your helmet . And take the sword of the Spirit — that sword is the teaching of God .
49006018	Pray in the Spirit at all times . Pray with all kinds of prayers , and ask for everything you need . To do this you must always be ready . Never give up . Always pray for all of God’s people .
49006019	Also pray for me — that when I speak , God will give me words so that I can tell the secret truth about the Good News without fear .
49006020	I have the work of speaking for that Good News , and that is what I am doing now , here in prison . Pray that when I tell people the Good News , I will speak without fear as I should .
49006021	I am sending you Tychicus , the brother we love . He is a faithful servant of the Lord’s work . He will tell you everything that is happening with me . Then you will know how I am and what I am doing .
49006022	That’s why I am sending him — to let you know how we are and to encourage you .
49006023	I pray that God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ will give peace and love with faith to all the brothers and sisters there .
49006024	God’s grace to all of you who love our Lord Jesus Christ with love that never ends .
50001001	Greetings from Paul and Timothy , servants of Jesus Christ . To all of you in Philippi who are God’s holy people in Christ Jesus , including your elders and special servants .
50001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
50001003	I thank God every time I remember you .
50001004	And I always pray for all of you with joy .
50001005	I thank God for the help you gave me while I told people the Good News . You helped from the first day you believed until now .
50001006	I am sure that the good work God began in you will continue until he completes it on the day when Jesus Christ comes again .
50001007	I know I am right to think like this about all of you because you are so close to my heart . This is because you have all played such an important part in God’s grace to me — now , during this time that I am in prison , and whenever I am defending and proving the truth of the Good News .
50001008	God knows that I want very much to see you . I love all of you with the love of Christ Jesus .
50001009	This is my prayer for you :
50001012	Brothers and sisters , I want you to know that all that has happened to me has helped to spread the Good News .
50001013	All the Roman guards and all the others here know that I am in prison for serving Christ .
50001014	My being in prison has caused most of the believers to put their trust in the Lord and to show more courage in telling people God’s message .
50001015	Some people are telling the message about Christ because they are jealous and bitter . Others do it because they want to help .
50001016	They are doing it out of love . They know that God gave me the work of defending the Good News .
50001017	But those others tell about Christ because of their selfish ambition . Their reason for doing it is wrong . They only do it because they think it will make trouble for me in prison .
50001018	But that doesn’t matter . What is important is that they are telling people about Christ , whether they are sincere or not . So I am glad they are doing it . I will continue to be glad ,
50001019	because I know that your prayers and the help the Spirit of Jesus Christ gives me will cause this trouble to result in my freedom .
50001020	I am full of hope and feel sure I will not have any reason to be ashamed . I am certain I will continue to have the same boldness to speak freely that I always have . I will let God use my life to bring more honor to Christ . It doesn’t matter whether I live or die .
50001021	To me , the only important thing about living is Christ . And even death would be for my benefit .
50001022	If I continue living here on earth , I will be able to work for the Lord . But what would I choose — to live or to die ? I don’t know .
50001023	It would be a hard choice . Sometimes I want to leave this life and be with Christ . That would be much better for me ;
50001024	however , you people need me here alive .
50001025	I am sure of this , so I know that I will stay here and be with you to help you grow and have joy in your faith .
50001026	When I am there with you again , you will be bursting with pride over what Christ Jesus did to help me .
50001027	Just be sure you live as God’s people in a way that honors the Good News of Christ . Then if I come and visit you or if I am away from you , I will hear good things about you . I will know that you stand together with the same purpose and that you work together like a team to help others believe the Good News .
50001028	And you will not be afraid of those who are against you . All of this is proof from God that you are being saved and that your enemies will be lost .
50001029	God has blessed you in ways that serve Christ . He allowed you to believe in Christ . But that is not all . He has also given you the honor of suffering for Christ . Both of these bring glory to Christ .
50001030	You saw the difficulties I had to face , and you hear that I am still having troubles . Now you must face them too .
50002001	Think about what we have in Christ : the encouragement he has brought us , the comfort of his love , our sharing in his Spirit , and the mercy and kindness he has shown us . If you enjoy these blessings ,
50002002	then do what will make my joy complete : Agree with each other , and show your love for each other . Be united in your goals and in the way you think .
50002003	In whatever you do , don’t let selfishness or pride be your guide . Be humble , and honor others more than yourselves .
50002004	Don’t be interested only in your own life , but care about the lives of others too .
50002005	In your life together , think the way Christ Jesus thought .
50002006	He was like God in every way , but he did not think that his being equal with God was something to use for his own benefit .
50002007	Instead , he gave up everything , even his place with God . He accepted the role of a servant , appearing in human form . During his life as a man ,
50002008	he humbled himself by being fully obedient to God , even when that caused his death — death on a cross .
50002009	So God raised him up to the most important place and gave him the name that is greater than any other name .
50002010	God did this so that every person will bow down to honor the name of Jesus . Everyone in heaven , on earth , and under the earth will bow .
50002011	They will all confess , “ Jesus Christ is Lord , ” and this will bring glory to God the Father .
50002012	My dear friends , you always obeyed what you were taught . Just as you obeyed when I was with you , it is even more important for you to obey now that I am not there . So you must continue to live in a way that gives meaning to your salvation . Do this with fear and respect for God .
50002013	Yes , it is God who is working in you . He helps you want to do what pleases him , and he gives you the power to do it .
50002014	Do everything without complaining or arguing
50002015	so that you will be blameless and pure , children of God without any fault . But you are living with evil people all around you , who have lost their sense of what is right . Among those people you shine like lights in a dark world ,
50002016	and you offer them the teaching that gives life . So I can be proud of you when Christ comes again . You will show that my work was not wasted — that I ran in the race and won .
50002017	Your faith makes you give your lives as a sacrifice in serving God . Maybe I will have to offer my own life with your sacrifice . But if that happens , I will be glad , and I will share my joy with all of you .
50002018	You also should be glad and share your joy with me .
50002019	With the blessing of the Lord Jesus , I hope I will be able to send Timothy to you soon . I will be glad to learn how you are .
50002020	I have no one else like Timothy , who genuinely cares for you .
50002021	Others are interested only in their own lives . They don’t care about the work of Christ Jesus .
50002022	You know the kind of person Timothy is . He has served with me in telling the Good News like a son with his father .
50002023	I plan to send him to you quickly , as soon as I know what will happen to me .
50002024	I am sure the Lord will help me come to you soon .
50002025	For now , I think I must send Epaphroditus back to you . He is my brother in God’s family , who works and serves with me in the Lord’s army . When I needed help , you sent him to me ,
50002026	but now he wants very much to see all of you again . He is worried because you heard that he was sick .
50002027	He was sick and near death . But God helped him and me too , so that I would not have even more grief .
50002028	So I want very much to send him to you . When you see him , you can be happy . And I can stop worrying about you .
50002029	Welcome him in the Lord with much joy . Give honor to people like Epaphroditus .
50002030	He should be honored because he almost died for the work of Christ . He put his life in danger so that he could help me . This was help that you could not give me .
50003001	And now , my brothers and sisters , be filled with joy in the Lord . It is no trouble for me to write the same things to you again . I want to be sure that you are prepared .
50003002	Be careful of the dogs — those men whose work does only harm . They want to cut on everyone who isn’t circumcised .
50003003	But we are the ones who have the true circumcision — we who worship God through his Spirit . We don’t trust in ourselves or anything we can do . We take pride only in Christ Jesus .
50003004	Even if I am able to trust in myself , still I don’t do it . If anyone else thinks they have a reason to trust in themselves , they should know that I have a greater reason for doing so .
50003005	I was circumcised on the eighth day after my birth . I am from the people of Israel and the tribe of Benjamin . I am a true Jew , and so were my parents . The law was very important to me . That is why I became a Pharisee .
50003006	I was so eager to defend my religion that I persecuted the church . And no one could find fault with the way I obeyed the Law of Moses .
50003007	At one time all these things were important to me . But because of Christ , I decided that they are worth nothing .
50003008	Not only these things , but now I think that all things are worth nothing compared with the greatness of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord . Because of Christ , I lost all these things , and now I know that they are all worthless trash . All I want now is Christ .
50003009	I want to belong to him . In Christ I am right with God , but my being right does not come from following the law . It comes from God through faith . God uses my faith in Christ to make me right with him .
50003010	All I want is to know Christ and the power that raised him from death . I want to share in his sufferings and be like him even in his death .
50003011	Then there is hope that I myself will somehow be raised from death .
50003012	I don’t mean that I am exactly what God wants me to be . I have not yet reached that goal . But I continue trying to reach it and make it mine . That’s what Christ Jesus wants me to do . It is the reason he made me his .
50003013	Brothers and sisters , I know that I still have a long way to go . But there is one thing I do : I forget what is in the past and try as hard as I can to reach the goal before me .
50003014	I keep running hard toward the finish line to get the prize that is mine because God has called me through Christ Jesus to life up there in heaven .
50003015	All of us who have grown to be spiritually mature should think this way too . And if there is any of this that you don’t agree with , God will make it clear to you .
50003016	But we should continue following the truth we already have .
50003017	Brothers and sisters , join together in following my example . Also , learn by watching those who are living the way we showed you .
50003018	There are many who live like enemies of the cross of Christ . I have often told you about them . And it makes me cry to tell you about them now .
50003019	The way they live is leading them to destruction . They have replaced God with their own desires . They do shameful things , and they are proud of what they do . They think only about earthly things .
50003020	But the government that rules us is in heaven . We are waiting for our Savior , the Lord Jesus Christ , to come from there .
50003021	He will change our humble bodies and make them like his own glorious body . Christ can do this by his power , with which he is able to rule everything .
50004001	My dear brothers and sisters , I love you and want to see you . You bring me joy and make me proud of you . Continue following the Lord as I have told you .
50004002	Euodia and Syntyche , you both belong to the Lord , so please agree with each other .
50004003	For this I make a special request to my friend who has served with me so faithfully : Help these women . They worked hard with me in telling people the Good News , together with Clement and others who worked with me . Their names are written in the book of life .
50004004	Always be filled with joy in the Lord . I will say it again . Be filled with joy .
50004005	Let everyone see that you are gentle and kind . The Lord is coming soon .
50004006	Don’t worry about anything , but pray and ask God for everything you need , always giving thanks for what you have .
50004007	And because you belong to Christ Jesus , God’s peace will stand guard over all your thoughts and feelings . His peace can do this far better than our human minds .
50004008	Brothers and sisters , continue to think about what is good and worthy of praise . Think about what is true and honorable and right and pure and beautiful and respected .
50004009	And do what you learned and received from me — what I told you and what you saw me do . And the God who gives peace will be with you .
50004010	I am so happy , and I thank the Lord that you have again shown your care for me . You continued to care about me , but there was no way for you to show it .
50004011	I am telling you this , but not because I need something . I have learned to be satisfied with what I have and with whatever happens .
50004012	I know how to live when I am poor and when I have plenty . I have learned the secret of how to live through any kind of situation — when I have enough to eat or when I am hungry , when I have everything I need or when I have nothing .
50004013	Christ is the one who gives me the strength I need to do whatever I must do .
50004014	But it was good that you helped me when I needed help .
50004015	You people in Philippi remember when I first told the Good News there . When I left Macedonia , you were the only church that gave me help .
50004016	Several times you sent me things I needed when I was in Thessalonica .
50004017	Really , it is not that I want to get gifts from you . But I want you to have the benefit that comes from giving .
50004018	I have everything I need . I have even more than I need . I have all I need because Epaphroditus brought your gift to me . Your gift is like a sweet-smelling sacrifice offered to God . God accepts that sacrifice and it pleases him .
50004019	My God will use his glorious riches to give you everything you need . He will do this through Christ Jesus .
50004020	Glory to our God and Father forever and ever . Amen .
50004021	Give our greetings to God’s people there — to each one who belongs to Christ Jesus . Those in God’s family who are with me send you their greetings .
50004022	And greetings to you from all of God’s people here , especially those who work in the service of the emperor .
50004023	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you all .
51001001	Greetings from Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus . I am an apostle because that is what God wanted . Greetings also from Timothy , our brother in Christ .
51001002	To the holy and faithful brothers and sisters in Christ who live in Colossae . Grace and peace to you from God our Father .
51001003	In our prayers we always thank God for you . He is the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
51001004	We thank him because we have heard about the faith you have in Christ Jesus and the love you have for all of God’s people .
51001005	Your faith and love continue because you know what is waiting for you in heaven — the hope you have had since you first heard the true message , the Good News
51001006	that was told to you . Throughout the world , this Good News is bringing blessings and is spreading . And that’s what has been happening among you since the first time you heard it and understood the truth about God’s grace .
51001007	You heard it from Epaphras , our dear friend and co-worker . He is a faithful servant of Christ for us .
51001008	He also told us about the love you have from the Spirit .
51001009	Since the day we heard these things about you , we have continued praying for you . This is what we pray : Then you will be happy
51001012	and give thanks to the Father . He has made you able to have what he has promised to give all his holy people , who live in the light .
51001013	God made us free from the power of darkness . And he brought us into the kingdom of his dear Son .
51001014	The Son paid the price to make us free . In him we have forgiveness of our sins .
51001015	No one can see God , but the Son is exactly like God . He rules over everything that has been made .
51001016	Through his power all things were made : things in heaven and on earth , seen and not seen — all spiritual rulers , lords , powers , and authorities . Everything was made through him and for him .
51001017	The Son was there before anything was made . And all things continue because of him .
51001018	He is the head of the body , which is the church . He is the beginning of everything else . And he is the first among all who will be raised from death . So in everything he is most important .
51001019	God was pleased for all of himself to live in the Son .
51001020	And through him , God was happy to bring all things back to himself again — things on earth and things in heaven . God made peace by using the blood sacrifice of his Son on the cross .
51001021	At one time you were separated from God . You were his enemies in your minds , because the evil you did was against him .
51001022	But now he has made you his friends again . He did this by the death Christ suffered while he was in his body . He did it so that he could present you to himself as people who are holy , blameless , and without anything that would make you guilty before him .
51001023	And that is what will happen if you continue to believe in the Good News you heard . You must remain strong and sure in your faith . You must not let anything cause you to give up the hope that became yours when you heard the Good News . That same Good News has been told to everyone on earth , and that’s the work that I , Paul , was given to do .
