51001024	I am happy in my sufferings for you . There is much that Christ must still suffer . And I gladly accept my part of those sufferings in my body for the good of his body , the church .
51001025	I became a servant of the church because God gave me a special work to do . This work helps you . My work is to tell the complete message of God .
51001026	This message is the secret truth that was hidden since the beginning of time . It was hidden from everyone for ages , but now it has been made known to God’s holy people .
51001027	God decided to let his people know just how rich and glorious that truth is . That secret truth , which is for all people , is that Christ lives in you , his people . He is our hope for glory .
51001028	So we continue to tell people about Christ . We use all wisdom to counsel every person and teach every person . We are trying to bring everyone before God as people who have grown to be spiritually mature in Christ .
51001029	To do this , I work and struggle using the great strength that Christ gives me . That strength is working in my life .
51002001	I want you to know that I am trying very hard to help you . And I am trying to help those in Laodicea and others who have never seen me .
51002002	I want them to be strengthened and joined together with love and to have the full confidence that comes from understanding . I want them to know completely the secret truth that God has made known . That truth is Christ himself .
51002003	In him all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge are kept safe .
51002004	I tell you this so that no one can fool you by telling you ideas that seem good , but are false .
51002005	Even though I am far away , my thoughts are always with you . I am happy to see your good lives and your strong faith in Christ .
51002006	You accepted Christ Jesus as Lord , so continue to live following him .
51002007	You must depend on Christ only , drawing life and strength from him . Just as you were taught the truth , continue to grow stronger in your understanding of it . And never stop giving thanks to God .
51002008	Be sure you are not led away by the teaching of those who have nothing worth saying and only plan to deceive you . That teaching is not from Christ . It is only human tradition and comes from the powers that influence this world .
51002009	I say this because all of God lives in Christ fully , even in his life on earth .
51002010	And because you belong to Christ you are complete , having everything you need . Christ is ruler over every other power and authority .
51002011	In Christ you had a different kind of circumcision , one that was not done by human hands . That is , you were made free from the power of your sinful self . That is the kind of circumcision Christ does .
51002012	When you were baptized , you were buried with Christ , and you were raised up with him because of your faith in God’s power . God’s power was shown when he raised Christ from death .
51002013	You were spiritually dead because of your sins and because you were not free from the power of your sinful self . But God gave you new life together with Christ . He forgave all our sins .
51002014	Because we broke God’s laws , we owed a debt — a debt that listed all the rules we failed to follow . But God forgave us of that debt . He took it away and nailed it to the cross .
51002015	He defeated the rulers and powers of the spiritual world . With the cross he won the victory over them and led them away , as defeated and powerless prisoners for the whole world to see .
51002016	So don’t let anyone make rules for you about eating and drinking or about Jewish customs ( festivals , New Moon celebrations , or Sabbath days ) .
51002017	In the past these things were like a shadow that showed what was coming . But the new things that were coming are found in Christ .
51002018	Some people enjoy acting as if they are humble and love to worship angels . They always talk about the visions they have seen . Don’t listen to them when they say you are wrong because you don’t do these things . It is so foolish for them to feel such pride , because it is all based on their own human ideas .
51002019	They don’t keep themselves under the control of the head . Christ is the head , and the whole body depends on him . Because of Christ all the parts of the body care for each other and help each other . So the body is made stronger and held together as God causes it to grow .
51002020	You died with Christ and were made free from the powers that influence this world . So why do you act as if you still belong to the world ? I mean , why do you follow rules like these :
51002021	“ Don’t eat this , ” “ Don’t taste that , ” “ Don’t touch that ” ?
51002022	These rules are talking about earthly things that are gone after they are used . They are only human commands and teachings .
51002023	These rules may seem to be wise as part of a made-up religion in which people pretend to be humble and punish their bodies . But they don’t help people stop doing the evil that the sinful self wants to do .
51003001	You were raised from death with Christ . So live for what is in heaven , where Christ is sitting at the right hand of God .
51003002	Think only about what is up there , not what is here on earth .
51003003	Your old self has died , and your new life is kept with Christ in God .
51003004	Yes , Christ is now your life , and when he comes again , you will share in his glory .
51003005	So put everything evil out of your life : sexual sin , doing anything immoral , letting sinful thoughts control you , and wanting things that are wrong . And don’t keep wanting more and more for yourself , which is the same as worshiping a false god .
51003006	God will show his anger against those who don’t obey him , because they do these evil things .
51003007	You also did these things in the past , when you lived like them .
51003008	But now put these things out of your life : anger , losing your temper , doing or saying things to hurt others , and saying shameful things .
51003009	Don’t lie to each other . You have taken off those old clothes — the person you once were and the bad things you did then .
51003010	Now you are wearing a new life , a life that is new every day . You are growing in your understanding of the one who made you . You are becoming more and more like him .
51003011	In this new life it doesn’t matter if you are a Greek or a Jew , circumcised or not . It doesn’t matter if you speak a different language or even if you are a Scythian . It doesn’t matter if you are a slave or free . Christ is all that matters , and he is in all of you .
51003012	God has chosen you and made you his holy people . He loves you . So your new life should be like this : Show mercy to others . Be kind , humble , gentle , and patient .
51003013	Don’t be angry with each other , but forgive each other . If you feel someone has wronged you , forgive them . Forgive others because the Lord forgave you .
51003014	Together with these things , the most important part of your new life is to love each other . Love is what holds everything together in perfect unity .
51003015	Let the peace that Christ gives control your thinking . It is for peace that you were chosen to be together in one body . And always be thankful .
51003016	Let the teaching of Christ live inside you richly . Use all wisdom to teach and counsel each other . Sing psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs with thankfulness in your hearts to God .
51003017	Everything you say and everything you do should be done for Jesus your Lord . And in all you do , give thanks to God the Father through Jesus .
51003018	Wives , be willing to serve your husbands . This is the right thing to do in following the Lord .
51003019	Husbands , love your wives , and be gentle to them .
51003020	Children , obey your parents in everything . This pleases the Lord .
51003021	Fathers , don’t upset your children . If you are too hard to please , they might want to stop trying .
51003022	Servants , obey your masters in everything . Obey all the time , even when they can’t see you . Don’t just pretend to work hard so that they will treat you well . No , you must serve your masters honestly because you respect the Lord .
51003023	In all the work you are given , do the best you can . Work as though you are working for the Lord , not any earthly master .
51003024	Remember that you will receive your reward from the Lord , who will give you what he promised his people . Yes , you are serving Christ . He is your real Master .
51003025	Remember that anyone who does wrong will be punished for that wrong . And the Lord treats everyone the same .
51004001	Masters , give what is good and fair to your servants . Remember that you have a Master in heaven .
51004002	Never stop praying . Be ready for anything by praying and being thankful .
51004003	Also pray for us . Pray that God will give us an opportunity to tell people his message . I am in prison for doing this . But pray that we can continue to tell people the secret truth that God has made known about Christ .
51004004	Pray that I will say what is necessary to make this truth clear to everyone .
51004005	Be wise in the way you act with those who are not believers . Use your time in the best way you can .
51004006	When you talk , you should always be kind and wise . Then you will be able to answer everyone in the way you should .
51004007	Tychicus is my dear brother in Christ . He is a faithful helper and he serves the Lord with me . He will tell you everything that is happening with me .
51004008	That is why I am sending him . I want you to know how we are , and I am sending him to encourage you .
51004009	I am sending him with Onesimus , the faithful and dear brother from your group . They will tell you everything that has happened here .
51004010	Aristarchus , the one here in prison with me , sends you his greetings . Mark , the cousin of Barnabas , also sends his greetings . ( I have already told you what to do about Mark . If he comes , welcome him . )
51004011	And greetings from Jesus , the one who is also called Justus . These are the only Jewish believers who work with me for God’s kingdom . They have been a great comfort to me .
51004012	Epaphras , another servant of Jesus Christ from your group , sends his greetings . He constantly struggles for you in prayer . He prays that you will grow to be spiritually mature and have everything that God wants for you .
51004013	I know that he has worked hard for you and the people in Laodicea and in Hierapolis .
51004014	Greetings also from Demas and our dear friend Luke , the doctor .
51004015	Give our greetings to the brothers and sisters in Laodicea . Greetings also to Nympha and to the church that meets in her house .
51004016	After this letter is read to you , be sure it is also read to the church in Laodicea . And you read the letter that I wrote to them .
51004017	Tell Archippus , “ Be sure to do the work the Lord gave you . ”
51004018	Here’s my greeting in my own handwriting — Paul . Remember me in prison . God’s grace be with you .
52001001	Greetings from Paul , Silas , and Timothy . To the church of those in Thessalonica , who are in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ . Grace and peace be yours .
52001002	We always remember you when we pray , and we thank God for all of you .
52001003	Every time we pray to God our Father , we thank him for all that you have done because of your faith . And we thank him for the work you have done because of your love . And we thank him that you continue to be strong because of your hope in our Lord Jesus Christ .
52001004	Brothers and sisters , God loves you . And we know that he has chosen you to be his people .
52001005	When we brought the Good News to you , we came with more than words . We brought that Good News with power , with the Holy Spirit , and with the sure knowledge that it was true . Also you know how we lived when we were with you . We lived that way to help you .
52001006	And you became like us and like the Lord . You suffered much , but still you accepted the teaching with joy . The Holy Spirit gave you that joy .
52001007	You became an example to all the believers in Macedonia and Achaia .
52001008	The Lord’s teaching has spread from you throughout Greece and beyond . In fact , your faith in God has become known everywhere , so we never have to tell anyone about it .
52001009	People everywhere are already telling the story about the good way you accepted us when we were there with you . They tell about how you stopped worshiping idols and changed to serve the living and true God .
52001010	And you began waiting for God’s Son to come from heaven — the Son God raised from death . He is Jesus , who saves us from God’s angry judgment that is coming .
52002001	Brothers and sisters , you know that our visit to you was not a failure .
52002002	Before we came to you , people in Philippi abused us with insults and made us suffer . You know all about that . And then , when we came to you , many people there caused trouble for us . But our God gave us the courage we needed to tell you his Good News .
52002003	When we encourage people to believe the Good News , it’s not out of wrong motives . We are not trying to trick or fool anyone .
52002004	No , we did it because God is the one who gave us this work . And this was only after he tested us and saw that we could be trusted to do it . So when we speak , we are only trying to please God , not anyone else . He is the one who can see what is in our hearts .
52002005	You know that we never tried to influence you by saying nice things about you . We were not trying to get your money . We had no greed to hide from you . God knows that this is true .
52002006	We were not looking for praise from people — not from you or anyone else .
52002007	When we were with you , as apostles of Christ we could have used our authority to make you help us . But we were very gentle with you . We were like a mother caring for her little children .
52002008	We loved you very much , so we were happy to share God’s Good News with you . But not only that — we were also happy to share even our own lives with you .
52002009	Brothers and sisters , I know that you remember how hard we worked . We worked night and day to support ourselves , so that we would not be a burden to anyone while we did the work of telling you God’s Good News .
52002010	When we were there with you believers , we were pure , honest , and without fault in the way we lived . You know , just as God does , that this is true .
52002011	You know that we treated each one of you the way a father treats his own children .
52002012	We encouraged you , we comforted you , and we told you to live good lives for God . He calls you to be part of his glorious kingdom .
52002013	Also , we always thank God because of the way you accepted his message . You heard it and accepted it as God’s message , not our own . And it really is God’s message . And it works in you who believe .
52002014	Brothers and sisters , you are just like God’s churches in Judea . I mean that you were treated badly by your own people , just as those believers in Christ Jesus were treated badly by other Jews —
52002015	the same Jews who killed the Lord Jesus and the prophets . And they forced us to leave their country . They are not pleasing to God , and they are against everyone else .
52002016	And they are trying to stop us from teaching those who are not Jews . They don’t want them to be saved . But they are just adding more and more sins to the ones they already have . Now the time has come for them to suffer God’s anger .
52002017	Brothers and sisters , we were separated from you for a short time . But even though we were not there , our thoughts were still with you . We wanted very much to see you , and we tried very hard to do this .
52002018	Yes , we wanted to come to you . I , Paul , tried more than once to come , but Satan stopped us .
52002019	You are our hope , our joy , and the crown we will be proud of when our Lord Jesus Christ comes .
52002020	You bring us honor and joy .
52003003	We sent him so that none of you would be upset by the troubles we have now . You yourselves know that we must have these troubles .
52003004	Even when we were with you , we told you that we would all have to suffer . And you know that it happened just as we said .
52003005	This is why I sent Timothy to you , so that I could know about your faith . I sent him when I could not wait anymore . I was afraid that the devil who tempts people might have defeated you with temptations . Then our hard work would have been wasted .
52003006	But now Timothy has come back from his visit with you and told us good news about your faith and love . He told us that you always remember us in a good way . He told us that you want very much to see us again . And it is the same with us — we want very much to see you .
52003007	So , brothers and sisters , we are encouraged about you because of your faith . We have much trouble and suffering , but still we are encouraged .
52003008	Our life is really full if you stand strong in the Lord .
52003009	We have so much joy before our God because of you ! So we thank God for you . But we cannot thank him enough for all the joy we feel .
52003010	Night and day we continue praying with all our heart that we can come there and see you again . We want to give you everything you need to make your faith strong .
52003011	We pray that our God and Father and our Lord Jesus will prepare the way for us to come to you .
52003012	We pray that the Lord will make your love grow . We pray that he will give you more and more love for each other and for all people . We pray that you will love everyone in the same way we love you .
52003013	This will strengthen your desire to do what is right , and you will be holy and without fault before our God and Father when our Lord Jesus comes with all his holy people .
52004001	Brothers and sisters , now I have some other things to tell you . We taught you how to live in a way that will please God . And you are living that way . Now we ask and encourage you in the Lord Jesus to live that way more and more .
52004002	You know all that we told you to do by the authority of the Lord Jesus .
52004003	God wants you to be holy . He wants you to stay away from sexual sins .
52004004	God wants each one of you to learn to control your own body . Use your body in a way that is holy and that gives honor to God .
52004005	Don’t let your sexual desires control you like the people who don’t know God .
52004006	Never wrong any of your fellow believers or cheat them in this way . The Lord will punish those who do that . We have already told you this and warned you about it .
52004007	God chose us to be holy . He does not want us to live in sin .
52004008	So anyone who refuses to obey this teaching is refusing to obey God , not us . And God is the one who gives you his Holy Spirit .
52004009	We don’t need to write to you about having love for your brothers and sisters in Christ . God has already taught you to love each other .
52004010	In fact , you love all the believers in Macedonia . We encourage you now , brothers and sisters , to show your love more and more .
52004011	Do all you can to live a peaceful life . Mind your own business , and earn your own living , as we told you before .
52004012	If you do these things , then those who are not believers will respect the way you live . And you will not have to depend on others for what you need .
52004013	Brothers and sisters , we want you to know about those who have died . We don’t want you to be sad like other people — those who have no hope .
52004014	We believe that Jesus died , but we also believe that he rose again . So we believe that God will raise to life through Jesus any who have died and bring them together with him when he comes .
52004015	What we tell you now is the Lord’s own message . Those of us who are still living when the Lord comes again will join him , but not before those who have already died .
52004016	The Lord himself will come down from heaven with a loud command , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trumpet call of God . And the people who have died and were in Christ will rise first .
52004017	After that we who are still alive at that time will be gathered up with those who have died . We will be taken up in the clouds and meet the Lord in the air . And we will be with the Lord forever .
52004018	So encourage each other with these words .
52005001	Now , brothers and sisters , we don’t need to write to you about times and dates .
52005002	You know very well that the day when the Lord comes again will be a surprise , like a thief who comes at night .
52005003	People will say , “ We have peace and we are safe . ” At that time destruction will come to them quickly , like the pains of a woman giving birth . And those people will not escape .
52005004	But you , brothers and sisters , are not living in darkness . And so that day will not surprise you like a thief .
52005005	You are all people who belong to the light . You belong to the day . We don’t belong to the night or to darkness .
52005006	So we should not be like other people . We should not be sleeping . We should be awake and have self-control .
52005007	People who sleep , sleep at night . People who drink too much , drink at night .
52005008	But we belong to the day , so we should control ourselves . We should wear faith and love to protect us . And the hope of salvation should be our helmet .
52005009	God did not choose us to suffer his anger . God chose us to have salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ .
52005010	Jesus died for us so that we can live together with him . It is not important if we are alive or dead when Jesus comes .
52005011	So encourage each other and help each other grow stronger in faith , just as you are already doing .
52005012	Now brothers and sisters , we ask you to recognize the value of those who work hard among you — those who , as followers of the Lord , care for you and tell you how to live .
52005013	Show them the highest respect and love because of the work they do . Live in peace with each other .
52005014	We ask you , brothers and sisters , to warn those who will not work . Encourage those who are afraid . Help those who are weak . Be patient with everyone .
52005015	Be sure that no one pays back wrong for wrong . But always try to do what is good for each other and for all people .
52005016	Always be full of joy .
52005017	Never stop praying .
52005018	Whatever happens , always be thankful . This is how God wants you to live in Christ Jesus .
52005019	Don’t stop the work of the Holy Spirit .
52005020	Don’t treat prophecy like something that is not important .
52005021	But test everything . Keep what is good ,
52005022	and stay away from everything that is evil .
52005023	We pray that God himself , the God of peace , will make you pure — belonging only to him . We pray that your whole self — spirit , soul , and body — will be kept safe and be blameless when our Lord Jesus Christ comes .
52005024	The one who chose you will do that for you . You can trust him .
52005025	Brothers and sisters , please pray for us .
52005026	Give all the brothers and sisters the special greeting of God’s people .
52005027	I tell you by the authority of the Lord to read this letter to all the believers there .
52005028	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
53001001	Greetings from Paul , Silas , and Timothy . To the church of those in Thessalonica , who are in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001002	Grace and peace to you from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001003	We thank God for you always . And that’s what we should do , because you give us good reason to be thankful : Your faith is growing more and more . And the love that every one of you has for each other is also growing .
53001004	So we tell the other churches of God how proud we are of you . We tell them how you patiently continue to be strong and have faith , even though you are being persecuted and are suffering many troubles .
53001005	This is proof that God is right in his judgment . He wants you to be worthy of his kingdom . Your suffering is for that kingdom .
53001006	God will do what is right . He will punish those who are causing you trouble .
53001007	And he will bring relief to you who are troubled . He will bring it to you and to us when the Lord Jesus comes from heaven for all to see , together with his powerful angels .
53001008	He will come with burning fire to punish those who don’t know God — those who refuse to accept the Good News about our Lord Jesus .
53001009	They will be punished with a destruction that never ends . They will not be allowed to be with the Lord but will be kept away from his great power .
53001010	This will happen on the day when the Lord Jesus comes to receive honor with his holy people . He will be admired among all who have believed . And this includes you because you believed what we told you .
53001011	That is why we always pray for you . We ask our God to help you live the good way he wanted when he chose you . The goodness you have makes you want to do good . And the faith you have makes you work . We pray that with his power God will help you do these things more and more .
53001012	Then the name of our Lord Jesus will be honored because of you , and you will be honored because of him . This can happen only by the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53002001	Brothers and sisters , we have something to say about the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ . We want to talk to you about that time when we will meet together with him .
53002002	Don’t let yourselves be easily upset or worried if you hear that the day of the Lord has already come . Someone might say that this idea came from us — in something the Spirit told us , or in something we said , or in a letter we wrote .
53002003	Don’t be fooled by anything they might say . That day of the Lord will not come until the turning away from God happens . And that day will not come until the Man of Evil appears , the one who belongs to hell .
53002004	He will stand against and put himself above everything that people worship or think is worthy of worship . He will even go into God’s Temple and sit there , claiming that he is God .
53002005	I told you before that all these things would happen . Remember ?
53002006	And you know what is stopping that Man of Evil now . He is being stopped now so that he will appear at the right time .
53002007	The secret power of evil is already working in the world now . But there is one who is stopping that secret power of evil . And he will continue to stop it until he is taken out of the way .
53002008	Then that Man of Evil will appear . But the Lord Jesus will kill him with the breath that comes from his mouth . The Lord will come in a way that everyone will see , and that will be the end of the Man of Evil .
53002009	When that Man of Evil comes , it will be the work of Satan . He will come with great power , and he will do all kinds of false miracles , signs , and wonders .
53002010	The Man of Evil will use every kind of evil to fool those who are lost . They are lost because they refused to love the truth and be saved .
53002011	So God will send them something powerful that leads them away from the truth and causes them to believe a lie .
53002012	They will all be condemned because they did not believe the truth and because they enjoyed doing evil .
53002013	Brothers and sisters , you are people the Lord loves . And we always thank God for you . That’s what we should do , because God chose you to be some of the first people to be saved . You are saved by the Spirit making you holy and by your faith in the truth .
53002014	God chose you to have that salvation . He chose you by using the Good News that we told you . You were chosen so that you can share in the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
53002015	So , brothers and sisters , stand strong and continue to believe the teachings we gave you when we were there and by letter .
53003001	And now , brothers and sisters , pray for us . Pray that the Lord’s teaching will continue to spread quickly . And pray that people will give honor to that teaching , the same as happened with you .
53003002	And pray that we will be protected from crooked and evil people . Not everyone believes in the Lord , you know .
53003003	But the Lord is faithful . He will give you strength and protect you from the Evil One .
53003004	The Lord gives us confidence that you are doing what we told you and that you will continue to do it .
53003005	We pray that the Lord will cause you to feel God’s love and remember Christ’s patient endurance .
53003006	Brothers and sisters , by the authority of our Lord Jesus Christ we tell you to stay away from any believer who refuses to work . People who refuse to work are not following the teaching that we gave them .
53003007	You yourselves know that you should live like we do . We were not lazy when we were with you .
53003008	We never accepted food from anyone without paying for it . We worked and worked so that we would not be a burden to any of you . We worked night and day .
53003009	We had the right to ask you to help us . But we worked to take care of ourselves so that we would be an example for you to follow .
53003010	When we were with you , we gave you this rule : “ Whoever will not work should not be allowed to eat . ”
53003011	We hear that some people in your group refuse to work . They are doing nothing except being busy in the lives of others .
53003012	Our instruction to them is to stop bothering others , to start working and earn their own food . It is by the authority of the Lord Jesus Christ that we are urging them to do this .
53003013	Brothers and sisters , never get tired of doing good .
53003014	If there are some there who refuse to do what we tell you in this letter , remember who they are . Don’t associate with them . Then maybe they will feel ashamed .
53003015	But don’t treat them as enemies . Counsel them as fellow believers .
53003016	We pray that the Lord of peace will give you peace at all times and in every way . The Lord be with you all .
53003017	Here’s my greeting in my own handwriting — Paul . I do this in all my letters to show they are from me . This is the way I write .
53003018	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all .
54001001	Greetings from Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus . I am an apostle by the command of God our Savior and Christ Jesus our hope .
54001002	To Timothy , a true son to me in the faith we share . Grace , mercy , and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
54001003	When I went to Macedonia , I asked you to stay in Ephesus . Some people there are teaching things that are not true , and I want you to tell them to stop .
54001004	Tell them not to give their time to meaningless stories and to long lists of names to prove their family histories . Such things only cause arguments . They don’t help God’s work , which is done only by faith .
54001005	My purpose in telling you to do this is to promote love — the kind of love shown by those whose thoughts are pure , who do what they know is right , and whose faith in God is real .
54001006	But some have missed this key point in their teaching and have gone off in another direction . Now they talk about things that help no one .
54001007	They want to be teachers of the law , but they don’t know what they are talking about . They don’t even understand the things they say they are sure of .
54001008	We know that the law is good if someone uses it right .
54001009	We also know that the law is not made for those who do what is right . It is made for those who are against the law and refuse to follow it . The law is for sinners who are against God and all that is pleasing to him . It is for those who have no interest in spiritual things and for those who kill their fathers or mothers or anyone else .
54001010	It is for those who commit sexual sins , homosexuals , those who sell slaves , those who tell lies , those who don’t tell the truth under oath , and those who are against the true teaching of God .
54001011	That teaching is part of the Good News that our blessed God gave me to tell . In it we see his glory .
54001012	I thank Christ Jesus our Lord because he trusted me and gave me this work of serving him . He gives me strength .
54001013	In the past I insulted Christ . As a proud and violent man , I persecuted his people . But God gave me mercy because I did not know what I was doing . I did that before I became a believer .
54001014	But our Lord gave me a full measure of his grace . And with that grace came the faith and love that are in Christ Jesus .
54001015	Here is a true statement that should be accepted without question : Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners , and I am the worst of them .
54001016	But I was given mercy so that in me Christ Jesus could show that he has patience without limit . Christ showed his patience with me , the worst of all sinners . He wanted me to be an example for those who would believe in him and have eternal life .
54001017	Honor and glory to the King who rules forever . He cannot be destroyed and cannot be seen . Honor and glory forever and ever to the only God . Amen .
54001018	Timothy , you are like a son to me . What I am telling you to do agrees with the prophecies that were told about you in the past . I want you to remember those prophecies and fight the good fight of faith .
54001019	Continue to trust in God and do what you know is right . Some people have not done this , and their faith is now in ruins .
54001020	Hymenaeus and Alexander are men like that . I have given them to Satan so that they will learn not to speak against God .
54002001	First of all , I ask that you pray for all people . Ask God to bless them and give them what they need . And give thanks .
54002002	You should pray for rulers and for all who have authority . Pray for these leaders so that we can live quiet and peaceful lives — lives full of devotion to God and respect for him .
54002003	This is good and pleases God our Savior .
54002004	God wants everyone to be saved and to fully understand the truth .
54002005	There is only one God , and there is only one way that people can reach God . That way is through Christ Jesus , who as a man
54002006	gave himself to pay for everyone to be free . This is the message that was given to us at just the right time .
54002007	And I was chosen as an apostle to tell people that message . ( I am telling the truth . I am not lying . ) I was chosen to teach those who are not Jews to believe and understand the truth .
54002008	I want the men everywhere to pray . Men who lift their hands in prayer must be devoted to God and pleasing to him . They must be men who keep themselves from getting angry and having arguments .
54002009	And I want the women to make themselves attractive in the right way . Their clothes should be sensible and appropriate . They should not draw attention to themselves with fancy hairstyles or gold jewelry or pearls or expensive clothes .
54002010	But they should make themselves attractive by the good things they do . That is more appropriate for women who say they are devoted to God .
54002011	A woman should learn while listening quietly and being completely willing to obey .
54002012	I don’t allow a woman to teach a man or tell him what to do . She must listen quietly ,
54002013	because Adam was made first . Eve was made later .
54002014	Also , Adam was not the one who was tricked . It was the woman who was tricked and became a sinner .
54002015	But women will be saved in their work of having children . They will be saved if they continue to live in faith , love , and holiness with sensible behavior .
54003001	It is a true statement that anyone whose goal is to serve as an elder has his heart set on a good work .
54003002	An elder must be such a good man that no one can rightly criticize him . He must be faithful to his wife . He must have self-control and be wise . He must be respected by others . He must be ready to help people by welcoming them into his home . He must be a good teacher .
54003003	He must not drink too much , and he must not be someone who likes to fight . He must be gentle and peaceful . He must not be someone who loves money .
54003004	He must be a good leader of his own family . This means that his children obey him with full respect .
54003005	If a man does not know how to lead his own family , he will not be able to take care of God’s church .
54003006	An elder must not be a new believer . It might make him too proud of himself . Then he would be condemned for his pride the same as the devil was .
54003007	An elder must also have the respect of people who are not part of the church . Then he will not be criticized by others and be caught in the devil’s trap .
54003008	In the same way , the men who are chosen to be special servants must have the respect of others . They must not be men who say things they don’t mean or who spend their time drinking too much . They must not be men who will do almost anything for money .
54003009	They must follow the true faith that God has now made known to us and always do what they know is right .
54003010	You should test them first . Then , if you find that they have done nothing wrong , they can be special servants .
54003011	In the same way , the women must have the respect of others . They must not be women who speak evil about other people . They must have self-control and be women who can be trusted in everything .
54003012	The men who are special servants must be faithful in marriage . They must be good leaders of children and their own families .
54003013	Those who do well as special servants are making an honorable place for themselves . And they will feel very sure of their faith in Christ Jesus .
54003014	I hope I can come to you soon . But I am writing this to you now ,
54003015	so that , even if I cannot come soon , you will know how people should live in the family of God . That family is the church of the living God . And God’s church is the support and foundation of the truth .
54003016	Without a doubt , the secret of our life of worship is great : Christ was shown to us in human form ; the Spirit proved that he was right ; he was seen by angels . The message about him was told to the nations ; people in the world believed in him ; he was taken up to heaven in glory .
54004001	The Spirit clearly says that in the last times some will turn away from what we believe . They will obey spirits that tell lies . And they will follow the teachings of demons .
54004002	Those teachings come through people who tell lies and trick others . These evil people cannot see what is right and what is wrong . It is like their conscience has been destroyed with a hot iron .
54004003	They say that it is wrong to marry . And they say that there are some foods that people must not eat . But God made these foods , and those who believe and who understand the truth can eat them with thanks .
54004004	Everything that God made is good . Nothing he made should be refused if it is accepted with thanks to him .
54004005	Everything he created is made holy by what he has said and by prayer .
54004006	Tell this to the brothers and sisters there . This will show that you are a good servant of Christ Jesus . You will show that you are made strong by the words of faith and good teaching you have followed .
54004007	People tell silly stories that don’t agree with God’s truth . Don’t follow what these stories teach . But teach yourself to be devoted to God .
54004008	Training your body helps you in some ways . But devotion to God helps you in every way . It brings you blessings in this life and in the future life too .
54004009	Here is a true statement that should be accepted without question :
54004010	We hope in the living God , the Savior of all people . In particular , he is the Savior of all those who believe in him . This is why we work and struggle .
54004011	Command and teach these things .
54004012	You are young , but don’t let anyone treat you as if you are not important . Be an example to show the believers how they should live . Show them by what you say , by the way you live , by your love , by your faith , and by your pure life .
54004013	Continue to read the Scriptures to the people , encourage them , and teach them . Do this until I come .
54004014	Remember to use the gift you have , which was given to you through a prophecy when the group of elders laid their hands on you .
54004015	Continue to do these things . Give your life to doing them . Then everyone can see that your work is progressing .
54004016	Be careful in your life and in your teaching . Continue to live and teach rightly . Then you will save yourself and those who listen to your teaching .
54005001	Don’t speak angrily to an older man . But talk to him as if he were your father . Treat the younger men like brothers .
54005002	Treat the older women like mothers . And treat the younger women with respect like sisters .
54005003	Take care of widows who really need help .
54005004	But if a widow has children or grandchildren , the first thing they need to learn is this : to show their devotion to God by taking care of their own family . They will be repaying their parents , and this pleases God .
54005005	A widow who really needs help is one who has been left all alone . She trusts God to take care of her . She prays all the time , night and day , and asks God for help .
54005006	But the widow who uses her life to please herself is really dead while she is still living .
54005007	Tell the believers there to take care of their family so that no one can say they are doing wrong .
54005008	Everyone should take care of all their own people . Most important , they should take care of their own family . If they do not do that , then they do not accept what we believe . They are worse than someone who does not even believe in God .
54005009	To be added to your list of widows , a woman must be 60 years old or older . She must have been faithful to her husband .
54005010	She must be known for the good she has done : raising children , welcoming travelers into her home , serving the needs of God’s people , helping those in trouble , and using her life to do all kinds of good .
54005011	But don’t put younger widows on that list . When their strong physical needs pull them away from their commitment to Christ , they will want to marry again .
54005012	Then they will be guilty of not doing what they first promised to do .
54005013	Also , these younger widows begin to waste their time going from house to house . They also begin to gossip and try to run other people’s lives . They say things they should not say .
54005014	So I want the younger widows to marry , have children , and take care of their homes . If they do this , our enemy will not have any reason to criticize them .
54005015	But some of the younger widows have already turned away to follow Satan .
54005016	If any woman who is a believer has widows in her family , she should take care of them herself . Then the church will not have that burden and will be able to care for the widows who have no one else to help them .
54005017	The elders who lead the church in a good way should receive double honor — in particular , those who do the work of counseling and teaching .
54005018	As the Scriptures say , “ When a work animal is being used to separate grain , don’t keep it from eating the grain . ” And the Scriptures also say , “ A worker should be given his pay . ”
54005019	Don’t listen to someone who accuses an elder . You should listen to them only if there are two or three others who can say what the elder did wrong .
54005020	Tell those who sin that they are wrong . Do this in front of the whole church so that the others will have a warning .
54005021	Before God and Jesus Christ and the chosen angels , I tell you to make these judgments without any prejudice . Treat every person the same .
54005022	Think carefully before you lay your hands on anyone to make him an elder . Don’t share in the sins of others . Keep yourself pure .
54005023	Timothy , stop drinking only water , and drink a little wine . This will help your stomach , and you will not be sick so often .
54005024	The sins of some people are easy to see . Their sins show that they will be judged . But the sins of some others are seen only later .
54005025	It is the same with the good things people do . Some are easy to see . But even if they are not obvious now , none of them will stay hidden forever .
54006001	All those who are slaves should show full respect to their masters . Then God’s name and our teaching will not be criticized .
54006002	Some slaves have masters who are believers , so they are brothers . Does this mean they should show their masters any less respect ? No , they should serve them even better , because they are helping believers , people they should love . This is what you must teach and tell everyone to do .
54006003	Some people will teach what is false and will not agree with the true teaching of our Lord Jesus Christ . They will not accept the teaching that produces a life of devotion to God .
54006004	They are proud of what they know , but they understand nothing . They are sick with a love for arguing and fighting about words . And that brings jealousy , quarrels , insults , and evil mistrust .
54006005	They are always making trouble , because they are people whose thinking has been confused . They have lost their understanding of the truth . They think that devotion to God is a way to get rich .
54006006	Devotion to God is , in fact , a way for people to be very rich , but only if it makes them satisfied with what they have .
54006007	When we came into the world , we brought nothing . And when we die , we can take nothing out .
54006008	So , if we have food and clothes , we will be satisfied with that .
54006009	People who want to be rich bring temptations to themselves . They are caught in a trap . They begin to want many foolish things that will hurt them . These things ruin and destroy people .
54006010	The love of money causes all kinds of evil . Some people have turned away from what we believe because they want to get more and more money . But they have caused themselves a lot of pain and sorrow .
54006011	But you belong to God . So you should stay away from all those things . Always try to do what is right , to be devoted to God , and to have faith , love , patience , and gentleness .
54006012	We have to fight to keep our faith . Try as hard as you can to win that fight . Take hold of eternal life . It is the life you were chosen to have when you confessed your faith in Jesus — that wonderful truth that you spoke so openly and that so many people heard .
54006013	Before God and Christ Jesus I give you a command . Jesus is the one who confessed that same wonderful truth when he stood before Pontius Pilate . And God is the one who gives life to everything . Now I tell you this :
54006014	Do what you were commanded to do without fault or blame until the time when our Lord Jesus Christ comes again .
54006015	God will make that happen at the right time . God is the blessed and only Ruler . He is the King of all kings and the Lord of all lords .
54006016	God is the only one who never dies . He lives in light so bright that people cannot go near it . No one has ever seen him ; no one is able to see him . All honor and power belong to him forever . Amen .
54006017	Give this command to those who are rich with the things of this world . Tell them not to be proud . Tell them to hope in God , not their money . Money cannot be trusted , but God takes care of us richly . He gives us everything to enjoy .
54006018	Tell those who are rich to do good — to be rich in good works . And tell them they should be happy to give and ready to share .
54006019	By doing this , they will be saving up a treasure for themselves . And that treasure will be a strong foundation on which their future life will be built . They will be able to have the life that is true life .
54006020	Timothy , God has trusted you with many things . Keep these things safe . Stay away from people who talk about useless things that are not from God and who argue against you with a “ knowledge ” that is not knowledge at all .
54006021	Some people who claim to have that “ knowledge ” have gone completely away from what we believe . God’s grace be with you all .
55001001	Greetings from Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus . I am an apostle because God wanted me to be . God sent me to tell people about the promise of life that is in Christ Jesus .
55001002	To Timothy , a dear son to me . Grace , mercy , and peace to you from God the Father and from Christ Jesus our Lord .
55001003	I always remember you in my prayers day and night . And in these prayers I thank God for you . He is the God my ancestors served , and I have always served him with a clear conscience .
55001004	I remember that you cried for me . I want very much to see you so that I can be filled with joy .
55001005	I remember your true faith . That kind of faith first belonged to your grandmother Lois and to your mother Eunice . I know you now have that same faith .
55001006	That is why I want you to remember the gift God gave you . God gave you that gift when I laid my hands on you . Now I want you to use that gift and let it grow more and more , like a small flame grows into a fire .
55001007	The Spirit God gave us does not make us afraid . His Spirit is a source of power and love and self-control .
55001008	So don’t be ashamed to tell people about our Lord Jesus . And don’t be ashamed of me — I am in prison for the Lord . But suffer with me for the Good News . God gives us the strength to do that .
55001009	God saved us and chose us to be his holy people , but not because of anything we ourselves did . God saved us and made us his people because that was what he wanted and because of his grace . That grace was given to us through Christ Jesus before time began .
55001010	And now it has been shown to us in the coming of our Savior Christ Jesus . He destroyed death and showed us the way to have life . Yes , through the Good News Jesus showed us the way to have life that cannot be destroyed .
55001011	I was chosen to tell people that message as an apostle and teacher .
55001012	And I suffer now because of that work . But I am not ashamed , because I know the one I have put my trust in . And I am sure that he is able to protect what I have put into his care until that Day .
55001013	What you heard me teach is an example of what you should teach . Follow that model of right teaching with the faith and love we have in Christ Jesus .
55001014	This teaching is a treasure that you have been trusted with . Protect it with the help of the Holy Spirit , who lives inside us .
55001015	You know that everyone in Asia has left me . Even Phygelus and Hermogenes have left me .
55001016	I pray that the Lord will show mercy to the family of Onesiphorus . Many times Onesiphorus encouraged me . He was not ashamed that I was in prison .
55001017	No , he was not ashamed . When he came to Rome , he looked and looked for me until he found me .
55001018	I pray that the Lord Jesus will make sure Onesiphorus receives mercy from the Lord God on that Day . You know how many ways this brother helped me in Ephesus .
55002001	Timothy , you are a son to me . Be strong in the grace that we have because we belong to Christ Jesus .
55002002	What you have heard me teach publicly you should teach to others . Share these teachings with people you can trust . Then they will be able to teach others these same things .
55002003	As a good soldier of Christ Jesus , accept your share of the troubles we have .
55002004	A soldier wants to please his commanding officer , so he does not spend any time on activities that are not a part of his duty .
55002005	Athletes in a race must obey all the rules to win .
55002006	The farmer who works hard deserves the first part of the harvest .
55002007	Think about what I am saying . The Lord will help you understand it all .
55002008	Remember Jesus Christ . He is from the family of David . After Jesus died , he was raised from death . This is the Good News that I tell people .
55002009	And because I tell that message , I am suffering . I am even bound with chains like someone who has really done wrong . But God’s message is not bound .
55002010	So I patiently accept all these troubles . I do this to help the people God has chosen so that they can have the salvation that is in Christ Jesus . With this salvation comes glory that never ends .
55002011	Here is a true statement : If we died with him , we will also live with him .
55002012	If we remain faithful even in suffering , we will also rule with him . If we refuse to say we know him , he will refuse to say he knows us .
55002013	If we are not faithful , he will still be faithful , because he cannot be false to himself .
55002014	Keep on telling everyone these truths . And warn them before God not to argue about words . Such arguments don’t help anyone , and they ruin those who listen to them .
55002015	Do your best to be the kind of person God will accept , and give yourself to him . Be a worker who has no reason to be ashamed of his work , one who applies the true teaching in the right way .
55002016	Stay away from people who talk about useless things that are not from God . That kind of talk will lead a person more and more against God .
55002017	Their evil teaching will spread like a sickness inside the body . Hymenaeus and Philetus are men like that .
55002018	They have left the true teaching . They say that the day when people will be raised from death has already come and gone . And they are destroying the faith of some people .
55002019	But God’s strong foundation never moves , and these words are written on it : “ The Lord knows those who belong to him . ” Also , these words are written there : “ Everyone who says they believe in the Lord must stop doing wrong . ”
55002020	In a large house there are things made of gold and silver . But there are also things made of wood and clay . Some of these are used for special purposes , others for ordinary jobs .
55002021	The Lord wants to use you for special purposes , so make yourself clean from all evil . Then you will be holy , and the Master can use you . You will be ready for any good work .
55002022	Stay away from the evil things a young person like you typically wants to do . Do your best to live right and to have faith , love , and peace , together with others who trust in the Lord with pure hearts .
55002023	Stay away from foolish and stupid arguments . You know that these arguments grow into bigger arguments .
55002024	As a servant of the Lord , you must not argue . You must be kind to everyone . You must be a good teacher , and you must be patient .
55002025	You must gently teach those who don’t agree with you . Maybe God will let them change their hearts so that they can accept the truth .
55002026	The devil has trapped them and now makes them do what he wants . But maybe they can wake up to see what is happening and free themselves from the devil’s trap .
55003001	Remember this : There are some terrible times coming in the last days .
55003002	People will love only themselves and money . They will be proud and boast about themselves . They will abuse others with insults . They will not obey their parents . They will be ungrateful and against all that is pleasing to God .
55003003	They will have no love for others and will refuse to forgive anyone . They will talk about others to hurt them and will have no self-control . They will be cruel and hate what is good .
55003004	People will turn against their friends . They will do foolish things without thinking and will be so proud of themselves . Instead of loving God , they will love pleasure .
55003005	They will go on pretending to be devoted to God , but they will refuse to let that “ devotion ” change the way they live . Stay away from these people !
55003006	Some of them go into homes and get control over weak women , whose lives are full of sin — women who are led into sin by all the things they want .
55003007	These women always want to learn something new , but they are never able to fully understand the truth .
55003008	Just as Jannes and Jambres fought against Moses , these people fight against the truth . Their thinking has been confused . The faith they have and teach is worthless .
55003009	But they will not succeed in what they are trying to do . Everyone will see how foolish they are . That is what happened to Jannes and Jambres .
55003010	But you know all about me . You know what I teach and the way I live . You know my goal in life . You know my faith , my patience , and my love . You know that I never stop trying .
55003011	You know about my persecutions and my sufferings . You know all the things that happened to me in Antioch , Iconium , and Lystra — the persecution I suffered in those places . But the Lord saved me from all of it .
55003012	Everyone who wants to live showing true devotion to God in Christ Jesus will be persecuted .
55003013	People who are evil and cheat others will become worse and worse . They will fool others , but they will also be fooling themselves .
55003014	But you should continue following the teaching you learned . You know it is true , because you know you can trust those who taught you .
55003015	You have known the Holy Scriptures since you were a child . These Scriptures are able to make you wise . And that wisdom leads to salvation through faith in Christ Jesus .
55003016	All Scripture is given by God . And all Scripture is useful for teaching and for showing people what is wrong in their lives . It is useful for correcting faults and teaching the right way to live .
55003017	Using the Scriptures , those who serve God will be prepared and will have everything they need to do every good work .
55004001	Before God and Jesus Christ , I give you a command . Christ Jesus is the one who will judge all people — those who are living and those who have died . He is coming again to rule in his kingdom . So I give you this command :
55004002	Tell everyone God’s message . Be ready at all times to do whatever is needed . Tell people what they need to do , tell them when they are doing wrong , and encourage them . Do this with great patience and careful teaching .
55004003	The time will come when people will not listen to the true teaching . But people will find more and more teachers who please them . They will find teachers who say what they want to hear .
55004004	People will stop listening to the truth . They will begin to follow the teaching in false stories .
55004005	But you should control yourself at all times . When troubles come , accept them . Do the work of telling the Good News . Do all the duties of a servant of God .
55004006	My life is being given as an offering for God . The time has come for me to leave this life here .
55004007	I have fought the good fight . I have finished the race . I have served the Lord faithfully .
55004008	Now , a prize is waiting for me — the crown that will show I am right with God . The Lord , the judge who judges rightly , will give it to me on that Day . Yes , he will give it to me and to everyone else who is eagerly looking forward to his coming .
55004009	Do your best to come to me as soon as you can .
55004010	Demas loved this world too much . That is why he left me . He went to Thessalonica . Crescens went to Galatia . And Titus went to Dalmatia .
55004011	Luke is the only one still with me . Get Mark and bring him with you when you come . He can help me in my work here .
55004012	I sent Tychicus to Ephesus .
55004013	When I was in Troas , I left my coat there with Carpus . So when you come , bring it to me . Also , bring my books . The books written on parchment are the ones I need .
55004014	Alexander the metalworker caused me so much harm . The Lord will punish him for what he did .
55004015	He fought against everything we teach . You should be careful that he doesn’t hurt you too .
55004016	The first time I defended myself , no one helped me . Everyone left me . I pray that God will forgive them .
55004017	But the Lord stayed with me . The Lord gave me strength so that I could tell the Good News everywhere . He wanted all those who are not Jews to hear that Good News . So I was saved from the lion’s mouth .
55004018	The Lord will save me when anyone tries to hurt me . He will bring me safely to his heavenly kingdom . Glory forever and ever be the Lord’s . Amen .
55004019	Give my greetings to Priscilla and Aquila and to the family of Onesiphorus .
55004020	Erastus stayed in Corinth . And I left Trophimus in Miletus — he was sick .
55004021	Try as hard as you can to come to me before winter . Greetings to you from Eubulus , Pudens , Linus , Claudia , and all the brothers and sisters here .
55004022	The Lord be with your spirit . Grace be with you .
56001001	Greetings from Paul , a servant of God and an apostle of Jesus Christ . I was sent to help God’s chosen people have faith and understand the truth that produces a life of devotion to God .
56001002	This faith and knowledge make us sure that we have eternal life . God promised that life to us before time began — and God does not lie .
56001003	At the right time , God let the world know about that life . He did this through the telling of the Good News message , and he trusted me with that work . I told people that message because God our Savior commanded me to .
56001004	To Titus , a true son to me in the faith we share together . Grace and peace to you from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior .
56001005	I left you in Crete so that you could finish doing what still needed to be done . And I also left you there so that you could choose men to be elders in every town .
56001006	To be an elder , a man must not be guilty of living in a wrong way . He must be faithful to his wife , and his children must be faithful to God . They must not be known as children who are wild or don’t obey .
56001007	An elder has the job of taking care of God’s work . So people should not be able to say that he lives in a wrong way . He must not be someone who is proud and selfish or who gets angry quickly . He must not drink too much , and he must not be someone who likes to fight . He must not be a man who will do almost anything for money .
56001008	An elder must be ready to help people by welcoming them into his home . He must love what is good . He must be wise . He must live right . He must be devoted to God and pleasing to him . And he must be able to control himself .
56001009	An elder must be faithful to the same true message we teach . Then he will be able to encourage others with teaching that is true and right . And he will be able to show those who are against this teaching that they are wrong .
56001010	This is important , because there are many people who refuse to obey — people who talk about worthless things and mislead others . I am talking especially about those who say that men who are not Jews must be circumcised to please God .
56001011	These people must be stopped , because they are destroying whole families by teaching what they should not teach . They teach only to cheat people and make money .
56001012	Even one of their own prophets said , “ Cretans are always liars . They are evil animals and lazy people who do nothing but eat . ”
56001013	The words that prophet said are true . So tell those people that they are wrong . You must be strict with them . Then they will become strong in the faith ,
56001014	and they will stop paying attention to the stories told by those Jews . They will stop following the commands of those who have turned away from the truth .
56001015	To people who are pure , everything is pure . But to those who are full of sin and don’t believe , nothing is pure . Really , their thinking has become evil and their consciences have been ruined .
56001016	They say they know God , but the evil things they do show that they don’t accept him . They are disgusting . They refuse to obey God and are not capable of doing anything good .
56002001	You , however , must tell everyone how to live in a way that agrees with the true teaching .
56002002	Teach the older men to have self-control , to be serious , and to be wise . They must be strong in faith , in love , and in patience .
56002003	Also , teach the older women to live the way those who serve the Lord should live . They should not go around saying bad things about others or be in the habit of drinking too much . They should teach what is good .
56002004	By doing this they will teach the younger women to love their husbands and children .
56002005	They will teach them to be wise and pure , to take care of their homes , to be kind , and to be willing to serve their husbands . Then no one will be able to criticize the teaching God gave us .
56002006	In the same way , tell the young men to be wise .
56002007	You should be an example for them in every way by the good things you do . When you teach , be honest and serious .
56002008	And your teaching should be clearly right so that you cannot be criticized . Then anyone who is against you will be ashamed . There will not be anything bad they can say about us .
56002009	And tell this to those who are slaves : They should be willing to serve their masters at all times ; they should try to please them , not argue with them ;
56002010	they should not steal from them ; and they should show their masters that they can be trusted . Then , in everything they do , they will show that the teaching of God our Savior is good .
56002011	That is the way we should live , because God’s grace has come . That grace can save everyone .
56002012	It teaches us not to live against God and not to do the bad things the world wants to do . It teaches us to live on earth now in a wise and right way — a way that shows true devotion to God .
56002013	We should live like that while we are waiting for the coming of our great God and Savior Jesus Christ . He is our great hope , and he will come with glory .
56002014	He gave himself for us . He died to free us from all evil . He died to make us pure — people who belong only to him and who always want to do good .
56002015	These are the things you should tell people . Encourage them , and when they are wrong , correct them . You have full authority to do this , so don’t let anyone think they can ignore you .
56003001	Remind your people that they should always be under the authority of rulers and government leaders . They should obey these leaders and be ready to do good .
56003002	Tell them not to speak evil of anyone but to live in peace with others . They should be gentle and polite to everyone .
56003003	In the past we were foolish too . We did not obey , we were wrong , and we were slaves to the many things our bodies wanted and enjoyed . We lived doing evil and being jealous . People hated us and we hated each other .
56003004	But then the kindness and love of God our Savior was made known .
56003005	He saved us because of his mercy , not because of any good things we did . He saved us through the washing that made us new people . He saved us by making us new through the Holy Spirit .
56003006	God poured out to us that Holy Spirit fully through Jesus Christ our Savior .
56003007	We were made right with God by his grace . God saved us so that we could be his children and look forward to receiving life that never ends .
56003008	This is a true statement . And I want you to be sure that the people understand these things . Then those who believe in God will be careful to use their lives for doing good . These things are good and will help everyone .
56003009	Stay away from those who have foolish arguments , who talk about useless family histories , or who make trouble and fight about what the Law of Moses teaches . These things are useless and will not help anyone .
56003010	Give a warning to all those who cause arguments . If they continue to cause trouble after a second warning , then don’t associate with them .
56003011	You know that people like that are evil and sinful . Their sins prove they are wrong .
56003012	I will send Artemas and Tychicus to you . When I send them , try hard to come to me at Nicopolis . I have decided to stay there this winter .
56003013	Zenas the lawyer and Apollos will be traveling from there . Do all that you can to help them prepare for their trip . Be sure that they have everything they need .
56003014	Our people must learn to use their lives for doing good and helping anyone who has a need . Then they will not have empty lives .
56003015	All the people with me here send you their greetings . Give my greetings to those who love us in the faith . Grace be with you all .
57001001	Greetings from Paul , a prisoner for Jesus Christ , and from Timothy , our brother . To Philemon , our dear friend and worker with us .
57001002	Also to our sister Apphia , to Archippus , who serves with us in the Lord’s army , and to the church that meets in your home .
57001003	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
57001004	I remember you in my prayers . And I always thank my God for you .
57001005	I thank God because I hear about the love you have for all of God’s holy people and the faith you have in the Lord Jesus .
57001006	I pray that the faith you share will make you understand every blessing we have in Christ .
57001007	My brother , you have shown love to God’s people , and your help has greatly encouraged them . What a great joy and encouragement that has been to me .
57001008	There is something that you should do . And because of the authority I have in Christ , I feel free to command you to do it .
57001009	But I am not commanding you ; I am asking you to do it out of love . I , Paul , am an old man now , and I am a prisoner for Christ Jesus .
57001010	I am asking you for my son Onesimus . He became my son while I was in prison .
57001011	In the past he was useless to you . But now he has become useful for both you and me .
57001012	I am sending him back to you , but it’s as hard as losing part of myself .
57001013	I would like to keep him here to help me while I am still in prison for telling the Good News . By helping me here , he would be representing you .
57001014	But I did not want to do anything without asking you first . Then whatever you do for me will be what you want to do , not what I forced you to do .
57001015	Onesimus was separated from you for a short time . Maybe that happened so that you could have him back forever ,
57001016	not to be just a slave , but better than a slave , to be a dear brother . That’s what he is to me . And I know he will mean even more to you , both as your slave and as one who shares your faith in the Lord .
57001017	If you accept me as your friend , then accept Onesimus back . Welcome him like you would welcome me .
57001018	If he has done any wrong to you or owes you anything , charge that to me .
57001019	I , Paul , am writing this in my own handwriting : I will pay back anything Onesimus owes . And I will say nothing about what you owe me for your own life .
57001020	So , my brother , as a follower of the Lord please do this favor for me . It would be such a great encouragement to me as your brother in Christ .
57001021	I write this letter knowing that you will do what I ask , and even more than I ask .
57001022	Also , please prepare a room for me . I hope that God will answer your prayers and that I will be able to come and see you .
57001023	Epaphras is a prisoner with me for Christ Jesus . He sends you his greetings .
57001024	Also Mark , Aristarchus , Demas , and Luke send their greetings . They are workers together with me .
57001025	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit .
58001001	In the past God spoke to our people through the prophets . He spoke to them many times and in many different ways .
58001002	And now in these last days , God has spoken to us again through his Son . He made the whole world through his Son . And he has chosen his Son to have all things .
58001003	The Son shows the glory of God . He is a perfect copy of God’s nature , and he holds everything together by his powerful command . The Son made people clean from their sins . Then he sat down at the right side of God , the Great One in heaven .
58001004	The Son became much greater than the angels , and God gave him a name that is much greater than any of their names .
58001005	God never said this to any of the angels : “ You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . ” “ I will be his Father , and he will be my son . ” “ Let all God’s angels worship him . ” “ He changes his angels into winds and his servants into flaming fire . ” “ God , your kingdom will last forever and ever . You use your authority for justice .
58001009	You love what is right and hate what is wrong . So God , your God , has chosen you , giving you more honor and joy than anyone like you . ” “ O Lord , in the beginning you made the earth , and your hands made the sky .
58001011	These things will disappear , but you will stay . They will all wear out like old clothes .
58001012	You will fold them up like a coat , and they will be changed like clothes . But you never change , and your life will never end . ” “ Sit at my right side until I put your enemies under your power . ”
58002001	So we must be more careful to follow what we were taught . We must be careful so that we will not be pulled away from the true way .
58002002	The teaching that God spoke through angels was shown to be true . And every time his people did something against that teaching , they were punished for what they did . They were punished when they did not obey that teaching .
58002003	So surely we also will be punished if we don’t pay attention to the salvation we have that is so great . It was the Lord Jesus who first told people about it . And those who heard him proved to us that it is true .
58002004	God also proved it by using miraculous signs , wonders , and all kinds of miracles . And he proved it by giving people various gifts through the Holy Spirit in just the way he wanted .
58002005	God did not choose angels to be the rulers over the new world that was coming . That future world is the world we have been talking about .
58002006	It is written some place in the Scriptures , “ Why are people so important to you ? Why do you even think about them ? Why do you care about the son of man ? Is he so important ?
58002007	For a short time you made him lower than the angels . You crowned him with glory and honor .
58002008	You put everything under his control . ”
58002010	God — the one who made all things and for whose glory all things exist — wanted many people to be his children and share his glory . So he did what he needed to do . He made perfect the one who leads those people to salvation . He made Jesus a perfect Savior through his suffering .
58002011	Jesus , the one who makes people holy , and those who are made holy are from the same family . So he is not ashamed to call them his brothers and sisters .
58002012	He says , “ God , I will tell my brothers and sisters about you . Before all your people I will sing your praises . ” “ I will trust in God . ” “ I am here , and with me are the children God has given me . ”
58002014	These children are people with physical bodies . So Jesus himself became like them and had the same experiences they have . Jesus did this so that , by dying , he could destroy the one who has the power of death — the devil .
58002015	Jesus became like these people and died so that he could free them . They were like slaves all their lives because of their fear of death .
58002016	Clearly , it is not angels that Jesus helps . He helps the people who are from Abraham .
58002017	For this reason , Jesus had to be made like us , his brothers and sisters , in every way . He became like people so that he could be their merciful and faithful high priest in service to God . Then he could bring forgiveness for the people’s sins .
58002018	And now he can help those who are tempted . He is able to help because he himself suffered and was tempted .
58003001	So , my brothers and sisters , those chosen by God to be his holy people , think about Jesus . He is the one we believe God sent to save us and to be our high priest .
58003002	God made him our high priest , and he was faithful to God just as Moses was . He did everything God wanted him to do in God’s house .
58003003	When someone builds a house , people will honor the builder more than the house . It is the same with Jesus . He should have more honor than Moses .
58003004	Every house is built by someone , but God built everything .
58003005	Moses was faithful as a servant in God’s whole house . He told people what God would say in the future .
58003006	But Christ is faithful in ruling God’s house as the Son . And we are God’s house , if we remain confident of the great hope we are glad to say we have .
58003007	So it is just as the Holy Spirit says : “ If you hear God’s voice today ,
58003008	don’t be stubborn as you were in the past , when you turned against God . That was the day you tested God in the desert .
58003009	For 40 years in the desert , your people saw what I did . But they tested me and my patience .
58003010	So I was angry with them . I said , ‘ Their thoughts are always wrong . They have never understood my ways . ’
58003011	So I was angry and made a promise : ‘ They will never enter my place of rest . ’ ”
58003012	So , brothers and sisters , be careful that none of you has the evil thoughts that cause so much doubt that you stop following the living God .
58003013	But encourage each other every day , while you still have something called “ today . ” Help each other so that none of you will be fooled by sin and become too hard to change .
58003014	We have the honor of sharing in all that Christ has if we continue until the end to have the sure faith we had in the beginning .
58003015	That’s why the Spirit said , “ If you hear God’s voice today , don’t be stubborn as in the past when you turned against God . ”
58003016	Who were those who heard God’s voice and turned against him ? It was all the people Moses led out of Egypt .
58003017	And who was God angry with for 40 years ? He was angry with those who sinned . And their dead bodies were left in the desert .
58003018	And which people was God talking to when he promised that they would never enter his place of rest ? He was talking to those who did not obey him .
58003019	So we see that they were not allowed to enter and have God’s rest , because they did not believe .
58004001	And we still have the promise that God gave those people . That promise is that we can enter his place of rest . So we should be very careful that none of you fails to get that promise .
58004002	Yes , the good news about it was told to us just as it was to them . But the message they heard did not help them . They heard it but did not accept it with faith .
58004003	Only we who believe it are able to enter God’s place of rest . As God said , “ I was angry and made a promise : ‘ They will never enter my place of rest . ’ ”
58004006	So the opportunity is still there for some to enter and enjoy God’s rest . But those who first heard the good news about it did not enter , because they did not obey .
