58004007	So God planned another special day . It is called “ today . ” He spoke about that day through David a long time later using the words we quoted before : “ If you hear God’s voice today , don’t be stubborn . ”
58004012	God’s word is alive and working . It is sharper than the sharpest sword and cuts all the way into us . It cuts deep to the place where the soul and the spirit are joined . God’s word cuts to the center of our joints and our bones . It judges the thoughts and feelings in our hearts .
58004013	Nothing in all the world can be hidden from God . He can clearly see all things . Everything is open before him . And to him we must explain the way we have lived .
58004014	We have a great high priest who has gone to live with God in heaven . He is Jesus the Son of God . So let us continue to express our faith in him .
58004015	Jesus , our high priest , is able to understand our weaknesses . When Jesus lived on earth , he was tempted in every way . He was tempted in the same ways we are tempted , but he never sinned .
58004016	With Jesus as our high priest , we can feel free to come before God’s throne where there is grace . There we receive mercy and kindness to help us when we need it .
58005001	Every Jewish high priest is chosen from among men . That priest is given the work of helping people with the things they must do for God . He must offer to God gifts and sacrifices for sins .
58005002	The high priest has his own weaknesses . So he is able to be gentle with those who do wrong out of ignorance .
58005003	He offers sacrifices for their sins , but he must also offer sacrifices for his own sins .
58005004	To be a high priest is an honor . But no one chooses himself for this work . That person must be chosen by God just as Aaron was .
58005005	It is the same with Christ . He did not choose himself to have the honor of becoming a high priest . But God chose him . God said to him , “ You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . ” “ You are a priest forever — the kind of priest Melchizedek was . ”
58005007	While Jesus lived on earth he prayed to God , asking for help from the one who could save him from death . He prayed to God with loud cries and tears . And his prayers were answered because of his great respect for God .
58005008	Jesus was the Son of God , but he still suffered , and through his sufferings he learned to obey whatever God says .
58005009	This made him the perfect high priest , who provides the way for everyone who obeys him to be saved forever .
58005010	God made him high priest , just like Melchizedek .
58005011	We have many things to tell you about this . But it is hard to explain because you have stopped trying to understand .
58005012	You have had enough time that by now you should be teachers . But you need someone to teach you again the first lessons of God’s teaching . You still need the teaching that is like milk . You are not ready for solid food .
58005013	Anyone who lives on milk is still a baby and is not able to understand much about living right .
58005014	But solid food is for people who have grown up . From their experience they have learned to see the difference between good and evil .
58006003	And that’s what we will do if God allows .
58006007	Some people are like land that gets plenty of rain and produces a good crop for those who farm it . That kind of land has God’s blessing .
58006008	But other people are like land that grows only thorns and weeds . It is worthless and in danger of being cursed by God . It will be destroyed by fire .
58006009	Dear friends , I am not saying this because I think it is happening to you . We really expect that you will do better — that you will do the good things that will result in your salvation .
58006010	God is fair , and he will remember all the work you have done . He will remember that you showed your love to him by helping his people and that you continue to help them .
58006011	We want each of you to be willing and eager to show your love like that the rest of your life . Then you will be sure to get what you hope for .
58006012	We don’t want you to be lazy . We want you to be like those who , because of their faith and patience , will get what God has promised .
58006013	God made a promise to Abraham . And there is no one greater than God , so he made the promise with an oath in his own name — an oath that he would do what he promised .
58006014	He said , “ I will surely bless you . I will give you many descendants . ”
58006015	Abraham waited patiently for this to happen , and later he received what God promised .
58006016	People always use the name of someone greater than themselves to make a promise with an oath . The oath proves that what they say is true , and there is no more arguing about it .
58006017	God wanted to prove that his promise was true . He wanted to prove this to those who would get what he promised . He wanted them to understand clearly that his purposes never change . So God said something would happen , and he proved what he said by adding an oath .
58006018	These two things cannot change : God cannot lie when he says something , and he cannot lie when he makes an oath . So these two things are a great help to us who have come to God for safety . They encourage us to hold on to the hope that is ours .
58006019	This hope is like an anchor for us . It is strong and sure and keeps us safe . It goes behind the curtain .
58006020	Jesus has already entered there and opened the way for us . He has become the high priest forever , just like Melchizedek .
58007001	Melchizedek was the king of Salem and a priest for God the Most High . He met Abraham when Abraham was coming back after defeating the kings . That day Melchizedek blessed him .
58007002	Then Abraham gave him a tenth of everything he had . The name Melchizedek , king of Salem , has two meanings . First , Melchizedek means “ king of justice . ” And “ king of Salem ” means “ king of peace . ”
58007003	No one knows who his father or mother was or where he came from . And no one knows when he was born or when he died . Melchizedek is like the Son of God in that he will always be a priest .
58007004	You can see that Melchizedek was very great . Abraham , our great ancestor , gave him a tenth of everything he won in battle .
58007005	Now the law says that those from the tribe of Levi who become priests must get a tenth from their own people , even though they and their people are both from the family of Abraham .
58007006	Melchizedek was not even from the tribe of Levi , but Abraham gave him a tenth of what he had . And Melchizedek blessed Abraham — the one who had God’s promises .
58007007	And everyone knows that the more important person always blesses the less important person .
58007008	Those priests get a tenth , but they are only men who live and then die . But Melchizedek , who got a tenth from Abraham , continues to live , as the Scriptures say .
58007009	Now those from the family of Levi are the ones who get a tenth from the people . But we can say that when Abraham paid Melchizedek a tenth , then Levi also paid it .
58007010	Levi was not yet born , but he already existed in his ancestor Abraham when Melchizedek met him .
58007011	The people were given the law under the system of priests from the tribe of Levi . But no one could be made spiritually perfect through that system of priests . So there was a need for another priest to come . I mean a priest like Melchizedek , not Aaron .
58007012	And when a different kind of priest comes , then the law must be changed too .
58007015	And these things become even clearer when we see that another priest has come who is like Melchizedek .
58007016	He was made a priest , but not because he met the requirement of being born into the right family . He became a priest by the power of a life that will never end .
58007017	This is what the Scriptures say about him : “ You are a priest forever — the kind of priest Melchizedek was . ”
58007018	The old rule is now ended because it was weak and worthless .
58007019	The Law of Moses could not make anything perfect . But now a better hope has been given to us . And with that hope we can come near to God .
58007020	Also , it is important that God made a promise with an oath when he made Jesus high priest . When those other men became priests , there was no oath .
58007021	But Christ became a priest with God’s oath . God said to him , “ The Lord has made a promise with an oath and will not change his mind : ‘ You are a priest forever . ’ ”
58007023	Also , when one of those other priests died , he could not continue being a priest . So there were many of those priests .
58007024	But Jesus lives forever . He will never stop serving as a priest .
58007025	So Christ can save those who come to God through him . Christ can do this forever , because he always lives and is ready to help people when they come before God .
58007026	So Jesus is the kind of high priest we need . He is holy . He has no sin in him . He is pure and not influenced by sinners . And he is raised above the heavens .
58007027	He is not like those other priests . They had to offer sacrifices every day , first for their own sins , and then for the sins of the people . But Jesus doesn’t need to do that . He offered only one sacrifice for all time . He offered himself .
58007028	The law chooses high priests who are men and have the same weaknesses that all people have . But after the law , God spoke the oath that made his Son high priest . And that Son , made perfect through suffering , will serve forever .
58008001	Here is the point of what we are saying : We have a high priest like that , who sits on the right side of God’s throne in heaven .
58008002	Our high priest serves in the Most Holy Place . He serves in the true place of worship that was made by God , not by anyone here on earth .
58008003	Every high priest has the work of offering gifts and sacrifices to God . So our high priest must also offer something to God .
58008004	If our high priest were now living on earth , he would not be a priest . I say this because there are already priests here who follow the law by offering gifts to God .
58008005	The work that these priests do is really only a copy and a shadow of what is in heaven . That is why God warned Moses when he was ready to build the Holy Tent : “ Be sure to make everything exactly like the pattern I showed you on the mountain . ”
58008006	But the work that has been given to Jesus is much greater than the work that was given to those priests . In the same way , the new agreement that Jesus brought from God to his people is much greater than the old one . And the new agreement is based on better promises .
58008007	If there was nothing wrong with the first agreement , then there would be no need for a second agreement .
58008008	But God found something wrong with the people . He said , “ The time is coming , says the Lord , when I will give a new agreement to the people of Israel and to the people of Judah .
58008009	It will not be like the agreement that I gave to their fathers . That is the agreement I gave when I took them by the hand and led them out of Egypt . They did not continue following the agreement I gave them , and I turned away from them , says the Lord .
58008010	This is the new agreement I will give the people of Israel . I will give this agreement in the future , says the Lord : I will put my laws in their minds , and I will write my laws on their hearts . I will be their God , and they will be my people .
58008011	Never again will anyone have to teach their neighbors or their family to know the Lord . All people — the greatest and the least important — will know me .
58008012	And I will forgive the wrongs they have done , and I will not remember their sins . ”
58008013	God called this a new agreement , so he has made the first agreement old . And anything that is old and useless is ready to disappear .
58009001	The first agreement had rules for worship and a place for worship here on earth .
58009002	This place was inside a tent . The first area in the tent was called the Holy Place . In the Holy Place were the lamp and the table with the special bread offered to God .
58009003	Behind the second curtain was a room called the Most Holy Place .
58009004	In the Most Holy Place was a golden altar for burning incense . And also there was the Box of the Agreement . The Box was covered with gold . Inside this Box was a golden jar of manna and Aaron’s rod — the rod that once grew leaves . Also in the Box were the flat stones with the Ten Commandments of the old agreement on them .
58009005	Above the Box were the Cherub angels that showed God’s glory . These Cherub angels were over the place of mercy . But we cannot say everything about this now .
58009006	Everything in the tent was made ready in the way I have explained . Then the priests went into the first room every day to do their worship duties .
58009007	But only the high priest could go into the second room , and he went in only once a year . Also , he could never enter that room without taking blood with him . He offered that blood to God for himself and for the sins the people committed without knowing they were sinning .
58009008	The Holy Spirit uses those two separate rooms to teach us that the way into the Most Holy Place was not open while the first room was still there .
58009009	This is an example for us today . It shows that the gifts and sacrifices the priests offer to God are not able to make the consciences of the worshipers completely clear .
58009010	These gifts and sacrifices are only about food and drink and special washings . They are only rules about the body . God gave them for his people to follow until the time of his new way .
58009011	But Christ has already come to be the high priest . He is the high priest of the good things we now have . But Christ does not serve in a place like the tent that those other priests served in . He serves in a better place . Unlike that tent , this one is perfect . It was not made by anyone here on earth . It does not belong to this world .
58009012	Christ entered the Most Holy Place only one time — enough for all time . He entered the Most Holy Place by using his own blood , not the blood of goats or young bulls . He entered there and made us free from sin forever .
58009013	The blood of goats and bulls and the ashes of a cow were sprinkled on those who were no longer pure enough to enter the place of worship . The blood and ashes made them pure again — but only their bodies .
58009014	So surely the blood sacrifice of Christ can do much more . Christ offered himself through the eternal Spirit as a perfect sacrifice to God . His blood will make us completely clean from the evil we have done . It will give us clear consciences so that we can worship the living God .
58009015	So Christ brings a new agreement from God to his people . He brings this agreement so that those who are chosen by God can have the blessings God promised , blessings that last forever . This can happen only because Christ died to free people from sins committed against the commands of the first agreement .
58009016	When someone dies and leaves a will , there must be proof that the one who wrote the will is dead .
58009017	A will means nothing while the one who wrote it is still living . It can be used only after that person’s death .
58009018	That is why blood was needed to begin the first agreement between God and his people .
58009019	First , Moses told the people every command in the law . Then he took the blood of young bulls and mixed it with water . He used red wool and a branch of hyssop to sprinkle the blood and water on the book of the law and on all the people .
58009020	Then he said , “ This is the blood that makes the agreement good — the agreement that God commanded you to follow . ”
58009021	In the same way , Moses sprinkled the blood on the Holy Tent . He sprinkled the blood over everything used in worship .
58009022	The law says that almost everything must be made clean by blood . Sins cannot be forgiven without a blood sacrifice .
58009023	These things are copies of the real things that are in heaven . These copies had to be made clean by animal sacrifices . But the real things in heaven must have much better sacrifices .
58009024	Christ went into the Most Holy Place . But it was not the man-made one , which is only a copy of the real one . He went into heaven , and he is there now before God to help us .
58009025	The high priest enters the Most Holy Place once every year . He takes with him blood to offer . But he does not offer his own blood like Christ did . Christ went into heaven , but not to offer himself many times like the high priest offers blood again and again .
58009026	If Christ had offered himself many times , he would have needed to suffer many times since the time the world was made . But he came to offer himself only once . And that once is enough for all time . He came at a time when the world is nearing an end . He came to take away all sin by offering himself as a sacrifice .
58009027	Everyone must die once . Then they are judged .
58009028	So Christ was offered as a sacrifice one time to take away the sins of many people . And he will come a second time , but not to offer himself for sin . He will come the second time to bring salvation to those who are waiting for him .
58010001	The law gave us only an unclear picture of the good things coming in the future . The law is not a perfect picture of the real things . The law tells people to offer the same sacrifices every year . Those who come to worship God continue to offer those sacrifices . But the law can never make them perfect .
58010002	If the law could make people perfect , those sacrifices would have already stopped . They would already be clean from their sins , and they would not still feel guilty .
58010003	But that’s not what happens . Their sacrifices make them remember their sins every year ,
58010004	because it is not possible for the blood of bulls and goats to take away sins .
58010005	So when Christ came into the world he said , “ You don’t want sacrifices and offerings , but you have prepared a body for me .
58010006	You are not pleased with the sacrifices of animals killed and burned or with offerings to take away sins .
58010007	Then I said , ‘ Here I am , God . It is written about me in the book of the law . I have come to do what you want . ’ ”
58010011	Every day the priests stand and do their religious service . Again and again they offer the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins .
58010012	But Christ offered only one sacrifice for sins , and that sacrifice is good for all time . Then he sat down at the right side of God .
58010013	And now Christ waits there for his enemies to be put under his power .
58010014	With one sacrifice Christ made his people perfect forever . They are the ones who are being made holy .
58010015	The Holy Spirit also tells us about this . First he says ,
58010016	“ This is the agreement I will make with my people in the future , says the Lord . I will put my laws in their hearts . I will write my laws in their minds . ” “ I will forget their sins and never again remember the evil they have done . ”
58010019	And so , brothers and sisters , we are completely free to enter the Most Holy Place . We can do this without fear because of the blood sacrifice of Jesus .
58010020	We enter through a new way that Jesus opened for us . It is a living way that leads through the curtain — Christ’s body .
58010021	And we have a great priest who rules the house of God .
58010022	Sprinkled with the blood of Christ , our hearts have been made free from a guilty conscience , and our bodies have been washed with pure water . So come near to God with a sincere heart , full of confidence because of our faith in Christ .
58010023	We must hold on to the hope we have , never hesitating to tell people about it . We can trust God to do what he promised .
58010024	We should think about each other to see how we can encourage each other to show love and do good works .
58010025	We must not quit meeting together , as some are doing . No , we need to keep on encouraging each other . This becomes more and more important as you see the Day getting closer .
58010026	If we decide to continue sinning after we have learned the truth , then there is no other sacrifice that will take away sins .
58010027	If we continue sinning , all that is left for us is a fearful time of waiting for the judgment and the angry fire that will destroy those who live against God .
58010028	Whoever refused to obey the Law of Moses was found guilty from the testimony given by two or three witnesses . Such people were not forgiven . They were killed .
58010029	So think how much more punishment people deserve who show their hate for the Son of God — people who show they have no respect for the blood sacrifice that began the new agreement and once made them holy or who insult the Spirit of God’s grace .
58010030	We know that God said , “ I will punish people for the wrongs they do ; I will repay them . ” And he also said , “ The Lord will judge his people . ”
58010031	It is a terrible thing to face punishment from the living God .
58010032	Remember the days when you first learned the truth . You had a hard struggle with much suffering , but you continued strong .
58010033	Sometimes people said hateful things to you and mistreated you in public . And sometimes you helped others who were being treated that same way .
58010034	Yes , you helped them in prison and shared in their suffering . And you were still happy when everything you owned was taken away from you . You continued to be happy , because you knew that you had something much better — something that would continue forever .
58010035	So don’t lose the courage that you had in the past . Your courage will be rewarded richly .
58010036	You must be patient . After you have done what God wants , you will get what he promised you .
58010037	He says , “ Very soon now , the one who is coming will come and will not be late .
58010038	The person who is right with me will live by trusting in me . But I will not be pleased with the one who turns back in fear . ”
58011001	Faith is what makes real the things we hope for . It is proof of what we cannot see .
58011002	God was pleased with the people who lived a long time ago because they had faith like this .
58011003	Faith helps us understand that God created the whole world by his command . This means that the things we see were made by something that cannot be seen .
58011004	Cain and Abel both offered sacrifices to God . But Abel offered a better sacrifice to God because he had faith . God said he was pleased with what Abel offered . And so God called him a good man because he had faith . Abel died , but through his faith he is still speaking .
58011005	Enoch was carried away from this earth , so he never died . The Scriptures tell us that before he was carried off , he was a man who pleased God . Later , no one knew where he was , because God had taken Enoch to be with him . This all happened because he had faith .
58011006	Without faith no one can please God . Whoever comes to God must believe that he is real and that he rewards those who sincerely try to find him .
58011007	Noah was warned by God about things that he could not yet see . But he had faith and respect for God , so he built a large boat to save his family . With his faith , Noah showed that the world was wrong . And he became one of those who are made right with God through faith .
58011008	God called Abraham to travel to another place that he promised to give him . Abraham did not know where that other place was . But he obeyed God and started traveling because he had faith .
58011009	Abraham lived in the country that God promised to give him . He lived there like a visitor who did not belong . He did this because he had faith . He lived in tents with Isaac and Jacob , who also received the same promise from God .
58011010	Abraham was waiting for the city that has real foundations . He was waiting for the city that is planned and built by God .
58011011	Sarah was not able to have children , and Abraham was too old . But he had faith in God , trusting him to do what he promised . And so God made them able to have children .
58011012	Abraham was so old he was almost dead . But from that one man came as many descendants as there are stars in the sky . So many people came from him that they are like grains of sand on the seashore .
58011013	All these great people continued living with faith until they died . They did not get the things God promised his people . But they were happy just to see those promises coming far in the future . They accepted the fact that they were like visitors and strangers here on earth .
58011014	When people accept something like that , they show they are waiting for a country that will be their own .
58011015	If they were thinking about the country they had left , they could have gone back .
58011016	But they were waiting for a better country — a heavenly country . So God is not ashamed to be called their God . And he has prepared a city for them .
58011019	He believed that God could raise people from death . And really , when God stopped Abraham from killing Isaac , it was as if he got him back from death .
58011020	Isaac blessed the future of Jacob and Esau . He did that because he had faith .
58011021	And Jacob , also because he had faith , blessed each one of Joseph’s sons . He did this while he was dying , leaning on his rod and worshiping God .
58011022	And when Joseph was almost dead , he spoke about the people of Israel leaving Egypt . And he told them what they should do with his body . He did this because he had faith .
58011023	And the mother and father of Moses hid him for three months after he was born . They did this because they had faith . They saw that Moses was a beautiful baby . And they were not afraid to disobey the king’s order .
58011026	He thought it was better to suffer for the Messiah than to have all the treasures of Egypt . He was waiting for the reward that God would give him .
58011027	Moses left Egypt because he had faith . He was not afraid of the king’s anger . He continued strong as if he could see the God no one can see .
58011028	Moses prepared the Passover and spread the blood on the doorways of the people of Israel , so that the angel of death would not kill their firstborn sons . Moses did this because he had faith .
58011029	And God’s people all walked through the Red Sea as if it were dry land . They were able to do this because they had faith . But when the Egyptians tried to follow them , they were drowned .
58011030	And the walls of Jericho fell because of the faith of God’s people . They marched around the walls for seven days , and then the walls fell .
58011031	And Rahab , the prostitute , welcomed the Israelite spies like friends . And because of her faith , she was not killed with the ones who refused to obey .
58011032	Do I need to give you more examples ? I don’t have enough time to tell you about Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , Samuel , and the prophets .
58011033	All of them had great faith . And with that faith they defeated kingdoms . They did what was right , and God helped them in the ways he promised . With their faith some people closed the mouths of lions .
58011034	And some were able to stop blazing fires . Others escaped from being killed with swords . Some who were weak were made strong . They became powerful in battle and defeated other armies .
58011035	There were women who lost loved ones but got them back when they were raised from death . Others were tortured but refused to accept their freedom . They did this so that they could be raised from death to a better life .
58011036	Some were laughed at and beaten . Others were tied up and put in prison .
58011037	They were killed with stones . They were cut in half . They were killed with swords . The only clothes some of them had were sheepskins or goatskins . They were poor , persecuted , and treated badly by others .
58011038	The world was not good enough for these great people . They had to wander in deserts and mountains , living in caves and holes in the ground .
58011039	God was pleased with all of them because of their faith . But not one of them received God’s great promise .
58011040	God planned something better for us . He wanted to make us perfect . Of course , he wanted those great people to be made perfect too , but not before we could all enjoy that blessing together .
58012001	We have all these great people around us as examples . Their lives tell us what faith means . So we , too , should run the race that is before us and never quit . We should remove from our lives anything that would slow us down and the sin that so often makes us fall .
58012002	We must never stop looking to Jesus . He is the leader of our faith , and he is the one who makes our faith complete . He suffered death on a cross . But he accepted the shame of the cross as if it were nothing because of the joy he could see waiting for him . And now he is sitting at the right side of God’s throne .
58012003	Think about Jesus . He patiently endured the angry insults that sinful people were shouting at him . Think about him so that you won’t get discouraged and stop trying .
58012004	You are struggling against sin , but you have not had to give up your life for the cause .
58012005	You are children of God , and he speaks words of comfort to you . You have forgotten these words : “ My child , don’t think the Lord’s discipline is worth nothing , and don’t stop trying when he corrects you .
58012006	The Lord disciplines everyone he loves ; he punishes everyone he accepts as a child . ”
58012007	So accept sufferings like a father’s discipline . God does these things to you like a father correcting his children . You know that all children are disciplined by their fathers .
58012008	So , if you never receive the discipline that every child must have , you are not true children and don’t really belong to God .
58012009	We have all had fathers here on earth who corrected us with discipline . And we respected them . So it is even more important that we accept discipline from the Father of our spirits . If we do this , we will have life .
58012010	Our fathers on earth disciplined us for a short time in the way they thought was best . But God disciplines us to help us so that we can be holy like him .
58012011	We don’t enjoy discipline when we get it . It is painful . But later , after we have learned our lesson from it , we will enjoy the peace that comes from doing what is right .
58012012	You have become weak , so make yourselves strong again .
58012013	Live in the right way so that you will be saved and your weakness will not cause you to be lost .
58012014	Try to live in peace with everyone . And try to keep your lives free from sin . Anyone whose life is not holy will never see the Lord .
58012015	Be careful that no one fails to get God’s grace . Be careful that no one loses their faith and becomes like a bitter weed growing among you . Someone like that can ruin your whole group .
58012016	Be careful that no one commits sexual sin . And be careful that no one is like Esau and never thinks about God . As the oldest son , Esau would have inherited everything from his father . But he sold all that for a single meal .
58012017	You remember that after Esau did this , he wanted to get his father’s blessing . He wanted that blessing so much that he cried . But his father refused to give him the blessing , because Esau could find no way to change what he had done .
58012018	You have not come to a place that can be seen and touched , like the mountain the people of Israel saw , which was burning with fire and covered with darkness , gloom , and storms .
58012019	There is no sound of a trumpet or a voice speaking words like those they heard . When they heard the voice , they begged never to hear another word .
58012020	They did not want to hear the command : “ If anything , even an animal , touches the mountain , it must be killed with stones . ”
58012021	What they saw was so terrible that Moses said , “ I am shaking with fear . ”
58012022	But you have come to Mount Zion , to the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem . You have come to a place where thousands of angels have gathered to celebrate .
58012023	You have come to the meeting of God’s firstborn children . Their names are written in heaven . You have come to God , the judge of all people . And you have come to the spirits of good people who have been made perfect .
58012024	You have come to Jesus — the one who brought the new agreement from God to his people . You have come to the sprinkled blood that tells us about better things than the blood of Abel .
58012025	Be careful and don’t refuse to listen when God speaks . Those people refused to listen to him when he warned them on earth . And they did not escape . Now God is speaking from heaven . So now it will be worse for those who refuse to listen to him .
58012026	When he spoke before , his voice shook the earth . But now he has promised , “ Once again I will shake the earth , but I will also shake heaven . ”
58012027	The words “ once again ” clearly show us that everything that was created will be destroyed — that is , the things that can be shaken . And only what cannot be shaken will remain .
58012028	So we should be thankful because we have a kingdom that cannot be shaken . And because we are thankful , we should worship God in a way that will please him . We should do this with respect and fear ,
58012029	because our God is like a fire that can destroy us .
58013001	Continue loving each other as brothers and sisters in Christ .
58013002	Always remember to help people by welcoming them into your home . Some people have done that and have helped angels without knowing it .
58013003	Don’t forget those who are in prison . Remember them as though you were in prison with them . And don’t forget those who are suffering . Remember them as though you were suffering with them .
58013004	Marriage should be honored by everyone . And every marriage should be kept pure between husband and wife . God will judge guilty those who commit sexual sins and adultery .
58013005	Keep your lives free from the love of money . And be satisfied with what you have . God has said , “ I will never leave you ; I will never run away from you . ” “ The Lord is my helper ; I will not be afraid . People can do nothing to me . ”
58013007	Remember your leaders . They taught God’s message to you . Remember how they lived and died , and copy their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday , today , and forever .
58013009	Don’t let all kinds of strange teachings lead you into the wrong way . Depend only on God’s grace for spiritual strength , not on rules about foods . Obeying those rules doesn’t help anyone .
58013010	We have a sacrifice . And those priests who serve in the Holy Tent cannot eat from the sacrifice we have .
58013011	The high priest carries the blood of animals into the Most Holy Place and offers that blood for sins . But the bodies of those animals are burned outside the camp .
58013012	So Jesus also suffered outside the city . He died to make his people holy with his own blood .
58013013	So we should go to Jesus outside the camp and accept the same shame that he had .
58013014	Here on earth we don’t have a city that lasts forever . But we are waiting for the city that we will have in the future .
58013015	So through Jesus we should never stop offering our sacrifice to God . That sacrifice is our praise , coming from lips that speak his name .
58013016	And don’t forget to do good and to share what you have with others , because sacrifices like these are very pleasing to God .
58013017	Obey your leaders . Be willing to do what they say . They are responsible for your spiritual welfare , so they are always watching to protect you . Obey them so that their work will give them joy , not grief . It won’t help you to make it hard for them .
58013018	Continue praying for us . We feel right about what we do , because we always try to do what is best .
58013019	And I beg you to pray that God will send me back to you soon . I want this more than anything else .
58013022	My brothers and sisters , I beg you to listen patiently to what I have said . I wrote this letter to strengthen you . And it is not very long .
58013023	I want you to know that our brother Timothy is out of prison . If he comes to me soon , we will both come to see you .
58013024	Give my greetings to all your leaders and to all God’s people . All those from Italy send you their greetings .
58013025	God’s grace be with you all .
59001001	Greetings from James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ . To God’s people who are scattered all over the world .
59001002	My brothers and sisters , you will have many kinds of trouble . But this gives you a reason to be very happy .
59001003	You know that when your faith is tested , you learn to be patient in suffering .
59001004	If you let that patience work in you , the end result will be good . You will be mature and complete . You will be all that God wants you to be .
59001005	Do any of you need wisdom ? Ask God for it . He is generous and enjoys giving to everyone . So he will give you wisdom .
59001006	But when you ask God , you must believe . Don’t doubt him . Whoever doubts is like a wave in the sea that is blown up and down by the wind .
59001009	Believers who are poor should be glad that God considers them so important .
59001010	Believers who are rich should be glad when bad things happen that humble them . Their riches won’t keep them from disappearing as quickly as wildflowers .
59001011	As the sun rises and gets hotter , its heat dries up the plants , and the flowers fall off . The flowers that were so beautiful are now dead . That’s how it is with the rich . While they are still making plans for their business , they will die .
59001012	Great blessings belong to those who are tempted and remain faithful ! After they have proved their faith , God will give them the reward of eternal life . God promised this to all people who love him .
59001013	Whenever you feel tempted to do something bad , you should not say , “ God is tempting me . ” Evil cannot tempt God , and God himself does not tempt anyone .
59001014	You are tempted by the evil things you want . Your own desire leads you away and traps you .
59001015	Your desire grows inside you until it results in sin . Then the sin grows bigger and bigger and finally ends in death .
59001016	My dear brothers and sisters , don’t be fooled about this .
59001017	Everything good comes from God . Every perfect gift is from him . These good gifts come down from the Father who made all the lights in the sky . But God never changes like the shadows from those lights . He is always the same .
59001018	God decided to give us life through the true message he sent to us . He wanted us to be the most important of all that he created .
59001019	My dear brothers and sisters , always be more willing to listen than to speak . Keep control of your anger .
59001020	Anger does not help you live the way God wants .
59001021	So get rid of everything evil in your lives — every kind of wrong you do . Be humble and accept God’s teaching that is planted in your hearts . This teaching can save you .
59001022	Do what God’s teaching says ; don’t just listen and do nothing . When you only sit and listen , you are fooling yourselves .
59001023	Hearing God’s teaching and doing nothing is like looking at your face in the mirror
59001024	and doing nothing about what you saw . You go away and immediately forget how bad you looked .
59001025	But when you look into God’s perfect law that sets people free , pay attention to it . If you do what it says , you will have God’s blessing . Never just listen to his teaching and forget what you heard .
59001026	You might think you are a very religious person . But if your tongue is out of control , you are fooling yourself . Your careless talk makes your offerings to God worthless .
59001027	The worship that God wants is this : caring for orphans or widows who need help and keeping yourself free from the world’s evil influence . This is the kind of worship that God accepts as pure and good .
59002001	My dear brothers and sisters , you are believers in our glorious Lord Jesus Christ . So don’t treat some people better than others .
59002002	Suppose someone comes into your meeting wearing very nice clothes and a gold ring . At the same time a poor person comes in wearing old , dirty clothes .
59002003	You show special attention to the person wearing nice clothes . You say , “ Sit here in this good seat . ” But you say to the poor person , “ Stand there ! ” or “ Sit on the floor by our feet ! ”
59002004	Doesn’t this show that you think some people are more important than others ? You set yourselves up as judges — judges who make bad decisions .
59002005	Listen , my dear brothers and sisters . God chose the poor people in the world to be rich in faith . He chose them to receive the kingdom God promised to those who love him .
59002006	But you show no respect to those who are poor . And you know that the rich are the ones who always try to control your lives . And they are the ones who take you to court .
59002007	And the rich are the ones who insult the wonderful name of Christ , the name by which you are known .
59002008	One law rules over all other laws . This royal law is found in the Scriptures : “ Love your neighbor the same as you love yourself . ” If you obey this law , you are doing right .
59002009	But if you are treating one person as more important than another , you are sinning . You are guilty of breaking God’s law .
59002010	You might follow all of God’s law . But if you fail to obey only one command , you are guilty of breaking all the commands in that law .
59002011	God said , “ Don’t commit adultery . ” The same God also said , “ Don’t kill . ” So if you don’t commit adultery , but you kill someone , you are guilty of breaking all of God’s law .
59002012	You will be judged by the law that makes people free . You should remember this in everything you say and do .
59002013	Yes , you must show mercy to others . If you do not show mercy , then God will not show mercy to you when he judges you . But the one who shows mercy can stand without fear before the Judge .
59002014	My brothers and sisters , if a person claims to have faith but does nothing , that faith is worth nothing . Faith like that cannot save anyone .
59002015	Suppose a brother or sister in Christ comes to you in need of clothes or something to eat .
59002016	And you say to them , “ God be with you ! I hope you stay warm and get plenty to eat , ” but you don’t give them the things they need . If you don’t help them , your words are worthless .
59002017	It is the same with faith . If it is just faith and nothing more — if it doesn’t do anything — it is dead .
59002018	But someone might argue , “ Some people have faith , and others have good works . ” My answer would be that you can’t show me your faith if you don’t do anything . But I will show you my faith by the good I do .
59002019	You believe there is one God . That’s good , but even the demons believe that ! And they shake with fear .
59002020	You fool ! Faith that does nothing is worth nothing . Do you want me to prove this to you ?
59002021	Our father Abraham was made right with God by what he did . He offered his son Isaac to God on the altar .
59002022	So you see that Abraham’s faith and what he did worked together . His faith was made perfect by what he did .
59002023	This shows the full meaning of the Scriptures that say , “ Abraham believed God , and because of this faith he was accepted as one who is right with God . ” Abraham was called “ God’s friend . ”
59002024	So you see that people are made right with God by what they do . They cannot be made right by faith alone .
59002025	Another example is Rahab . She was a prostitute , but she was made right with God by something she did . She helped those who were spying for God’s people . She welcomed them into her home and helped them escape by a different road .
59002026	A person’s body that does not have a spirit is dead . It is the same with faith — faith that does nothing is dead !
59003001	My brothers and sisters , not many of you should be teachers . I say this because , as you know , we who teach will be judged more strictly than others .
59003002	We all make many mistakes . A person who never said anything wrong would be perfect . Someone like that would be able to control their whole body too .
59003003	We put bits into the mouths of horses to make them obey us . With these bits we can control their whole body .
59003004	It is the same with ships . A ship is very big , and it is pushed by strong winds . But a very small rudder controls that big ship . And the one who controls the rudder decides where the ship will go . It goes where he wants it to go .
59003005	It is the same with our tongue . It is a small part of the body , but it can boast about doing great things . A big forest fire can be started with only a little flame .
59003006	The tongue is like a fire . It is a world of evil among the parts of our body . It spreads its evil through our whole body and starts a fire that influences all of life . It gets this fire from hell .
59003007	Humans have control over every kind of wild animal , bird , reptile , and fish , and they have controlled all these things .
59003008	But no one can control the tongue . It is wild and evil , full of deadly poison .
59003009	We use our tongues to praise our Lord and Father , but then we curse people who were created in God’s likeness .
59003010	These praises and curses come from the same mouth . My brothers and sisters , this should not happen .
59003011	Do good water and bad water flow from the same spring ? Of course not .
59003012	My brothers and sisters , can a fig tree make olives ? Or can a grapevine make figs ? No , and a well full of salty water cannot give good water .
59003013	Are there any among you who are really wise and understanding ? Then you should show your wisdom by living right . You should do what is good with humility . A wise person does not boast .
59003014	If you are selfish and have bitter jealousy in your hearts , you have no reason to boast . Your boasting is a lie that hides the truth .
59003015	That kind of “ wisdom ” does not come from God . That “ wisdom ” comes from the world . It is not spiritual . It is from the devil .
59003016	Where there is jealousy and selfishness , there will be confusion and every kind of evil .
59003017	But the wisdom that comes from God is like this : First , it is pure . It is also peaceful , gentle , and easy to please . This wisdom is always ready to help people who have trouble and to do good for others . This wisdom is always fair and honest .
59003018	People who work for peace in a peaceful way get the blessings that come from right living .
59004001	Do you know where your fights and arguments come from ? They come from the selfish desires that make war inside you .
59004002	You want things , but you don’t get them . So you kill and are jealous of others . But you still cannot get what you want . So you argue and fight . You don’t get what you want because you don’t ask God .
59004003	Or when you ask , you don’t receive anything , because the reason you ask is wrong . You only want to use it for your own pleasure .
59004004	You people are not faithful to God ! You should know that loving what the world has is the same as hating God . So anyone who wants to be friends with this evil world becomes God’s enemy .
59004005	Do you think the Scriptures mean nothing ? The Scriptures say , “ The Spirit God made to live in us wants us only for himself . ”
59004006	But the kindness God shows is greater . As the Scripture says , “ God is against the proud , but he is kind to the humble . ”
59004007	So give yourselves to God . Stand against the devil , and he will run away from you .
59004008	Come near to God and he will come near to you . You are sinners , so clean sin out of your lives . You are trying to follow God and the world at the same time . Make your thinking pure .
59004009	Be sad , be sorry , and cry ! Change your laughter into crying . Change your joy into sadness .
59004010	Be humble before the Lord , and he will make you great .
59004011	Brothers and sisters , don’t say anything against each other . If you criticize your brother or sister in Christ or judge them , you are criticizing and judging the law they follow . And when you are judging the law , you are not a follower of the law . You have become a judge .
59004012	God is the one who gave us the law , and he is the Judge . He is the only one who can save and destroy . So it is not right for you to judge anyone .
59004013	Some of you say , “ Today or tomorrow we will go to some city . We will stay there a year , do business , and make money . ” Listen , think about this :
59004014	You don’t know what will happen tomorrow . Your life is like a fog . You can see it for a short time , but then it goes away .
59004015	So you should say , “ If the Lord wants , we will live and do this or that . ”
59004016	But now you are proud and boast about yourself . All such boasting is wrong .
59004017	If you fail to do what you know is right , you are sinning .
59005001	You rich people , listen ! Cry and be very sad because much trouble will come to you .
59005002	Your riches will rot and be worth nothing . Your clothes will be eaten by moths .
59005003	Your gold and silver will rust , and that rust will be a proof that you were wrong . That rust will eat your bodies like fire . You saved your treasure in the last days .
59005004	People worked in your fields , but you did not pay them . They are crying out against you . They harvested your crops . Now the Lord All-Powerful has heard their cries .
59005005	Your life on earth was full of rich living . You pleased yourselves with everything you wanted . You made yourselves fat , like an animal ready for the day of slaughter .
59005006	You showed no mercy to good people . They were not against you , but you killed them .
59005007	Brothers and sisters , be patient ; the Lord will come . So be patient until that time . Look at the farmers . They have to be patient . They have to wait for their valuable crop to grow and produce a harvest . They wait patiently for the first rain and the last rain .
59005008	You must be patient too . Never stop hoping . The Lord is coming soon .
59005009	Brothers and sisters , don’t complain against each other . If you don’t stop complaining , you will be judged guilty . And the Judge is ready to come !
59005010	Brothers and sisters , follow the example of the prophets who spoke for the Lord . They suffered many bad things , but they were patient .
59005011	And we say that those who accepted their troubles with patience now have God’s blessing . You have heard about Job’s patience . You know that after all his troubles , the Lord helped him . This shows that the Lord is full of mercy and is kind .
59005012	My brothers and sisters , it is very important that you not use an oath when you make a promise . Don’t use the name of heaven , earth , or anything else to prove what you say . When you mean yes , say only “ yes . ” When you mean no , say only “ no . ” Do this so that you will not be judged guilty .
59005013	Are you having troubles ? You should pray . Are you happy ? You should sing .
59005014	Are you sick ? Ask the elders of the church to come and rub oil on you in the name of the Lord and pray for you .
59005015	If such a prayer is offered in faith , it will heal anyone who is sick . The Lord will heal them . And if they have sinned , he will forgive them .
59005016	So always tell each other the wrong things you have done . Then pray for each other . Do this so that God can heal you . Anyone who lives the way God wants can pray , and great things will happen .
59005017	Elijah was a person just like us . He prayed that it would not rain . And it did not rain on the land for three and a half years !
59005018	Then Elijah prayed that it would rain . And the rain came down from the sky , and the land grew crops again .
59005019	My brothers and sisters , if anyone wanders away from the truth and someone helps that person come back ,
59005020	remember this : Anyone who brings a sinner back from the wrong way will save that person from eternal death and cause many sins to be forgiven .
60001001	Greetings from Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ . To God’s chosen people who are away from their homes — people scattered all over the areas of Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia .
60001002	God planned long ago to choose you and to make you his holy people , which is the Spirit’s work . God wanted you to obey him and to be made clean by the blood sacrifice of Jesus Christ . I pray that you will enjoy more and more of God’s grace and peace .
60001003	Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ . God has great mercy , and because of his mercy he gave us a new life . This new life brings us a living hope through Jesus Christ’s resurrection from death .
60001004	Now we wait to receive the blessings God has for his children . These blessings are kept for you in heaven . They cannot be ruined or be destroyed or lose their beauty .
60001005	God’s power protects you through your faith , and it keeps you safe until your salvation comes . That salvation is ready to be given to you at the end of time .
60001006	I know the thought of that is exciting , even if you must suffer through different kinds of troubles for a short time now .
60001007	These troubles test your faith and prove that it is pure . And such faith is worth more than gold . Gold can be proved to be pure by fire , but gold will ruin . When your faith is proven to be pure , the result will be praise and glory and honor when Jesus Christ comes .
60001008	You have not seen Christ , but still you love him . You can’t see him now , but you believe in him . You are filled with a wonderful and heavenly joy that cannot be explained .
60001009	Your faith has a goal , and you are reaching that goal — your salvation .
60001010	The prophets studied carefully and tried to learn about this salvation . They spoke about the grace that was coming to you .
60001011	The Spirit of Christ was in those prophets . And the Spirit was telling about the sufferings that would happen to Christ and about the glory that would come after those sufferings . The prophets tried to learn about what the Spirit was showing them — when it would happen and what the world would be like at that time .
60001012	It was made clear to them that their service was not for themselves . They were serving you when they told about the things you have now heard . You heard them from those who told you the Good News with the help of the Holy Spirit sent from heaven . Even the angels would like very much to know more about these things you were told .
60001013	So prepare your minds for service . With complete self-control put all your hope in the grace that will be yours when Jesus Christ comes .
60001014	In the past you did not have the understanding you have now , so you did the evil things you wanted to do . But now you are children of God , so you should obey him and not live the way you did before .
60001015	Be holy in everything you do , just as God is holy . He is the one who chose you .
60001016	In the Scriptures God says , “ Be holy , because I am holy . ”
60001017	You pray to God and call him Father , but he will judge everyone the same way — by what they do . So while you are visiting here on earth , you should live with respect for God .
60001018	You know that in the past the way you were living was useless . It was a way of life you learned from those who lived before you . But you were saved from that way of living . You were bought , but not with things that ruin like gold or silver .
60001019	You were bought with the precious blood of Christ’s death . He was a pure and perfect sacrificial Lamb .
60001020	Christ was chosen before the world was made , but he was shown to the world in these last times for you .
60001021	You believe in God through Christ . God is the one who raised him from death and gave honor to him . So your faith and your hope are in God .
60001022	You have made yourselves pure by obeying the truth . Now you can have true love for your brothers and sisters . So love each other deeply — with all your heart .
60001023	You have been born again . This new life did not come from something that dies . It came from something that cannot die . You were born again through God’s life-giving message that lasts forever .
60001024	The Scriptures say , “ Our lives are like the grass of spring , and any glory we enjoy is like the beauty of a wildflower . The grass dries up and dies , and the flower falls to the ground .
60001025	But the word of the Lord lasts forever . ”
60002001	So then , stop doing anything to hurt others . Don’t lie anymore , and stop trying to fool people . Don’t be jealous or say bad things about others .
60002002	Like newborn babies hungry for milk , you should want the pure teaching that feeds your spirit . With it you can grow up and be saved .
60002003	You have already tasted the goodness of the Lord .
60002004	The Lord Jesus is the living stone . The people of the world decided that they did not want this stone . But he is the one God chose as one of great value . So come to him .
60002005	You also are like living stones , and God is using you to build a spiritual house . You are to serve God in this house as holy priests , offering him spiritual sacrifices that he will accept because of Jesus Christ .
60002006	The Scriptures say , “ Look , I have chosen a cornerstone of great value , and I put that stone in Zion . Anyone who trusts in him will never be disappointed . ” “ the stone that the builders refused to accept , which became the most important stone . ” “ a stone that makes people stumble , a rock that makes people fall . ”
60002009	But you are his chosen people , the King’s priests . You are a holy nation , people who belong to God . He chose you to tell about the wonderful things he has done . He brought you out of the darkness of sin into his wonderful light .
60002010	In the past you were not a special people , but now you are God’s people . Once you had not received mercy , but now God has given you his mercy .
60002011	Dear friends , you are like visitors and strangers in this world . So I beg you to keep your lives free from the evil things you want to do , those desires that fight against your true selves .
60002012	People who don’t believe are living all around you . They may say that you are doing wrong . So live such good lives that they will see the good you do , and they will give glory to God on the day he comes .
60002013	Be willing to serve the people who have authority in this world . Do this for the Lord . Obey the king , the highest authority .
60002014	And obey the leaders who are sent by the king . They are sent to punish those who do wrong and to praise those who do good .
60002015	When you do good , you stop ignorant people from saying foolish things about you . This is what God wants .
60002016	Live like free people , but don’t use your freedom as an excuse to do evil . Live as those who are serving God .
60002017	Show respect for all people . Love your brothers and sisters in God’s family . Respect God , and honor the king .
60002018	Slaves , be willing to serve your masters . Do this with all respect . You should obey the masters who are good and kind , and you should obey the masters who are bad .
60002019	One of you might have to suffer even when you have done nothing wrong . If you think of God and bear the pain , this pleases God .
60002020	But if you are punished for doing wrong , there is no reason to praise you for bearing that punishment . But if you suffer for doing good and you are patient , this pleases God .
60002021	This is what you were chosen to do . Christ gave you an example to follow . He suffered for you . So you should do the same as he did :
60002022	“ He never sinned , and he never told a lie . ”
60003001	In the same way , you wives should be willing to serve your husbands . Then , even those who have refused to accept God’s teaching will be persuaded to believe because of the way you live . You will not need to say anything .
60003002	Your husbands will see the pure lives that you live with respect for God .
60003003	It is not fancy hair , gold jewelry , or fine clothes that should make you beautiful .
60003004	No , your beauty should come from inside you — the beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit . That beauty will never disappear . It is worth very much to God .
60003005	It was the same with the holy women who lived long ago and followed God . They made themselves beautiful in that same way . They were willing to serve their husbands .
60003006	I am talking about women like Sarah . She obeyed Abraham , her husband , and called him her master . And you women are true children of Sarah if you always do what is right and are not afraid .
60003007	In the same way , you husbands should live with your wives in an understanding way , since they are weaker than you . You should show them respect , because God gives them the same blessing he gives you — the grace of true life . Do this so that nothing will stop your prayers from being heard .
60003008	So all of you should live together in peace . Try to understand each other . Love each other like brothers and sisters . Be kind and humble .
60003009	Don’t do wrong to anyone to pay them back for doing wrong to you . Or don’t insult anyone to pay them back for insulting you . But ask God to bless them . Do this because you yourselves were chosen to receive a blessing .
60003010	The Scriptures say , “ If you want to enjoy true life and have only good days , then avoid saying anything hurtful , and never let a lie come out of your mouth .
60003011	Stop doing what is wrong , and do good . Look for peace , and do all you can to help people live peacefully .
60003012	The Lord watches over those who do what is right , and he listens to their prayers . But he is against those who do evil . ”
60003013	If you are always trying to do good , no one can really harm you .
60003014	But you may suffer for doing right . If that happens , you have God’s blessing . “ Don’t be afraid of the people who make you suffer ; don’t be worried . ”
60003015	But keep the Lord Christ holy in your hearts . Always be ready to answer everyone who asks you to explain about the hope you have .
60003016	But answer them in a gentle way with respect . Keep your conscience clear . Then people will see the good way you live as followers of Christ , and those who say bad things about you will be ashamed of what they said .
60003017	It is better to suffer for doing good than for doing wrong . Yes , it is better if that is what God wants .
60003018	Christ himself suffered when he died for you , and with that one death he paid for your sins . He was not guilty , but he died for people who are guilty . He did this to bring all of you to God . In his physical form he was killed , but he was made alive by the Spirit .
60004001	Christ suffered while he was in his body . So you should strengthen yourselves with the same kind of thinking Christ had . The one who accepts suffering in this life has clearly decided to stop sinning .
60004002	Strengthen yourselves so that you will live your lives here on earth doing what God wants , not the evil things that people want to do .
60004003	In the past you wasted too much time doing what those who don’t know God like to do . You were living immoral lives , doing the evil things you wanted to do . You were always getting drunk , having wild drinking parties , and doing shameful things in your worship of idols .
60004004	Now those “ friends ” think it is strange that you no longer join them in all the wild and wasteful things they do . And so they say bad things about you .
60004005	But they will have to face God to explain what they have done . He is the one who will soon judge everyone — those who are still living and those who have died .
60004006	Some were told the Good News before they died . They were criticized by others in their life here on earth . But it was God’s plan that they hear the Good News so that they could have a new life through the Spirit .
60004007	The time is near when all things will end . So keep your minds clear , and control yourselves . This will help you in your prayers .
60004008	Most important of all , love each other deeply , because love makes you willing to forgive many sins .
60004009	Open your homes to each other and share your food without complaining .
60004010	God has shown you his grace in many different ways . So be good servants and use whatever gift he has given you in a way that will best serve each other .
60004011	If your gift is speaking , your words should be like words from God . If your gift is serving , you should serve with the strength that God gives . Then it is God who will be praised in everything through Jesus Christ . Power and glory belong to him forever and ever . Amen .
60004012	My friends , don’t be surprised at the painful things that you are now suffering , which are testing your faith . Don’t think that something strange is happening to you .
60004013	But you should be happy that you are sharing in Christ’s sufferings . You will be happy and full of joy when Christ shows his glory .
60004014	When people say bad things to you because you follow Christ , consider it a blessing . When that happens , it shows that God’s Spirit , the Spirit of glory , is with you .
60004015	You may suffer , but don’t let it be because you murder , steal , make trouble , or try to control other people’s lives .
60004016	But if you suffer because you are a “ Christ-follower , ” don’t be ashamed . You should praise God for that name .
60004017	It is time for judging to begin . That judging will begin with God’s family . If it begins with us , then what will happen to those who don’t accept the Good News of God ?
60004018	“ If it is hard for even a good person to be saved , what will happen to the one who is against God and full of sin ? ”
60005001	Now I have something to say to the elders in your group . I am also an elder . I myself have seen Christ’s sufferings . And I will share in the glory that will be shown to us . I beg you to
60005002	take care of the group of people you are responsible for . They are God’s flock . Watch over that flock because you want to , not because you are forced to do it . That is how God wants it . Do it because you are happy to serve , not because you want money .
60005003	Don’t be like a ruler over those you are responsible for . But be good examples to them .
60005004	Then when Christ the Ruling Shepherd comes , you will get a crown — one that will be glorious and never lose its beauty .
60005005	Young people , I have something to say to you too . You should accept the authority of the elders . You should all have a humble attitude in dealing with each other . “ God is against the proud , but he is kind to the humble . ”
60005008	Control yourselves and be careful ! The devil is your enemy , and he goes around like a roaring lion looking for someone to attack and eat .
60005009	Refuse to follow the devil . Stand strong in your faith . You know that your brothers and sisters all over the world are having the same sufferings that you have .
60005010	Yes , you will suffer for a short time . But after that , God will make everything right . He will make you strong . He will support you and keep you from falling . He is the God who gives all grace . He chose you to share in his glory in Christ . That glory will continue forever .
60005011	All power is his forever . Amen .
60005012	Silas will bring this letter to you . I know that he is a faithful brother in Christ . I wrote this short letter to encourage you . I wanted to tell you that this is the true grace of God . Stand strong in that grace .
60005013	The church in Babylon sends you greetings . They were chosen just as you were . Mark , my son in Christ , also sends his greetings .
60005014	Give each other a special greeting of love when you meet . Peace to all of you who are in Christ .
61001001	Greetings from Simon Peter , a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ . To all of you who share in the same valuable faith that we have . This faith was given to us because our God and Savior Jesus Christ always does what is good and right .
61001002	Grace and peace be given to you more and more , because now you know God and Jesus our Lord .
61001003	Jesus has the power of God . And his power has given us everything we need to live a life devoted to God . We have these things because we know him . Jesus chose us by his glory and goodness ,
61001004	through which he also gave us the very great and rich gifts that he promised us . With these gifts you can share in being like God . And so you will escape the ruin that comes to people in the world because of the evil things they want .
61001005	Because you have these blessings , do all you can to add to your life these things : to your faith add goodness ; to your goodness add knowledge ;
61001006	to your knowledge add self-control ; to your self-control add patience ; to your patience add devotion to God ;
61001007	to your devotion add kindness toward your brothers and sisters in Christ , and to this kindness add love .
61001008	If all these things are in you and growing , you will never fail to be useful to God . You will produce the kind of fruit that should come from your knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	But those who don’t grow in these blessings are blind . They cannot see clearly what they have . They have forgotten that they were cleansed from their past sins .
61001010	My brothers and sisters , God called you and chose you to be his . Do your best to live in a way that shows you really are God’s called and chosen people . If you do all this , you will never fall .
61001011	And you will be given a very great welcome into the kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ , a kingdom that never ends .
61001012	You already know these things . You are very strong in the truth you have . But I am always going to help you remember them .
61001013	While I am still living here on earth , I think it is right for me to remind you of them .
61001014	I know that I must soon leave this body . Our Lord Jesus Christ has shown me that .
61001015	I will try my best to make sure you remember these things even after I am gone .
61001016	We told you about the power of our Lord Jesus Christ . We told you about his coming . The things we told you were not just clever stories that people invented . No , we saw the greatness of Jesus with our own eyes .
61001017	Jesus heard the voice of the great and glorious God . That was when he received honor and glory from God the Father . The voice said , “ This is my Son , the one I love . I am very pleased with him . ”
61001018	And we heard that voice . It came from heaven while we were with Jesus on the holy mountain .
61001019	This makes us more sure about what the prophets said . And it is good for you to follow closely what they said , which is like a light shining in a dark place . You have that light until the day begins and the morning star brings new light to your minds .
61001020	Most important of all , you must understand this : No prophecy in the Scriptures comes from the prophet’s own understanding .
61001021	No prophecy ever came from what some person wanted to say . But people were led by the Holy Spirit and spoke words from God .
61002001	In the past there were false prophets among God’s people . It is the same now . You will have some false teachers in your group . They will teach things that are wrong — ideas that will cause people to be lost . And they will teach in a way that will be hard for you to see that they are wrong . They will even refuse to follow the Master who bought their freedom . And so they will quickly destroy themselves .
61002002	Many people will follow them in the morally wrong things they do . And because of them , others will say bad things about the way of truth we follow .
61002003	These false teachers only want your money . So they will use you by telling you things that are not true . But the judgment against these false teachers has been ready for a long time . And they will not escape God who will destroy them .
61002004	When angels sinned , God did not let them go free without punishment . He sent them to hell . He put those angels in caves of darkness , where they are being held until the time when God will judge them .
61002005	And God punished the evil people who lived long ago . He brought a flood to the world that was full of people who were against God . But he saved Noah and seven other people with him . Noah was a man who told people about living right .
61002006	God also punished the evil cities of Sodom and Gomorrah . He burned them until there was nothing left but ashes . He used those cities as an example of what will happen to people who are against God .
61002007	But he saved Lot , a good man who lived there . Lot was greatly troubled by the morally bad lives of those evil people .
61002008	This good man lived with those evil people every day , and his good heart was hurt by the evil things he saw and heard .
61002009	So you see that the Lord God knows how to save those who are devoted to him . He will save them when troubles come . And the Lord will hold evil people to punish them on the day of judgment .
61002010	That punishment is for those who are always doing the evil that their sinful selves want to do . It is for those who hate the Lord’s authority . These false teachers do whatever they want , and they are so proud of themselves . They are not afraid even to say bad things against the glorious ones .
61002011	The angels are much stronger and more powerful than these beings . But even the angels don’t accuse them and say bad things about them to the Lord .
61002012	But these false teachers speak evil against what they don’t understand . They are like animals that do things without really thinking — like wild animals that are born to be caught and killed . And , like wild animals , they will be destroyed .
61002013	They have made many people suffer . So they themselves will suffer . That is their pay for what they have done . They think it is fun to do evil where everyone can see them . They enjoy the evil things that please them . So they are like dirty spots and stains among you — they bring shame to you in the meals you eat together .
61002014	Every time they look at a woman , they want her . They are always sinning this way . And they lead weaker people into the trap of sin . They have taught themselves well to be greedy . They are under a curse .
61002015	These false teachers left the right way and went the wrong way . They followed the same way that the prophet Balaam went . He was the son of Beor , who loved being paid for doing wrong .
61002016	But a donkey told him that he was doing wrong . A donkey cannot talk , of course , but that donkey spoke with a man’s voice and stopped the prophet from acting so crazy .
61002017	These false teachers are like springs that have no water . They are like clouds that are blown by a storm . A place in the deepest darkness has been kept for them .
61002018	They boast with words that mean nothing . They lead people into the trap of sin . They find people who have just escaped from a wrong way of life and lead them back into sin . They do this by using the evil things people want to do in their human weakness .
61002019	These false teachers promise those people freedom , but they themselves are not free . They are slaves to a mind that has been ruined by sin . Yes , people are slaves to anything that controls them .
61002020	People can be made free from the evil in the world . They can be made free by knowing our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . But if they go back into those evil things and are controlled by them , then it is worse for them than it was before .
61002021	Yes , it would be better for them to have never known the right way . That would be better than to know the right way and then to turn away from the holy teaching that was given to them .
61002022	What they did is like these true sayings : “ A dog vomits and goes back to what it threw up . ” And , “ After a pig is washed , it goes back and rolls in the mud again . ”
61003001	My friends , this is the second letter I have written to you . I wrote both letters to you to help your honest minds remember something .
61003002	I want you to remember the words that the holy prophets spoke in the past . And remember the command that our Lord and Savior gave us . He gave us that command through your apostles .
61003003	It is important for you to understand what will happen in the last days . People will laugh at you . They will live following the evil they want to do .
61003004	They will say , “ Jesus promised to come again . Where is he ? Our fathers have died , but the world continues the way it has been since it was made . ”
61003005	But these people don’t want to remember what happened long ago . The skies were there , and God made the earth from water and with water . All this happened by God’s word .
61003006	Then the world was flooded and destroyed with water .
61003007	And that same word of God is keeping the skies and the earth that we have now . They are being kept to be destroyed by fire . They are kept for the day of judgment and the destruction of all people who are against God .
61003008	But don’t forget this one thing , dear friends : To the Lord a day is like a thousand years , and a thousand years is like a day .
61003009	The Lord is not being slow in doing what he promised — the way some people understand slowness . But God is being patient with you . He doesn’t want anyone to be lost . He wants everyone to change their ways and stop sinning .
61003010	But the day when the Lord comes again will surprise everyone like the coming of a thief . The sky will disappear with a loud noise . Everything in the sky will be destroyed with fire . And the earth and everything in it will be burned up .
61003011	Everything will be destroyed in this way . So what kind of people should you be ? Your lives should be holy and devoted to God .
61003012	You should be looking forward to the day of God , wanting more than anything else for it to come soon . When it comes , the sky will be destroyed with fire , and everything in the sky will melt with heat .
61003013	But God made a promise to us . And we are waiting for what he promised — a new sky and a new earth . That will be the place where goodness lives .
61003014	Dear friends , we are waiting for this to happen . So try as hard as you can to be without sin and without fault . Try to be at peace with God .
61003015	Remember that we are saved because our Lord is patient . Our dear brother Paul told you that same thing when he wrote to you with the wisdom that God gave him .
